White_Charter: We absolutely love Kawah Puteh [White Crater] Such a beautiful scenery,  cooler weather & the route leading to it were a sight to behold! Stunning! 5 <U+0001F31F>
Tangkuban_Perahu: Awesome view of the volcanic crater even if it was foggy at times and the air smells of sulfur, depending on wind direction. I especially enjoyed getting a good look of how the lava cooled post-eruption! Just be (mentally) prepared for relentless touts and guides pressuring you…
Dusun_Bambu: Very nice place for kids, you can feed animals, take a look around, even ride rides like mini train, or go horseback riding. But if you don't have kids, it is not worth it.
Saung_Angklung: We loved our visit to Angklung Udjo - we visited with one of my good friends who's actually from Bandung. She knows the owner and could tell us a bit more about the background of Udjo.  Not only is this a great afternoon full of joy watching the show but also very charitable.…
Ciater: We loved our visit to Angklung Udjo - we visited with one of my good friends who's actually from Bandung. She knows the owner and could tell us a bit more about the background of Udjo.  Not only is this a great afternoon full of joy watching the show but also very charitable.…
YELLO: The room was dusty, we clean the room by ourself but we can't handle it because too dirty.  Me and my wife sneezed so many times because of the room.expect more from this brand and gave it a try, but so dissapointed. And the xbox is broken.
Aryaduta: I would like to start by saying that the staff is friendly and helpful.  We have stayed in Aryaduta Medan, Aryaduta Jakarta and now Aryaduta Bandung.  All had reasonably good rooms yet all of the hotel’s infrastructures had much need for improvement.  If you stay in Aryaduta Bandung it is because you have a room for a lesser price than other 4 star hotels here.   Our first room on the 14th floor was decent. Large room, large bed, good sized bathroom with tub that was clean enough.  Because of low occupancy the management had us move, after 4 days, to the 5th floor. This is to save money as the covid 19 slowed tourism. What a downgrade this is. The first room smelled bad so we changed. That was easy as the staff is available and helpful. The new room is by far the worst room I’ve…
Trans: Stay at this hotel at November 20, room 1215 - 1217  1. No Towel at suite room 1215 2. No one welcoming you at front door, only security before front door who check for body temperature 3. Breakfast..WOW are you sure this is luxury hotel ?  Restaurant full no distancing very crowded, this covid-19 pandemic situation,  No staff that take care of guest need, only Mr Fa.. forgot his name he say that he is the restaurant manager that help us food is not 5 star quality, food choice is very limited and so so taste, this is not 5 star standard tips Book room without breakfast, is not worth it

White_Charter: When descending the steps from the parking place towards the crater, you gradually see the view appearing. Although I have seen many volcanoes in the last decade, this one is impressive again. The fumarole opposite of the walking steps gives you a feeling of glooming underground…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Beautiful place but don't ever bother of entertaining anyone here.  No guides and dont buy anything.  Guides can tell u wonderful stories but its actually a trap later.  U will be forced to purchase things at super high price and to pay tips.  They will treat u like VIP but…
Dusun_Bambu: Good place to bring your family to this spot. They have some playground and educational for your kids. My children really love when she played flyingfox.
Saung_Angklung: A must see musical show when you in Bandung.   Angklung is a traditional music instrument made by bamboo. The sound is surprisingly good. The owner started to promote Angklung since 1960. Now they trained kids from the village to play this instrument, dance and wayang kulit. …
Ciater: A must see musical show when you in Bandung.   Angklung is a traditional music instrument made by bamboo. The sound is surprisingly good. The owner started to promote Angklung since 1960. Now they trained kids from the village to play this instrument, dance and wayang kulit. …
YELLO: Very nice hotel, and location also, if you need to shopping, this hotel is upper the mall, and you can find food market also behind the mall, so no need to worry. the facility and cleanliness good, I will stay there again :)
Aryaduta: a very good old hotel in the good location. we enjoy the swimming poll and the the park, however the parking slot is very minimum but a security will help you to find a parking slot. keep the good work !!
Trans: Dear Mr Farid, first and foremost kudos to your staff at the Club Lounge with great effort and extra hardworking ( Mr Syakar , Mr Ardi and another guy I forgot his name ). However this stay has been a such TERRIBLE stay since you placed me in a thin iced wall so called Club Premiere room . I was forced to call 3 times gradually to your officer in charge until the neighbour next to my room can calm themselves down. Thank you Trans Luxury for ruining my staycation , you guys succeeded to keep me up all night by giving me thin iced wall room .

White_Charter: Unique crater located at approximately 2400m, 2 hours drive from Bandung. Lovely and unique white lake crater where you can access the crater and have great photo shoot opportunities. For the handicap in wheel chair, you can access a path to a look out point where you can see…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is the one 'attraction' I will recommend everyone to avoid.  1. The most expensive entry tickets in Bandung, and they still charge you for toilets that are not maintained.  2. You will be harassed by persistent sellers who tout you like flies, trying to sell souvenirs at…
Dusun_Bambu: Location is a bit far toward Lembang. The place itself if very good with beautiful landscaping. Food was average, but was compensated by the ambience.  Parking space needs improvement as it is very inconvenient when its raining.
Saung_Angklung: This was a highlight for me in Indonesia. The children are so talented and it is a great, interactive show. I would not miss it!
Ciater: This was a highlight for me in Indonesia. The children are so talented and it is a great, interactive show. I would not miss it!
YELLO: Best location to have a family staycation, because it's beside paskal mall, so it's easy if you want to find some food during the stay.. clean room and facilities.. Nice and helpful staff.. surely we will stay again here someday.. thanks..
Aryaduta: It was a good experience and I recommend this accommodation, staff are friendly willing to help and  place cleaned and neat high security connected to the mall for shopping enjoyable fancy lobby with the classical music at evening
Trans: The hotel has very elegant interior, match with the name luxury :) It has nice swimming pool, very suitable for children, next to the big shopping mall,  Trans Studio Mall, complete with branded boutique, restaurants and food court, also with children's playground. So if you want to take your children on vacation, this hotel is very recommended. And the breakfast has various menu, eastern and western, and they all delicious.

White_Charter: I went here with my parents and 2 of my friends from Lebanon and China to impress them how outstanding the crater is until some things upset us. We came with a car, got stopped at the lockets pay for the car 150k IDR + each person (local 25k IDR, foreigner 75k IDR) we complained…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited in December 2109 with wife and young kids. Site was reopened after 3 months of closure. Entry for foreigners was 200,000 rupiah per head for ages above 5.   Touts would stick to us like leeches. They claim to be from some kind of tourism organization. They followed us…
Dusun_Bambu: A place not recommended to come again unless you really feel like wasting cash and time.  Lack of public facilities like toilet.  In fact you can hardly find one.  Crowded and restaurant unable to sustain the visitor.
Saung_Angklung: A lot of tourist wouldn't miss to come here and watch the traditional Sundanese musical performance. Participation of children's performance was excellent and they performed well in accordance with the rhythm. We were given Saung Angklung to try the music and basically it was…
Ciater: A lot of tourist wouldn't miss to come here and watch the traditional Sundanese musical performance. Participation of children's performance was excellent and they performed well in accordance with the rhythm. We were given Saung Angklung to try the music and basically it was…
YELLO: This place is such a good value for money and services. My partner and i decided to use the room service for most of our dinner during the stay because of its excellent food quality and affordable price! We had a great view of the mountain from our room as well which was really great. We would definitely come back to this hotel in the future if we visit bandung again!
Aryaduta: Great location and have direct access to the mall. Spacious and clean room. Good sport facilities, gym, swimming pool, spa, sauna. Breakfast have a huge selection and all the food its delicious.    Close to various food street Overall i enjoy stay in this hotel
Trans: - The Hotel is very luxurious <U+0001F60D><U+0001F929>  - Breakfast very complete and very tasty <U+0001F60D><U+0001F929>  - Complete Facilities <U+0001F60D><U+0001F929>  - Very strategic location <U+0001F60D><U+0001F929>  - Very satisfying service <U+000

White_Charter: This crater with lake and some other trees are not quite worthwhile and impressive compared to other craters in Indonesia like Bromo and the nearby Tangkuban Perahu.  It has a small lake with turquoise water and some other trees and sulphur smoke with smell. However to get there…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Few craters and hot spring. Even if you are traveling with a car please plan to walk and to roam around at least 4-5 hours.
Dusun_Bambu: This place located out of the Bandung city but it's worth of visit. Surrounding by green nature site and it has rabbit garden. Recommended for family trip
Saung_Angklung: Worth spending the afternoon at this place to learn about this musical instrument and enjoy the excellent show. The host (the grandson of the founder) was very good. Recommended 100%
Ciater: Worth spending the afternoon at this place to learn about this musical instrument and enjoy the excellent show. The host (the grandson of the founder) was very good. Recommended 100%
YELLO: Everything is nice ....  i love it. Apalagi pelayanannya sangat memuaskan. Room so clean .... wifi so fast ....  yg kurang pas check in. Bisa masuk room jam 3 sore ... ya mungkin karena high season and i can understood.... overall is good
Aryaduta: Nice, cool, clean, friendly staff, delicious food. Cozy place, recommended. Fast response. Surrounded by culinary and mall. Easy to find out some food or drink outside hotel. Complete facilty @hotel (gyms, spa, swimming pool, restaurant.
Trans: This is the best hotel ive ever stayed. Nice food, great pool for my kids to play, close to trans studio bandung. Keep up the good work. We hope we can stay again in the meantime. Wish u the best, trans luxury !!

White_Charter: An okay site for adult, probably a good place for children or teenager (primary/junior high) to go on a study tour, if their teachers could explain what's inside or what happened in this site. A natural hot bed of sulfuric lake and mud/swamp made by volcanic eruption from ages…
Tangkuban_Perahu: There are 3 craters we visited domas first it cost an extra 300k after the 200k pax entry. They say it's 1.2 kilometer walk. 900 flat then 300 hilly. The 300 meter part is at least 600meters. You get a guide fur the 300k who gives you little info and plenty of sob stories. When…
Dusun_Bambu: Cooling weather at Lembang. The kids enjoyed themselves at the playground. Most activities require additional cost after paying the entrance tickets. The lunch at the food court was good. Most of them do not speak English, better to have someone who can translate to Bahasa.
Saung_Angklung: I brought my friends and her family (with young children) here during weekend. The travel to Saung Angklung Udjo was bad because of the long traffic jam. My friend and her children had fun on making angklung and learn how to play this musical instrument.If you want to see and…
Ciater: I brought my friends and her family (with young children) here during weekend. The travel to Saung Angklung Udjo was bad because of the long traffic jam. My friend and her children had fun on making angklung and learn how to play this musical instrument.If you want to see and…
YELLO: Everything was excellent. From the cleanliness of the room, great service, location very good, and the price was affordable. I had a great stay here and would like to revisit this hotel again in the future.
Aryaduta: One of the fancy old hotel from 90s, love the ambience and open air area from the lobby straight to 15th floor. The location very close to factory outlets, supermarket and restaurants in Jl. Riau. Also, the hotel is in the same building with Mal. They have tennis court, gym, swimming pool, sauna and hot whirl pool inside sauna room.
Trans: I went to that hotel a year ago and thought it was a really cool place to be. The room was large, beautiful and the bathroom was extraordinary. The breakfast was great because they provide all sorts of food - continentan, local and whatever you want. My daughter had a good time playing in the swimming-pool and the mall nearby have lots of cheap and delicious restaurants. I definitely recomment this place.

White_Charter: We can go up with small van @idr25k/person or bring ur own car and pay idr150k for parking plus idr25k/person , it's include the mask. Dont forget to bring umbrella and rain coat because it rainy up there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Crater of mt Tangkuban Parahu is very beautiful, amazing, great view and authentic panoramic. Sulfur is odorless by the time we visit on July 2019, than it usual. You better visit in the morning, before fog is come by and block out the crater and the top of mt. HIstory of mt…
Dusun_Bambu: This park is complete package for short vacation with fresh air, it provides place to stay, leisure park, food place, children playground and lots of photo spot. This park equipped with artificial river, rabbit feeding, children sliding and also support by shuttle from parking…
Saung_Angklung: A really fun activity in Bandung. The performance is very entertaining,showcasing Shadow puppets, Dances from different regions of Indonesia, and of course the Ankjung music. The students are very talented, and Udjo's son will also coach the crowd to play the Ankjung together.…
Ciater: A really fun activity in Bandung. The performance is very entertaining,showcasing Shadow puppets, Dances from different regions of Indonesia, and of course the Ankjung music. The students are very talented, and Udjo's son will also coach the crowd to play the Ankjung together.…
YELLO: Hospitality is great, clean and tidy room, the room, aisle, lobby smells good, gaming zone was so helpful to stay in hotel while rain all day, the connection was also great. gonna stay at yello again soon.
Aryaduta: I love the room. Its comfy, clean, and big. Strategic location, it connected with Bandung Indah Plaza. Nice staff..they give me a room in the top floor with a beautiful view (room 1504). Many option menu for breakfast. Unfortunately, the swimming pool isn't with warm water so you can't swim in the night. Will be back to Aryaduta if i go to Bandung again.
Trans: for the room...I must say it was so nice and cozy...love the breakfast and please don't forget to come and get nice coffee in th 18th restaurant...enjoy the evening Bandung's nite view while we have nice dinner

White_Charter: Took us 2.5 hours to reach the crater. We arrived at about 10 am. No sulphur smell though and just a little vapour. You are only allowed here 15 minutes for health reasons. Spent a while walking round it. Just be careful you don't go beyond the allowed boundaries or your shoes…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited Tangkuban Perahu during my company retreat. The view was amazing and it is worth the time to go take a look if you are in Bandung.   However, beware of touts, there were many of them. As we were quite a big group, some of them followed us throughout and one even offered…
Dusun_Bambu: Its a nice and beautiful place with beautiful landscape. Several restaurant to try out. Chalet on the lake make it a unique place. Its a huge place to walk around, to up the hill, to take photos. Got game park, traditional house from bamboos with musical instrument from bamboos.…
Saung_Angklung: Because i bring my guest who like music, so i guided them 2 weeks ago to Saung Angklung Udjo. They were excited to see the show of angklung and also they can learn how to play angklung. Its easy to play.. And proofing everybody can play angklung..
Ciater: Because i bring my guest who like music, so i guided them 2 weeks ago to Saung Angklung Udjo. They were excited to see the show of angklung and also they can learn how to play angklung. Its easy to play.. And proofing everybody can play angklung..
YELLO: The staff is friendly and helpful and the oom hotel is good, but need improvement for payment on website yello (tauzia). I am very comfort with ambience (room, check in place, lobby). I love the arts at every side place.
Aryaduta: Hotel is in the heart of the city. Helpful and friendly staff, yummy breakfast, huge bedroom, great facilities, comfy bed, easy access to everywhere. Overall, had great time staying at Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: Nice hotel, they prepare a nice little surprised if you are celebrating your spesial day .here. Kamar luas, style klasik tapi modern. Staff ramah. Kolam renang bagus dan bersih tapi memang sedikit berangin.

White_Charter: Entry fees: (1) Foreigner ('Bule') pays 3 times the local's fee. (2) car entry fee (higher than the local and 'Bule' fee. This is dandy. But the road from the gate up to the lake is atrocious.  I visited this place for the photographic potential of the lake. I visited in…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The amount of touts here really ruins the experience. If you want to enjoy the area, don’t bring your wallets or bags out with you so that you can say you have no money when you’re harassed by the touts.
Dusun_Bambu: Come with status Not a staff anymore And really as a guest, I feel something different Because now it's more critical to see something that happens from the visitor's side, The place is still awake its beauty but it's just unfortunate that the flowers that are the pride are gone…
Saung_Angklung: Loved the performances there. A good introduction to the different cultures in Indonesia. The host spoke both Bahasa and English. The kids performing were really cute and the dancers were talented. The end segment was really fun cause we got to learn and play the angklung with…
Ciater: Loved the performances there. A good introduction to the different cultures in Indonesia. The host spoke both Bahasa and English. The kids performing were really cute and the dancers were talented. The end segment was really fun cause we got to learn and play the angklung with…
YELLO: Overall is good, at the time of check in, stay there and check out is easy and also the service of each staff is good, but further enhanced for its hospitality , so thar visitors provide good feedback and can give a good impression also for the hotel and can be a better hotel if everyone is interested in all the facilities and comfort of each guest
Aryaduta: I stay for 3 nights in Business Room.  The room is very spacious and nice. The bed is good specially I like their pillows. Bathroom equiped with bathtub. Breakfast also nice, many choice of food. Minus thing is in parking area. Parking area is limited specially when there is an event in hotel.  I recommend this hotel for stay in Bandung,
Trans: My whole family recently stayed at this hotel and we enjoyed our stay there. The rooms were lovely and housekeeping was excellent throughout our stay there. My parents tried out their celebrity suite and were very impressed with the suite. The staff there were very accommodating and always greet us with a smile. Do try out their spa. My wife and mum kept on saying how much they enjoyed their treatment there.  We will be back to stay here again for sure!

White_Charter: On the road of discovery .. what seems like mere natural vegetation to some, but to both of us, makes for an interesting discussion ..   Pretty white field of tiny flowers hugs the greenery tt guides us all the way on the ascend to the crater .. KAWAH PUTIH  .. the volcanic soil…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was great to visit  Tangkuban Perahu. there were a few things that we disappointed and hope it will change it one day  Firstly , the entrance price was different between a  local and foreigner - the point was but it was not make any extra services in term of paying more but…
Dusun_Bambu: This place provides various park with different theme. They also provide rabbit to pet and hold. Could be nice place for kids. They provides restaurant too, could be good place to take good picture. However, I went to this place around 3 years ago. Heard from my friend that they…
Saung_Angklung: They provide interactive entertainment. You will get to make sound with your angklung too. The heir will know which tone you play. I got to dance with them in the last dance. It was so fun even though I went alone. Souvenir shops have interesting stuffs related to the related…
Ciater: They provide interactive entertainment. You will get to make sound with your angklung too. The heir will know which tone you play. I got to dance with them in the last dance. It was so fun even though I went alone. Souvenir shops have interesting stuffs related to the related…
YELLO: the location was really good for me, the room is fine, the bathroom is a bit too small. i left the room for a dinner out and i remember i've turn off the room's lamp, but when i get back to the room later, the lamp was on. i dunno, is it supposed to be like that or?
Aryaduta: The room is so big, clean and neat. Love so much the swan towels decoration on my bed.. just like honeymoon room <U+0001F60D> my kids also happy.. I have 4 daughter.. 15, 12, 10 and 3 yo.. and all are happy. They stay at different room without connecting door but still feel safe.. I bring my  parents and they stay at different floor because my father is smoking, but the front office give me flexible key card so I can access the lift to visit my parents even at different floor.. hotel position is near mall so easy to find anything we need.. they also have a nice garden to relax in the city centre.. overall is perfect..
Trans: the name of the hotel describes its facilities.. the room is comfortable.. my baby too he strolling around the room happily.. the breakfast is good and the pool also good.. all the staff are friendly..

White_Charter: Bring a mask, jacket. head gear. be prepared to smell like sulphur even after you leave the place. do support the local photographers. they can take very good photos for a low fee. do bargain with them if you choose to take many shots. pics are loaded into yur phone for easy…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Read mixed reviews about this site but decided to proceed anyway since we had come all the way to Bandung and Tangkuban Perahu was one of the top attractions.   One thing’s for sure - this place ain’t cheap. Entrance fee per foreign visitor is Rp200K per person, hence with a…
Dusun_Bambu: We initially planned to visit this place as a photo and lunch stop before heading off to other attractions. The journey from our hotel in Braga Walk to this place took us about an hour but we got that, the guide suggested we took up the special offer to enjoy the activities in…
Saung_Angklung: Very interactive performance with audience, children performing, culture of different areas were shared in the dances. We were also given task to play angklung and play music base on directions from the emcee who is multi talented who has a beautiful voice to sing along. My…
Ciater: Very interactive performance with audience, children performing, culture of different areas were shared in the dances. We were also given task to play angklung and play music base on directions from the emcee who is multi talented who has a beautiful voice to sing along. My…
YELLO: Connected to the Paskal mall directly and also best services especially by the front office team! (I forget who were there, but they’re amazing)  Spacious room, clean room and has reasonable price to stay. They also applied the COVID-19 protocol. So you don’t have to worry to stay here. We went to their swimming pool as well while enjoying the view of Bandung city in the morning<U+0001F324>!   Last but not least, shout for one of the Front Officer who helps me for my luggage and stuff!  Once again thankyou Yello Paskal and the team. I had a great stay!
Aryaduta: I already tried many hotels in Bandung, and no doubt Aryaduta is one of the best hotel in Bandung. But please make some improvement for parking space, its quite hard to find empty space. Breakfast is nice, variety of breakfast should be improved.
Trans: from entering the lobby, with friendly front office and security services, very luxurious rooms with modern features, welcome snacks and fruit baskets, branded amenitis, swimming pools with temperature control to not feel cold and with white sands. delicious food with perfect menu choices. restaurant and lounge on the 18th floor with a glass bridge is very instagramable. the location is next to the mall, really there is no minus for this hotel.

White_Charter: I went from Bandung and used the public transportation. It took around 2 hours depends on the traffic. Its a nice place with a good view that can refresh my eyes and my mind. We need to used their local transportation if we want to go there, around 5km. The worst thing at there…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Aside from the hefty entrance fee of 200k for foreign visitors, the view of Ratu crater is fab. Cool weather and a short trek up to view Ratu is nice. Didnt have time to view domas but heard warnings of cheats and touting.
Dusun_Bambu: Spend 1 night at dusun glamping site,  it was nice and chilly. However everything went downhill when my 7 year old son got stung by 2 bees at the bouncy castle at the bamboo playground. To my horror the playground doesn't have any first aid kit at all, and refused to refund the…
Saung_Angklung: We were here at Saung Angklung Udjo during our short weekend getaway in Bandung. The show was brilliant, it comprised of different traditional entertainment show of Sunda / West Java region. The show was opened with a puppetry performance called Wayang Golek and followed by…
Ciater: We were here at Saung Angklung Udjo during our short weekend getaway in Bandung. The show was brilliant, it comprised of different traditional entertainment show of Sunda / West Java region. The show was opened with a puppetry performance called Wayang Golek and followed by…
YELLO: PROS - room is big for budget hotel - always have hot water and shower is very nice - staff is very friendly and welcome - carpark is big as it join with the mall - directly shopping centre below the hotel  CONS - wall between room and floor is quite thin. And it's noisy depending on the guest next to your room or above your room. Can't sleep well because of this - please re-check cleanliness of the room especially near the window. I found a bunch of dead small flies lying there and it's quite a shock. - the tv channel goes blank every 5 minute. And it goes completely blank by midnight. So no tv at all during my stay. Disappointing.
Aryaduta: One of the best hotel in Bandung. From the arrival till departure we felt all the hospitality and comfort. Breakfast beverage was awesome, this hotel also surprisingly attached to the shopping mall, what a great experience. No place like Aryaduta. Thanks a lot
Trans: I really enjoy my stay. Have been guest for two weeks now and this is plenty of time to realize how staff goes way beyond their duty to make you feel comfortable. Hotel is conveniently located near mall and amusement park with plenty of restaurants, cafes, bakeries, supermarket, shops... Love it and recommend it.

White_Charter: This crater is unique in the sense that it is filled with sulfuric excretion and it smokes.  Spend 15 minutes to see the wonder, take some photos and leave.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Wonderful experience at the mountain. Other than the fantastic views, had a guide which brought us down to the Domas crater. The walk down was about 25min and not too challenging, although the legs were a little wobbly after that. But we enjoyed the time cooking the eggs and…
Dusun_Bambu: Good and cozy accomodation Good and vibrant place to stay Good and indulging food & beverages Good and comfy rooms Good rates for good people Good leisure for good families Good pique-nique
Saung_Angklung: Great and Artsy Performance from Childrean an Teenagers in Saung Mang Udjo. It's really fascinating watching them play angklung and Teathre
Ciater: Great and Artsy Performance from Childrean an Teenagers in Saung Mang Udjo. It's really fascinating watching them play angklung and Teathre
YELLO: I stayed two days in a superior room with doublebed.  YELLO Hotel Paskal is located inside paskal shopping complex, so if you bring car, you'll enter a parking area. the hotel itself doesn't have designated parking area for itself, but you can either park at mall basement or in front of the mall lobby (but it was always full somehow). But don't worry about the parking fees, as the hotel gives you free parking voucher for your entire stay.  location wise, The Hotel stand on top of upscale and modern shopping mall with top name retailer, restaurants and supermarkets. The area around the hotel is full of shops and restaurants as well. there is also foodcourt (Paskal Food Market) near the hotel selling plenty of Bandung traditional dishes. So that's a lot in vicinities.   As for the…
Aryaduta: When booking reservation, joining room was requested but none available when got there. One of the room wasn’t ready, had to wait an hour. Limited 2 towels, they were yellowish. No face towels. Stains on the comforter, had to be replaced caused it was bad. Carpets in the room and lobby dirty. Strong cigarette in the lobby even though no smoking sign in placed. Toilet kept on flushing, had to pushed the lever every time toilet is used. They resolved the issues we brought out. Staffs were courteous.
Trans: Good experience..   The hotel is very comfortable, the service is also satisfying, from the receptionist and all the staff are very friendly ... hopefully getting better in the future and we will comeback soon<U+0001F60A>

White_Charter: “Kawah Putih -,Must Visit when you are in Bandung” was what a friend told us before our trip. Well, after a nearly 2 hours drive from Bandung City Centre and through narrow mountain roads lined with forestation, vast tea plantations and local housings, we arrived at this famous…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If u haven seen a volcano then perhaps u can give a shot. Will i go back there again, no!  1. Foreigners r require to pay Rp300k per person instead of Rp30k for locals.  2. The moment u parked ur car there, swarms of tour guides n peddlers will come to u and they will keep…
Dusun_Bambu: i've been here with her to having lunch and it was amazing, i enjoy the food that they offer to us. Good recommendation
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the most cultural places in The Capital City of West Java Province, Bandung. It's a tiny 'village' of which the Sundanese traditional musical instrument called BAMBU is made, displayed and even played in a very interesting colossal performance…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the most cultural places in The Capital City of West Java Province, Bandung. It's a tiny 'village' of which the Sundanese traditional musical instrument called BAMBU is made, displayed and even played in a very interesting colossal performance…
YELLO: be more and growth of hospitality you managed. a staf was give a friendly service and always smile even meet or walking area. the construction is unic, interior are semi milenials and fresh. but my room its so hot in day because the sun is sorted via glass wall. so it little bit distrubing when i stay. the bed isn't symetric so has doing lite clicky sound when i sleep. the room so quiet that i will stay longer at yello. nice
Aryaduta: I really didn't expect that the hotel will remain the same as 9-10 years ago, when was under different hotel management. But I like the hotel, fast check in and out, room is big and clean, good service, fantastic food and breakfast buffet, and very good location. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who want to visit Bandung,
Trans: Holiday is here, bandung is the answer and everything will be convinient if we stay here because therea a mall, leisure for kids, lovely night for the parenta and food are delicious. Everything are cool! Water fountain for kids as well

Dusun_Bambu: I love this place. The view is very nice and love the small lake they have. But i dont think the price is reasonable for a small family to br charge for 6 package minimum in order to eat besides the lake. The bambu houses happens to be a foto corner. I was hoping that it's a…

YELLO: Stayed for one night in this hotel, after 8 hours of driving i finally arrived at midnight (23.30). Im confious where to park that night as basement was closed during Covid Pandemic, after few minutes waiting in lobby a security finally come and directing to park outside of hotel lobby. Reception are on the 4th floor, check in was fast and friendly. Went up to our room, corridor was bright and warm, room is spacious, clean and comfortable. The minus point is bed size is 80/90cm i think, its too small and light so when i change position when i sleep the bed will move.  Bathroom is clean, water pressure was okay.  Breakfast only avail for room service, menu is american and indonesian you may choose as preference.   There is on small nice thing, the next day around 12.20Pm i went…
Aryaduta: This is hotel so far is so good.. But i little disappointed for a WiFi access very slow and coverage signal is not good even im in bedroom. Some TV-digital can't be acess, and have a bad quality image due to low signal maybe
Trans: I was enjoy my stay at The Trans Luxury Hotel, the room is very clean, and comfort. the services also very good. I hope one day I will come again with my friends or family, and spend our time in this hotel.

White_Charter: Very beautiful view and make sure you bring your mask.  They also sell masks there,  but i think its better if we brought our own mask.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is my first trip to crater in Indonesia and I found this place awesome. The crater I visited was the one non active. I might visit again next time to see the active crater (Omas Crater)
Dusun_Bambu: well if you bring a baby - its not much todo, but kids & teens would love to do activities. Enjoy the nature , views & food.  tips: Don't go on peak /holiday period.  Take other route - don't go through Lembang area to save travel time.
Saung_Angklung: In my opinion, its a must-see when you visit Bandung.  Helps you to learn and understand more about the culture. In addition, the performance is really great and interesting, we had an enjoyable time!
Ciater: In my opinion, its a must-see when you visit Bandung.  Helps you to learn and understand more about the culture. In addition, the performance is really great and interesting, we had an enjoyable time!
YELLO: Great Hotel Near Paskal 23. Good portion breakfast. Friendly crew. Nice Room design. City center location. Sayangnya tidak bisa pakai poolnya karena lagi tutup. AC aga kurang dingin. Good value of money.
Aryaduta: We have pleasant stay during our trip in Bandung. Friendly and helpfull staffs. Good food with good taste and varieties. Complete facilities for family vacation. Awesome. We're gonna back to this hotel again on our next trip.
Trans: The service at trans luxury hotel is always the best, they always help fullfill your needs. Another plus point is u can just walk to the mall if u need anything u forget to bring One of the best 5 star hotel in Bandung.

White_Charter: #thekulotjourney  Kawah Putih is a striking crater lake and tourist spot in a volcanic crater about 50 km south of Bandung, West Java in Indonesia. This vast volcanic crater is filled with turquoise colored water and air filled with sulfur. A must visit natural attraction in…
Tangkuban_Perahu: After all the reviews, we decided to visit. It was cloudy so we were full of anticipation of a different sort. Ticket price for foreigners is 200k a pop, so make it last! True enough, clouds floated in, making the place mysterious and spooky. Remember to bring a windbreaker! We…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place, we really enjoy coming here. It's been twice. You can find a lotta traditional food in Pasar Khatulistiwa. Now it's easier because you can pay it with e money, not a local payment card from Dusun Bambu.    Children will love the activities, we tried Trampoline,…
Saung_Angklung: The activity was good for family, we can learn how to play angklung the otentic music of west java indonesia. The conductor is verry communicative and friendly to teach us how to play the music. And many children bringing us to play and traditional dancing. Absolutly great
Ciater: The activity was good for family, we can learn how to play angklung the otentic music of west java indonesia. The conductor is verry communicative and friendly to teach us how to play the music. And many children bringing us to play and traditional dancing. Absolutly great
YELLO: Nice & good, the staff very warm and friendly, room was clean & decorative, environment was great... only the view quite disappointing... view of paskal mall deck... and there are dead bird on the roof deck.. but that is out of your control I think... :)  Thanks
Aryaduta: overall OK.. Aryaduta Bandung feel better than another Arya Duta because the Aryaduta Bandung is not too old.. for improvement feedback, smoking area near elevator better relocate to outdoor.. very appreciate to receptionist because when i arrived very late, they call me and make sure my reservation.. they also can tolerance when i must late check out because my seminar schedule..
Trans: When you arrived at this hotel you got all you need. Its next to mall and trans studio. The hotel facilities such as Kids corner, kids playground and kids pool are very cool. There white sands in the pool make your children feels like at the ocean.  The fitness center is very clean and quite complete.  Last but not least. For food if you dont feel like to explore outside of hotel.food at mall and hotel is very excellent and various too.

White_Charter: Simply stunning view and do avoid the weekends to avoid the crowds. There is a trek you can take upwards to view. Or if you are feeling lazy, can take a pony ride up. A definite must visit
Tangkuban_Perahu: The nothing special attraction in Bandung. Expensive entrance fee and parking. But all we can see is as the same as the picture (the Ratu Crater). Nothing much. If you wish to visit another crater, you have to pay additional 300k for 5 of us just to experience hot spring and…
Dusun_Bambu: We are a group of 2 adults, 5 young adults & 3 kids. We paid Rp 70k for the activity pass (Jun 19 promo) on top of the Rp 25k? basic admission ticket and the buffet of activities made visit the highlight of our 5 days Bandung visit.  We took the shuttle service from the entrance…
Saung_Angklung: If you are interested to know the genuine cultures & people of Bandung, this is the place. It's not only about musical instrument, but also experiences & knowledges.
Ciater: If you are interested to know the genuine cultures & people of Bandung, this is the place. It's not only about musical instrument, but also experiences & knowledges.
YELLO: I have stayed in Yello for many times. Staying in this hotel makes me feel at home, comfortable and secured. Any kind of services has met the expected ones with affordable/ reasonable room rate. Keep it as it is or make it much better that it is. Thanks a lot
Aryaduta: Aryaduta is one of the oldest Indonesia hotel chain. Aryaduta bandung is no exception, but don't let the old building steer you away. The moment you step into the hotel, a classical music playing in the background, carpet flooring, high ceiling and wooden furniture immediately gives you old but gold ambience. it feels so relaxing and... exclusive.  to start with, the value i got for paying less at this hotel, far exceed than those modern and chic hotel chain.   the staff greeted and treated us like royalty. check in was super fast and they did offer their hand to get our luggages up.   Our room is.. SPACIOUS. large king bed is very comfortable and firm to my liking. There are sofa too. The room has wide, floor to ceiling window overlooking Bandung city view. there are also water…
Trans: I was very happy to stay here and this is my third time staying here.  all services provided have not changed one bit. spacious rooms with good lighting, spacious bathrooms, room temperature that can be adjusted and pillows that can be selected according to our wishes

White_Charter: Beautiful lake with sulphur. Pretty to look at but simply exposure to no more than 15 mins. Bring N95 masks for protection if planning to stay longer. Ask your driver to bring you to the top (Sunan Ibu) - this is about 5 minutes ride and then climb up the steep uneven steps to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: After a quite long drive and into a busy car park we all excitedly climbed the few busy steps to the view...mmmmm!!..disused coal mine was my first thought and pretty much still is...
Dusun_Bambu: I went there with my guests from  Swiss.. And they all felt happy.. Because in dusun bambu has plenty flowers.. And when u going back, u bring 1 plant for each person during weekend. I recommend you all to come to this place..
Saung_Angklung: We as a group of friends visited the Saung Angklung Udjo - an inside view of Indondesian culture. The show started with a puppet show displaying battle between good and bad. Then moved onto the different costumes and dancing of the many varied islands of Indonesia - this was…

YELLO: Don't hestitate to waste your money to stay here, i guarantee you it's worth everything you paid for in here. From Room cleanliness, view, service, location, everything just went great! Amazing experience.
Aryaduta: This is the second time staying at Aryaduta Bandung. I love the classic ambience in this hotel. Very nice and clean and comfortable for your staycation. Located in central Bandung, near to any famous destination. Will come again to this hotel
Trans: One of the best hotel in bandung for family vacation. Service excellent, good food, great amenities,  location next to Trans Studio Mall. I enjoyed and obviously will come back again for sure!  Recommended <U+2764>

YELLO: food ok, room all great, the staff very nice, but sadly i didnt try the swimming pool, only the TV is too big for the room. The design of the Hotel are good, also this hotel connected to Paskal 23 shopping center.
Aryaduta: It was our first time in Aryaduta Bandung. Not to compare them with Aryaduta Jakarta, but the service was so much better in Jakarta. The room was OK, but the toiletries were not quite satisfactory. Our bathroom was so out-of-date, the shower was not functioned properly. We thought you need to renovate the bathroom, and also the elevator. some of the lights in the elevator were off. too bad.   The food was good, for in-door dining and breakfast. The varieties were good, perfect for our enjoyment. Too bad the breakfast area was too crowded - we guess it was because we were in high occupancy week.
Trans: Nice hotel. One of the best value for money. Room was clean, staff were friendly, facilities were clean and well maintained. Located in an entertainment complex. Good delicious good from the resraurant

Tangkuban_Perahu: We was there on February 2019. After the eruption on Feb 2013, visitors not allowed to going down. So just walk on top walk path. My opinion : if you want to feel the crater better visit Domas Crater; which located before Tangkuban Perahu.
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is a nice places for couples or family They have many facilities for family like restaurants, hotel, nice view for take a picture  The foods are very delicious, and We take our lunch at Purbasari Restaurant. Must try for Sundanese food and suitable with their…

Trans: Very nice hotel.  Clean, well appointed and staff also excellent.  The only thing that lets the hotel down is breakfast.   Had to wait 10 mins for 2 poached eggs. They just don’t seem to have the breakfast service properly organised.

Dusun_Bambu: This place recommended by ny daughter....very nice place....nice view...the garden....the stream...the lake....all the facilities.....cool place to be with family...relaxing....

White_Charter: I was there in the morning  and was told by my driver guide that it is unusually quiet because it is Ramadan month. All by ourselves, my small little group and I enjoyed the peace and serenity of this beautiful and stunning white crater. The bluish green water with a clear blue…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I have been in march 2019 in my trip to lembang. I saw angkuban Perahu is a stratovolcano 30 km north of the city of Bandung, the provincial capital of West Java, Indonesia.The weather was cool.But,cold for kids. The view was great and there are hot spring close around 1 km. …
Dusun_Bambu: We stayed in camp for 1 night. It was very refreshing. The camp was located in  private area. Even there were raining in the night we still can sleep without worry about tent leakage or anything else.  We could enjoy very refreshing morning. Woke up because of the birds chirping…
Saung_Angklung: A must see.It was so nice to see children as young as 4 yrs old to appreciate art.It will refresh your mind and awaken the soul.The sound of angklung was very refresing.Towards the end audience will have chance to participate in the activities.
Ciater: A must see.It was so nice to see children as young as 4 yrs old to appreciate art.It will refresh your mind and awaken the soul.The sound of angklung was very refresing.Towards the end audience will have chance to participate in the activities.
YELLO: My first Yello was in Harmoni. Beyond my expectation so that I have high expectation for this brand.  I was afraid and I was wrong, Yello paskal meet my expectation, superb service and again, they work with heart, same compliment as I gave to a first one. Now I’m sure that Yello will give me high quality service.  Thank you for Niar and big-tall with tattoo on left hand guy (forgot his name) in a restaurant. They work with their heart. Send them my regards. They show me what is Yello and why Yello is a must for me. Will be there again for sure.
Aryaduta: so far the breakfast is nice, i am happy with the smoking room. only the bathroom, the hot water is just warm. the room is clean. the room service and GR is quite responsive. great view to the city. nice overall.
Trans: You get what you paid. I want to give 5 star but the check out experience waiting for more than 8 minutes just to give my lugugae tags make it just 4 star. With this 5 star brand hotel provide only 2 reception and 1 concierge staff is not make any sense. Overall this is good hotel. Love the kids club staff they so helpfull.

White_Charter: Short walk down some stairs to the gorgeous ijen crater! Rained a little but that made if even better in a very mystic kind of way!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Best way to get there is with a scooter in my opinion. Rented a scooter for 90K (Yes more expensive than Bali but that's the way it is in Bandung). Took around 1 hour from centre of Bandung to the top of the crater. Getting out of Bandung is the longest part due to congestion.…
Dusun_Bambu: I went there on Friday morning around 10 pm. Firstly quite sceptical due to lack of review regarding to this place. It was an amazing place and we spent more than 4 hours there to enjoy the view, serenity and awesome activities there.
Saung_Angklung: I visit this place recently and it was a pleasant experience. They have the mc where she explained the history of this place, specifically about angklung itself. They have an amazing show, from wayang golek demonstration, an angklung orchestra,a band with traditional instrument,…

YELLO: After staying at Lembang, decided to stay a night at Bandung and we choose this hotel. We are a group of 26 people.  Overall, the rooms are nice, clean, not spacious but just the right size we need. The staffs are friendly and the breakfast is superb. Connected to a mall, easy to find dinner like we did last night.  Maybe the only hiccup is the parking area as it is joint to a mall.  Will I stay here again? Yes. Very soon.
Aryaduta: They have not enough parking space against their rooms. When I stay in this hotel for 2 nights (weekend), definitely as a guest we have a parking space facility. But unfortunately since the hotel parking space occupied, the security allocate us to the mall parking space which is very close to the hotel. BUT the to get the free parking we have to scan the ticket, and the front office staff ask us to the security and when we come to the security, he asked us to go to the front office. Why they do not manage the simple free parking procedure for the guest????
Trans: The hotel offers complete facillities, its location connect to Trans Studio ( indoor theme park, shopping mall and restaurants. The hotel provide a pool and sands for kids and various menu on breakfast also give us choice of pillow preference. Amazingly, they provide us a bolster too. Thank you

White_Charter: The crater is supercool -- dead things, acid lake, all white, poisonous fumes, smoke going our from the mountain, yeah. But come on 75k per person and 150k for car where you cannot get without one. Really?
Tangkuban_Perahu: The Legend of Tangkuban Perahu  Once upon a time, in West Java, there lived a wise king who had a beautiful daughter.   Her name was Dayang Sumbi.  She liked weaving very much.  One day, she was weaving a cloth. Suddenly, one of her tool fell to the ground.  She was very tired…
Dusun_Bambu: A nice and comfortable to spend a day especially with family. Went on Saturday and the place wasn't overly packed. There was a eatery place inside, so don't have to worry about food though the price is slightly higher than outside.
Saung_Angklung: Visited this attraction during a business trip to Bandung. Situated about a 40-minute drive from the centre of town (Bandung’s notorious traffic permitting), it’s an important cultural centre preserving Angklung music as well as other forms. At 3:30pm each day there’s a…

YELLO: My 2nd visit here. Still recommended hotel at mid-range price. Location above mall give another plus point if you need something or just want to refreshing. Room and bathroom were clean, also good selection of tv channel. Checking in and checking out also fast and simple.  Please expect heavy traffic around hotel, and if you bring your own car will need extra time to parked your car during weekend (parking area mix with mall's visitor)
Aryaduta: It very nice to stay at aryaduta hotel bandung, clean room.. nice pool.. and delicious food for brekafast.. but it my room there is no mini bar an mini refrigerator.. but its ok if tou dont need mini bar at all..
Trans: Positive :  - rooms are nice  - friendly fast check in staff : Havier and check out staff : Chikita - superb facilities  - breakfast nice  - evening cocktail at Club Lounge day 1 nice and tasty, day 2 not at all - very limited menu.  - swimming pool packed with kids which for us not comfort swim with all noisy kids.  - love to take Detox Juice during breakfast. Nice and Freshness  Negative :  - Star service need to get attention, day 1 ask for pillow bolster since 4pm and finally can get around 7 or 8 pm and direct request to HK staff whom passed by outside room area.  - ask extra shower gel and shampoo and got not the same brand Aqua, and without explanation.  - in Club Lounge lots of daily worker staff and they didn't get enough brief on product knowledge. They didn't wrong,…

Tangkuban_Perahu: Been here in 2016. We took a tour because this place is so far from our hotel. Its a cheap tour for me because its only 550,000 idr with 5 places to visit. And our driver so friendly. I book Jacktour before reach here. And until im still friend with the driver. So Tangkuban…
Dusun_Bambu: Beautiful. It's a place to hang out with family. 1 full day to covered all activities (if intrested).
Saung_Angklung: Very someah person,,,we start in the morning,,first they explain history of saung angklung,,,the pr was very polite,,,recomended attaction when you visit bandung

YELLO: With my wife and son, I had a trip to Bandung for just one night. Considering my purpose of visit, which is neither for a vacation or a shopping spree, I decided to stay at an affordable good-quality hotel. After having browsed for a suitable premise, Yello seems to be an interesting choice, as I have an enjoyable stay before in Yello Harmoni Jakarta, and this Yello Paskal is attached to an upscale stylish mall called Paskal 23. Once again, Yello didn't let me down. From the moment I checked-in until I left for home, all of the staff provided their best services. Room size is typical for 3-stars rated hotel. Amenities provided is nothing to complain about. Breakfast spread is sufficient for its class, and it all tastes good. Next to this hotel is a stylish shopping mall, where…
Aryaduta: The establishment used to be called Grand Hyatt Bandung. It was one of the best hotel in Bandung, back then. I still like the room size that is big and the king size bed is comfortable. Bathroom need upgrading as we found water stains and marks in the bathtub. When we enter the room, some of its amenities were missing. E.g. luggage rack, not enough soap nor liquid soap. Breakfast is nice, although more variety is much appreciated.
Trans: The name stands for itself, nice, clean comfortable room. Extremely hospitable, friendly and helpful staff. During peak seasson check in/out could takes a while. And finding a parking spot is challenging

White_Charter: I visited The White Crater or Batu Putih (local name) last week. It was a breathtaking view with beautiful sceneries surrounding it. You can access all the way until the edge of the crater and you can take lots of instagrammable pictures. The journey from Bandung City center…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee per pax as foreigners, and travel by car with additional car fee. Is real cooling up there.
Dusun_Bambu: Picturesque! Bamboo everywhere! Super like the prosperity coins! So creative! Restaurant in nests are awesome idea! Playground is well maintained. A place that caters from young to old. It would be nice if the lake water is crystal clear. Perfect!
