YELLO: The people who work there are very professional and very helpful.i would love to come back! Guys thanks for all your services it is greatly appreciated.it feels like I’m just at home, only here I don’t have to do anything...
Aryaduta: Stay 3 nights/4 days at Room 701. Overall, happy with early-check in and fast check-out as well as the hospitality of the staffs, spotless and well-maintained bedroom, and good size swimming pool. Breakfast needed improvements. Will be back
Trans: Stayed there for 2 nights during the new year. Nice room, nice pool, GREAT SERVICES, the foods are good too. Next to the theme park and shopping malls. You don't have to go out from the hotel since they have everything you need. However my room was facing the mall so in the new year night I could hear the music and the fireworks loud and clear. For me I'm ok with the noise since its once a year thing. But might be better if they can put some sound proofed barrier. However,like i put in the capital before, they have the top notch service that makes me want to come back.

White_Charter: Departed from Bandung center at 9am, and traffic heading up was bad. But once we've got there, it worth all the time and effort. The place was not overly packed, and the view was magnificent. However, beware for those who have breathing issue as the sulfur smell could be strong…
Tangkuban_Perahu: In comparisons to other “volcanoes” that I’ve seen so far, the whole place requires urgent upgrading & improvement as well a bit of cleaning so that rubbish ends up in garbage bins and not on the street.  There are lots of guys trying to sell you all sort of toys, but…
Dusun_Bambu: It happened to be raining when we are there, but, we enjoyed the scene, the setting, the eateries on the water bank etc. Kids would loved the place most, even adults will find it a fun place to be.
Saung_Angklung: Good one to preserve our heritage The performance is interactive. They give us angklung to try too to make good symphony of music.
Ciater: Good one to preserve our heritage The performance is interactive. They give us angklung to try too to make good symphony of music.
YELLO: This is a new hotel placed just by a big shopping mall. As shopping malls isnt my thing I did actually not spend time there more than having a coffee at starbucks. The only thing this hotel lacks is a gym. It has a nice pool area. But the friendly staff is what makes the experience so good!
Aryaduta: We would like to say thanks to Aryaduta Bandung Team. Helpful &  friendly staff. Large lobby area with atrium concept. Good location and this hotel connecting with Mall. Breakfast experience was great. Especially thanks to MR BERRY ... For the Excellent service .  Definately, will come back again. Bravo Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: Fitnes and the staff are excellent I was so happy with the kid's pool and especially there was a game for my kids from the staff that time nice hotel for my famly.I will stay again in trans luxury hotel.

White_Charter: Stepping into the White Crater is like being propelled onto another planet. Go there early to avoid the crows, and then wander around from groups of visitors, who, inexplicably, tend to gather near the staircase. We turned to the right, walked along the edges of the lake, and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I wished I gave this place a miss as I left it with a sour mood, at least $300 less in mine and my family's wallet. The local tour guide is a scammer and so does the throng of men that follows us down. An active volcano is not that beautiful (to me) and the experience left a…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place for family, but you need to have your own car !! ... this place is quite far from bandung, bring or rent a car to get here .. you can easily spend the whole day here
Saung_Angklung: I write as one with formal training in Gamelan performance and a professional musician.  From the total disrespect the Gamelan performers gave as they approached their instruments, and subsequent manner of playing, I was aware that this was not going to be an authenticate…
Ciater: I write as one with formal training in Gamelan performance and a professional musician.  From the total disrespect the Gamelan performers gave as they approached their instruments, and subsequent manner of playing, I was aware that this was not going to be an authenticate…
YELLO: One of the convenient hotels in the Bandung area for those who want to find convenience for direct access to the mall and also access the train and airport flights that are not so far away.  Very like the atmosphere in front of the reception, entertainment is provided for children and there is a corner provided for playing games. Very useful for me who has a little trouble with 2 children! Ha ha!
Aryaduta: i love being here! plus i spent this staycation with my family and friends. strategic location too! near mall, Bandung Indah Plaza and Mcd wohoo! clean, good services, and good food! will be back soon! thank you aryaduta!
Trans: Nice room view, bed comfort and soft, lots of variety of breakfast, lots of parking, nice view on swimming pool with the miniature waterfall, sliding, and beach, good service, helpfull and friendly concierge

White_Charter: Been to Bandung too many times & looking for something different, driver Pak Yusuf recommended us White Crater. It is much more breathtaking compare to Tangkuban Perahu that is too commercialist.  Pictures taken by were beautiful, blue and green. The sulfur is quite strong so,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was really amazing to come up close to the center of the Crater.  We hiked all the way pass the rows of shops and found a hidden treasure!  This was blocked by wooden gates, and manned by the natives.  To enter, you need to be guided by them and a fee is chargeable.  For the…
Dusun_Bambu: It was so pretty. I went in the evening nearing sunset time. It was pretty. Quite a big park to walk around and take photos in. Very nice place, for a family especially. It was breezy and quiet, nice ambient, the resort by the lake was just loveee.
Saung_Angklung: Great place to see some local culture. The entrance is around 100K. You get to see local children perform local dances. The show takes around 2.5 hours. The best part was when the audience were given an angklung instrument and we were playing some well known tunes :)
Ciater: Great place to see some local culture. The entrance is around 100K. You get to see local children perform local dances. The show takes around 2.5 hours. The best part was when the audience were given an angklung instrument and we were playing some well known tunes :)
YELLO: It was my first time to stay in Yello and really nice. Upon check in the staff really friendly. If you are early to arrive at the hotel and the room not ready yet, you can please yourself at game station or strolling around Paskal Shopping Center. Room also comfy. Overall it was a really nice stay in Bandung.
Aryaduta: Nice hotel, comfortable room, very kind of they staff but less variant food when breakfast. Playground and swimming pool, have an access to Bandung Indah Plaza Mall and near to the others acomodation..
Trans: Always love to stay in this hotel, friendly staff, room is comfortable, the bed is big! Complete amenity, breakfast is great. If you lucky you can breakfast in 18th floor and see bandung from above! And enjoy glass through terrace!

White_Charter: an interesting sight...but the smell of the sulfur is very strong towards the middle of the crater. admission fee and vehicle admission fee is pretty expensive i would say...long tiring ride to and fro the city.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's a new experience for a holiday trip seeing the nature. Nice experience and recommended for a close up to the nature.
Dusun_Bambu: It is a theme park here, with a couple of rice fields and a buffalo, different bamboo varieties. So if you don't like artificial places, don't go. If you like a place where nature has been tamed and you can have a meal (if waiters acknowledge your presence), then, it may be the…
Saung_Angklung: The best part of our first day in Bandung! If you are here even for just a day, come to watch (and participate) their afternoon show! It’s awesome in terms of culture, music and entertainment. We also bought a few things in the shop.
Ciater: The best part of our first day in Bandung! If you are here even for just a day, come to watch (and participate) their afternoon show! It’s awesome in terms of culture, music and entertainment. We also bought a few things in the shop.
YELLO: Very poor staff reaction on left stuff's, first I left my book inside the room and they didn't contact me until I realize that I left my book, I also left my newly bought clothes in the shopping bag on the bed and they also didn't contact me until I ask them to find the left clothes, and they were not reactively called me whether they can find the clothes or not, I have to call them several times to get update on left clothes, they also said that they can't find the clothes (I believe they untentionally throw the shopping bag without checking what's inside the shopping bag
Aryaduta: Great service, public area like lobby & restaurant have good fragrant, fast room service, warm & wide swimming pool, gym has complete facilities  several old facilities like; elevator, hairdryer needs upgrade
Trans: This is a mass hotel, so expect to be crowded especially in weekends and peak seasons. Other than that, nothing to complain really. Great room and facilities. The staffs, even though overwhelmed, seemed to be well trained and really tried their best. Room's wall needs more reducer since I can still hear voices from next door. Great breakfast with varied menu (even though crowded). The pool was jam packed, but the pool guards were always standing by. The 18th was overpriced, but the service and menu were good. Overall recommended

White_Charter: The drive up to the entrance booth was OK.  But right after paying entrance fees, the road is badly maintained.  In most cases, it is probably the other way around.  Since they charge, they should at least maintain the roads.  They should also maintain the toilets if they…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A place to visit the history of the volcano in Indonesia but there has no details about the history, or any description of the place. Lots of tiny shops selling small items and even  bamboo musical instruments. Lots of sellers walking around to sell small souvenirs.  You need to…
Dusun_Bambu: Indeed a Family Leisure Park! A one-stop holiday destination!! It's got a resort, great view and an excellent ambience, a lot of activities for kids and adults, a food court, a souvenir shop, etc.
Saung_Angklung: I went to this place for buying souvenir for the tourist visitor. I often visit this place to show Bandung and the show of music angklung. Everybody enjoy with the show and the souvenir shop. Good for fun, for education and any activities to add value of your visit in Bandung.
Ciater: I went to this place for buying souvenir for the tourist visitor. I often visit this place to show Bandung and the show of music angklung. Everybody enjoy with the show and the souvenir shop. Good for fun, for education and any activities to add value of your visit in Bandung.
YELLO: it was good stay in yello. its near from bdg station and paskal mall. the hotel as same as i see in traveloka for booking this hotel. the room was big and i like it. my suggestion for the hotel dont forget to put sticker qibla for muslim pray
Aryaduta: Nice hotel and close to shopping mall Bandung Indah Plaza, easy check in, Friendly staff, my kids enjoy the swimming pool. Good and lots off choice. Room very clean just door between  two need more attention.
Trans: Supershort trip. I stayed there for 1 nite. I got cold and cough. I arrived at 7.30pm. The check in was smooth. Actually kinda disappointed bcoz i got twin bed but yeah it's ok bcoz the hotel was fully booked back then. The staff is helpful and kind. The room is big and clean. I didn't use the bathtub bcoz there is no shower in the tub. I usually use shower to clean every side of the tubs. The breakfast is good. My fave is dimsum of course.

White_Charter: One of the hot spots for tourists and locals. The management there should set up a proper place for muslims to take their ablution for prayers. The view of the kawah putih was remarkable.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great for photos, but lots of people at the top.  As usual Indonesian practice, foreigners/travellers have to pay 10x the price of locals to enter. We also explored deeper into the forested area.
Dusun_Bambu: Very nice place It has playground for small kids, painting, fishings, horse rising and others. It also have a lot of games for teenagers and adult like shooting, archery, paintball...etc Many restaurants Worth going
Saung_Angklung: It's a must see when you are in Bandung as it gives the visitor a chance to see and appreciate Indonesian culture in a little less than 2 hours. It's interactive because the audience gets to play the angklung and dance with the performers. It's worth the trip!
Ciater: It's a must see when you are in Bandung as it gives the visitor a chance to see and appreciate Indonesian culture in a little less than 2 hours. It's interactive because the audience gets to play the angklung and dance with the performers. It's worth the trip!
YELLO: Yello Paskal is perfect location to spend a weekend in the Bandung city. The surrounding area is also perfect for culinary experiences.. the locals offer variety of delicasies.. all within walking distance from the hotel.  The hotel is modest and clean and connected to a nice Mall. Nice Ambience.
Aryaduta: Spacious and clean room. My room has many full-length mirrors. Varieties food for breakfast. Link to Bandung Indah Mall. It is just a 5 min walk to reach the mall. All staff were friendly and helpful. Recommended to stay!
Trans: My company just delivered training to one of big oil & gas company at this hotel meeting room, it was so great especially for the meeting room services conducted by Bery and team, they are very nice and helpful, the food is also full of taste

White_Charter: Im so excited to visit this place but unfortunately when i arrived there im very dissapointed because the price for private vehicle its so expensive IDR 150k&damaged road to access Kawah Putih I hope they can improve the access for go to kawah putih Thank you.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This was my second visit to the place, the first being more than 15 years ago. Decided to visit the place again as I had previously enjoyed the relative quiet and mystic feel of the place. But this was not to be, once I arrived many local touts came towards me, wanting to be my…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is a must place to go if you are at Bandung. The fresh air, greeneries, sceneries, games and food must not be missed. You can spend almost the whole day there, your kids will be happy to play with the rabbits/slides and other games. You will definitely enjoy every…
Saung_Angklung: Fun experience at the Saung Angklung Udjo. Easiest way to learn how to play a musical instrument under 10 minutes.
Ciater: Fun experience at the Saung Angklung Udjo. Easiest way to learn how to play a musical instrument under 10 minutes.
YELLO: I stayed for two night this October with consideration of its location. Its reception was located in 4th floor, and separated lifts for going down to the mall and going upstairs to the rooms were there. Usual sized rooms with smart TV and ordinary clean toilet. Good but not exceptional. I have no complain for the bed tho. Battery in AC and TV remote were nearly worn out thus the remote was albeit unresponsive. View from 5th floor was bad (what you will see is only concrete rooftop). However all the staff was humble and helpful. I have to mention its proximity to cafes in Paskal 23 and Paskal Hypersquare tho since it had a really huge value for your consideration in choosing this hotel.
Aryaduta: It was my second stay at Aryaduta. Everything was still amazing. The check-in process was easy and quick. I got a room on the 14th floor, with windows overlooking the city area, which was great. Just like the first stay, I booked a Business room and it was quite spacious, especially for one person. However, the room needed more thorough cleaning (especially the window) and it took longer to drain the bathtub.   The hotel's gym was not that big but it had everything I needed to exercise. The whirlpool made a perfect addition but I'd love it better if the water was warmer. The weather was bad so I didn't get to use the pool but I guess relaxing in the whirlpool was enough for me.   Staff members were helpful and friendly. The location is superb; everything is within a walking…
Trans: I only stayed for one day and one night but the experiences are quite memorable. I like the teenage club the most bcs I like playing game and in this hotel, they provide psp and many more interesting games to play. The breakfast also really delicious. The view is amazing when I stayed in 14th floor. Also the room is really comfortable. The bathroom kits are the most spesific and complete if I have to compare with another hotels I've stayed before. The bed also nice and large. Overall it was a very nice experience to stay in The Trans Luxury Hotel. Just like the name the hotel is indeed luxury. Thank you.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih is located near the charming little market town of Ciwidey, approximately 50 Kilometers south of Bandung.  It was so beautiful, I couldn't breathe. And I mean it literally. Our vehicle breezed through the forest..  Its english name is White Crater but the sulphuric…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Over priced entry for foreigners, not worth it , can consider other attractions in Bandung , overall this is just not worth it
Dusun_Bambu: Is a must to go. So nice and refreshing. The view is so amazing. Food is good too. And nice bintang beer too.  We had a great time.
Saung_Angklung: I thought it was gonna be a boring thing but i was wrong. I really enjoyed my visit to this place. It was fun. Consider me finally a little bit educated in "angklung" thanks to this place. The angklung performance is unforgettable. It was AWESOME. They even taught the audiences…
Ciater: I thought it was gonna be a boring thing but i was wrong. I really enjoyed my visit to this place. It was fun. Consider me finally a little bit educated in "angklung" thanks to this place. The angklung performance is unforgettable. It was AWESOME. They even taught the audiences…
YELLO: Thank You for Dinar Ulfa for prepared my reservation so good , i wrily impersive for her to helping me during stay at yellow hotel . i will coming back to yellow hotel . Great Location and and the staff verry helpfull specialy to reservation/Fo team ! . but the swimmingpool is not good condition , the water litle bit dirty and delivery pooltowel so long .
Aryaduta: The service was very good. they react to your complain immediately. just that the hotel is too old. some rooms need refurbishment.  the breakfast spread was yummy & lots of variety. the facilities were good also.
Trans: Thankfully I was only on this place for one night.  1 I booked a long size bed 3 weeks earlier. On arrival they tell me all sold out.  After voicing my displeasure  they magically found they had one. 2 I went to the lobby bar to get a quick drink. Smoking or non they said.  I chose non smoking. Pointless as people just smoked anywhere. At 5 am I got up to go to gym. I literally couldn't get in for 30 or 40 soldiers using it. Not one signed in if I had known it was a military facility i would have asked for a military price  This place should be avoided unless you are into military occupations

White_Charter: Really not much to do. Stunning lake with terrible smell and interesting to read up on the history but I would only suggest visiting if you are nearby. Literally can only stand there for like 5 minutes because of the smell and place overrun by selfie takers.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Marvellous view, unique. Entrance tickets quite steep for foreigners. Crowded with tourists on weekend and holidays. The negative side is that too many souvenir sellers hassled us the moment we step off the car and followed us around. For the same stuffs one can get cheaper…
Dusun_Bambu: This place would be great for families. Wide variety of activities such as archery, knife throwing, shooting, etc. You can just take a walk around.
Saung_Angklung: Never heard about that instrument before and learned that it is completely made from bamboo. There are different kinds of udjos with regard to size and sound. Visitors were guided how to ‚play‘ the udjo and afterwards we had a really nice performance of the professionals (kids…
Ciater: Never heard about that instrument before and learned that it is completely made from bamboo. There are different kinds of udjos with regard to size and sound. Visitors were guided how to ‚play‘ the udjo and afterwards we had a really nice performance of the professionals (kids…
YELLO: Staying at YELLO is just like staying on top of a shopping mall because... it’s on top of a mall ;). Positioned on top of Paskal 23, you can enjoy most of popular local food just below your room.  Try to keep up with other new hotels in Bandung, YELLO provides good ranges of amenities in their vicinity: game center and swimming pool are some of them.  Downside: no in-room fridge, the swimming pool is there just so it can claim to have a pool, you need to “fight” mall’s traffic to reach the hotel (especially Saturday’s night) since it has no dedicated lobby.
Aryaduta: Being there for couples trip. The room is big and clean. The people are good. And the food is so delicious. I'll be back to stay at the hotel someday. The location is strategic becouse have acces to Mall Bandung Indah Plaza.
Trans: Special mentions to staffs from The Restaurant, Mr. Ayus and Ms. Novi.   I couldn't express in words how grateful I am to Mr Ayus who noticed how pale I was, during one of the breakfast sessions I had. He immediately asked if I was okay and if there's anything else that he could do to make me feel better. After hearing my condition, he offered to make me a cup of traditional drink (which was delicious by the way). It did made me feel much better. This kind gesture was truly heart warming. I could genuinely feel his sincerity and care towards me. This is a fine example of service excellence.   Ms. Novi is a cheerful and beautiful lady. Breakfast is never dull with her around. Her bright smile and happy greeting instantly makes the place seems livelier. The fact that she…

White_Charter: Natural attraction in southern area of bandung west java, easy access to get there (shuttle)  The white creter in mountai area
Tangkuban_Perahu: I lived in Bandung and Lembang for about 8 years. Lembang is near to Tangkuban Perahu, lived there for about 2 years. There's another way to get to Tangkuban Perahu for free but it's a long hike up from Lembang. If you get into Lembang there's a 90 degree curve in the road, just…
Dusun_Bambu: Beautiful scenery and fresh air. I am very happy to be in this place. We can find various instagramable photo spots. Suitable for vacationing with family.
Saung_Angklung: Yes!! If you looking for the traditional and culture of west java, this is the place!  A great place for the culture attraction, and also you can play the Angklung the traditional music instrument.  Thumbs up for this place, to save and educate west java culture to the world and…
Ciater: Yes!! If you looking for the traditional and culture of west java, this is the place!  A great place for the culture attraction, and also you can play the Angklung the traditional music instrument.  Thumbs up for this place, to save and educate west java culture to the world and…
YELLO: Good experience, clean hotel and very strategic location. The staff quite nice and well informed. But during my stay the play area is off, ipad also the the playstation and also i believe i already inform during my check in that my breakfast to go was bread but what i received was fried rice. But overall its a nice hotel and i might consider to stay again for the next trip.
Aryaduta: The room is very big, I booked 2 deluxe rooms side by side but the room was full so in return they gave me 2 suite rooms with seperate floor. Thats was so wonderfull. The room is so big. My kids was so happy. The room is very clean and I really enjoy staying there
Trans: I've been numerous times staying at this hotel, be it for office events, or a family getaway in Bandung. But during this time, when I'm traveling back with my family there are so many things that seem to be below my expectations (improper maintenance) and it diminishes my whole perception about the so-called luxury hotel in West Java.   Let me begin, prior to my arrival, I have requested a connecting room (I'm always staying with two rooms connecting) and upon check-in, I have also stated that I would like to please have the connecting door to be open immediately. What happened? Upon entering the room the connecting door is still closed and we had to wait for it. After several calls finally, the staff came to attend the request. They reprimand the issue by sending an apology…

White_Charter: Nothing much you can see in this place. The entrance fee was expensive. After paying the entrance fee they will force you to buy a face mask with a double price than 7-11. So if you want to go here make sure you bring your own face mask. Do not fall for local photographer. just…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A must visit for the volcano crater experience, although the entry fee of IDR300,000 per pax for foreign visitors is a bit steep especially as we were a family of 6 pax. A great scenic view of the mountains and crater, although you cannot walk around the whole crater. There are…
Dusun_Bambu: Can easily spend an entire day at this park with my kids aged 7 to 16. Many activities like horse riding, ATV, paint ball, shooting, archery. Lots of photography spots. This place is not stroller friendly, don't bother bringing as you will end up carrying the stroller and the…
Saung_Angklung: I love the show as it has variety, from dance to anklung orchestra playing to band to children singing. The emcee is so pretty and the music conductor who led us in the interactive section is so charismatic! I was impressed too when the ‘Mission Impossible’ theme song was…
Ciater: I love the show as it has variety, from dance to anklung orchestra playing to band to children singing. The emcee is so pretty and the music conductor who led us in the interactive section is so charismatic! I was impressed too when the ‘Mission Impossible’ theme song was…
YELLO: Check in process take a long time Location is near to the train station Hotel still new building Able to walk around the hotel, especially in the morning. Near to the various culinary corner in paskal square
Aryaduta: Yesterday, my big family stayed at Aryaduta Bandung in Sumatera Road. Actually we book this hotel without see the testimoni or review, just book this hotel because it located near BIP Mal and easy to have meals. We book around 10 rooms via website aryaduta hotel, and we are so lucky because we got the promo rate, only Rp. 480.000,-/room/night with breakfast for 2 persons.   The Lobby quite huge, and comfortable to serve guest. There are a piano, and every night the pianist play the piano.  The Staffs are very kind and helpfull. The facilities quite complete, Gym, Pool, tennis court, futsal court, billiard, Kids Club (this is important for travelers like me who bring kids), the food are good enough.   And the best is the Room, the space quite huge than another hotels in the same…
Trans: if you go to the city of Bandung Must stay at The Trans Hotel. there are many facilities. a place for shopping, playing, eating, entertainment, swimming, relaxing, comfortable rooms, and making happy.

White_Charter: The place was scenic but had to pay a hefty admission fee including the driver in! Was cold in the morning but hot later in the afternoon! If you have allergy or nauseous wear a mask! It was nice view to take IG photos and many vendors to help you take photos and develop…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Beautiful scenery! My mum and I walked alongside the volcano, away from the throngs of tourists who tended to stick at the main drop-off point. It was quite lovely just standing at some of the quieter spots and admiring the view.   If you're not interested in purchasing any of…
Dusun_Bambu: Not particularly accessible if you don't drive or take a coach to get here but it is definitely one of the better managed and maintained parks in Indonesia. Great if you just want to soak in the fresh air and views with friends or family but there are quite a number of…
Saung_Angklung: This is where they made angklung,the traditional music instruments made of bamboo. They carefully craft it, and sell it too in different size, perfect for gifts idea.  They provide angklung performance in certain schedule (you need to check the schedule so you won't missed it)…
Ciater: This is where they made angklung,the traditional music instruments made of bamboo. They carefully craft it, and sell it too in different size, perfect for gifts idea.  They provide angklung performance in certain schedule (you need to check the schedule so you won't missed it)…
YELLO: This is a perfect placed hotel..in the middle of a mall. The rooms are average sized enough for a couple.  The bed is comfortable and so is the ambience in the night.   The hotel shares the carpark with the mall. Only during the weekends,it's difficult to get a place to park.   The hotel has a small Coffee house which serves tasty meals. Its nasi goreng choices are excellent. The chefs are very good. The waitress and waiters are young but helpful. So are also the receptionists. There's a smart guy named Thomas who is very helpful.  If one gets hungry and wants a bite,one needs only to get out of the hotel and 300metres away are food stalls which are opened till 11pm WIB except for weekends til
Aryaduta: i always come here when i go to bandung. this hotel is very reccomended with strategic location near Gedung Sate. And i’ll be back to stay at Aryaduta when i comeback to bandung again. Thankyou so much
Trans: Staying at The Trans Luxury Hotel in Bandung always gives me a memorable stay. A few minutes after  entering my room at 14th floor, a hotel staff gave me a special and delicious cake. Thanks The Trans.

White_Charter: However, if you've forgeten your mask, there is a vendor selling mask at the entrance of the crater. Good to go.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Our organised tour leader brought our group to visit Tangbukan Parahu Volcano in our recent tour to Bandung. We arrived at late morning on Monday due to heavy traffic jam. It was a long ride from our hotel, but we were glad to have made the trip to the mountain top.I was awed by…
Dusun_Bambu: There are many activities inside this leisure park, such as archery, ATV, paintball shooting, flying fox. One of the best part of this leisure park is the rabbit wonderland, there're many rabbits which you can feed them with the small carrots provided by the staffs and they will…
Saung_Angklung: the only place that presents the Sundanese culture that has begun to disappear in the city of Bandung, is very interesting and entertaining because played by gifted young children
Ciater: the only place that presents the Sundanese culture that has begun to disappear in the city of Bandung, is very interesting and entertaining because played by gifted young children
YELLO: very nice atmosphere to bring your kid, they have pool, gaming station and mall beneath to provide all your needs in emergency matter. my son loves the hotel so much. i think the game station need to have varieties to game.
Aryaduta: One of the great place to stay! We had a great experience while staying at Aryaduta Bandung.   Beside of its strategic location, Aryaduta had given its best service through their offering of great room, amenities, hotel facilities (kids club, pool and intimate garden). I would recommend all prospected guests to try the breakfast menu, mie soup with variety of noodles is recommended!  Once again, thank you for your cordial hospitality. Looking forward to visit again in the future.
Trans: The hotel location was just ok. The parking was very challenging. it was full and packed all the time. perhaps, it is because it is nearby another chain hotel.  The check in process was ok, the plus point is i can get in the room without having to wait, yet it's before 13PM.  The ambience was glamour inside the hotel and in their premise. But when you step outside, it started to feel like seedy.   The room was spacious, even for it's standard class. The cleanliness is top notch, and their amenities was awe. The facilities were also top notch.  HOWEVER, the pool. It was a disaster. turns out they allowed their adjacent hotel guests to also enjoy their pools. you can acknowledge them from their slippers. which in weekend, turns into pool of human. not to mention, limited seating…

White_Charter: Definitely someplace to visit when in Bandung because it is really an interesting but few drawbacks:  1. It's more expensive for foreigners to visit than for locals. 2. A lot of indiscriminate smoking all over the place. 3. Many guys hanging around to take photos. 4. You have to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The trip to tangkuban perahu was a horrible trip for us. It took us about an hour to reach the site, but the scenery wasn’t very impressive..personally think that kawah putih was way more beautiful than tangkuban perahu. Beside, the most important is at tangkuban perahu, there…

YELLO: the best thing about this hotel is the location breakfast is quite ok, quite a long queue in check in process,  a slight disappointment with the housekeeping, forgot to refill the soap. already gave message in my room but when i came back, found iut the soap container was still empty. too tired to call the staff as it was quite late. i just used my own
Aryaduta: It's first time we stayed in Aryaduta chain hotel, we booked 3 rooms..  (+) positive values 1. The room is big (what make me surprise is the size room as five stars hotel) 2. Have many choices of breakfast (We loved the foods and the staffs are very quick response) 3. We got 2 room cards that is very simple thing but very helfull  (-) minus values 1. We booked for 3 rooms with double bed, but unfortunatelly 2 rooms not ready yet so we have to wait until 1.5 hours.  So, we would like recommend stay with Aryaduta Hotel when visited Bandung.  Good Job, Aryaduta!!! Have made us happy and memorable.
Trans: We stayed here a few months ago, just for one night, and my kids love the hotel.  They love the room, since it's so spacious and they like to play with the automatic curtain too :)  The breakfast is excellent and the service is great too.  Totally recommended for a family vacation

White_Charter: Nice place!! But when the fog comes down you can’t see the beautiful view, as the hills and cliffs. anyway the smell of the sulphur wasn’t strong enough
Tangkuban_Perahu: It’s a very expensive trip for tourists. There is another crater nearby known as domas crater but it is costly too. The journey to the domas crater is quite an ordeal if one choose to walk. And also be prepared to pay a hefty tip to the guide. If you choose to take a motorbike…
Dusun_Bambu: This park can accommodate tourists who just want to relax & enjoy nature or who want to play the game until it triggers adrenaline. The nature is fresh because it is at the foot of the mountain. there are restaurants and food stores to take away. I think it's harder to reach…
Saung_Angklung: A very entertaining performance that engaged all the guests because we all were forced to participate. Good communication. Nice cool place, and pretty clean too.
Ciater: A very entertaining performance that engaged all the guests because we all were forced to participate. Good communication. Nice cool place, and pretty clean too.
YELLO: I stayed there with my son for 1 night only. The hotel is next to the mall. So confinient, eassy acces to entertainment and food.  The lobby was in the next floor. Spacious, good design n layout. There were game zone. So cool.  Our room was twin bed and there is a sofa that you can sleep in. I sleep there that night. It was comfy also. It was not big but very clean and great design Breakfast was standard but nice. The pool was great, but we skipped the pool session. The staffs were nice n helpful. I use their laundry service. Bit expensive but 1 day service.  So... room was 9, fasility 10, staff 10.  Hope i can back to enjoy Bandung more next time...
Aryaduta: The room, the location is very good and recommended. but if Aryaduta doesn't improve the quality of their Breakfast, it's not worth having breakfast in the hotel .. unless you really don't have a choice .. Disappointing breakfast, the food mostly cold .. and the selection is not much ..
Trans: the trans luxury hotel is a very good hotel in bandung and offers many interesting and best facilities, i think this hotel is highly recommended..the trans luxury hotel also has a swimming pool that is different from other hotels and very close to the mall

Dusun_Bambu: Very green place, love the tree house, where you can eat inside the tree house,  Enjoy the led lights during nite time.

Aryaduta: The hotel location was perfect as its right next to a mall and very accessible. The security was also very tight and i feel very safe staying in the Hotel. The facilities such as the gymnasium were very well equipped and spacious. Hotel staff are all very welcoming and always greeted us with their warm smile. Enjoyed our stay there!
Trans: This is not the first time for me to stay at Trans studio hotel. It is a luxurious hotel with friendly staffa, comfortable room and bed. The check in and check out was very efficient. But I was a bit disappointed that the room was not soundproof. My neighbour next door has a fight, i do not know with who. She keeps on shouting and talk very loud at 10pm until mid night and at 2am I was awaken by my next door neighbour again crying very loud which is kind of disturbing and makes us so uncomfortable and could not sleep well. Otherwise, this is hotel is superb. I love the breakfast too. Lots of nice choices.

White_Charter: 1st time getting so close to pond.  u can smell the sulphur smell but most of us got ourselve masked up so it was not really that bad. there's a signage there indicating that no recommended for those with weak heart, pregnant, small kids, and etc. so i guess, to visit this…
Tangkuban_Perahu: travelled a long there. a bit disappointed as you pay 10 times more than the local and just see ONE crater. Lots of touts so we just stayed for 15 min and left. Not really worth it.
Dusun_Bambu: The views are amazing. We brought drone when we visited and the top view over the flowers is so nice. Worth the visit! You should go there around 3pm onwards so you can appreciate its beauty when there's still sunlight.

Aryaduta: Old hotel with bad furniture and bad water supply smells very bad every whar bathroom is bad no water no hot water this is not 4 stars hotel this is 1 star hotel the location of the hotel makes sty little batter
Trans: The best legacy to your children is a beautiful memories..,and The Trans Luxury Hotel provides us the best one. It was a great satisfaction to see a smile on my children faces. Best regard to all your crew from my family. Thankyou all.

White_Charter: It’a now easy to reach and the facilities are good. Try to go during the week to avoid the masses of people and also the traffic.

Dusun_Bambu: Average place to visit - one hour drive. Place is relatively well kept with few attractions scattered around big park. We came there having lunch in mind around big playground and that was main dissapointment. Food is ok-ish but overpriced for quality. Playground is small and…

Trans: Very convenient hotel, room is clean and comfortable,  full amenities and equipment just like in the home... with king size bed and luxury bathroom, and if you travel with family there is a connecting door between room  Menginap bulan Agustus 2019

Tangkuban_Perahu: We stay in Bandung and one day we explored areas South and another day North of Bandung. The Tangkuban Perahu national park with main attraction being volcanic craters is about 1h slow drive from Bandung city. While the park is only about 30km from the city, narrow roads + heavy…

Ciater: I love culture thus this is worthy. Good performance and you been given chance to try learn and experience the angklung
YELLO: The hotel design from the lobby to the rooms is so quirky and very artistic. Check in was hassle-free and the lobby is filled with activities to do like the Game Room, foosball etc.   Rooms were huge, the beds is quite comfy but only downside that it does not have an office chair by the table, only a sofa-bed. Ordered room service which was quick but the Kway Teow was super salty with sausages and beef which makes it even saltier.   The infinity pool is a nice feature but the water was freezing cold even though the sun is blazing, and it wasn't a joy to swim in.   Breakfast was great especially the cook-to-order egg station and the live cooking of waffle and pancakes. Also serving various local dishes and the DIY toppings for the porridge is my favourite.   It's a great hotel…
Aryaduta: good location..., good facilities..., good services..., warm staff... aryaduta always keep this standard for their guest... Old but Gold..., they lovely deluxe room type which help from the housekeeping to manage the sofa become sofa-bed
Trans: Choose to stay in this hotel 6-9 October 2019 for a short refreshing experience during my work leave. For a hotel at bandung city center, it has almost everything in one place to offer to their guests (luxuriuos rooms, spa, swimming pool, kids club plus their own beach theme swimming pool, fitness center and classes, club lounge access at 18th, mall direct connecting and theme park next door)  Check In and check out process was smooth. We arrived at 2PM and the room appointed to us supposed to 618 club premier room but the room still not ready and we're given 608 (view gate entrance, mosque and theme park on the right side). But our next door room apparently is a family with lots of children and they still have active activity past 12am such as wall banging and screaming at…

Saung_Angklung: The performances was excellent, fantastic traditional dance, Arumba, Angklung Massal Nusantara and the best Angklung interactive. My daughters and I enjoyed it's so much.   We had lunch at Saung Angklung Udjo and the food was raos pisaan (enak dan sedap/ delicious). Will…

YELLO: Yello Paskal Hotel staff is very very awesomely friendly Located in 23 Paskal will ease you during your stay The facility is complete and gaming station is our favorite one So if you ask me about this hotel i will say,"Just want to stay more & more"
Aryaduta: Overall was good.  Only some notes on floor of toilet that using marble that make slippery after water come through the marble. It will be better to use the better/special mat that absorb water on the floor more rather than ordinary mat.
Trans: me n my family stay at Trans Hotel for 4 nights on October, we extremely happy with trans hotel and definitely will be back again. my kids love the bath bomb, the play ground and of course the pool :)

White_Charter: Kawah Putih or the white crater located about 2-3 hours, depending on the traffic from Bandung City.  It’s better to visit in the morning as you will start to feel hot around 10:30am.  Remember to bring a face mask <U+0001F637> as the smell of sulphur will make you feel uncomfortable. …
Tangkuban_Perahu: What a great view and location ...its scary to think that was active volcano long time back and the damage was created it was huge...indigence people were nice and great help. highly advisable to visit..stunning!!
Dusun_Bambu: We took our daughter here for a few hours on one of the days we were in Bandung. She had a great time riding the horses, feeding various animals and making some clay shapes. Prices were very reasonable by international standards, although some of the entertainment seemed a bit…
Saung_Angklung: Its great. Never been bored with saung angklung udjo. I like it very much. And the service is good. They all smile everytime. Definitely will came here again
Ciater: Its great. Never been bored with saung angklung udjo. I like it very much. And the service is good. They all smile everytime. Definitely will came here again
YELLO: Hotel was clean, comfortable, very nice and bright in design, staff friendly and fast in service. Hotel placed in the building of mall so is not boring to stay there you can enjoy shopping and food-court anytime. Pool is not big but very clean and convenient. I will recommend the place to my friends
Aryaduta: (+) Even though old room, but it seems very well maintained, strategic location, friendly staff (especially for satpam). (-) I have to wait for an hour to get a room even it was at 2 pm (my expectation the room is ready at least ar the time of check in was started)
Trans: We arrived at 12.30, since their check in time is 15.00, we managed to entertain our family to look around at Trans studio mall. At 15.00 we were told that our room is ready, got our room key, didn't get any welcome drink at all (too bad) and had to wait like 10 minutes to use the elevator. It's very frustrated to wait that long, the bell boy said, it is because there is wedding on that hotel (that's not excuse isn't?).  Got room with mosque view (yes, there is a big mosque across the hotel), and our first impression was WOW, this is one Luxury hotel i've ever spent the night.  Love the amenities and slipper, the room ambience, and very spacious one. Like the bathroom.  For breakfast, i think the meals could be better, need to pay another IDR 300 thousand for additional 1 adult…

White_Charter: went on a weekend and there is quite a handful of people. got there by a van and we hired a guide. van will be park at the middle of the mountain. there will be a shuttlebus to bring you up. entrance ticket we got in at the village at the bottom of the mountain.   there will be…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Spectacular crater with great views. You can drive right up to the top so very accessible to all. You can then walk round part of the rim if you like, a good idea if you want to get away from the crowds.  Quite a lot of people trying to sell you cheap & cheerful trinkets but…
Dusun_Bambu: The place is very interesting, and showcases bamboo architecture. There is also a Balinese inspired mini-village where one can stay for a fee. An amusing way to cap the visit is to try the hammock tower!
Saung_Angklung: Easy communication via WhatsApp ( can get there number from their website ). Used it to confirm when performance starts and availability of tickets.  All the children that performed were great and really expressed their culture through song and dance.  Information office is…
Ciater: Easy communication via WhatsApp ( can get there number from their website ). Used it to confirm when performance starts and availability of tickets.  All the children that performed were great and really expressed their culture through song and dance.  Information office is…
YELLO: Hotel have adequate facilities, friendly staff, and easy to reach, good accessibility. I appreciate all staff for the pleasure visit that I had here. Would recommend any of my connections to staying here for business occasions
Aryaduta: in terms of location and facilities, this hotel is good. easy access to the mall, easy to find food. Breakfast is less consistent, sometimes there is a lot of variation, but if low seasson, the food is lacking variety. Old but well-maintained hotel. only a few things need to be improved, such as bed linen, towels are still old stuff.
Trans: I find that this hotel to be awesome. The breakfast was great. The hotel outlook and service was fabulous. No complain about the room or service. The only problem was that around 7pm, we can hear the loud music from the lounge. I was there was my birthday and I got a cake which I appreciate. It was a delicious cheesecake. You can even choose the type of pillow you want. It’s sort of baby friendly as part of the room was carpeted.

White_Charter: IMHO, it's better than tangkuban perahu because you get to be so close to the crater. In Tangkuban perahu, you can just see it from afar.  Do go there early as the sulfur smell is lesser. The weather is also better in the morning. You are advised to not stay more than 15 minutes
Tangkuban_Perahu: Only 30 km from the city. The views from the road are amazing. The volcano is sleeping but you can see some smoke sniff sulphur. Landscape is wonderful.  The entrance fee for foreigners is about US$18.
Dusun_Bambu: It's a trully Family Leisure Park.  One stop holiday destination and you got it all! Resort to stay, Fresh Air, Great Views, Activities for Adults and Kids, Cool Restaurants and Varities of Food Stalls, Souvenir Shop..It has everything you can imagine!   Definitely a great place…
Saung_Angklung: We saw the performance during weekday. It was less crowd. The performance was amazing, consist of wayang golek simple show, mask dance, halaran ceremony, arumba music show, angklung concert and angklung practice.
Ciater: We saw the performance during weekday. It was less crowd. The performance was amazing, consist of wayang golek simple show, mask dance, halaran ceremony, arumba music show, angklung concert and angklung practice.
YELLO: Nice hotel with nice game station. My kids really enjoyed played the game and stay here. The place is nice which integrated with Paskal Square and near the train station. It should be near the airport also. Thanks.
Aryaduta: All the staffs are very welcomed, alwyas greeting,always smile and very helpfull.thanks Aryaduta. we very enjoyed to stay at your hotel.. keep up your good work and hospitality..always sucsess for your hotel..
Trans: Great hotel, great staff, great services,, still be my numero uno hotel in bandung,, suitable for bussiness or leisure, with family or group..  i've been 5 times stay in this hotel and always have a great experience

White_Charter: I don’t know why I waited so long to visit this place; only on my 5th visit to Bandung. But better late than never.   The view is just awesome, lotsa great spots to take those insta-worthy photos even when there’s a lot of people around you. Not only the crater looks divine, the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I've never seen such raw volcanic craters before. So, to me it was an experience to add to my collection. However, the frequent shelling out of money left a bad taste in the mouth. The entry fee for foreigners is quite high as it is, but it's a full notch higher on a weekend.…
Dusun_Bambu: I went to dusun bambu with 3 kids all of them enjoy the weather there. The scenery was amazing. Can get variety of foods there. Kids enjoy the parks there. They also have place for kids to play with rabbits.
Saung_Angklung: You can get wonderful angklung atraction "by appointment" or saturday, good for education and family bounding, get some merchandise for present
Ciater: You can get wonderful angklung atraction "by appointment" or saturday, good for education and family bounding, get some merchandise for present
YELLO: Really good Hotel in a central area next to 23 Paskal Mall. Really enjoyed the clean room and good breakfast. The staff was very friendly and helped me with everything I needed. The same YELLO ad in the two elevators AND in the room when you put in your card was the only annoying thing.
Aryaduta: Spend 1 night in this hotel and was perfect. The location is perfect. Air Condition not function properly but the weather is too cold anyway. The room is clean and staff is supporting. Will be back again if I come to Bandung.
Trans: We (a family with two small kids) stayed here for six nights, and it was an amazing experience all along: rooms are well-equipped, spacious, clean and cosy, albeit not brand new. The staff is extremely friendly and service-minded. Breakfast is one of the best we’ve had at a hotel, and with a good range. The pool is a bliss, and our three-year old still asks us when we can go back to the kid’s club, several weeks after we have checked out... The gym and spa are both high-quality as well. Location is very convenient, with the best (?) mall in Bandung next door. I actually cannot come up with anything disadvantageous to say about this hotel!

White_Charter: One of the ‘must’ visit place travellers to Bandung should go. The White Crater is a beautiful volcano lake and it’s worth the travelling time of nearly 2 hours from the city area.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Know their legend story from our grand mothers been passed down from generations.... Its famous in Asia especially in Java Indonesia. The mountain can be see very clearly like up side down Perahu (ship) I was very excited to see this place nearly as it look very symmetrical and…
Dusun_Bambu: first seen this place .. looks amazing because a lot of beautifu plants and also beautiful scenery that can be made in camera besides its lake which makes many visitors impressed at this place while the restaurantnya food provided also a lot .. such as fried rice, fried chicken,…
Saung_Angklung: you will not get bored visit this place. you can enjoy dancing, singing, even playing angklung together. good to bring children here. the show is well organized. recommended!
Ciater: you will not get bored visit this place. you can enjoy dancing, singing, even playing angklung together. good to bring children here. the show is well organized. recommended!
YELLO: Great! Will stay there again and recommend to others. the game zone was awesome! service after check out (bag deposit counter system <?>) also really great. But the pool water was too cold. Didn't try the breakfast before, will try it on my next stay. keep up the good work
Aryaduta: Excellent service and location, have a nice city view, clean room, instagramable garden.. Very helpfull dan friendly staff in every position from security to the cleaning service. Have a good taste in breakfast menu  but less of variation of menu, Maybe it time to upgrade the parking lot because have small space and the lift service is quite to old.
Trans: Spend 2 nights here and it was unforgettable. All the staffs are amazing. The food is delicious and so many choices. Our kids love the pool, warm water and clean. Just one minute walk to the Trans Studio Mall, definitely will come back again.

White_Charter: We Grab D Grab Driver for a day trip to south of Bandung for 500K Rupiah for a full day ride. Of course that is cheap cause when you asked around the price is around 700-800 K per day. Keep on Asking. Dont give up.  Please if you catch one dont forget to leave extra tips. Cause…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Not everyone is able to trek up a volcano. Fortunately for us folks who cant, this is the best way to get up close n personal with a volcano! It is a nice and smooth drive up we didnt even feel it. It is a good 1 hour ride from the heart of Bandung town to Lembang where…
Dusun_Bambu: Great place to spend time with whole family..  Various food can be choosed.. There are several food stand or some good restaurant..
Saung_Angklung: Bring your overseas friends along, they'd be amazed with the musicality of the angklung orchestra. Me myself never know angklung could be that good. I guess it's too underrated. Go angklung!
Ciater: Bring your overseas friends along, they'd be amazed with the musicality of the angklung orchestra. Me myself never know angklung could be that good. I guess it's too underrated. Go angklung!
YELLO: - excellent hotels, reccommended for stay in the Bandung, near mall, nice view from the room, keep clean, full services, good person of crews,  - minimum tv station, hopely you can add some station from international tv
Aryaduta: Pros: Everything from value, security, service, location etc  I stayed in a business room and got the 13 floor which had quite a decent view  Every end of the hotel is manned by security, guess they really take it seriously  From front desk, to housekeeping and room service all was great!  Location very centralised.   Cons: Not a new hotel but doesn't matter
Trans: All my experience during stay on this hotel, very satisfied.  No problemat all, since check until check out. Begin with fresh drink and fresh fruit in the room, high quality bed, and nice pool. After that, i can feel the modern and clean Gym room, with full of facility

White_Charter: White Crater lake or better known as Kawah Putih is a sight to behold. Its a sulphur lake crater filled with a beautiful turquoise, green, white n blue hues. While its beautiful to d eyes i would reccomend buying a mask on your way in. The smell can be a little pungent over…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We drove into the Tangkuban Perahu volcano park on our visit here. Note that Foreign nationals have to pay a stiff fee of almost USD25 per person to visit - so remember to keep cash in Indonesia Rupiah ready. They do not accept foreign currency or credit cards!! Having said…
Dusun_Bambu: playground is big, and kids really love it, but really crowded when lunch time. maybe if the management consider to widen it's restaurant, it would be a 5 star to visit place for holiday.
Saung_Angklung: If you have the chance the visit the Angklung school in Bandung, I can highly recommend going there! It's really energizing to see so many happy faces and hear such beautiful tones and symphonies come out such a simple-looking but true ingenious instrument. They create memories…
Ciater: If you have the chance the visit the Angklung school in Bandung, I can highly recommend going there! It's really energizing to see so many happy faces and hear such beautiful tones and symphonies come out such a simple-looking but true ingenious instrument. They create memories…
YELLO: Recommended place to stay while you're holiday in Bandung, if you're hungry just going down the hotel is near with Mall and Food Market at Paskal, the room is clean even not bigger but it's quite good to sleep.
Aryaduta: Pros:  - beautiful moutain & city view - clean & quiet room - variety breakfast - near access to mall - very friendly reservation staff  Cons: -  limited hotel parking - no access lift to basement car park
Trans: We are very happy with our stay at this hotel. The staff is so professional, friendly and service-minded! Our room is spacious and beautifully decorated. The bed is very comfortable! The breakfast buffet is amazing the food served at the breakfast buffet is so delicious! I went for a massage at the spa here and I would rate it 4/5! We love the pools here so much! The water was warm and my kids love the sandy pool and the slide!  The hotel has a kids club which is fantastic! Another amazing feature of this hotel is that it’s connected to Trans Studio mall and we love the food court at the mall!  We would definitely come back to this hotel!! Thank you you to all the staff here for being so accommodating and warm!

White_Charter: The place is well-maintained. There are toilets near the entrance so you dont have to worry about that. Just make sure to bring scarf to cover you nose, the sulfur is very pungent.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I feel the entrance fee is ovepriced. 350 000 RP for foreign adult is exorbitant.If the fee is that much at least you can provide a dedicated guide to explain about the touristic attraction. By just giving a flyer is not enough as no time to read when you are there. This is not…
Dusun_Bambu: The area is huge, you may walk or used "angkot" provided to go to another area. Lovely garden, nice restaurant, activities for adults and kids. And might consider a comfort shoe to wear.
Saung_Angklung: Highly recommended musical performance by local children who get education and assistance by Pak Ujo. They play angklung: local bamboo instruments. Funny and a good work to.
Ciater: Highly recommended musical performance by local children who get education and assistance by Pak Ujo. They play angklung: local bamboo instruments. Funny and a good work to.
YELLO: The hotel is very Instagramable with modern design, as it named yello hotel the design use yellow color so bright and cheerful. The location is great near to mall, it's the downstairs of the hotel. The internet connection was fast and stabil. Even though the room quite small but very convenient. I would like to recommend this hotel and I'd love to go back.
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung Hotel was very near behind BAndung Indah Plaza ( BIP). They have fast reaponse front desk service. Their room is clean and neat. If you don't like cold temperature may be you need more blanket or clothes because air conditioner is so cold <U+0001F601>
Trans: Business meeting at ground floor lounge. Thanks to irma for good and nice service, and i enjoy the atmosphere This is my third time visit at that lounge  Today me and my colleague stay there for a few hours I will definitely go back to the lounge

White_Charter: This place is worth to visit. Prepare a mask with you when you visit the crater. The crater is beautiful and please avoid Indonesia holiday when visit this place. Otherwise your photos will be photobombed by other tourists.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is the most expensive attractions we went in Bandung, around IDR200,000/pax! The crowd was still manageable as we went on weekdays. It is beautiful and the weather was chilly. Do bring along jacket. Some walking or stairs climbing was required in order to catch nice…
Dusun_Bambu: Good place to visit for you and your family at lembang bandung if you want to escape  from your routine activities. The area is fresh with green trees and many of flowers. They also provide resto & cafe in the area. Good & nice place
Saung_Angklung: My husband is into Indonesian heritage , tradition and culture.  Where can you be exposed to angklung nowadays and have fun at the same time?  My daughter is entertained by it, sat through the whole performance at the age of 2.   We have been here 3 times ( 2 others before I…

YELLO: This hotel is great, with the great price and i want to come back again the room is good condition with the best view from hotel we can see the mountain and the city near from alun alun bandung and asia afrika street this hotel have a good breakfast
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Hotel is one of the Best hotel in Bandung for stay in terms of location, cleanliness and price, friendly staff, convenient and beautiful room for sleep. Recommend for either business or leisure.
Trans: Great services, full facilities, great location, big mall beside this hotel. The room was clean, big, and luxurious. The staff were polite, helpful, and smiley. Free parking as long as you stay. Great experience.

White_Charter: If you are choosing between Kawah Putih or Tangkuban Perahu, i would surely recommend Kawah Putih.. the overall area is well kept and clean to a reasonable level. View is magnificent. Since its a non active volcano, no bubbling effect could be sighted but the smell of sulphur is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place has a hereditary history known as Sangkuriang and Mt Tangkuban perahu.  In the past there was a mother who was loved by her own child. His mother named dayang Sumbi. Nice place.
Dusun_Bambu: This place is very beautiful yet touristy. A little tip if you want to go here, go in the morning (7/8am) it's less crowded. Becoz searchung for the parking lot and queue for the entrance tix could be tiring.  Overall this place is fun and attractive !
Saung_Angklung: We came together with our Indonesian relatives (with 11 children) and was blown away by the astounding cultural experience. Totally enjoyed the whole auditorium playing the angklung together. Seeing the director's conducting us amateurs in music and the performers' passion…
Ciater: We came together with our Indonesian relatives (with 11 children) and was blown away by the astounding cultural experience. Totally enjoyed the whole auditorium playing the angklung together. Seeing the director's conducting us amateurs in music and the performers' passion…
YELLO: I have a great time staying at your hotel,but we found a condom in our room, and its so disgusting, we found it in bottom of our bed, how about if our son found it. But anyway its ok i have a great exp in your hotel and great hospitality
Aryaduta: Great adventures, I feels like king in an executive room, beautiful view from 15th floor clean and the best value at the time I booked. Very recommended to any one visited Bandung to try find a room in Aryaduta.
Trans: I like the facilities are very good, the room is very clean and very comfortable. The bathroom is very clean. The tv is very big. The bed and pillows are very comfortable. The breakfast is very much variatif menu and very delicious. The pool is standard but it will be better if you add big drum jump water for kids play

White_Charter: The Volcanoe lake is more than 2 hours from Bandung City but the place is worth visiting. This is a volcanoe crater lake. Don't walk near the water as you might get shoes wet on the sand. It is a nice scenary and the entrance fee is half of Tangkuban Perahu.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It’s one of the places you must visit in Bandung. There’s a lot of local people selling souvenirs here. When you walk down the tracking path, there are a lot of stalls selling local stuff too.
Dusun_Bambu: This park has been developed specifically for tourists.  It is full of greenery, flowers, lake and running water streams that together give a sense of relaxation. There are lots of rides and play areas for children and many souvenir shops, restaurants and coffee houses. One can…
Saung_Angklung: Nice to see the effort put in to preserve and promote the cultural art and music.  You basically pay to watch a 90mins show which starts at 330pm daily.  The show is very entertaining from start to the end. Very well thought out programme with the interactive part being the most…
Ciater: Nice to see the effort put in to preserve and promote the cultural art and music.  You basically pay to watch a 90mins show which starts at 330pm daily.  The show is very entertaining from start to the end. Very well thought out programme with the interactive part being the most…
YELLO: Stay with family during the short time vacation..Excellent service, room is stylish n quite simple but i loved it, has a strategic location which is connected with shopping mall, food during breakfast was really good. Can't wait to stay again.
Aryaduta: I booked 5 rooms for two nights with my family. Overall the room is great, breakfast as well. But check in service took so long, and on second day i got different toiletteries compare to others rooms.
Trans: Overall beyond expectation for our 1st anniversary, especially  special treatment for us that first time come to Trans Hotel Bandung. Rooms, cake, and anniversary setup in the rooms looks wonderful and memorable. Thanks to fitriyadi warsono and all the teams.

White_Charter: It's a unique escape from the rowdiness of Bandung. Once you enter the site, you need to use public transportation available there. It's also possible to use private car, but you need to pay a lot. the long road to reach crater offer you a greenish scenery with fresh air. When…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is my first time to visit volcano crater so this is special for me. I went there by booking Klook tour. The driver accompany us to visit the crater and told us the beautiful legends of the crater. The crater is big. There is certain spots of the craters that you need to…
Dusun_Bambu: This place is great for families to spend some time away from the hustle and bustle of city life. I recommend about 2 to 3 hours here. It's relaxing to walk around this leisure park, with many photo opportunities too. Activities ranging from horse rides to playing in the rabbit…
Saung_Angklung: Highlight of the performance for me is to learn to play the Aunklung. Everyone will get an Angklung and taught to play it as part of the show. Only downside is you may not totally get the humour as performance is conducted mainly in local language. And do get there early, we had…

YELLO: I have my trip on august for office purpose, Strategic location,excellence services,small but functional pool, natural track to jogg inthe morning in the paskal 23 parking area, never got bored coz the hotel is above the mall  (One exception...limited tv chanel )
Aryaduta: Everything went well when I stayed here. Location, Room, bed, facilities are awesome. Connect to the Bandung Indah Plaza.  However the minus point was about breakfast, there were no spacious places for breakfast so guests had to wait in long queues only to have breakfast. That was very uncomfortable.   For 4-5 stars hotel with a huge number of rooms, they should have more restaurant for breakfast, especially in peak seasons.
Trans: This hotel is very comfortable, easy to go everywhere, connecting with the mall, Trans Studio riding game. The hotel's staff very kindly and helping, the restaurant with  many kinds of foods and off course delicious too. In my opinion, this hotel very comfortable to stay if you come to Bandung.

White_Charter: If you're planning to get to Kawah Putih, make sure you have some warm clothing with you. It can get very cold here. The place is about 2 hours drive away from the City Centre. It's worth the time and distance travelled. This place offers visitors a beautiful view of a volcanic…

Dusun_Bambu: A very well-designed park, huge n with different sections that appealed to different ages. There is a food place, kids park n what i like was the park vans going around to make thenselves available to any visitor who is tired walking in the vast space n need to catch a ride. My…
Saung_Angklung: Truly a world class act that involves its audience in the art of angklung..my kids who thought that it will boring ended up enjoying it tremendously.
Ciater: Truly a world class act that involves its audience in the art of angklung..my kids who thought that it will boring ended up enjoying it tremendously.
YELLO: I decided to stay at this hotel for a short family trip with my young niece & nephews together with my parents. It's so hard to satisfy all of them, but they really enjoyed their time in this Hotel. It's a one-stop entertainment + stay. Suitable for both older people such as my parents, and youngsters like my niece & nephews.   The hotel is attached to one of a new & also the best Mall so far in Bandung. You name it, they have it! We went down to the Mall several times, it was so convenient with big brand stores, favourite chained coffee shops, various restaurants/stalls, and a cinema.   The Hotel has an outdoor pool on the 4th floor, it was windy + icy-cold. They also provide a game corner with game apps in tablets, a table football, and an Xbox-One with lots of pirated games…
Aryaduta: We went there for a honeymoon trip with my spouse. It was a great experience especially with the great bedroom. We got 'special' treatment on my bed due to my request related to the honeymoon. We are very satisfied especially for the service. Top quality! Good job! One thing, you have to add a safe in the bedroom. Thanks.
Trans: Our family first experience in Bandung and im so surprise that trans luxury really one luxury place to stay in Bandung  Next to trans studio theme park and trans mall.. Meaning full of food place..   First on check in.. The crew was so warm that we feel so welcome.. When they named it luxury.. Yes it was one luxury designed lobby they have..  First impression on the room was.. Wowww... Nice clean bright big room with 2 super single bed.. They also have a pillow menu where we can request all other type of pillow even pregnancy pillow.. Two thumbs up!!! We requested for booster as my kids request for it..  All the amenities was very Nice as well.. We feel so pampered!!!   My Hubby and i tried the massage at night.. And it was one of the best massage i ever had.. You will notice…

White_Charter: Really worth visit here! I have enjoyed this place. Really Amazing view and calm. I was here with my partner.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban  With an entrance fee of IDR 200k on weekdays and only a large crater to see this attraction is overrated and very expensive. The actual crater looks much the same in pictures. To get to another crater one has to walk about 1.5km and pay another IDR 300k.   If you have…
Dusun_Bambu: When we arrived, we saw the staff cleaning the playground and were told it would open at 10am. At 11am, they were still cleaning - very inefficient despite more and more people enquiring about it. It can be quite hot in the day so there is no need to layer up. There are some…
Saung_Angklung: The performance was really good, vividly showing the rich culture of bandung and how the simpleness of life can make one so happy. Through, this my family and I learnt more about the angklung and how to play it. It definitely is worth visiting.
Ciater: The performance was really good, vividly showing the rich culture of bandung and how the simpleness of life can make one so happy. Through, this my family and I learnt more about the angklung and how to play it. It definitely is worth visiting.
YELLO: The best we had in Indonesia in 4 weeks, if you compare esp. The clean rooms and breakfast. The location is perfect. The staff is really friendly, not in pure way.. The bed is excellent. Absolutely quiet as well. We had a very good stay.
Aryaduta: I have some request during my booking at trip.com but never get confirmation nor feedback from the hotel, when I directly call the hotel the staff guy not even willing to help and never ask my name nor my booking number he just explain about additional charging for early check in ( who care about additional charges if you gave the good service ? )
Trans: Staying in this 5 star hotel for some business reason. The room is spacious, with a nice set of toiletries, comfy pillow. It’s a pleasure having the experience to stay in this hotel. From check in process, until check out, everything is smooth. All staffs are having a good way to treat their customer. Keep it up.

White_Charter: It is not the best of geothermal activity displays but the sulphur pool of milky lime and yellow green nestled around a crescent of mountain top with the slow gurgling of hot air through some of the vents is a fun thing to take in, especially if you can’t travel further like to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Generally it is worth to visit and gives good idea of volcano craters in Indonesia (I have been to Kerinci, Semeru and Merapi). If you go on right side it’s pleasant hike where you can reach old bunker and go through it. When we wanted to go to lower section we were surrounded…
Dusun_Bambu: We came here after our lunch at Kampung Daun restaurant. Just 15mins drive to here with smooth traffic during Ramadan on Thursday. Most of the food stalls were closed but we were fine with it as we just had late lunch before we arrived.   We spent a good one hour walking around…
Saung_Angklung: A must visit destination when in Bandung. The music from the Angklung performance was very good and we even had the opportunity to play a few songs with the instruments.
Ciater: A must visit destination when in Bandung. The music from the Angklung performance was very good and we even had the opportunity to play a few songs with the instruments.
YELLO: wifi for internet connection slower than 3G, and the pool water is very cold, no extra towel near pool so we have to bring our bath towel down other that is awesome keep a good work and more event promotion
Aryaduta: So sad even though i know it is an old hotel but i always impressed with the breakfast option and quality up to my last trip on dec 29th and 30th, it was totally a different experience that i get up to i decided it should be my last one for aryaduta bandung
Trans: Very good hotel in strategic location.  Delicious dinner,  good ambien.  Nice poll with warm water.  Cool sand ponds.  Good service.  Its better use club premier so u more easy on checkin, checkout and had try the lounge to

White_Charter: Local price is 20.000rp. Foreigner is 75.000rp. Car is 150.000rp. That was our costs. Shuttle buses are 35.000rp one way.   There are info boards in Indonesian and English which give good explanation. If you walk out on the boardwalk in the crater there is a 10.000rp fee. …
Tangkuban_Perahu: There were bad reviews of the place. I would like to say that the entrance fees were steep at 200K Rupiah per person regardless of adult or child. There were touts at the place and they will try to persuade you to buy something. But the overall experience was good. I just simply…
Dusun_Bambu: The atmosphere is soothing, plus plenty of trees and rice paddies all around adding a very strong countryside atmosphere.  Enjoy lunch at Burangrang Cafe or go to the food court for other options.  Do not hesitate to invite your toddler because many areas are intended for them…
Saung_Angklung: I visited  this place with my students. We watched the dance performances from some region in Indonesia. We tried to play some songs by playing angklung. The duration for performances about 2hours. In the middle, the students were boring but in the end, they so enthusias because…
