YELLO: location very strategic because its beside shopping mall.. the room was very clean, i like the concept inside the room and also the bathroom.. internet was very strong.. the water of swimming pool very cold so I couldn't swim.. overall the hotel very good!
Aryaduta: Our Family booked for 4 rooms (802-803, 806 and 807) on behalf of my brother and me. Nice hotel with spacious room. The people are friendly and helpful. Breakfast time was very crowded but they well-managed for availability of tables / chairs and foods.  For the room that I was staying in, when the room was cleaned, there was still sachet coffee rubbish left on the carpet and the mineral water wasn't refilled.  Please improve for the cleanliness of the room. Thank you.
Trans: This hotel is really recommended for you who just come for the first time to Bandung especially when you come with family. The rooftop view is really nice to enjoy sip of your cocktails, they have easy access to the shopping mall (TSM) and their Trans Studio is cool place to take our childrens for discover. Try it out!

White_Charter: As in the title. The place is just insanely beautiful. Be sure to take some long-sleeved shirt or hoodie as it gets cold in there. You're high up in the mountains. Also a face mask is recommend as there might be a gas leakage at times.
Tangkuban_Perahu: We totally regretted visiting this place and left with lousy mood.  The trip was a well learn experience with a hefty price we paid.  The place is beautiful but please avoid it unless you come well prepared to "fight" along with lots of blood sucking touts.  We are a group of 4…
Dusun_Bambu: This is high up hills so climate was amazing with loads of rain. The lake side and flower gardens were amazing. We could not enjoy facilities as it was raining heavily. Good place to visit with family but bit pricey.
Saung_Angklung: The expert of attraction involved other people nations..we can learn traditional & modern music using instrument made of bamboo, we can see live performers, involved various nations that love Indonesia's custom
Ciater: The expert of attraction involved other people nations..we can learn traditional & modern music using instrument made of bamboo, we can see live performers, involved various nations that love Indonesia's custom
YELLO: swimming pool is located in 1 area with smoking room -> its really not healthy to be exposed smoke while swimming                          the closet is very dirty with yellow stained, it's disgusting  But overall Ok, the hotel is located near mall, easy to get taxi anytime, and the breakfast is nice
Aryaduta: Better then last visit, staff more helpful, room as expected, food more variatives,  i hope this is  continuing and consistence as Arya Duta's Hotel commitment  We really appreciate for this improvement.  Specially thanks to Arya Duta Hotel Management <U+0001F44D>
Trans: Best hotel in bandung, Best pillow, Best value, Best roominess, best access because it’s placed with mall, small pool but it has best facility for kids pool, family friendly neighborhood, best service that their employees brought to customer

White_Charter: Came here on Thursday afternoon. View was worth the trip. Sulphuric smell was bearable when surrounded by scenic site. We were thankful to come at a right time, as groups of students came right when we were about to leave. Do visit when in bandung! :)
Tangkuban_Perahu: this place is very famous with the local story. if you want to heard the story you can ask local. the place is very far. if you have more time you can visit this.
Dusun_Bambu: Beautiful mountain atmosphere and comfortable, clean, safe and friendly service ... suitable for family vacation spot, good food and variatif ... sip ess.
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is a tourist attractions with the theme of the traditional sides. Signature of this place is "Angklung". There is also the other sundanese that in the show in this place. Tari Topeng , Wayang Golek, Helaran, and Calung & Arumba. How it compliments to take the…

YELLO: Place is located next to one of the biggest Mall in Bandung - Paskal 23. Rooms is also clean with basic amenities such as intenet and bath soap. Quality of breakfast food taste could be improved. Couldn't ask for more - is a great place to stay that is worth the value of what you paid for.
Aryaduta: Good facilities and nice room to stay at bandung,thanks for excellent service from Front Office team upon check in and cleanliness is very good still maintain from Housekeeping department. Good jobs!!!
Trans: Our family stay at Trans Luxury Hotel for four days. Staff really warm welcome, check in doing smoothly, get Good view in our room directly to Trans Studio. Good amenities and comfy bed.  Weekend its really crowded for breakfast n pool, lucky We get club lounge so more peaceful ambience and staff . Bit dissapointed with coffee, order cappuccino but no taste at all.  Pool area bit messy when high season, lucky We can found place near waterfall more peaceful Cleanliness should be more attention during high season .  We order trans hamburger and fried rice to our room its really Good taste and ok with value we spend it.

White_Charter: Beautiful place, not that crowded if you go on weekdays, smells like rotten egg but overall really worth going there.  There were a lot of locals offering to take pictures of you but fortunately they weren’t pushy. You can also pay a small fee to go on the bridge and take some…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Too expensive (for foreigners) and not worth it for a family travelling with kids. For solo traveller, for the price tag 300k, maybe you can consider it.
Dusun_Bambu: I've been here last year with my Family and couple of friends.  It has one of the most peaceful and relaxing environment for a recreational park.  So many things and activities you can take advantage of but when we arrived at the park, almost all of the fun and activities are…
Saung_Angklung: Very traditonal place showing Sundanese cultures. Love the performances. It was unique and interesting. Even it is a bit far to go but worth a visit to see the local cuture. Recommended to visit Saung Udjo.
Ciater: Very traditonal place showing Sundanese cultures. Love the performances. It was unique and interesting. Even it is a bit far to go but worth a visit to see the local cuture. Recommended to visit Saung Udjo.
YELLO: Please send my regard to Mr, Aji as operation manager, very professional for handling guest complain. He has kindness feel to approve our request booking.  I really satisfy when stay here about 2 nights for our short trip in Bandung. Start from security in concierge, front office team, and restaurant team , they are so really friendly, helpful, and kindness.   + The breakfast menu, do not ask me about the taste. Most of the menu is so delicious, yummy and speechless for the gado gado sauce. (score 100)  For the suggestion, please to make different the room rate between twin and double to anticipate the problem that happens to my self, but overall good.  Thank You  Jein L
Aryaduta: Nice hotel with spacious room. The people are friendly and helpful. Got very high initiative as at the restaurant.the hotel is connected to Bandung Indah Plaza, so it's very convenient for dining or shopping.   Breakfast time was very crowded but they well-managed. The teamwork is great!  I love the gym and swimming pool area. Unfortunately, the jacuzzi, sauna, whirlpool were under construction.   My family and I will definitely get back to Aryaduta Bandung Hotel.  Thank you for the hospitality during our 3 days stay.
Trans: location, ambience, food, rooms, staffs, all perfect  you also have to try the 18th lounge.  perfect place to chillaxing and enjoy the height view of bandung  I look forward to stay again here at Trans Luxury

White_Charter: We got a car hire to bring us to the place. You can either choose to drive in with the car or take their orange van (cheaper). There’s a guy selling face mask but you don’t really need it as it makes no difference. The views are great but you can’t stay too long because of the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: For our first excursion on Java, we first encountered the commercial aspect (300k rps p.p. for foreigner entrance to national park on weekend day...) and a disappointing view to main crater. Then had to bargain our way down to side crater (with « forced » guide and souvenirs…
Dusun_Bambu: Visited Dusun Bamboo with my mom and friend. It is an awesome leisure park with many outdoor and indoor activities to do. Tranquil and relaxing environment is a great place to spend your day with your friends and family. Highly recommend it to nature and photograph lovers.
Saung_Angklung: After repeated visits to Bandung, I finally had the opportunity to visit Saung Angklung Mang Udjo. It is one stop cultural workshop with: performance venue, bamboo handicraft center, and bamboo instrument workshop.   The ticket entrance to enjoy this fantastic performance is IDR…
Ciater: After repeated visits to Bandung, I finally had the opportunity to visit Saung Angklung Mang Udjo. It is one stop cultural workshop with: performance venue, bamboo handicraft center, and bamboo instrument workshop.   The ticket entrance to enjoy this fantastic performance is IDR…
YELLO: Actually I am an indian and it's very tough to find a food which tastes me good.try to keep 1 single indian dish like the other keep like Sun lake sunter.Indian breakfast will add special for ur guest.
Aryaduta: very good location close to shopping centers and food places. Service is quite good just for breakfast the taste and type of food is somewhat lacking and there must be improvement. General quit good..
Trans: Top notch hotel in Bandung   After a few hickups from the reservation team, i was assisted by Felicia. She was spot on and service driven. i requested for late checkin and checkout plus honeymoon setup which was dearly honoured and thank you very kind for the cake. Rooms: Very good room with superb amenities like Aqua di parma ect, really superb. Very comfy bed, sofa-bed. Breakfast: Massive selection of Asian dishes and also Arabic and Indian. Service was slightly slow due to the volume of guests at that time however no big deal. Spa: Had the most relaxing time ever, the therapists know their job and very good hands.Special thanks to Sri & collegue whom i dont recall the name.  Staff are very service oriented and speaks very good English, which is a bit tough in some hotels in…

White_Charter: Went on Sunday so it was quite crowded but we were still able to get plenty of great photos without other people in the background. There were a lot of young men offering to take photos and their price was reasonable. but you can politely decline and they'll make their way. if…
Tangkuban_Perahu: As all the reviews mention, entrance fee is too pricey by Bandung standards. 300,000 rp for weekend compared to 50,000 rp at Kawah putih which is a far better wonder in my opinion. We went by 11am and by then it was hot and not much to view. Early mornings are probably better if…
Dusun_Bambu: Good theme park for family with loads of activities and beautiful scenery.  I think you need at least 6 hours inside to enjoy thoroughly.  Must visit
Saung_Angklung: A traditional music club using traditional equipment made of bambu. Average for local bandung people because we see it and play it in scholl. But quite attractive for tourist who love traditional music.
Ciater: A traditional music club using traditional equipment made of bambu. Average for local bandung people because we see it and play it in scholl. But quite attractive for tourist who love traditional music.
YELLO: good place, very clean & tidy location if superb, very near to train station staff also very friendly very recommended if go to bandung  haven;t try their food, will try if go there again overall very satisfied
Aryaduta: Booked 2 business room. Requests handling was exceptional, all of my requests were met. Thank you!  Check-in time was quick. I appreciate how the front desk officer maintain his priority with my check-in when another guest suddenly came in with his card key issue. Thumbs up!  Staffs in the hotel were very friendly.  Room was great, spacious and we had interconnecting rooms. One room furnished with double bed and the other with twin beds. It has pool view but at higher floor (1202 and 1203), the height of the room and the view was perfect for me. The bathroom also great, spacious, hot water running flawlessly, everything working well. But there was one thing about the room that bothers me, it was a dusty smell when i entered the room for the first time (I’m beginning to question…
Trans: What can be better than surfing the net or watch your favorite channel while doing your exercises the gym? Also, they prepare fresh tower and mineral water in every equipment, the assistant there is extremely attentive and take really good care of you. I love the spa the most as the masseur is very experienced and helps relieve my muscle strain.  Regarding location, Trans Luxury Hotel is quite far but it has everything so you might not need to get out at all. No problem.

White_Charter: This attraction is reachable via private car or the orange van provided by the government.   The entrance fee is IDR75k per person. Children aged 7 is paying the same entrance fee. For private car, the entrance fee is IDR150k per person.   If possible, try to visit this…
Tangkuban_Perahu: just beware of some locals trying to sell overprice stuffs. They will follow you from the moment you arrive.
Dusun_Bambu: Atv, rabbit playground with real rabbits, angry bird catapult and many more games. Good views from restaurant. Food waa decent. Pay for each activity on top of entry fee though, but thats the same with most places in the area.
Saung_Angklung: Its the best experience to visiting saung angklung udjo. They wrap it up all the show. Its true face of west java.
Ciater: Its the best experience to visiting saung angklung udjo. They wrap it up all the show. Its true face of west java.
YELLO: I do really like the breakfast. The variety was not so much bu i really do like the taste. Room size is big enough actually, and honestly I didn't expect the room is that big. But for minor improvement, the TV Channel have to be improve, because most of the channel didn't work well in my room.
Aryaduta: Without booking hotel in advance, when we arrived in Bandung we just go to Aryaduta Bandung where we almost always stay there when in Bandung, since it’s a peak season (xmas holiday) it’s a bit of gambling having vacant room, and yes we got it, we’ve got the privilege of having the suite room at a special price, and as always we enjoyed our stay there not to mention the great location and wonderful service. Thanks Aryaduta Bandung, we love it.  Novita - Jakarta
Trans: Stay here for 3 days and overall we satisfied w the service   Lot of menu for breakfast Kids corner Kids pool Waterslide  You can find Bubur ayam infront of the hotel for supper  Warm water pool  Thanks to mr. Ayus for good service

White_Charter: Amazing view. But the sulphur smell is very strong. Not advisable to spend more than 15mins there. But one can always hike up to a small hill nearby and still can get a spectacular view.
Tangkuban_Perahu: PLEASE DON'T COME. The entrance ticket is IDR300,000 (weekend) or IDR200,000 (weekday) too expensive. It is just a dry crater there. If you want to visit another hot spring in that area, you need to pay another IDR150,000. This is a blood sucker place with nothing mush amazing.…
Dusun_Bambu: Tried their eagle camp site with my kids age 5 and 7. The tent is nice but I wish there are more lights inside the tent or maybe you can bring your own emergency light. I get the tent closes to the office so it’s easier if I need any help. They provide you with bonfire and…
Saung_Angklung: If you like to experience how to play angklung, a traditional sundanese musical device, in just a few minutes while collaborating with tens of others. playing Beatles' song or the likes and put smiles on your serious face this is just the perfect place.
Ciater: If you like to experience how to play angklung, a traditional sundanese musical device, in just a few minutes while collaborating with tens of others. playing Beatles' song or the likes and put smiles on your serious face this is just the perfect place.
YELLO: yello is great hotel, good location, near food market thats really awesome.  but for breakfast the taste just ordinary nothing special. hope you can upgrade that.  And also for room, i think you need to add hair dryer. Thats really important
Aryaduta: it is nice to stay here, the location very strategic for holiday The room is clean and comfort a lot of culinary location near the hotels gym and pool also good and clean but during stay the Jacuzzi and sauna is under maintenance
Trans: I wanna back to stay again in this hotel, couse the hotel is very good service and the facility is very good too, so make me comfort to stay there. The playground and the pool make a kid have fun play there

White_Charter: The story of how the lake formed is quite fascinating. You can either take your own car inside up to the lake with some extra money or pay cheaper for one of the open tour minivans. The route up the mountain is very scenic.  The lake itself is beautiful and probably looks more…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A great view of sleeping volcano. Grey with smoke come out. It's still active as the guide tell us. The smell of sulphur is not as strong as kawah putih, so the mask is not necessary. Climb around it need to take about 2 hrs.   There are many "fly" sticking and following you…
Dusun_Bambu: Shalom. We are so happy coming. We can eat and enjoy fresh air in this area. We can waste our time one and the other. I will back to this area again. Thanks. God bless
Saung_Angklung: I recommend y'all to visit this place. This place shows many popular music. One of the best is Bohemian Rhapsody song. What make it special because all songs played with Angklung (Indonesian Traditional Instrument made of bamboo tree). Don't worry for tourists because it…
Ciater: I recommend y'all to visit this place. This place shows many popular music. One of the best is Bohemian Rhapsody song. What make it special because all songs played with Angklung (Indonesian Traditional Instrument made of bamboo tree). Don't worry for tourists because it…
YELLO: very good place to stay and spend holiday, just going down and we can find mall 23 pascal with complete facility especially playground for children, good food to have breakfast, lunch, even dinner, very strategic location so we can find any great place
Aryaduta: Old building but very well maintance. Good location and have direct access to Bandung Indah Plaza,  breakfast also good, The room is big and clean. Near hotel so many restaurants and most of them open 24 hours. I love stay in Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: I stay there with my family on June 2019, the room was great, lobby area clean and tidy, twin bed with sofas very nice touch, my daughter love the kids room and the pool so much, swimming pool with white sand can unforgettable experience for my daughter. Staff who's handle my check in was friendly and polite. Definitely will stay again. Thank....

White_Charter: Recommendation. We just had a great tour to Kawah Putih from Bandung. Driver Aris, +81 3-2109-8456, charged 700k from our hotel in Bandung. Safe car. Best thing was he rode us to the parking next to crater. This way we avoided hawkers and imo unsafe busses to the top. (We travel…
Tangkuban_Perahu: RIP off!!! They want more money of you because your a tourist! 300 000! + another 300 000 to see another! Got charged 50000 to park up! And forced to buy souvenirs! Another 5000 to climb up! Ridiculous! It’s not worth the hype!
Dusun_Bambu: It was quite a distance from Bandung city, however the trip was worth it. So many variety and choice of good food at the food court. We had one of the best Batagor in town.   My daughter loved the Rabbit farm. The rabbits were chubby, cheerful and clean. We didn't find any…
Saung_Angklung: Come and see angklung and some culture in the midst of the shopping malls, restaurants, museum encounters in Bandung. But use google map or waze to find quickest route, otherwise you'd get stuck in the usual traffic.
Ciater: Come and see angklung and some culture in the midst of the shopping malls, restaurants, museum encounters in Bandung. But use google map or waze to find quickest route, otherwise you'd get stuck in the usual traffic.
YELLO: This hotel have a good location, even for bussines travelling or for leisure. And the staff are so kind and respectful   The room was simple and clean. Unfortunately there was no refrigerator to store drinks
Aryaduta: I went there with my parents and kids.  Positive comments : - spacious room - a nice and friendly staff  Negative: - no welcome drinks (i have to asked for this) - breakfast choice was very limited - elevator was very slow (need to wait approximately 5 mins+) - the water was not clean (a bit brownish)
Trans: Location: in conjunction with a large Indoor theme park (various adrenaline rides + playground for kids and baby + small climbing wall). It is also located beside Trans Studio Mall (the 3rd floor food court is full of local foods such as Ampera, Mie Merapi, Wedang Jahe, Batagor Yeyen, Lumpia Pak Pur, Cendol Elisabeth, etc) and there is a large supermarket on the basement. Hotel can arrange for local transportation for one day/6 hrs/4 hrs which is good value since it is partnering with Golden Bird (Blue Bird). Club premiere deal is very good for my taste because you get to have free dinner in addition of breakfast at the 18th floor club lounge plus 4 piece extra laundry every day. The staffs there are excellent especially pak Andri who went out all the way to help us all having a…

White_Charter: First time visiting here on a day trip from Bandung. Really quite an impressive site, although a lot of people were visiting on the Saturday when we went. Very strong smell of sulphur in the air. Need to be quite careful when approaching the lake in order to avoid getting stuck…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A good place to visit, very fresh air and nice view.  The bad part was the people selling the merchandize always tailing you like nobody business makes you really annoyed.  No peace of mind.. Bad.
Dusun_Bambu: Incredible View, Nice place for rest and relax, Delicious Food , and leisure park for my children. Natural environment,  Fresh Air and really good place to enjoy and spend quality time with my family.
Saung_Angklung: it was an impromptu decision to visit the place.definitely did not regret it.loved the performance by the orchestra and the interactive performance by the people there.definitely a good cultural addition to the trip
Ciater: it was an impromptu decision to visit the place.definitely did not regret it.loved the performance by the orchestra and the interactive performance by the people there.definitely a good cultural addition to the trip
YELLO: My friend and I stayed for a night and we had a room with windows overlooking north, meaning that we woke up to the view of Mount Tangkuban Parahu, which was great. The room interior was just typical of YELLO properties: a monochromatic palette with yellow colour pops here and there, minimalist furniture, and fun murals on the wall. There was a chaise lounge by the window, making a perfect spot to enjoy my morning coffee.   The bathroom was okay. The shower area was a bit smaller than expected. The drainage might need some improvement since it took longer to drain the water. Also, we could not find a hairdryer in our room. However, we liked the bathroom products provided.   The hotel had a swimming pool and a game corner. The pool was not heated, but the temperature was great…
Aryaduta: My family stayed in Aryaduta during Christmas Holidays from Dec 25th for 3 nights. We get special rate thru Aryaduta Website, the facilities (pool, restaurants, kids room, amenities, and mall s) are very comfortable. We dont need any extra efforts to find foods and other stuffed.
Trans: staff, room, check-in, check-out all great. Price also great.definitely come back to this hotel for only stay.  Overall hotel is very great. Except the 18th restaurant, not worth to try, really disappointed because the 18th

White_Charter: The lake is so bluyish but it's not considered a very big lake like lake of China. You can see the smoke above the lake and of course the smell of sulphur. The smell will caused you feeling dizzy and coughing. If you need a mask, someone is selling it at the entrance.  The…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The entrance fees was crazy high for foreigners! 10x of the local visitor. Place closes at 5pm so do time your visit properly. The crater view was amazing! There were many friendly guides who followed us on the crater, helping us take photos and stuff. We were ok to pay them a…
Dusun_Bambu: Ive been to almost every family park in Bandung and this place is the best of all. Huge place for all the visitors on the weekend so you dont bump your self into people. They have lots of activity and entrance ticket only 25.000  The let down is only the restaurant on the water.…
Saung_Angklung: Usually i'm not too into cultural show but I like this one! its entertaining and fun, but  need to be on time, check the time before u go! Kids will love it too.....
Ciater: Usually i'm not too into cultural show but I like this one! its entertaining and fun, but  need to be on time, check the time before u go! Kids will love it too.....
YELLO: This hotel and room interior was surprisingly beautiful.. I love the room and the hotel surrounding, friendly and smiley staff all over the place.. A nice game room and seating areas on the lobby level..  The only annoying thing is, one of the mug in my room had some dirty coffee spot inside and didn't get change during my whole stay so i could only use 1 instead of 2 everyday..  But overall, i love my stay here <U+2764><U+FE0F>
Aryaduta: One of my favorite hotels.  Swimming pool far from the breakfast place, all rooms have bathtub. Food at breakfast always tastes good. The process at check in was fast, before arriving at the hotel I called them to prepared the room so we didn't have to wait long, stayed here several times and were always satisfied. Thank you to all staff.
Trans: You must come and taste the great service and atmosphere of Trans Luxury hotel  Fast, polite, and helpful staffs. Design interior and hotel amenities are great. White sandy pool and kids club suit the children. Breakfast tasteful with variety choice of foods.

White_Charter: KAWAH PUTIH CIWIDEY BANDUNG  Kawah Putih is a tourist spot in West Java located in Ciwidey area. White crater is a lake formed from the eruption of Mount Patuha.  The surface height is about 2,430 m. With these altitudes, the air temperature in the White Crater area is of course…
Tangkuban_Perahu: My parents and I did not hike down the crater. We just lounging at the areas and taking photos with the horses and shops around the area. The area that day was windy and foggy. Not to mention cold as well! The reason we did not go down the crater is because the locals keep on…
Dusun_Bambu: u must using shuttle around the little village.  there's a good spot for taking a picture.  restaurant = so so lah...
Saung_Angklung: We had to come here twice, cos we can't find the performance timing anywhere. Our reception at hotel says they will start show with at least 10 people but that s wrong info. So we came here twice after finding out the exact performance timing. The show is really good, it has…
Ciater: We had to come here twice, cos we can't find the performance timing anywhere. Our reception at hotel says they will start show with at least 10 people but that s wrong info. So we came here twice after finding out the exact performance timing. The show is really good, it has…
YELLO: My first time stay at Yello as MTP member. The Price is Good! But none know me as a member. My overall experience is Good. I had a little accident when open bathroom door from inside. Thomas came and help me take care of the wound.
Aryaduta: The hotel is clean and comfortable. The room is well ordered. Fitness center and swimming pool are good, the water is warm! Tasty breakfast with classy dining room. It'd be better to provide coffee maker to brew coffee instead of providing coffee in a jar.
Trans: This was our first stay in Trans Luxury Hotel and satisfied with the hotel overall services. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Check-in and check-out was smooth. Food were various and met our expectation. Would be great for a family holiday since the hotel within an area with a mall and a theme park, even a big mosque is just across the hotel. Recommended!

White_Charter: We walked on top of the hill amd the view was nothing short of incredible from there.  The lake itself is crowded but very less people climb the hill, its worth it even though a bit tiring. The lakeside is also nice but.i had difficulty breathing due to sulfer.   The entrance…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is a joke, they are asking 10X more from tourists for some reason, according to local it's not a big deal to see, so skipped it
Dusun_Bambu: Were having lunch while having a short sightseeing with group. We had really nice lunch at tepi danau restaurant. For a group of 12 person we booked saung / small house at the lakeside. while waiting for our foods we take alot of great pics, listening to their traditional music…
Saung_Angklung: Come and experience the angklung interactive performances At Saung Mang Udjo. You wont regret... Angklung Mang Udjo has also bamboo handicraft centre and bamboo instrument workshop. It costs Rp. 45,000 per person to join the workshop.
Ciater: Come and experience the angklung interactive performances At Saung Mang Udjo. You wont regret... Angklung Mang Udjo has also bamboo handicraft centre and bamboo instrument workshop. It costs Rp. 45,000 per person to join the workshop.
YELLO: The fantastic stay began with a very personal welcome on my bed, a unique towel art and a personal note. Outstanding. The room was comfortable with excellent and simple decor. Breakfast was also delicious and of a good selection. As always the staff were the best part of the stay. The front of house crew were always cheerful and would address me by name. Can't imagine staying anywhere else in Bandung. Another plus to staying here is the shopping mall attached to the hotel.
Aryaduta: I am satisfied to stay here, friendly service, strategic location. Comfort is the main thing for me. But it's good to improve the breakfast menu, especially side dishes and coffee. I like a cup of brown sugar coffee late.
Trans: My 1st stay and I was delighted by how warm the club lounge team welcomed us, thanks to Pak Teddy , Ms Hanifa , Pak Bagas , we were treated as family and that’s what you’re searching for from a hotel.   Great facilities :  - kids playing sand near the warm water swimming pool - complete reliable concierge team  - spotless and neat room  - the Gym <U+0001F44C><U+0001F3FB> reflects superior guest treatment  Will definitely be back here

White_Charter: When we reached there it was so cold! Luckily my mom and I packed up sweater and we are spared from the coldness of the atmosphere. The weather at that time was very foggy so we don't have a good chance to actually take good photos. The surrounding forests look serene and calm…
Tangkuban_Perahu: love the view here.the weather also good,calm and relax.but the fee seriously very expensive for tourists
Dusun_Bambu: Its a nice place to have a family vacation. Have a new ambience for urban people to relax. Its better to visit not in public holiday.. too crwoded..
Saung_Angklung: In this show, you will be introduced to a traditional musical instrument : Angklung - how it work and how to use it to make diffirent tongue of sound.  Don't forget to pass by their souvenir shop in the end of the show, so many things to buy with amazing cheap prices !
Ciater: In this show, you will be introduced to a traditional musical instrument : Angklung - how it work and how to use it to make diffirent tongue of sound.  Don't forget to pass by their souvenir shop in the end of the show, so many things to buy with amazing cheap prices !
YELLO: First experience stay in yello hotel and amazed by the simple but fresh design on the interior. The service also very good and friendly. All young and friendly hotel staff give joy to us. The location is inside PASKAL SQUARE and connected to the newest mall "23 PASKAL".
Aryaduta: It was great. Thanks for having us in 4 stars hotel. But I'm sorry to be honest that the breakfast must be improved. The taste was not really good. Only omlete and breads that we like. But overall, our satisfactions is beyond! Thx
Trans: My 1st experience staying here, as our trip with children wanted to go to Trans Studio. Connecting to mall and trans studio make everything easy for us. Comfort bed, good and wide selection of breakfast, good amenities, nice pool, clean room. Quick and attentive service from the staff from the check in counter and housekeeping to meet our needs.

White_Charter: Breathtaking and amazing view. Very nice to take a lots of picture. Needless to say, the white crater turquoise lake was simply epic.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Warning to all who are visiting this place. This place is full of 'Orang utans' who self declare as guides and support staff. We were ambushed to buy souvenirs at exorbitant prices and it's difficult to bargain or even refuse to buy their useless wares.   Once we reached the…
Dusun_Bambu: Good for family with kids. The rabbit wonderland was nice, with a maze and small place to run around chasing rabbits, my only complaint would be that they start keeping the rabbits from 4-5pm so we missed the rabbits running around and saw only a couple. Rabbits were clean and…
Saung_Angklung: I have been here for three times already and never get bored. The most interesting part for me is an angklung orchestra but overall show is awesome tho. We can learn a lil bit about sundanese traditional art and the angklung it self.
Ciater: I have been here for three times already and never get bored. The most interesting part for me is an angklung orchestra but overall show is awesome tho. We can learn a lil bit about sundanese traditional art and the angklung it self.
YELLO: Goed location, good breakfast,  service and helpful.<U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D>, nearby trein station, downstair is shopping mall , supermarkt, shopping, restaurant. And 5 minuten walking there have  very ice food market<U+0001F60B><U+0001F60B><U+0001F60B><U+0001F60B><U+0001F60B><U+0001F60B>
Aryaduta: I booked this hotel on last minutes, luckily that I still got 2 room. The room is spacious and clean. The location is just walking distant to mall BIP next door. All the staff is very helpfull, from front office, restaurant and even the security on the parking area. Very recommended if you want to have family weekend getaway.
Trans: Stay in Trans is very good and happy experience, Nice staff, great hotel room, clean and bright room, great beach theme pool, great and delicious food. Beautiful and kind staff. Perfect hotel. Thx Trans hotel.

White_Charter: The place is managed very well. If we don't want to take our vehicle to park near the crate, there's a parking lot also near the entrance, surrounded by souvenir shop, and there's public transportation arranged by the management to go up. On the parking lot upstairs there's no…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This Is place is nice! Great view weather is great. You can get souvenir up there. Food is also available. The view along the way is amazing.
Dusun_Bambu: If you feel stressed out or tired of the city, then go here. Because it is really natural where there are so many trees, pond, and flowers. This place is so well mantained. They also provide bus for free transport from the main gate to the main attraction. When we went there, it…
Saung_Angklung: This place is very well known in domestic and international. In this place you can enjoy music from angklung also can learn how to play angklung. This place not really hard to find.. you can access it from google map too.. the place also make you feels like back to nature
Ciater: This place is very well known in domestic and international. In this place you can enjoy music from angklung also can learn how to play angklung. This place not really hard to find.. you can access it from google map too.. the place also make you feels like back to nature
YELLO: Best location, attractive interior, sufficient facility, responsive and attentive staffs, couldn't ask for more.  The lift traffic is not bad, it won't make you wait for too long. I happy staying here. Keep it up!
Aryaduta: The room is spacious. The location is strategic, connected to BIP, very easy to find food nearby. Breakfast not so many choices, yet nice. Shower is inside the bathub, quite dangerous for elderly or children. Overall, great service, will be back for sure!
Trans: Spend one night in the Trans Luxury Hotel with my family as part of our vacation in Bandung. Check in process was quick and smooth, in minutes we have access to the room. This hotel is built and designed with luxury in mind, you can see it from the moment you step in to the lobby. Luxury interior can also be found inside the room, it felt like staying in a classic five star hotel.   Service and hospitality was top notch. Staffs are kind, polite, and helpful everywhere they stationed. Breakfast was superb, though it felt like a normal hotel breakfast with no nature view but the quality of the dishes was remarkable.  Some unique features of this hotel is its beach pool with sands, my kid loved it playing there. The next one is the restaurant at the 18th floor, it boast marvellous…

White_Charter: I always come here once in a month at least, i visit here as a tour guide bringing my customer from around Asia which choose Bandung as their holiday trip. The weather sometime can very could around the crater, so i suggest you bring your warm clothes if you want to go to the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: WARNING TO ALL WESTERNERS. Entry into see this tourist spot is a joke. They charge WAY more because i was white and in a car with 4 other indonesians from Bandung. We tried to argue why is was $30 alone for me and $3 for them to enter and they just said it was a government…
Dusun_Bambu: We could arrived to the restaurant or bungalows with its unique accomodation car after we bought the entrance tickets.. there are so many attractions  for children inside..such as play ground, bycicles, etc..
Saung_Angklung: It's like unprofessional school show , that they use children in most of shows that I think they are not paid ( I asked people there about that , and they assured this)  But to be honest there is one orcestra show that was really good and funny But still don't worth even half a…
Ciater: It's like unprofessional school show , that they use children in most of shows that I think they are not paid ( I asked people there about that , and they assured this)  But to be honest there is one orcestra show that was really good and funny But still don't worth even half a…
YELLO: The location is the main attraction because it located next to 23 Paskal Mall. It offered low budget cost but very nice and clean room.But if you want big room it is not recommended because it only for low budget
Aryaduta: Booked this hotel to celebrate my son birthday. Surprisingly, Front Office team - Bu Felly gave us birthday cake which make my son is very happy.. room is clean and spacious. Pool with kids corner also good for us with family. They also have garden.  Thanks also for the security team, they are very helpfull and warm. They assist us at the night to find parking slot.
Trans: It was about two weeks ago my fam n me stay in this hotel. When we arrived my boy was getting cold. Refused to eat and cough all day. To my surprise when the room boy and girl clean the hotel she asked me about my boy's condition. Whether he's sick or not. And she offered me to have nurse visit.  And, when we're about to having a walk in the mall near the hotel we asked a wheelchair for my boy so that he can enjoy. The hotel borrowed us the wheelchair. And for all services were free.  The food is okay. And bcoz of the warmness from almost all of the employees my hubby and I discussed about it when we're on the way home. How well the management of the hotel so that all peoples involved having such amazing hospitalities. Almost all of them were amazing. Warming and touching our…

White_Charter: It’s worth going if you’re in the ciwidey area. Took around 20 minutes from the main gate to the parking lot near the crater. Not suitable for elderly and for child under 2yo since there’s quite a lot of stairs.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee is +- Rp30.000 (correct me if I'm wrong) Visit here better in the morning, less the crowd and still fresh. Could be crowded in peak holidays. This place closed at night becoz no electricity. Worth the visit :)
Dusun_Bambu: We came here during weekend and the traffic was a bit crowded. There is transportation provided from the cark park to the garden. The local ice cream sell here was nice to try. This place is a bit steep.
Saung_Angklung: such a nice place to educate the kids and experience the local culture and playing angklung instantly. the ticket is a bit expensive for domestic, but understandable due to enormous people involved in the show.
Ciater: such a nice place to educate the kids and experience the local culture and playing angklung instantly. the ticket is a bit expensive for domestic, but understandable due to enormous people involved in the show.
YELLO: I was there during the Holiday Season. There was the usual hotel rush but checking into the Standard Room was no hassle.  Room and bathroom were tiny but well lit. Bed was comfortable. Floor felt dusty though, housekeeping needs to be more thorough. There is a day bed in the room. Wifi has a good strong connection. Rooms are not soundproof so bear that in mind if you’re a light sleeper.   Tried room service. Took forever to have my order delivered, perhaps because it was holiday rush. Decided to go down the mall for meals instead of sitting around waiting for food.  Breakfast was so-so with the usual breakfast buffet menu. Wasn’t bad but wasn’t that good either.  There is a non heated kiddie pool available. No life guards so watch your kids closely. There also a game corner in…
Aryaduta: Location of this hotel is very good.  the building looks old and abit dirty  but overall it's ok.  the downside is only with the check in timr. I have arrived at the hotel at 4PM. and somehow my room is not ready. I booked 2 room for me and my family. I finally got my room on 5.30PM and my parents got their room 6PM.
Trans: Clean room, good service staff, comfort room, good facilities, good location, directly link to the mall, good variety of breakfast. I and family having a good vacation in here. The only things that we disappointed is the parking area, it's take us too long to get out of there

White_Charter: Unusual lake  but the sulfur dioxide concentration in the air is quite high ! We can smell it as we approached the lake . There  was a write-up on one of the boards about how they discovered this place..... the birds  avoided flying over it . Masks on sale won’t prevent the gas…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Paid an entrance fee of IDR$337500, you get to visit one crater only, if you want to go visit the hot spring, that's another IDR337500, this country really hates tourists do they? The locals are paying 10 times less!!!!
Dusun_Bambu: This place had two big eating place. The exclusive Burangrang restaurant and the other one was more like foodcourt style. Both located in the middle of the property. Paid IDR 20,000 and will be able to take decorated mini bus that circle around this area. If you walk, you will…
Saung_Angklung: So great! Kids love it, grand ma love it, local, foreign ppl love it, a truly universal experience that everyone can enjoy. Music at the heart of each person, we listen, we learn, we play. Culture, humor, music, such a wonderful time with family and friends. Imo a must-do in…
Ciater: So great! Kids love it, grand ma love it, local, foreign ppl love it, a truly universal experience that everyone can enjoy. Music at the heart of each person, we listen, we learn, we play. Culture, humor, music, such a wonderful time with family and friends. Imo a must-do in…
YELLO: This is no bad  hotel , but wifi a bit slow at nite time, and maybe  will stay back to this hotel at my next trip. But I hope can solve the wifi issue when I come again. Location is ok, near shopping mall.
Aryaduta: Strategic location, spacious rooms, clean, neatly arranged, friendly staff, swimming pool and playground cool, overall very good but unfortunately from the parking lot to the lobby there is no elevator only stairs and the breakfast menu is less varied. Hopefully the future will be even better.
Trans: The Trans was the best hotel I ever stayed! Everyone in the hotel were friendly, and the room really luxury! The most complete toiletries I ever found (they provided bathbomb, loofah, nail kits and many more)! They also have 3 pools, really good for kids too! The breakfast also delicious! Awesome!

White_Charter: The scenery is just awesome! This place suitable for family photos with awesome background of white crater. We come here with our Son and parents. However if you want to come here, please take note of the visit duration (suggested only about 15 minutes due to the smell of sulfur…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It can be fun to see a volcano ! However there were quite alot of local men who acted as guides and persist on selling tourists their goods . The Long trail down to the hot springs can be quite challenging for the elderly and those who have weak knees. Alternatively, one can…
Dusun_Bambu: Went there recently during our holidays with the family. The kids really enjoyed it especially the playground that was located next to the birds nest/walkway and souvenir centre. When we were there the weather was cool around 17-19 degrees which made it more pleasant. The food…
Saung_Angklung: This traditional show revolved around the angklung, a traditional bamboo musical instrument popular in the Indonesian and Nusantara region.   The show consists of traditional songs, dances, a traditional puppet show, and the angklung. A lot of the performances are performed by…
Ciater: This traditional show revolved around the angklung, a traditional bamboo musical instrument popular in the Indonesian and Nusantara region.   The show consists of traditional songs, dances, a traditional puppet show, and the angklung. A lot of the performances are performed by…
YELLO: I enjoy staying in Yello because of cleanliness and also good location for culinary around the area. All staffs mostly very helpful and fast response. I'll come back again to stay in Yello if I come to Bandung
Aryaduta: The room is spacious and clean. The bathroom is also clean. The wifi in the room is very good. But the parking lot is not too big. We have a little trouble to park our car at the hotel. Because the parking lot is full. The breakfast is so so. Overall I enjoyed my stay at Aryadutta.
Trans: This is my second time staying at this hotel, the first in 2012 and the second just now. Even at the beginning there is something problem but finally Mr. Fadly as a duty manager taking hand on it . The houskeper Man Mas Ari is very good and also Mas Ricky and the front office line is informative. The room is so clean and the people are friendly. I will back to this hotel again.

White_Charter: This place is around 2.5 hours away from Bandung city. We rented a van with driver to come here and we left the hotel around 8am. Recommend time to start your travel to this place is between 7 to 8am if you are coming from the city. There was a stop to pay for the entrance…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Beautiful nature view but for younger children better to wear mask due to sulphur smell.  There are many souvenir seller there. Bargain is a must. Some good can be priced doubled or even more.
Dusun_Bambu: Great place to relax and rewind. Flowers are colourful and lovely.. It is completed with eateries and great view.
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the most cultural places in The Capital City of West Java Province, Bandung. It's a tiny 'village' of which the Sundanese traditional musical instrument called BAMBU is made, displayed and even played in a very interesting colossal performance…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the most cultural places in The Capital City of West Java Province, Bandung. It's a tiny 'village' of which the Sundanese traditional musical instrument called BAMBU is made, displayed and even played in a very interesting colossal performance…
YELLO: Anything is good except the internet speed. i can't streaming properly with youtube and other streaming site. And i hope they use carpet in the floor near bed. it's feel sticky when my feet touch the floor after wake up.
Aryaduta: Good hotel.  Suitable for couple and family.  The room is very clean.  Fast services during checkin or check out.  The pool is not to cold good for children. Strategic place connecting with mal BIP.  We are happy thanks
Trans: Best experience so far.. will definitely stay in this hotel when I am in Bandung.   The birthday setup for wife’s birthday was wonderful. She’s surprised and happy.   Many kinds of food for breakfast >> superb!

White_Charter: This place is about 1.5 hours drive from Bandung.  Not too bad. There were not many people when we arrived in the morning, there was a wedding photo shoot going on.  Nice view and I am glad we decided to come here instead of Tangkuban Perahu which is more of a tourist…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Normally, I take reviews on tripadvisor that give terrible reviews of a place with a pinch of salt, but in this case, I wish I had take these reviewers' advice. Trust me when I say this place is a huge rip-off. Sure, it's nice. How much would I pay to enter? Max. 5.000IDR. Yet…
Dusun_Bambu: a huge place (+/- 45 ha) with various small theme parks, have 3 resto inside (purbasari, burangrang, and pasar safari) . we took purbasari resto, great place for relaxing. only have 12 private tents for lunch or dine. the only minus point is the price, the serve in package with…
Saung_Angklung: For group visitors, reservations is recommended, so the staff can arrange many pleasant attractions and give more attention, also they offer meals and gift better for accompanying great moments here
Ciater: For group visitors, reservations is recommended, so the staff can arrange many pleasant attractions and give more attention, also they offer meals and gift better for accompanying great moments here
YELLO: I like the food. But some food already cold. The staff really friendly. Fast check in. The problem only with the wifi. Because uts so hard to get signal, i only can depend on the wifi. But the wifi is not really fast.
Aryaduta: During our supposed to be three days stay, which ended in a runaway after two creepy nights, we could experience way too many creepy things, such as: old building, worn out furniture, dirty bathroom, creepy bathtub mat, yellow, stinky water pouring from the bathroom tubes, worn out towels, dirty pool full of people swimming in their pijamas, room was not sound proofed at all, so we heard kids whining, running, doors banging, people talking loudly in the corridors, kids shouting in the lobby while the poor piano player kept playing on, loud groups of people gathering for marriage parties, filthy breakfast room, no food refills, stained glasses and cups, poor and extremely overpriced room service, slow and over crowded elevators, poor customer care from the staff, slow response to…
Trans: Its location with trans mall bandung area. The services and facilities are good and comfortable also don’t forget to visit The 18th to enjoy city of bandung while enjoying your food/beverages in morning or evening.

White_Charter: The white crater looks surreal. I was taken aback by the color of the sulphur in the crater and the sulphuric foam that was coming out of it. It is really worth a visit. Just make sure to bring a mask because sulphur smell is strong.
Tangkuban_Perahu: The scenery of Tangkuban Perahu is beautyful, especially the Ratu crater.  As a foreigner you have to pay 200K and locals pay 20K. In the weekend you pay 300K as a foreigner.  The drawback, during the week: the hawkers, who sometimes follow you all the time like a shawdow, to…
Dusun_Bambu: Good view..they allow to bring dogs but not to enter the restaurant...they have play yard and it was spaciouse...the culinary was also good with may options traditional and western..we were happy
Saung_Angklung: It was fascinating to see these traditional Indonesian bamboo musical instruments (Anklung) at this studio which is still run by the son of the founder & provides musical education to young people. They put on a wonderful show with a puppet demonstration, traditional dance &…
Ciater: It was fascinating to see these traditional Indonesian bamboo musical instruments (Anklung) at this studio which is still run by the son of the founder & provides musical education to young people. They put on a wonderful show with a puppet demonstration, traditional dance &…
YELLO: Near big mall Paskal 23 , good service , complete facilities , easy transportation , good and delicious breakfast , friendly , big room , so many restourant near the hotel , many spots instagram mabel
Aryaduta: Room facilty is good, swimming pool with max 1,7 mtrs depth is nice but breakfast is not recommended (need to improve), parking space is small and difficult to access, hotel lift is small and does not reach basement area.
Trans: Great place for short escape, next to the mall, totally luxurious amenities inside the room, a lot variety breakfast menu and friendly staffs.. but we had a bad experience upon arrival, we waited for more than an hour until our room ready, and we don’t recommend the pool and kids club,too crowd in weekend.

White_Charter: from the parking area / counter tickets, we ride the vehicle they provide for the visitors, at the last stop, we walk to the white crater by climbing the stairs down to the crater, the crater area, high cliffs, thick enough fog, the scenery is amazing , btw use a mask to cover…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Not beautiful unlike many others volcanoes in Indonesia  I still don't get it.. why do foreigners have to pay 10 times more than Indonesians?  Too commercialized. U better have a ride a few kilometer further and enjoy a walk in the tea gardens (for free).
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bamboo located at the feet of Mountain Burangrang Limbang, Bandung. Ticket price is 25,000 IDR.   They will give a coupon where you can exchange to Mineral Water upon exiting the park.  There will have a shutter van for you from the ticket counter to the main entrance. …
Saung_Angklung: Love to be here. Good vibes. And here we can learn how to play angklung. And we can see how the angklungs were made.
Ciater: Love to be here. Good vibes. And here we can learn how to play angklung. And we can see how the angklungs were made.
YELLO: Colorful ! Instagram able ! Clean room and so homey ! I think u have much spot for photos, actually for selfies . Lol ! Overall its was NICE ! Thank u and GOOD LUCK YELLO ! See you again on another trip !
Aryaduta: It was great experience during stay in Hotel Aryaduta Bandung. The strategic location in Bandung, the rooms was comfortable and clean also the breakfast was lots of choice and good. Thank you for your kind service.
Trans: I reserved 2 (two) rooms for 1 night on 20 Apr - 21 Apr 2019. It was all good but that was until I left my jewelry (gold necklace) on the bathroom sink. I checked out at 21 Apr and just found out that I left the necklace on the next day. I made a call and report to the front desk staff to check on it, they contacted the Lost & Found department but the result was negative. I’m pretty sure it was there, on the bathroom sink. I know it’s my bad for not taking care of my own belonging but to recall that Trans Luxury is a 5 stars hotel, I was quite upset to hear what their staff said, “We couldn’t find anything, we have checked with the duty staff and the result was negative. At the same day you check out, the room was also occupied by the next guest” - for me this is completely non…

White_Charter: The smell of sulfur at certain areas can be a overwhelming, you'll feel like coughing. There is a route for hiking that not many people take near the parking area. The viewing area along the hike looking down to the crater is very beautiful. On the way you'll also pass by a tea…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Although the crater is indeed beautiful but the attraction has been too commercialized up to a point where it is discouraging to visit.  Entrance fee is priced at IDR300,000 for tourists (weekend rate) - 10 times more expensive than locals. There are 3 craters within vicinity…
Dusun_Bambu: Me and my family enjoy it here. The ticket Rp.25k for adult and child's ( up to 140cm). Not much we do that time because of rain <U+0001F60F>.   We have our lunch in Lutung kasarung. The ambien really nice feel like a bird, we need to pay this place Rp.50k for weekday and Rp.100k for…
Saung_Angklung: Great place to see culture and traditional music. They shows us traditional dance, traditional puppets, and traditional music
Ciater: Great place to see culture and traditional music. They shows us traditional dance, traditional puppets, and traditional music
YELLO: Awesome Hotel. Very good bargain. The room condition are perfect. The breakfast was awesome, the spread are good and everything was refilled fast enough. All the staff are very helpful and friendly. Definitely will recommend this hotel to others.
Aryaduta: Excellent service, nice & clean room. It's a good place for children also. It's located in the middle of town. The staffs are helpful & friendly. Should be recommend for our next visit to Bandung. The kids love this place so much.
Trans: It was really great and always great stayed at trans luxury hotel. I booked celebrity suite and premier room with connecting door. The rooms were very comfortable, clean and spacious. The pool was so awesome, they have pool with sand so its very safe for kids.

White_Charter: Located in Cidwey, Bandung. You need to hire a driver to get there. Upon reaching the carpark, you will be asked to transfer to an orange van thingy which will bring you up to the crater.  Beautiful view with bluish/greenish water, white crater rim and dead tree branches giving…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited this place on 28 May, it is very beautiful and breathtaking to enjoy the view.   The price difference for local and for foreigner is a lot. For local (Domestic) you will need to pay IDR20,000 (SGD 2), For foreigner you will need to pay IDR200,000 (SGD 20) which is 10x…
Dusun_Bambu: I was coming here directly after landed at Husein Sastranegara airport.. It took about 45-60 minutes from airport. When I came here, it had just been opened.  First impression of this place is "green and cool". You have to walk through the mini fields then bamboos trees…
Saung_Angklung: WOW! I have never failed to visit this cultural heritage village every time I have visited Bandung and that's been 3 times.  It never fails to fascinate me that it is such a beautiful window into something so heartwarming as to see the descendants of the founder and young people…
Ciater: WOW! I have never failed to visit this cultural heritage village every time I have visited Bandung and that's been 3 times.  It never fails to fascinate me that it is such a beautiful window into something so heartwarming as to see the descendants of the founder and young people…
YELLO: Nice Facilities Great Ambience One step to Hits Paskal Mall and Near to Kuliner area like Sudirman Food Street Market sure i will back to Yello Hotel Paskal and will recommend this hotel to family and friends
Aryaduta: Nice hotel and good inveromental. Good hospitality staff, this is location near by restaurant and mall.  Swiming pool and restaurant at pool good. Breakfast menu it's good with traditional food like mie bakso.
Trans: NIce Palace to stay in Bandung, staff very kind and helpful, food variety and delicious,room and bathroom very clean and smell is good..near mall and trans studio.. one day will back again  with my family..

White_Charter: One of the top attractions in Bandung. Looks surreal from certain spots, especially with dead tree branches surrounding it. Would make for wonderful postcards :)  Slightly chilly in the area. Mild sulphuric stench deeper in. Entrance fees differs between locals & tourists. You…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is indeed one of many beautiful places to visit in Bandung; an active volcano, cool breeze and magnificent view.   All-in-all, it’s worth to visit once for the experience but there is a price tag to it. Foreigners will need to pay an entrance fee of IDR300,000…
Dusun_Bambu: Does the food halal for Muslims? Do you serve pork? Our children would love to play there /stay at your resorts. We would like to go there next year. Thanks.
Saung_Angklung: I saw this show as solo Travellers earlier and this time wanted my family to visit this amazing presentation.  Getting tickets were easy at the counter (no booking required in advance)   The event started on time. Intro and start was little slow but later part was interesting…
Ciater: I saw this show as solo Travellers earlier and this time wanted my family to visit this amazing presentation.  Getting tickets were easy at the counter (no booking required in advance)   The event started on time. Intro and start was little slow but later part was interesting…
YELLO: value for money. good location. good cleanliness. friendly employees. nice rooms. surrounded by many culinary spot, street food and restaurant. near Kartika Sari (snacks and cakes). near train station. overall is great.
Aryaduta: The best short business trip, very comfortable. The location is very strategic. I got an upgrade to an executive room even though I only stayed one night.  All service is very helpful. I will come back for a longer stay.
Trans: Very fast and smoothly to check in. the staff help me to early check in. they provide a lot of stuff such as cookies, peanuts, welcome drink, fruit,news paper as complimentary. the pool was great with nice and white sandy like a real beaches, has a slide even the slide a bit stuck. the pool comes with warm water.so you will not getting cold.higly recommended hotel for weekend getaway.

White_Charter: Nice place to visit especially you are a nature lover. Up there can be quite chilly approximately 17C to 20C so remember to bring light jacket.   Huge difference for entrance fee for local and foreigner.   Need to hire a tour to go there.  Highly recommended to visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Locals and tourists pay different prices for the entrance tickets  There are so many touts selling souvenirs there. They are very persistent and follow you up to the top  even though they are not supposed to  The top of the hike isn’t high at all. It is cool but wearing a…
Dusun_Bambu: Very great view with lots of activities for kids. The place is very pretty and it's got a restaurant where you can eat in a circular tree house which is very scenic and soothing. There is a large flower garden and really beautiful view from above. There is a tour car that takes…
Saung_Angklung: Attended a show on Sunday, May 13, with friends from Bandung. I attended a show here in 2014, and wanted to see the show again. Great cultural experience for both the locals and tourists. Show second time around was good, but did not feature the talents of one amazing boy who…
Ciater: Attended a show on Sunday, May 13, with friends from Bandung. I attended a show here in 2014, and wanted to see the show again. Great cultural experience for both the locals and tourists. Show second time around was good, but did not feature the talents of one amazing boy who…
YELLO: Ac not cold though set in 18 degree Hv called the housekeeping they only increased the fan.  Took the smoking floor since thats the only floor where we can get 2 rooms next to each other and both rooms with single twin beds which were difficult when you sleep with kids. Though we have requested adjoon rooms when booked the hotel earlier.   Bedsheet got several holes caused of cigarerrette burned.  Breakfast ok.  Pool will be better if can provide warm water specially for kids since Bandung quiete chill in the morning.
Aryaduta: I stayed in double Queen size bedroom with L shape huge couch. Excellent service from all level staffs. I would recommend anyone who is visiting Bandung to try out this hotel, no regrets at all. Best hotel n location.
Trans: The Trans Luxury Hotel , Magnificient decoration . Huge room and beautifull decorated . Luxury amenities. Service is procedural can be better with experience perhaps . Amazing building . And great value

White_Charter: Located in cidiwey bandung. you can hire a driver/supir to bring you here. there are entrance fees and payment must be made before you reach white crater.
Tangkuban_Perahu: with a height of more than 1800 above sea level, located at the top of this mountain lies a huge crater due to the eruption of Sunda volcano hundreds of years ago, with all the myths above the long story, strong sulfur smell is felt when you arrive, 25 minutes from the area…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is one of many attractions in Lembang up on the mountainside. Thwe land area is pretty big and there is a small lake where you can ride in a boat, a nice restaurant where you can eat nicely presented but normal tasting local Sundanese food, and gift shop that also…
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo had put up a very colourful and entertaining show. The Master of Ceremony (emcee) is telented & beautiful. The show started with an Indonesian doll show and back-up by a Gamelan troups. Then, a group of young Indonesian dance the 'kuda kepang', 'tarian merak'…
