YELLO: It's a cozy hotel. The room is simple yet spacious (for me). Sofa bed is avalaible with cushions. The room facilities are all good, yet they need to upgrade the AC (quite hot tho). No minibar. The food and beverages... I can' tell you guys 'coz I didn't try it. Good service and hospitality! Keep it up!  One step to Paskal23 Mall and Food Market. Those who like shopping and culinary, it's a recommended hotel.
Aryaduta: It was such a lovely staying to be in Aryaduta. The room was clean and the staff were really great. The location is also great beside the mall and near many of the outlet stores . Parking is also available
Trans: Trans has met my expectation for their great services during my stay.  It exceeded mine for their cleanliness,  quit and comfortable,  and their activities in the kids club area and pool..  The lifeguard and other employee  is doing job properly. The room is spacious and comfort.   This hotel is memorable for my kids during stay for their hot water pool,  mini beach,  the slide and mini waterfall and lots of game on their kids club.  The 18th lounge is good and may be will be more cozy if there weren't to crowd when we got there.  The  restaurant was a bit hectic and crowd during my stay but they had wide range of good food from local,  japan,  western and many more.

White_Charter: The journey from Zest Hotel to Kawah Putih was about 1 hour 40 mins. We reached at 10:10am.   We came here last Friday and because it was Ramadan with very low visitors, our driver advised that he should drive up to Kawah Putih. There were not many visitors so it is not…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We came here during Ramadan month on Thursday. We left our hotel at 9:45am and reached here at 10:50am. Left at 11:25am. We just stayed at the main crater. Probably, there were less than 10groups during our visit, mainly because it was during the fasting period.   You will be…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place to visit with family and many choiches of food stall, price range starting from 35.000. If you want to go to restaurant Tepi Sawah they will be charge 650.000 for 6 person eventhough we only 3 person, but don't expect the hospitality service in here
Saung_Angklung: Go to Saung Udjo Bandung is really good choice... it could be aducated your children about Angklung and Sundanesse history. We can sing, play and see follow the intruction in SU. So... go there!
Ciater: Go to Saung Udjo Bandung is really good choice... it could be aducated your children about Angklung and Sundanesse history. We can sing, play and see follow the intruction in SU. So... go there!
YELLO: Staffs are helpful and friendly, always greet when meet. Room was clean and yellow bright, have various TV channel selection. Easy check in and check out process. Asking for hair dryer and ironing, sent to room right away.
Aryaduta: this hotel is located at the city so close to Balaikota Bandung and also famous mall BIP. The room (where I stayed) is so spacious with a bathtub in the bathroom. I was experiencing a good service from the staffs and also good food.
Trans: it was a memorable stay in this hotel, from the arrival till departure. the cleanliness of this hotel, bigger room rather than the others, and the technology also very nice. looking forward to stay in this hotel if i get another chances.

White_Charter: repeatedly coming there but I never get bored with this place, the smell of sulfur and cold air has always been a special thing, although the road to get there is still not good
Tangkuban_Perahu: 1st time there with my bf, amazed by the view but we were targeted by the local people as they followed us all way and at 1 place they forced us to buy souvenirs like keychain, fridge magnet and all sorts of things. We offered them some money to chase them away but no vain,end…
Dusun_Bambu: Clean and beutiful. Great place to relax. I took many good photos here. Just hope the weather is nice when you go there, or else, it will be cold and too gloomy to take photos.  The food was pricey with so so taste.
Saung_Angklung: The best part of my visit here was when they involved the audience in the performance. :)  They have several performances, but clearly the best one was at the end when they taught the audience how to play angklung. It was just so fun. The first few performances pale in…
Ciater: The best part of my visit here was when they involved the audience in the performance. :)  They have several performances, but clearly the best one was at the end when they taught the audience how to play angklung. It was just so fun. The first few performances pale in…
YELLO: The things that unforgettable is the atmosphere, ambience, and the breakfast. I guess next time i will visit YELLO again, maybe for couple of days to enjoy the facilities. I need more exploring YELLO to know more.
Aryaduta: Good location, good and a lot of variant food for breakfast, room was clean and comfortable, friendly staff. Actually we have booked two Deluxe Rooms but there was some misunderstanding, so our rooms were upgraded to Suite rooms. I recommend this hotel for business and family trip
Trans: what a great experience, great room and pool. love the breakfast.  But the bathrobe is smelly  (perhaps the staff doesn't change it). The pool is not clean enough. i see other guest spit in the pool but the staff doesn't aware with it.

White_Charter: Loved this picturesque crater lake. The weather is also nice for a walk around the area. Better bring/purchase a mask to protect yourself from the fumes.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I found this trip a little disappointing. It was also  expensive as apart from the cost of a guided tour, the entrance fee was 340,000 IDN. From the minute we arrived we were pestered with touts selling tourist tat. And after 10 minutes looking at the crater and the distant…
Dusun_Bambu: Just passed by and had a drink while enjoying the cooling weather. Entrance fees RP25,000 per head (including a bottle of mineral water), Parking RP15,000. The park has restaurant, accommodations and place for a walk around the lake. I reached in the evening so didn’t managed to…
Saung_Angklung: There is only one cultural show compared to this one; Kecak dance in Bali.   The distance from central city is really worth by what you will get on the place. Visitors will be treated by great performance there; from puppet show (wayang golek) to orchestra show of angklung…
Ciater: There is only one cultural show compared to this one; Kecak dance in Bali.   The distance from central city is really worth by what you will get on the place. Visitors will be treated by great performance there; from puppet show (wayang golek) to orchestra show of angklung…
YELLO: I really enjoy staying at this hotel. The location is perfect if you need to rest while shopping. The room is comfortable, but for some reason I can't sleep well. Breakfast is good and has many varieties. I'll visit again soon.
Aryaduta: Very good service and convenient,we enjoyed our holiday , we will come a gain, our children's very happy can played in playground, the breakfast delicious and many varians menu, we can going to mall Bandung indah plasa by walking, very interesting
Trans: Overall experience was fantastic. However, there are some noise at night (I don't dare to judge, but from what I can hear was the sound of couple making love, if I'm not wrong) I can hear the sound from around bathroom at room 1702. The bed sheets are quite dirty on the first day of my 2 nights stay & there are little bucks on it. If the sound prove & bed sheet cleanliness can be improved, I will be back definitely for more somewhere in the future.

White_Charter: Me and my bf went there by private driver, we forgot to bring own face masks but we got them from entrance of kawah putih. The view is amazing but the sulphur smell is quite strong,during puasa time and weekdays,not many people and we managed to took a few nice pictures. I…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The main crater (Kawah Ratu) is mother earth's true creation. But there are also smaller crater which you can visit and get some local guide for a better and personal experience. If you're using a personal vehicle beware of when it rains as the climb from the entrance to the…
Dusun_Bambu: They have an amazing lake. If you are planning tk go with your family or your friends this is the place. They have good food and you can take good photos here. The bad thing is it is too crowded in some places although we went there early in the morning. But overall it is a nice…
Saung_Angklung: if you want to know about angklung you have to visit this place. you will have experience to play angklung.
Ciater: if you want to know about angklung you have to visit this place. you will have experience to play angklung.
YELLO: Staff all are friendly, hotel is clean and location is very strategic, the one that is suggested is having allocated parking lot space for hotel's guests so that to make more convenience for guest who bring car.
Aryaduta: We spent 5 days here while at an academic conference. Nice pool, solid fitness room, responsive front desk, excellent breakfast. Not a U.S. chain, which we appreciated. Strong Wi-Fi. Next to mall, including supermarket, for quick shopping needs.Recommend highly.
Trans: Really nice, friendly and very comfortable Hotel with all facilities. The Location is really strategic, you'll find all what you need in this hotel for your accomodation. For family vacation is this hotel is really recommended

White_Charter: with stunning altitude and through the forest with a narrow path you can reach this beautiful crater, the smell of sulfur will you feel when will reach this crater, accompanied by cold air, within 100 m from the parking you can see and touch the amazing white crater.
Tangkuban_Perahu: We spend 4 hours travel time from jakarta to get here, and its worth it. The crater was astounding, a magnificent work of God. According to our tour agent, the volcano sometimes are active so you must check first if tourist are allowed to tour. It is also best to get tour agent…
Dusun_Bambu: This place is seriously a must visit place .You can see many interesting places that you can hangout .A very peaceful and calm place to relax .If you want a beautiful picture for your instagram this place is what you are looking for .
Saung_Angklung: This is a great place to see some of Indonesian culture. I would recommend going! I have been twice and enjoyed it both times.
Ciater: This is a great place to see some of Indonesian culture. I would recommend going! I have been twice and enjoyed it both times.
YELLO: Great hotel, the staff is friendly, the breakfast great too, children love it, a little bit hard to parking near entrace hotel but the crew is helping, there's a little problem for the toilet but not a big deal.
Aryaduta: Excellent services, comfy room, great breakfast, and nice swimming pool. The location is strategic, attached to the mall, near some factory outlets and food vendors. The room itself was great clean and comfortable.
Trans: been staying in many 5stars hotel in bandung, but trans luxury definitely better in terms of everthing.. we had a great time with the pool breakfast and the mall for me and the kids. kids club very helpfull and spacious. the pool very good concept for kids and adults with warm water location wise is a bit far but the surrounding can make it up to it with malls and many foods near there thx trans luxury bandung

White_Charter: After a 1.5hr trip from Bandung to The White Crater car park, we purchased an entrance ticket for Rp75K each and jumped in the shuttle bus (the only way to ascend to the crater). The trip lasted roughly 15min and shuttles only run when they’re at capacity with 12people - be…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Important info first: 200,000 per foreign tourist weekdays 300,000 per foreign tourist weekends 30,000 per vehicle  Pay at the entrance as you drive in.  You will arrive at Kawah Ratu, the largest one. A guide and 8 peddlers will be assigned to your group (this park is managed…
Dusun_Bambu: It is a good place to visit in Lembang. Kids love it since it provides some spots for them to have fun. Some foods are provided there, too! It also provides rooms n premium camp to stay over.
Saung_Angklung: Angklung is a fantastic Indonesian traditional music instrument that has lots of enthusiasts around the globe. Visit here to experience the sound of angklung. You can even try to play it. Lucky if you visit with large groups as they can arrange us to play the angklung.
Ciater: Angklung is a fantastic Indonesian traditional music instrument that has lots of enthusiasts around the globe. Visit here to experience the sound of angklung. You can even try to play it. Lucky if you visit with large groups as they can arrange us to play the angklung.
YELLO: It was a short stay during long weekend, but we are satisfied with the service and facilities. Celine greet us with a warm smile and assist the check in process quickly. We do not need to wait for long procedure upon check in.  Our only input was for wifi connectivity that quite unstable.
Aryaduta: The service, the room, the food are all great. There is not much to say regarding what is left to be improved, but i guess the walls could be improved as it seems a little old. Regardless, everything else is on point.
Trans: I stayed many times in Trans Luxury Hotel, I tried their 3 room types. The standard, the corner room, and the celebrity suite. For standard room..the amenities were their standard (don't get me wrong, they'll provide you with Balance brand for toiletteries or Acqua Di Parma), the room was okay, everything was exceptionally perfect. The corner room doesnt different much from the standard, its only bigger with corner huge windows so it feels like they're reaaally spacious. The superb one was celebrity suite room..I FREAKING LOVE THE BATHROOM. It came with bath bombs, weight scale, and sophisticated toilet (if you ever visit fine hotel in Japan, that the exact same type but waaaaay nicer). The celebrity suite came with dining table, complimentary fruits, fresh roses and TIRAMISU…

White_Charter: The best places of interest in Bandung. Cold and windy so be prepared. A little smelly due to the sulphur so bring a mask. View was simply stunning.
Tangkuban_Perahu: We were very excited to Visit Tangkuban Perahu, but its was a nightmare to us. Went home with regrets.   It was just me and my friend, we are both girls. As soon as we reach our destination, 2 men followed me and another 2 men followed my friend. And also showed us their pass…
Dusun_Bambu: Love the ambience. Rent a 'bird cage' at 50k and chill with friends . Food and drinks can be ordered. Try the magic mango smoothie- it is yummy!
Saung_Angklung: I really love this place. If you like Sundanese (Indonesia Clan) culture you must visit this place. They have show performing aunthentic Sunda music called " Angklung". This music tools is original music from Sunda Clan Indonesia. When I was in there I wasn't see the show…

YELLO: Location is amazing, just one step to the 23 Paskal mall. The food is good  The room service really helpful. The security help the parking with valet parking in basement. Facilities are wowwww, xbox, ipad, rooftop pool, cafe, etc. The interior design is so instagrammable  Love it!
Aryaduta: Very warm welcome and also kind services among the staff. Location wise was very strategic. Although it attached to the mall, still the area not so noisy. Definitely will stay there again. Keep up the great service.
Trans: I often wonder how this hotel would be. my husband booked a premiere club from 30th of May to 1st of April (Room 612) nobody mentioned that we could check-in at separated desk. room was quite large with L shaped sofa which I valued most. the furnitures felt a bit odd, the luxurious feel was terminated by the accent cabinet that was nowhere near luxury and miss-matched the odd-two-separated mirrored narrow cupboards. I love the bathroom (as always) and the amenities though. on our first breakfast we didn't get offered ala carte menu for club guests, and a bit clueless, so my husband asked where was the egg counter, then ordered omelette for both of us. but all in all, the cuisines are great in taste and esthetic as well. staffs at club lounge were very friendly, helpful, and…

White_Charter: This place is around 2 Hrs drive from Bandung City centre. The best option is to book a grab and then make a deal with him for return, usually grab is 165K-170K and my driver was happy to do the complete trip including all the toll etc for 350K IDR ( I did pay him 50K additional…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We were hiking up to the volcano from Lembang. It was a hard trip but amazing. Be prepared for lot of hills and dirt. The volcano is beautiful. We found a tour guide who took us down to the Upas crater, it was amazing to walk in an active volcano's crater.
Dusun_Bambu: Bring your family , u can spend time together. It wi bring up your mood. Dont forget the camera. So much place to play.  Do not wear high heels.  It's not recomended
Saung_Angklung: Overall, I was very glad I came to see the performance. It's quite interactive.  The puppet show at the beginning was a bit boring (it's in bahasa) but after that, the performances were great.   The highlight was when they distributed angklungs and taught the audience how to…

YELLO: we’ve been searching hotel in Bandung on last minute and we found Yello Hotel. turns out it’s more than a budget hotel. they fullfil our request on king size bed and we really appreciated it. all the staffs are friendly, great location, easy access. we would like to come back again when we visit Bandung soon.
Aryaduta: The area is perfect for shopper, Big n clean room, Wifi ok, SwimmingPool is just nice. Please try their choc biscuit "Cinamon Brand" its perfect taste. Recommended  for family trip with children,the location near with Taman Lalu lintas, an education park. I  Will comeback again with my Fam on my next visit.
Trans: We arrive in 15/3/2019  and we Stayed 3 days.The hotel was luxury ,clean and modern with nice and welcome staff.my suite was amazing .On the other hand face two prpblems. 1-I can not sleep well because  everyday noise from the musical party near the hotel until 1.0 pm. 2-No exgange money in or near the hotel you need taxi .

White_Charter: The trip from Bandung to White Crater is estimated to be 2 hours. Highly recommended to leave Bandung as early as possible to enjoy White Crater before noon because it can be too hot. Stay away from this area during weekends.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban perahu volcano is one of attractive tourism area near bandung, capital city of west java. Here, you can see the main tangkuban crater  in a closer distance. Moreover, you can find a traditional market arround the crater. They sell souvenirs and local foods. For you who…
Dusun_Bambu: Lots of activities at the place. Would be great for family with kids. There is also enough things to do for the adults.
Saung_Angklung: At first a bit boring with puppets shows. But then it getting better and better when we give a chance to learn how to play angklung and play verities kind of song and sing a song along the way. Very enjoyable moments of my life...  how bamboo can produce music like that. Good…

YELLO: Hotel location is connect to Paskal 23 Mall, and walkable to paskal food market. since this hotel is inside Mall complex, so if you check in during weekend, it will be long que for vehicle to enter mall complex
Aryaduta: We stay in business room , very clean room. Good service. Good food. Everything just fine. Look forward to stay again in future time, and recommend to others.Strategic location, connected to the mall BIP , Delicious and varied breakfast. Helpful and friendly staffs
Trans: I always love Trans Hotel but my latest was quite dissapointment particularly during check in. One female nStaff was not helpful and was not friendly and was not giving solution. Later, another male staff came to assist and the problem was resolved

White_Charter: It's my after thought though that I'm giving a good remarks on this volcanic lake. For those who have seen much of the world, for example Lake Tekapo in New Zealand (which offers truly breathtaking views and having the same turquoise blue water), then you would probably find…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I remembered coming here smelling the sulfur stronger back then. Well, it was in the 90s. As we returned here, the environment has changed. More smaller vendors surrounding the crater. Still a beautiful place but very windy. Prepare for a jacket.
Dusun_Bambu: Located at Lembang, Bandung. We need to pay IDR 25k to enter and there's a shuttle-service if you didn't want to walk.  This place is a nice choice for quality time with family or friends, a lot of pretty flowers and park. And there were some places to eat, many the food stalls…
Saung_Angklung: You will learn playing angklung ( local music instrument ). Show at 15.30 Mainly western tourist go there
Ciater: You will learn playing angklung ( local music instrument ). Show at 15.30 Mainly western tourist go there
YELLO: Location, excellent staff, especially the 2 reception ladies apologies didn't take their names and the ever so welcoming atmosphere all around. Definitely worth the value. See ya again when in Bandung.!!
Aryaduta: Well managed hotel, good service and very friendly and attentive staff, especially at the reception;  The breakfast is very Asian; the bread was not always a real pleasure due to its "old age"; in this area the staff is also friendly, but not always really attentive (very individual);   Altogether a good conference hotel;
Trans: Service & foid beverages is good, but lift service & parking meed improvement, ms linda as waitrees is the best service.  dimsum must Still available .. room is clean & need improve about toiletrist like more lotion etc..

White_Charter: It's such great feeling to see what mother nature could provide on this Earth. Crowded of Local peoples but this could be something you have to see while you traveling to Bandung. The road from the entrance ticket to the location is really bad, careful when you drive by your…

Dusun_Bambu: It is a relaxing place to go especially for you with young children. They have lots of game for the kids and also great view and instagramable. The food was ok but you dont come here for food, you come here to enjoy the view and fresh air.
Saung_Angklung: For those who like traditional and cultural show, this will be the best place to visit. You can enjoy the musical dance and other local performance
Ciater: For those who like traditional and cultural show, this will be the best place to visit. You can enjoy the musical dance and other local performance
YELLO: Firstly, the location of this hotel is strategic because downstairs you’ll find a mall attach to it and it is near indomaret. Futhermore, the staff is really friendly and the room is very clean. Definitely going to repeat staying here <U+0001F970>
Aryaduta: The plus : + the room is big + just next to mall (just walk. there's the connecting space to mall) + valet parking is free (though confusing, the ticket says got to pay 20.000 rupiahs, but then I asked the officer and he said it can be made free. seems like u have to protested to get it to free)  The minus : - breakfast variety not too much - the chocolate jam on the 1st day seems to be expired. I protested to the staff, and she then throw it away. Still, I have eaten 1 pancake with that expired chocolate jam. and there's no chocolate sprinkles anywhere on breakfast. so not recommended for chocolate lovers. - check in is long. I only have 1 queue before me and it took so long to wait for my turn - 1st room got water leaking  - have to wait for a long time for 2nd room (the…
Trans: Luxury is the right word for this hotel. All you see and get is maintained very well. Like the big bed, generous bathroom amenities, just everything you see once you enter this hotel. Breakfast was amazing, with lots of choices, till it's hard to decide which one to eat. Thanks to the friendly and quick-moving staff,, Tita, Derry and everyone else who helped us during our stay. Though the price is high, but you will definetely get back what you have paid.

White_Charter: Nice place  Nice weather  White crater is so unique. . Long drive from Bandung city centre.  Suggestions Must start early in the morning as it may take up to 3 hours in the peak time to reach.  Once you have seen Kawah putih  You will have time to cover other places  in South…
Tangkuban_Perahu: They charge you 300,000 IDR on a weekend if you are a foreigner. But only 30,000 IDR if you're local. Crappy place, nothing much to see except grey soils. Irritating "tour guides"   So, do not waste time coming to this place.
Dusun_Bambu: This park is suitable for every range of age. You could bring your grand parents and also their grand children to go there. The ambiance is very natural and relax, with a harmony of natural and modern design in every single thing.  You will be brought to the center of the park…
Saung_Angklung: It was one of the best things I have done in Indonesia! I absolutely loved it!! The kids were amazing the show was entertaining and very informative, One of the highlights was when the host welcomed everyone in the audience in their own language, and it never let down from…

The hotel is clean, the crew is friendly, the only negative about this hotel is the cable tv channel, the give us big tv but the cable tv is not HD yet, so the picture is really bad,
Aryaduta: A spacious, comfortable, and lovely hotel, conveniently connected to a large shopping mall. Large and varied breakfast buffet with many servers, though sometimes overwhelmed by large crowds. Elevator frequency and plumbing could use some upgrades.
Trans: This hotel is very nice and comfort. The room is very clean. Very recommended for family with young children. The food also very good. Besides that the location near with mall. The staff very friendly.

Tangkuban_Perahu: Amazing view. If possible, would want to spend more time trekking around the crater of the volcano. A place not to b missed when u r at lembang.
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place to take pictures, food prices a bit expensive, quite long time waiting for the car to take us down.

I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and I will gladly comeback !
Aryaduta: very good stay with attentive staff. the rooms are big with a very nice view (if it is not misty). I have stayed already many times here, both for business and for pleasure. Good and large  breakfast and nice restaurant.
Trans: Beautiful hotel with shopping & theme park under 1 roof. Suitable for both travelling with families & friends. Also very convenient for the muslims to do their prayers at the mosque nearby. Lukman, the waiter from the hotel f&b is very Kind & Helpful. Qrisna from the spa is a Great masseuse.

White_Charter: I read up lots of reviews which mentioned that this is a beautiful place to visit. However, when I reached there, it was a little underwhelming as the view was not as spectacular as I had expected. The temperature up there is really cold, so its best to wear a jacket or a…

Dusun_Bambu: Nice Ambience, Nice Places, Nice Food & Also Clean :).  Many Kind Bamboo Tress From Different Types, The Dining Places at Lakeside is Nice, and The Gazebo we can rental for dining, Food Court Also Available near with Flowers Garden serving Traditional Food From Bandung.
Saung_Angklung: I visited this place many times. They have a room to rent.. they have restaurant.. show attraction with angklung pride.. also have a gift shop..   Once u in bandung u must try to visit.. and enjoy the atmosphere :)

YELLO: it was an excellent short bussines trip.. The hotel is so perfect for all aspects.. love thiss hotel XoXo want to tell others for recommend this hotel. easy to get various food, easy to reach dept store :)
Aryaduta: Really satisfied customer, the room was very comfort, the bathub was so warm and meaningful. But you guys need add parfume/cologne and pomade for the guest. You need to exagrate the food menu so it is not boring.  I wish i could enjoy more and more in this hotel.
Trans: The Hotel was near to everything you need, either for business or for leisure. The cleanliness, the staffs and the amenities were superb. Just the food at breakfast, it was awful...  I will stay in this hotel again if I visit Bandung for sure, but I will skip having breakfast in this hotel.

White_Charter: Nice place for photo taking. Need to arrange transport to get there and back. For families with young children its advisable to pay the extra for car to take u up comfortably. The public van is doorless and goes fast on a bumpy terrain.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Overall the place is good, nice weather , we paid 40IDR each (foreigner with kitas)  as an entrace fee to visit the volcano and another 150IDR for all of us to visit the domas..it was about 1.2km walk in the jungle. (please do not forget to wear your comfort shoes).My 6yrs old…
Dusun_Bambu: I've been here last month with my Family and couple of friends.  It has one of the most peaceful and relaxing environment for a recreational park.  So many things and activities you can take advantage of but when we arrived at the park, almost all of the fun and activities are…
Saung_Angklung: Schools have visited this place for a trip so it is definitely educational. It is a very nice and clean place to go and there are many products and souvenirs that are very cultural.
Ciater: Schools have visited this place for a trip so it is definitely educational. It is a very nice and clean place to go and there are many products and souvenirs that are very cultural.
YELLO: I stayed here for 4 days meeting.  The staffs are outsatnding.  The room is clean, bed is very comfortable.  The hotel ambiance is modern.  The food is excellent. 4 days meeting always with new set up of coffee break and lunch with new selection of food.   The hotel is attached with Park 23 Mall. In the morning we can jog around the compleks. Highly recommended place to stay while in Bandung.
Aryaduta: Very clean room. Variety food for breakfast large room convinient  near plaza near foodcourt good location value for money easy to get transportation to go anywhere staff very polite the staff at the food and beverage is very hardworking and like their teamwork
Trans: Nice and gorgeous hotel. Near shopping centre and amusement park. Easy to reach. Service excellent. Good food. Spatious and clean rooms. I enjoyed my stay here. Hope someday I have a chance to stay here again.

White_Charter: Really nice place ... beautiful view with white crater mountain.. good view for take picture..will be back soon

Dusun_Bambu: One of the tourist attraction in Bandung.   Cool weather with plenty of activities for kids.  Close to nature.

Breakfast is not a lot of menus provided with a standard taste.
Aryaduta: This is a famous-legendary hotel, well-maintained, and clean. So happy, we got some complimentary fruits and cake in our room, because one of us had a birthday. Soooo many choices of breakfast menu, and all of them: delicious! Keep up your excellent services, Aryaduta!
Trans: only happiness and satisfaction that I can tell when staying at the trans luxury hotel, because the staff very friendly, easy to access hotel, amenities are very good, bathroom very clean because they clean up 2 x/day, and near to the shopping mall and trans studio amusement park.

White_Charter: Beautiful and serene place.  Feel so peaceful and good for picture taking.  Water suppose to be different color depending on different timing.  <U+0001F44D>

Trans: Excellent service, great taste of food, comfortable room, the traffic to reach the location is crowd sometimes, but we enjoyed our time to staycation here. Such a memorable experience. Thank youuu Trans Luxury Hotel!

Ciater: I went here few years ago. We can play angklung here lead by the condectur. Sundanese culture is very strong here.
YELLO: Its hard to look parking lot for the weekend but over all its good i have a nice stay when have a bussiness trip with my husband last weekend, best location at 23 paskal so i can get more entertainment and best place for hangout with my friends after bussiness

Trans: Stayed here for 5 nights for business.   Breakfast was not so international and had almost nothing but egg variety for me.   Room was spacious and housekeeping was very good.  Spa and fitness club was impressive.  Good access to a big mall with a wide selection of brand goods and grocery shops.   A beautiful Mosque is nearby.

White_Charter: We joined day trip to come here. It took 90 min from Bandung to here by car. We were impressed with the view of green color lake. Although the sulfur smell make us coughing and not feeling good, we really enjoyed this unique experience.  Recomend to every traveller who gonna…

Dusun_Bambu: Decent place with decent amount of entertainment to keep you and your partner/family busy for a good 3 hours or so. I recommend clubbing the Leisure Park with D'Ranch and/or Floating market in one day itinerary as they are somewhat close together.

Aryaduta: This hotel is my favorite hotel in Bandung for busies purposes. I love the fitness center and poll. Those facility well maintenance. The location is near shopping center. Room condition very good and clean.
Trans: My family and I were very happy and comfortable staying at this hotel If I go to Bandung again, I will stay here Staff services, food and various facilities are very satisfying Facilities outside the hotel are also very complete and comfortable. The mosque that is available is very good and convenient for prayer

White_Charter: This unusual eerie place deserves a visit from persons of all ages.Being in my seventies i must admit the climbing up and down steps was a little daunting but well worth the effort.From memory hire of a private vehicle was around $50 plus the entry to the car park.When you…

Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu I think the best place for us to enjoying thr nature or we call it "nuansa kampung", they have ricefield,  beautiful lake and so many beutiful spot for you take your best moment when you visit there.  The located not far from Center City of Bandung.  Dusun Bambu best…

YELLO: when we went to Yello, the receptionist's service was very good, and also the hotel employee very nice and friendly. we often leave the hotel and come back again in a short time which we think will be troublesome for the Mr.Security, but he is very kind to us, always smiles and opens the door for us. By the way, we're still students, but the hotel people call us Mrs :', but that's okay, perhaps because of the job order and we can understand it. Thank you for the receptionist who helped us call repeatedly to wake up our friends, we almost desperately to woke them up :)). lastly for rooms, pools and other facilities are really good!! UvU
Aryaduta: Had a staycation in Aryaduta Bandung was such a great experience. Location just perfect, with easy access to the malls. the most important is the spacious and clean room and bathroom, the breakfast was tasty and plenty kind of food, easy check in/out process and helpful staff
Trans: Nice view, clean and in room we have everything we need. Breakfast buffet has a lot of variety, so It was easy to choose what you like. Friendly welcoming staff and fast registration process. The kids love the pool so much.

White_Charter: Amazing view from the white crater. We took a guide to go over here since the is no direct access for public transportation. Its located around 2 hours from bandung city  Dont go at noon. It would be too hot for any photography activities
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visiting Indonesia and not seeing a volcano is like going to the beach and not getting wet. The nearest accessible volcano from Jakarta is a must visit. It does take a long drive from Jakarta and you will have to start very early, but the place has its own wild beauty and that's…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusin bambu is a restaurant and caffee Located close to Lembang area, a bit far out of the city .... so you can enjoy cleaner air, cooler temperature especially in the evening. They also have many playgrounds for childrens to play. Dusun bambu also have new concept of villas,…

Aryaduta: Feel so refreshed staycation at this hotel. Breakfast is quite nice with indonesian food like tutug oncom. And their bread NOM! Will definitely recommend this hotel. And i like their pool is so private, with flamingo float.
Trans: The overall ambiance is outstanding . Quietness is guaranteed to have a good rest in the room. Good location next  to the mall is a bonus. The experience with helpful staff during meeting which need support for additional service was also a world class standard.

Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is a magnificent volcano which is still active. It is a must visit destination while in bandung. The experience is mind blowing.
Dusun_Bambu: This is my most favourite family park among 4 we have visited in Lembang this month. The air was fresher, cleanliness was best, workers more helpful, and food yummy. Toddlers had fun at the playground and rabbit maze while the parents can supervise while eating from the…
Saung_Angklung: It's a great place to visit and performers are interesting. When you visit, you will have a fantastic concert and have fun.
Ciater: It's a great place to visit and performers are interesting. When you visit, you will have a fantastic concert and have fun.
YELLO: location is good. have a unique interior, the crew is so friendly who always give a big smile and so helpful. the room is nice and clean. breakfast menu has so many variation from Indonesian food to western food. I personally really like the the chicken porridge.   you guys must tried this place
Aryaduta: I stay on november with my family, lobby hotel clean huge and had good lounge with variety of drinks, rooms spacious and neat, breakfast taste very good, will be back again for new year at the end of december
Trans: Except for the location, this is indeed a luxury hotel, they deserve their name. Everything is as expected, from products quality to staff services, it was excellent. Plan a whole day stay to enjoy all facilities and complete them with a visit to Trans Studio.

White_Charter: Many visitors to Bandung come for the countryside that can be found in the Lembang area but also in Ciwidey. The best way to get here is by car and renting a car + driver is a good way to get here. In order to get to Kawah Putih you travel past tea plantations and then arrive at…
Tangkuban_Perahu: "Tourist, go home!" This is the message you left when you charge 10x the price for foreign tourist compared to local. Can you explain where is the logic? Well, for those don't know - the entrance ticket for a local is 30k IDR and for foreigners is 300k IDR. Do you consider it…
Dusun_Bambu: Very nice place for family leisure. My daughters really enjoy the fun at Dusun Bambu. The buffet restaurant(forget the name) were giving good food. Some of the food served live cooking such as Tepanyaki, Bakso and pancakes. The view, was wonderful. We love the Rabbit land.…
Saung_Angklung: Amazing traditional music performance for me. I didn't expected it would be very entertaining to watch kids and adults play Angklung. The audiences also got the chance to play Angklung and dancing with the kids. In the end of performance they even play classical and western…
Ciater: Amazing traditional music performance for me. I didn't expected it would be very entertaining to watch kids and adults play Angklung. The audiences also got the chance to play Angklung and dancing with the kids. In the end of performance they even play classical and western…
YELLO: Very very recommended for people whos bringing their folding bike, as the management is allowing us to slide our bike across the corridor as it will be heavy for us to carry them, the room is big & clean, staffs are very nice
Aryaduta: The Room is very clean, nice view, location nearby downtown, easy to go everywhere form this hotel, the food is various and delicious, nice assistant form receptionist, laundry was on schedule and folded as requested
Trans: Good Service with exellent smile, we choose because nice review all about this hotels, and its true..its very nice place. When we arrive, the just welcome us with warm smile....we just gave high floor room, and view was very nice... You paid what you were deserve...its cool..

White_Charter: One of the best place in Bandung, you will meet so many people if you went there in Saturday or Sunday. Next to this place, there's so many places you can go such as de ranch Bandung, tea plantation, and Ranca Upas, in which all of those places are so worth to visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I visited 5 hours, ago, my memory is still quite fresh had to do some research online since I felt cheated and here i am, and it's all true,  Worts thing is I'm not white nor do I look foreign, I'm Chinese and I do speak malay( similar to Indonesian) And I rented a car, a Toyota…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a perfect place for one full day family vacation.  There are lots of games to play (though we need to pay extra to play these games) costs around Rp 25k-35k per game, entrance ticket cost Rp25k/person. Went there with my niece and she loves the reptile corner also walking…
Saung_Angklung: One of the most amazing musical experiences in my life; first see how Angklung is operated by experts, then how they trying to teach you operating it, and the final activity left me speechless. The souvenirs are a little bit expensive, but if you looking slowly you could get…

YELLO: Keep up the great job! I will never disappoint staying with Yello hotel. Friendly staff. Great hospitality. Warmth ambience. Variety choice of good food. I will definitely recommend and stay with YELLO again.
Aryaduta: my stay in aryaduta Bandung was really great. I think I really made a good choice for choosing to stay there. the ambience was great, room was tidy and nice, check in and check out was fast. I really enjoyed to stay there
Trans: I held a customer seminar in Trans Hotel Bandung. At the beginning I was very upset. The seating lay out was not as per expectation, had problem with sounds etc. but luckily the PIC at that time was very helpful and fast in assisting my requirements. So Thank you so much for Kaka for the great coordinations and support. Two thumbs for you and your team.   As for room, I have no complain at all. Its huge and very lux

White_Charter: My friend Brata from CitytourBanndung  recommend me to join his tour to kawah putih  It was very excited because it was my first time to go to a creater.  it was a good place for taking some pictrues in kawah putih.He also tell me a lot of information about kawah putih.  I…

Saung_Angklung: Attended the angklung show and it was fascinating. The host managed to explain the history and relevance of angklung while teaching the audience how to play them.
Ciater: Attended the angklung show and it was fascinating. The host managed to explain the history and relevance of angklung while teaching the audience how to play them.
YELLO: Great hospitality, good facilities, cool rooms, wonderful breakfast menu, so close to paskal food market, close to the train station and you can get 1 stop entertainment just by going down to the mall. Great place to stay
Aryaduta: Aryaduta is one of the best hotels i've ever visited, the room like home, the service is very good, room so quitely, the price i paid is worth with the satisfaction that i got, i highly recommend this hotel
Trans: If your looking for over the top hotel room with excellent service in Bandung, look no further than The Trans Luxury Hotel. You’d feel like you’re being transported into a different place than Bandung. Good food, good view and amazing rooms with great amenities.  The hotel is adjacent to its mall and indoor theme park. So there’s something for everyone. Enjoy your stay and have a good time!

White_Charter: It was December 2017 my friend Brata recommend me to join his tour i tough it was a boring tour but it was NOT. Kawah putih have beautiful landscape especially for instagramers.  I would recommend you to join CITYTOUR TXBRAGA
Tangkuban_Perahu: Joined day trip to come here. Located 45min from Bandung. Spend 1 hour here. A good photo spot. A beautiful legend regarding this volcano and we were glad to know more about it.

YELLO: I stay for few days at this hotel ,n also my first experience in Yello paskal, Hotel is pretty good ,same building with branded Mall ,so i need to go so far to get something , Staff name Celline is great n charming ,she help me for cek in proccess , But i fell disapointed ,since i came at the hotel in ground floor i meet bellboy he just ignore me ,he busy with something,no Yello gretting ,event in Lobby counter and restaurant , since i stay there there is nobody say Yelloooo ,i book and stay in yello bandung coz when i stay at Yello harmoni Jkt there is i fell young  energic all staff there always say Yellooo no matter i pass in front of them until hundred time , Hopefully Yello paskal can improve that ,your hotel is nice just need little touch to make guest have memorabble…
Aryaduta: the room is really nice, we chose twin beds. Cold air conditioning, large screen TV and bathtub. The hotel is located next to BIP, a popular mall in Bandung, there is even a connector between the hotel and the mall, so you don't need to go down the street to get to the mall. The break fast option is quite complete, and does not disappoint. Starting from the omelette station, cereal, nasgor, migor, porridge, bread, donuts, cakes, fruits, juice, smoked meat, beef jerky, soto, fried fish, everything is there.
Trans: Breakfast buffet in Trans Luxury was one of the best experience I had. The service was beyond compare. A waiter named Yudha served us best starting from my first step in the restaurant untill I left. The menu variation was also great, you can have many kind of foods from around the world.

White_Charter: Interesting experience there. We went on a cold rainy day so it was really foggy up there. It was freezing despite us wearing quite thick clothing. Because of the fog and the blue water, it almost had a very mysterious feel to the whole area. We were able to take a lot of nice…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Really scenic view. The whole place was foggy when we reached but we decided to wait for around 10mins and when the fog cleared up...lovely.
Dusun_Bambu: It's bit of a drive. If you have a full day to spend it's worth a visit. Nice recreation facility for kids. Restaurants have nice views and food is good and value for money. We loved the nasi Goreng with smoked beef and avocado juice.

YELLO: I don't even know how to put this into words, YELLO is PERFECT! the location, the facility, the food, EVERYTHING! Trans: Service from the Restaurant team was awesome,Especally Linda dan Andri Supervisor very atentive and friendly .We never disspointed our service and stay at Trans hotel,Buffet breakfast variant is so much and we full can’t try all food.next We will stay at Trans with my family for next holiday <U+263A><U+FE0F>

YELLO: i enjoyed my stay at this hotel. the room was pretty clean, the air condition was good, and the room wasnt too small. so i recommend this hotel to you who want to travel solo, with friends, or even with your family.
Aryaduta: old properties but still well operate. Hommy feels, just like in grandma house. Place in the middle of crowded Bandung, but give us lot of breaths....., spacious. When trend of new hotel getting smaller.
Trans: Decent 5 star room, complete facilities - swimming pool, 24hour gym, just a step away from Trans Studio Mall. Went to Club Lounge on the 18th floor and get to enjoy Bandung City View from top.  Had breakfast at level 3, the food options were varies from Asian, Western, Local Cuisine, and staff Dede greet us politely and ask how we’re going. Overall great place to stay with excellent service.

White_Charter: Family trip 2018 was a satisfying trip . Went to a few places of interest but time was too short. I’ll comeback

Trans: Staff was always attentive and greeted every guest with warm smiles. Room (club premier) was a total luxury with daily complimentary light dinner & laundry services.   Perfect for families with little children/elderly or even honeymooners.

White_Charter: The place is on a high land, so the weather is quiet cold and you need to go by car that provided there from the parking lot to the crater. the smell is not really good but it's very unique place to go

Trans: I stayed with my husband and 6yo son for the weekend. The location of the hotel is in the middle of Bandung City. You can find shopping mall and amusement park for family in the area. The hotel itself was definitely a luxury hotel. The lobby was grand, it feels like Macau or even Las Vegas style. The room was also nice... clean and luxurious. You may even choose pillow for your own comfort. For price wise, this hotel is not cheap.  They have nice swimming pool, semi beach style and my son loved it. They use warm water system in the pool, feels nice especially when there is lots of wind because of the  location of the pool is between buildings. All staffs were friendly and polite. We went for dinner and breakfast in the restaurant on 18th floor. The view was great but it was very…

White_Charter: very nice views.  only 10k IDR to walk through the wooden platform/bridge. however you can't stay too long due to the high sulphuric content in the air. be sure to wear face mask and a windbreaker as it gets misty and chilly. go early to avoid the traffic jam
Tangkuban_Perahu: One of the most attractive place in Lembang, this is the active volcano with easy access for visitor to the crater.  Visiting during the windy time,  we have to wear jacket to prevent from the cold weather.  This bad weather has forced the seller to close their shops.  Bringing…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a nice place, cool weather, fun attraction for some outdoor fun time with the family. It's a got beautiful landscapes & activities for kids. It's got a lake which you could boat in & I think lake side chalets for rent.   Kind of a mix & match of things. Kids would love…
Saung_Angklung: Great place to learn how to play the instrument and good performance. Good for family with young children and for people who enjoy such traditional performance.
Ciater: Great place to learn how to play the instrument and good performance. Good for family with young children and for people who enjoy such traditional performance.
YELLO: This could be the hotel of choice for those who want to visit Bandung to enjoy this "KOTA KEMBANG", Yello Hotel is a hotel that integrates with 23 Paskal Mall, simple, and not very expensive, very pleasant, I stayed to visit Bandung for one day to visit friends there, overall I have very fun Here... this is a hotel in the middle of the city, with a short distance to the train station for you backpakers this hotel can be a choice, other facilities that can be enjoyed by the hotel concept that is very cool and also there is swimingpool to unwind, a very cute cafe to be able made an interesting photo spot almost every corner.
Aryaduta: I stayed in Aryaduta, Executive Suite room with my family. The service and hospitality from receptionist really good in my check in process. They offered me to go to 3rd floor where there was a swimming pool and kids club, also they asked us to wait in the executive lounge while the room is prepared. I was pleased.  Then at the evening, I went out with husband. My mom and sister stayed in the room and they are shocked and terrified when suddenly a room boy appeared in front of them, in the living room, IN MY SUITE ROOM. He said he brings sandals which we never asked.   I came to the lobby and tell the Receptionist, a man, he said they will find out and inform me why this was happened.  The breakfast was not met 4 stars hotel standard. Few options, the taste also not good for the…
Trans: This is my second time stay at Trans Hotel chain, previously is in Bali. I stay for a weekend getaway and watching concert that performed in this hotel. the staff are friendly, check in and check out process is fast, room is clean and spacious, bed is comfort, the food also good, and the pool is great. Overall is great stay at this hotel.

White_Charter: lies between mountains south west of Bandung, give you nice place and a little bit adventure if you drive by your own car. Climb and downhills with narrow road very challenge. But thus being paid with very beautiful lanscape. When you reach the top of mountain you will see…

YELLO: Yello Hotel Paskal really comfy and cosy place it,s clean and neat the crews are very welcome and friendly i stay in Yello Hotels many times (almost everytime i travel to Bandung) also the locations very good, it's near railway stations
Aryaduta: Very friendly staff, room hotel very clean and comfort, hotel location very easy and near too find best culinary at bandung, highly recomended if you booked deluxe room because the room very big, and the facility also very nice
Trans: Will definitely come back as always I love Trans Hotel. They have the best staffs, so friendly and humble. The bed also the reason why we came back to this hotel over and over. The location is great too

White_Charter: If you come to Bandung, Indonesia. Don't forget to come this place. This place so famous with the best view. This location in Ciwidey, not very far from Bandung City. You can rent motocycle for 1 day or use public transportation. From Bandung, you should go to Terminal Leuwi…

All the staff were also very polite and special thanks to Berry, the asst of FBM, that were very helpful during my stay specially on breakfast and explain about the hotel facilities very well. But there is something need to upgrade, its their room facilities. I think this hotel has to change their hairdryer at room. I need to dry my hair for about 1,5 hour and also the power button is very hard to push. And also, they lock the minibar at room, which i think its better to clear up the items inside the minibar instead of lock them up.  But overall, i love to stay here and…
Trans: Sangat puas dengan pelayanan Gilang dr bag. restaurant ... melayani dengan ramah membuat kami betah ... kept up the good work Gilang. Thank you for yr hospitality when i visit trans hope i can see you again

Saung_Angklung: So fun! Gotta try if you're a n Bandung.   Especially good because I was expecting a tourist trap, and this is so not like that :)

Aryaduta: That was our first time for visiting Aryaduta Bandung. We arrived on 9pm and really want to sleep. With great standardization in greeting and services, good enough in creating customer experience, we hope will come back to Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: This hotel is rather expensive compared to other hotels in Bandung. For people looking for a luxurious room, this is the right hotel. Everything in this hotel is prepared with a touch of luxury.  Breakfast was very good but we didnt try the lunch and dinner here since there's a big mall next to it where we could find more restaurants at more reasonable price.

White_Charter: Went to the location early so the place was still not too crowded. Nice place to take pictures. No access to walk to the summit. As the crater still active, could not stay too long.
Tangkuban_Perahu: The ticket is ridiculously expensive for foreigner. More parking fee besides the one on the gate. If you want to go to Domas Crater you must be guided. And it expensive too. Why need a guide when there's only one way going there?
Dusun_Bambu: I am not recommend this place for eat because there is no special taste food in this place. But if you want to make a photograph session this place has some place to make a nice one.
Saung_Angklung: I’m all excited when being informed that we’ll be watching Saung Angklung Udjo. But it’s a bit further up from the city. And with the heavy traffic everywhere, you have to estimate your time correctly or you might end up missing the timely show.  The show I attended started…

YELLO: Clean room Great welcome Fast check in or check out process Good food Nice crew Strategic location 24 hours resto Good  value And great swimming pool. Really recommended for family. It's easy to go anywhere,or searching another resto there.
Aryaduta: Good Location, good service, good price, average breakfast, service just ok, room cleanliness average, better stay on weekdays so not too crowded, but overall recommended for family, couple even business trip.
Trans: Our children enjoyed staying in this hotel which offered sand pool, kids club and next to the Trans Studio. Breakfast menu variety was much extensive than any other hotels. Will definitely stay again.

White_Charter: Good view, fresh air. I suggest you take your car by paying idr 150k .If you too lazy to drive, then just pay for angkot to take you to the crater. It cheaper too. But, you ll have to wait for a loooong time in angkot to go to parking lot. They already built the bridge now. Pay…
Tangkuban_Perahu: quite a waste of time here. spent 11 hours in the transport just to get there and back. 1 whole day wasted. too expensive entrance fees.  (300k IDR) too many locals hard-selling their stuff my aunt bought 4 packs of strawberries. ALL infused with sugar syrup!  the view is just…
Dusun_Bambu: I was going yesterday, with my family, know this place by googling 'most fav place at Bandung' and this place ia one of them,so i decided to bring my family came here, when we arrived,is rain,is nice that they lend us some umbrella while we waiting a 'Wara wiri car' who bring us…
Saung_Angklung: Bangga bisa ikut melestarikan Angklung dan bertemu dengan Anak alm. mang Udjo Must come and will enjoy it so much
Ciater: Bangga bisa ikut melestarikan Angklung dan bertemu dengan Anak alm. mang Udjo Must come and will enjoy it so much
YELLO: it would be perfect if there was a small refrigerator in the room, and for small things like shower cap, it should have been provided, for the overall facilities and services I felt it was quite satisfying
Aryaduta: When entering the lobby, the soaring atrium impresses. But the weird thing is that you’d expect glass-enclosed elevators moving up and down over the atrium bar. Instead, the elevators are hidden behind tasteful decorative fabric. The cars themselves seem undersized. What happened? I hear the property was built by a chain. The front desk staff thinks the elevators were built this way.   Other than the camouflaged elevators, the hotel is pleasant, comfortable, and clean. The decor is getting dated, but is okay. The floor lamp control is a pedal on the floor behind the lamp. WiFi is excellent. The staff are helpful.   The breakfast buffet is very good. They have a variety of cuisines. I really appreciated the information cards by the dishes pointing out “seafood,” “vegetarian,”…
Trans: The hotel is attached to an entertainment centre and vibrant modern shopping mall. There is also a a beautiful mosque in the vicinity. The hotel is heavily decorated and tries hard to impress the guest. There are many spaces and decorated walls in the hotel that would make a great photo backdrop. For security, you need to tap your room card in the lift. The room was spacious with a a long sofa and decorated beautifully will full glass view to the city. The bed was very very comforatble and fluffy, it was hard getting up. All fixtures in the room and toilet were in in excellent condition with strong wifi.  I had a great 4 days 3 nights stay at this hotel

White_Charter: Must see in bandung! Gorgeous white crater. Recommended to bring/wear a mask as the sulphur, though odourless, irritates your throat and eyes. From the entrance, it’s about a 7km drive up to the white crater. You can choose to go up via your own private vehicle (IDR 150k per…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Only had two hours to visit as it was crowded and jammed with cars, busses. The view was stunning. We spend more time accessing and leaving the site.
Dusun_Bambu: The place is awesome  Beautiful view  to snap  around  Convenient coz there's a shuttle bus to bring you around the park  Good foods too  High recommendation to all <U+0001F44D>
Saung_Angklung: Had a great time in Saung mang Udjo. I think Saung mang Udjo made our trip more pleasant. They are very attractive, funny and not offer boring show. I think saung mang udjo is must to do when you are in Bandung. Will be back here on next visit.
Ciater: Had a great time in Saung mang Udjo. I think Saung mang Udjo made our trip more pleasant. They are very attractive, funny and not offer boring show. I think saung mang udjo is must to do when you are in Bandung. Will be back here on next visit.
YELLO: Room quite spacious but no fridge so unable to enjoy cold drink Working table is quite suitable for work8ng but too bad the chair is not comfortable enough for long hour.  the room is clean, unique n fun design. Location is perfect. Hiwever it is not your perfect one if you intend to work in the room
Aryaduta: The hotel was strategically located and the décor was nice, albeit a bit dated.  I enjoyed the front desk and all other service staff.    A couple of things that were disappointing:   The cleaning of the room was not done thoroughly.  The cleaning person did not replenish the soap, shampoo etc.  Have to call twice before they were delivered.  The breakfast buffet was adequate.  Could use more variety.  The service was good.  The buffet dinner, although priced fairly modestly, was very disappointing.  The food was not warm and hardly any choice.  The worst is that they actually charged 10% service charge for non-existing service for a buffet.  We had a la carte dinner another night and the quality was decent.    I will probably stay here again but not use the buffet.
Trans: Best vacation so far.very memorable. All went so smoothly from the time we checked in til the time we checked out. Facilities were also so well-maintained. The warm beach pool made the kiddos could spend hours there. Surely the most memorable trip!

White_Charter: Volcanic lake situated at 2400m asl. It's about 2 hours drive from Bandung City and the weather is pretty cool. The only thing you can do over the lake is just taking photos and sightseeing. On the way down from the lake, you can have some short visits to the strawberry farm,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: They provide good managements for groups, family, especially in access from the parking lot to the crater. Just like most of the tourism places in Indonesia, it needs a proper rules for the sellers there
Dusun_Bambu: Great place for family holiday,  u can take the children.  Have a nice view and restaurant.  Spot to have a nice photos
Saung_Angklung: I got a discount from the ticket since we worked very well for a community nearby. They offered us this majestic concert. Never had such an experience. Due to my musical experience, I am familiar with the sounds they produce. They are "configured" to use the C-major. This…
Ciater: I got a discount from the ticket since we worked very well for a community nearby. They offered us this majestic concert. Never had such an experience. Due to my musical experience, I am familiar with the sounds they produce. They are "configured" to use the C-major. This…
YELLO: Big Room, modern and very clean.  Great Location and easy to access restaurants to enjoy Indonesian food.  Friendly Staffs who greet you when they see you. I will definitely stay at this hotel again whenever I come to Bandung.
Aryaduta: Hi Aryaduta,   I stayed in your hotel on October 11, 2019, for one night for a family affair. Wonderful hotel and all facilities as expected. Nice room and breakfast in the morning, and nice helpful staff. Only one downfall that I regretted, you have provided us very bad towels in our room. Those towels should not be distributed anymore for rooms, not for a four-star big hotel as Aryaduta. I was hoping to have white, soft and smell nice ones in my bathroom, and sadly there weren't any and I have to accept all the opposite of it. My husband even said, our guinea pigs towels are better than these. (lol). Seriously, maximum I can think of, those towels probably still acceptable in a one or two-star hotel, not you.   I hope my note helps for your improvement.   Best regards,  Alia
Trans: Great cocktail by Samba and friendly service by Mutiara. They're lovely people and I would love to recommend you to come here and greet these people over here and I can guarantee they won't disappoint.

White_Charter: We decided to come here to experience the view of the volcanic crater. The journey from Bandung took about 2 and a half hours. There view along the journey is very nice as we will pass through the paddy fields, the scenic green tea plantations and nice small cities. We even…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entry fee varies (depending on whether you're local or not). Heard it was 300K IDR per person but when we visited we paid 200K IDR (??) Be prepared to brave the touts, if you don't want to purchase anything, be polite but firm. Some food options like banana fritters and fried…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place to hangout with family. Good view, food and facilities. Have food court with many choices and restaurants with nice view.
Saung_Angklung: we start at 10 am for the show... we walk in and gamelan sounds calmly..  made us relax.. the the muppet show we called wayang golek.. we can call "Cepot"... at first i was thought that we will asleep..  but the fact the story very interesting and quit funny... then heleran…

YELLO: Very good location because together in the shopping mall, room and bath room clean enough with standing shower clean enough and good breakfast also. Familiar hotel staff and smooth for check in process and check out also and if possible late check out till 14.00 (case by case)
Aryaduta: The room was big, nice, and clean. This hotel is located near Bandung Indah Plaza and so easy to find anything that I want (super market, restaurant, etc). Breakfast menu was great, complete, and perfect taste. Thank you Aryaduta, I will definitely comeback to stay again.
Trans: great hotel with excellent services with comfortable bed and yummy food. friendly staff from frontliners till waitres. the connection of the internet is good. the hotel gave  2 keycards when others hotel just  gave 1 card. connected with mall so i don't have to worried back at late night when i didn't bring car.

White_Charter: Set off for Kawah Putih (white crater) slightly earlier at 7.30 am on a Friday, even though my driver suggested 8am. Our driver used a new expressway and arrived there in less than 2 hours. Managed to beat the crowd, hence better photo opportunities. The crowd started coming in…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Amazing view of the crater (Kawah Ratu). The entrance was expensive for foreigners which is 200,000 (weekdays) and 300,000 (weekend). Last I visited this place (around 2011) I was chased by a big group of people selling their souvenirs. Now it is more organized as each visitors…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu offers you a panoramic view of flower garden, lake with cottage that you can rent, and a lot of family activities. Its perfect for your family vacation or couple getaway, and dont forget to bring your camera here.
Saung_Angklung: We had a great time and experience at this place with lots of cultural activities, especially the beautiful instruments and music provided using bamboo by the students of Udjo. The announcer was awesome and kept the audience entertained and well informed. Being a photographer, I…
Ciater: We had a great time and experience at this place with lots of cultural activities, especially the beautiful instruments and music provided using bamboo by the students of Udjo. The announcer was awesome and kept the audience entertained and well informed. Being a photographer, I…
YELLO: The only and main reason I give "poor" is because they gave me smoking room instead of non-smoking as I requested during booking by mtp. The other things are good, even excellent. But the smoking room took it all out.
Aryaduta: the hotel are very clean, great services and facilities, good hotel ambience and located on great area in Bandung, the hotel has direct access to Bandung Indah Plaza make you easier to go to the mall definitely recommended hotel in bandung
Trans: We are a family of 5. Couple an 3 kids 18yrs, 8yrs and 5yrs. We wen TransHotel to celebrate our Charming Price 5th birthday. We booked 2 Premier Club Room. It's was omg wonderful beautiful <U+0001F60D><U+2764><U+FE0F><U+2764><U+FE0F>. Hotel gave my son a Suprise cake which was served to my table at the breakfast area. The whole restaurant staffs, manager around 15staff brought the cake to my boy singing a very loud birthday song for him.Just imagine I was in joyful tears . It's was so lovely. All staff Front Desk , Room Services, Pool side they are Soo dedicated. Every year we had went to each hotel in Malaysia Port Dickson but we would very strongly say Trans Luxury Hotel is the BEST BEST BEST hotel. We enjoyed each an every min there . Hotel breakfast was superp ..  First time in our life we had never miss our…

White_Charter: The only downside in going to this place is the travel which took 3 hours or so. If you're not used to bumpy rides, then better prepare yourself. Even though the ride was hectic, I still believe it's a sight worth seeing. Too bad when we went there it was drizzling so we…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Been here for several times but I never get bored to visit this place. This is such a wonderful place for me to enjoy God creation! Well this place located in Lembang Bandung West Java. You have to bring your  jacket with you when you want visit this place. A very recommended…
Dusun_Bambu: Best place in lembang bandung for get away bring family especially children ,exiting,safe and clean,price for food quite reasonable
Saung_Angklung: The show was a few hours and included short versions of many traditional dance & music performances. This was fun, but what made it less good for us, was the fact that it is quite long & there are many many many tourists (all the tour buses visit, and there is only one…
Ciater: The show was a few hours and included short versions of many traditional dance & music performances. This was fun, but what made it less good for us, was the fact that it is quite long & there are many many many tourists (all the tour buses visit, and there is only one…
YELLO: have repeatedly stayed at this hotel but it is not boring for hotels under four stars, for facilities including decent with a swimming pool that is quite good, a nice breakfast menu although not as complete as a four star hotel, for cleaning the hotel is clean, and for fans of dining this hotel is quite strategic because it is in the Paskal mall which is around the hotel lots of food courts and also food stations, quite strategic because it's quite close to the train station you can walk to and from the hotel.
Aryaduta: 1st time we stay with aryaduta bandung.  Wow...  Large lobby area  and guest room. Great location and this hotel connecting with Bandung Indah Plaza Mall. We having breakfast at Taruma Restaurant. Variety of food was good and staff very friendy and helpful. Mr Berry with smile come to my table and ask about breakfast experience to make sure everything Ok.  He offering more coffee tea and we talk as well about recommendation place at Bandung for holiday.  Thank you Aryaduta Bandung Will come back again to Aryaduta if we have plan to Bandung.
Trans: Stayed for 3 days during Christmas in this hotel, we booked 4 room.  I arrived at 8pm, room was ready and all 4 rooms located at same floor. This is grand hotel, lobby area was huge and luxurious, classic designed. Staff was attentive and very helpful, plenty of them stanby in lobby ready to help and greet.  Corridor was big dark as they choose woods as main wall accesories. Their room is super comfy, bright, spacious, good ambience, clean, very good choose on carpets and bed equipment, pillow-bed sheets-blanket was nice. Spot on!  Their room is one of the most comfortable room i’ve ever stayed in. Bathroom has separated shower chambers and bath-tub, water pressure was good unfortunately sewer bit cloaked so when i took bit long bath water will overflowing and flooding out. …

White_Charter: I didn't really feel this place. Yes, it does look pretty but I don't think that it is worth the trip from Bandung. It's just a small lake with white water. If you go bring a jacket as it actually gets quite cold. There were people selling masks for the smell but it really…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's a lovely area, but as many have pointed out,  expensive  (by Indonesian standards)  for foreigners.  We has a private hire car that dropped us at the top,  ratu crater,  and it was very windy there.  We walked down to Domas crater with a guide (Rp 300,000) and he explained…
Dusun_Bambu: If you plan for Glam Camp during December holiday please booked at least 6 month before. We booked 4 Tents for family gathering. Each tent have basic facilities, bbq pit & camp fire. Each tent can fit 4-6 people. have private door, meaning each tent surounded with high fence &…
Saung_Angklung: A great place to visit for angklung cultural performance. Casual, unassuming and fun experience - a must when visiting Bandung!
Ciater: A great place to visit for angklung cultural performance. Casual, unassuming and fun experience - a must when visiting Bandung!
YELLO: The Yellow Hotel Paskal in Bandung is located on top of The Paskal 23 Mall, at Paskal Hyper Square offering a great location in the City Centre and on top of a modern Shopping Mall.  Surrounded by local outside & inside food courts and many other great Restaurants including international brand name shops and top notch Cinema as well as Children’s playground.  Situated in a strategic location close to the Bandung main railway station and less than three kilometres from the International Husein Sastranegara Airport (Bandung) makes it a great place to stay for travellers with a tight itinerary.  The hotel itself is decorated and furnished in clean modern and young hip style, suited for families with children, young couples and singles.  Offering a game corner, outside swimming pool…
Aryaduta: I stayed at Aryaduta bandung for holiday. The front office staff are friendly to welcoming the guests. I booked through an old friend and what i was suprised it was there had a birthday cake in the room. When i ask the front office it was an idea from one of the staff pak Berry Media, he was very responsive and heartis.  Thank you aryaduta, surely i will comeback again<U+0001F642>
Trans: The Trans Luxury Hotel is THE BEST hotel i've ever stayed in. This hotel easy to find and Superb nice room, and nice bandung city view from room. It's very recommended when to want to find a place to stay at Bandung. We stay for 1 night here due to my birthday celebrate with my husband and we are very happy because we got bithday surprise from the hotel. Thank you for all staff Especially Thank you for Ms. Ringgit Sari and team at The Spa for your service present, we really like with atmosphere very relax and comfortable, we are also satisfied with Superb service, very friendly and helpful during we pampering our body at your spa, and thank you for restaurant staff @Andri and team. Thank you the Trans for making my stay memorable.. love love..

White_Charter: The place is small and crowded. It is also overrated as the view is nothing much compared to tangkuban perahu. Entrance fee is quite cheap at 50,000. Additional 15,000 to go up to Kawah Putih for their local transportation. If you want to use your own private transport (way way…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Today we went to Tangkuban Perahu taking some Indonesian Friends from Tasik . To enter the area, we need to pay the entry tickets. For the local the tickets cost $2 and for the foreigners cost $20. Even it's against my principle to pay 10 times more than the locals, we had no…
Dusun_Bambu: Went here with family during our trip to Bandung. Beautiful scenery. They have small rooms for dining that looks like a tree house which are covered with tree-roots, very creative. A lot of nice spot to take photos.
Saung_Angklung: A must see for those who love to understand the arts and culture of Indonesia. The performance was interactive and casual. It was worth the money spent
Ciater: A must see for those who love to understand the arts and culture of Indonesia. The performance was interactive and casual. It was worth the money spent
YELLO: It was quite easy to find the location in google maps, but we were a bit puzzled on where the hotel is located and where to park our cars. If you're driving, just go to the basement parking and follow the sign that points to Yello. There you will be greeted by security and the hotel's valet service. They will take your vehicle and park it, then they will give you a tag so you can claim your keys later. The elevator can take you to a transit area where you can enter the Pascal 23 mall and you can also go to the hotel lobby. The hotel room was spacious and clean. You will need to request for the hair dryer though. The best part was that it's located within the same building as the mall and there are also other restaurants and stores near the area, so you don't need to go far to…
Aryaduta: I enjoyed my stay with family in Aryaduta last week. Comfortable room, good food, hospitality is there. Just couple inputs. One, the water has yellow color. The hotel staff said it may take time to get clear since it was during maintenance. But until my last day of stay, the water still has yellow color. Two, limited parking area. I need to pay valet though I stay there. I thought parking area is their problem not supposed to be burden the guest.
Trans: Just standard hotel. Nothing impressive. Everything is just okay. Not bad, but not that good. Maybe i expect too much from reading the review. The hospitality is good though. Nice people. I just take room only, so can’t say much about the food. The pool is good, the water is always warm. Thumbs up for that

White_Charter: Really great looking around this place for 30 minutes and we had an enjoyable time. However, be warned it’s not easy reaching this place for anyone who likes a bit of comfort and a quick journey. From Bandung bus station we took a crowded mini bus to Ciwidey which seemed hard to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place worth a visit. To visit this place you need to hired your own transport, pay parking entry and a entry charge perhead. Easy hike to surrounding areas. You may spend around 1 hours here. If you have multiple visit of the day, make sure this is your 1st destination as…
Dusun_Bambu: You neèd to walk ....to view scenery. The problem of mine is coming along with young kid. to tired to walk.......overall this facility look good. but this place mainly for young traveller.
Saung_Angklung: Instead of the second volcano we chose this attraction and I recommend it a lot. You can see indonesian puppet show, dance, costumes and than amazing playing the bamboo instrument.
Ciater: Instead of the second volcano we chose this attraction and I recommend it a lot. You can see indonesian puppet show, dance, costumes and than amazing playing the bamboo instrument.
YELLO: location is good room is clean swimming pool is clean food is limited choice but healthy food are avalaible minus is that i can hear the noise from the next door room. when we stayed we had kids in the next rooms and i couldn’t sleep because the kids were played till midnight.
