Aryaduta: Nice place, friendly service, my child was happy because of the clean swimming pool and play ground facilities. Also for small garden that was very beautifull. But for breakfast should be more variations.
Trans: Reception atmosphere, room, pool, hospitality is excellent.  Breakfast menu for me is near excellent. This hotel easy to find and the additional you can walk to the mall and find things also entertainment at Trans Studio. Overall, you must try. It's very recomended when to want to find a place to stay at Bandung.

White_Charter: When you first visit this place, you will amazed by how beautiful the crater color. This place name is "kawah putih" or white crater in English, but the real is the crater color not only white but it is depend on the sky color. When the weather is clear and sunny you can see the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Rp200,000 per person even for my 3yo. Quite high priced. Beautiful picture taking opprtunities. Very cooling. Beware of the peddlers at the top. Some of them wanted to help us take our pictures and got angry when we declined even politely. They thought we think they might steal…
Dusun_Bambu: Great food and great atmosphere.  Fun park for kids under 12. Got my kid to play the entire day. The playground for the kids are great fun. Well maintain all sections. Maybe the toilet could be better clean. There not dirty just would be better and suited as all the other things…
Saung_Angklung: An Indonesian friend in Jakarta told me that this show was a must-see in Bandung, so on my weekend visit there, I decided to see it on a Saturday afternoon.  Because of terrible traffic, I arrived about 10 minutes after the show had started, but I don't think I missed much. …
Ciater: An Indonesian friend in Jakarta told me that this show was a must-see in Bandung, so on my weekend visit there, I decided to see it on a Saturday afternoon.  Because of terrible traffic, I arrived about 10 minutes after the show had started, but I don't think I missed much. …
YELLO: Great location in Bandung with easy access to the main attractions. The hotel also sits conveniently on top of a new mall which has a trampoline park and kids soft play areas with animals. Add that to the hotels own games area and pool and your kids will not be bored even on a day off from seeing the sights.
Aryaduta: Aryaduta still keep same standard since it was Hyatt, we like the room, we like the restaurant, we also like the view from 14th floor. This stay we got free upgrade to deluxe room. Spacious and Comfy.
Trans: Since 2.5 year ago we had been stay for 2 night, but 1st day my son got seizure & very appreciate trans well train their staff, ambulance car etc. Very satisfied & Well maintenance Cleanlines, good aminities, warm swimming pool, full kids actv and near to supermarket, Trans Mall indoor Park and food everwhere.Very recomended for family & Kids

White_Charter: This place is amazing & a must-visit in Bandung. Love the scenery - better than Tangkuban Perahu. Entrance free is much cheaper too. One thing to note the weather is cold, so bring along a sweater or jacket.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited the Queen Crater - nice scenery. However the entrance ticket of IDR200K is too pricey for foreigners. Also be careful with the peddlers there as they can rip you off trying to sell things to you - had a BAD experience with them!!
Dusun_Bambu: It's too crowded and hectic, the park have  10 points for kids and toddler to have fun all day long etc,  however they have poor service for public toilet and place to pray which is almost half of the population of indonesia are Moslem (mushola or mosque would be better!) and…
Saung_Angklung: As this was optional in the package, we paid extra 100K for this performance as we heard it was popular. It was very good. There was also an angklung session where the guests gets to play and dance at the end. Interactive indeed. Recommended.  Irwanjoe #GCMSG @Gengcarimakansg
Ciater: As this was optional in the package, we paid extra 100K for this performance as we heard it was popular. It was very good. There was also an angklung session where the guests gets to play and dance at the end. Interactive indeed. Recommended.  Irwanjoe #GCMSG @Gengcarimakansg
YELLO: I like to stay here.. Comfort and clean.. Looks modern and familiar to the guest.. Pool also recomend for parents who have a kids.. Easy n fast to go to mall and many foodcourt there..   If go to bandung, i'll book again..  Thanks Yello!!
Aryaduta: I was really satisfied with everything in Aryaduta. The staffs was friendly and helpful. I requested some things on my stayed and they gladly did. My room was on 13th floor which is had very amazing cityview. I stayed on deluxe room, it was surprisingly a huge room. Everything on the room worked very well. I will come back to stay whenever I visit Bandung again. Thankyou Aryaduta :)
Trans: nice , comfortable and luxury as like as the name.you should try to stay it 1 day to see all services.it is recommend for family.comfortable, save for our childrens.they will enjoy for the swimming pool facilities.

White_Charter: The view was exotic and one of a kind. Standing at the crater, it really is a geography student's dream come true! This spot is definitely an insta-worthy spot! However, please be careful of the sulfur puddles on the floor and not step into them, which I did <U+0001F602>
Tangkuban_Perahu: The entrance fee is quite pricey. Not many things can be seen or done here. Rp200k weekdays and Rp300k weekend you choose yourself. Beware of local sellers, they will follow you in every corner and place. Please do consider to buy what they are selling if you start to bargain.…
Dusun_Bambu: This place is very nice to bring your family and friends to interact with nature and relax. There are many great sceneries to take pictures as your background and complete with various attraction. However, it is very crowded on weekends. Full of locals from all over the place…
Saung_Angklung: Great show!!! My family enjoyed it very much. They taught us how to play. It was fun and educational at the same time
Ciater: Great show!!! My family enjoyed it very much. They taught us how to play. It was fun and educational at the same time
YELLO: Great breakfast, many varieties on the menu. The staff is very welcoming and full of hospitality. The interior design in the bedroom is very colorful. It has a good atmosphere. Love the yellow color on the wall of the bedroom.
Aryaduta: overall satisfactory, good service, nearby everywhere, there is a mall next door, convenient store just across the road. The receptionist is fast in handling check-in guests, give information on the available rooms so guest can choose according to his/her preferences.
Trans: the best hotel i've ever stayed in. staying with family for vacation trip. superb room. big screen tv. cool tech in room facilities. nice bandung city view from room. superb services from all staff. really luxury hotel. near trans studio mall and trans studio bandung.

White_Charter: A must visit place while in Bandung. For me, it is better than Tangkuban Perahu. More nature, more scenic views and more cheaper. The price is Rp65k for foreigners and Rp35k for locals. This beauty volcanic lake sometimes mysterious in color. It looks like turquoise when you go…
Tangkuban_Perahu: No wonder that Tangkuban Perahu has a great view. Yet, the tickets are quite expensive for me. I rode my motorbike and spent IDR 47000 in the entrance only. When I wanted to visit Kawah Domas, one of the craters, I had to pay for another IDR 100000. This is the cost for a guide…
Dusun_Bambu: You'd better come in the morning of the weekdays to avoid the crowded.  So, I went there with my classmate for lunch and taking some pictures. The cafe is cool, the food is okay and the price is still reasonable for that kind of place. There are various spots to take pictures…
Saung_Angklung: Do you know what an Angklung is?   It's an Indonesian traditional musical instrument made of Bamboo.   What happens if you have 8 of them tuned to a musical octave?   You get enough notes to make songs and harmonies.  So, we sit in the show, have the introduction, a great puppet…
Ciater: Do you know what an Angklung is?   It's an Indonesian traditional musical instrument made of Bamboo.   What happens if you have 8 of them tuned to a musical octave?   You get enough notes to make songs and harmonies.  So, we sit in the show, have the introduction, a great puppet…
YELLO: I'll be back soon and stay in Yello Hotel again. Very strategic location. Nearby to the Paskal 23 Mall. The breakfast its so delicious. Every angle is so instagramable, and cute. Maybe for the swimming pool, can make it bigger
Aryaduta: Everything is very satisfied. Hopefully I can stay in here again. Simple and fast when I check in here. Food is very delicious and all staff very kind and helpful. Room is clean and bathroom is very comfortable.
Trans: this is my second stay in this hotel, and this time, with family and i have chance to try all they facility, first stop the pool, since this time we are going with our kids, the pool is their best spot the spend the day, the pool is nice, kid friendly, located in 3rd floor, nice job for the pool, next the gym, plenty of sport equipment that you can try, nice. the breakfast, different from my first experience, really good taste and delicious with plenty of food chice, and this time i have my breakfast in 18th floor, with really nice view,  definitely will stay in this hotel again if i visit to bandung

White_Charter: Amazing place on the ciwidey. My 2nd visit after 10 years ago. Definitely a good place for relaxing alone, with your mate, or families.
Tangkuban_Perahu: some sellers at tangkuban can be trusted, but some charge with expensive price,  if you interesting with some stuff you can bargain the price as cheap as minimum 50%
Dusun_Bambu: Facility is clean, hot water is really a treat considering the cool air.  Staff is helpful and polite  Bbq tools and bonfire included... yay
Saung_Angklung: I personally think for 100,000 IDR is dirt cheap for a one and a half hour of programme and entertainment. It also allows you to participate in the program where they teaches you to play the Angklung and dance together!
Ciater: I personally think for 100,000 IDR is dirt cheap for a one and a half hour of programme and entertainment. It also allows you to participate in the program where they teaches you to play the Angklung and dance together!
YELLO: Good location,good facilities, food was great also and most important great service and friendly staff . great job to showing hospitality skill to others.thank you for making our holiday feels like home
Aryaduta: We had a good package for our stay at Aryaduta Hotel such as : clean room, nice staff and wide variety of food during breakfast... and i also love the swimming pool. this hotel suit for business, couples or family
Trans: Trans luxury hotel is the perfect place if you want to have an unforgettable holiday experiences in Bandung. They come up with one stop service (mall, kids club, massages, sky lounge). Really recommended!!!!!

White_Charter: I went to White Crater with 8 family members. The place were under 20 degrees temperature, windy, nice and stunning, as you can take as many great photos because each angle was prefect. Children not advisable to visit here. Wear comfortable hiking shoes and thick jacket. It is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Super expensive for foreigners. The ticket price is 10 times of the local(lucky you). Rp 200.000 on weekdays and Rp 300.000 on weekend for foreigner. You may check again the ticket in case they reduce the price.  There are 3 craters; Kawah Ratu ("Queen Crater"), Kawah Domas…
Dusun_Bambu: Mostly its about foods or maybe its only about foods. Very crowded on weekend, must queue to get shuttle from parking area. Various pay activities offered in here, must try eat in the tree eventhough must queue. While the menus in food stall just ordinary menus. But its a unique…
Saung_Angklung: The show was really exciting. You can enjoy Angklung show here and learn how to play with it. The most important think, you will become part of the show in the angklung orchestra and the dance so you'll have great and fun experience there.
Ciater: The show was really exciting. You can enjoy Angklung show here and learn how to play with it. The most important think, you will become part of the show in the angklung orchestra and the dance so you'll have great and fun experience there.
YELLO: The room price was good, already included with breakfast. Check-in process was great, we could even check-in at 10am and the room was ready to be used. Good location, there is a direct connection to Paskal 23 Mall. Plenty of parking space. Overall was very excellent!
Aryaduta: This is my first stay at aryaduta bandung, i chosed this hotel regarding near by everywhere. I arrived there before c i time but the staff berry yanuar as a bqt team helped me to proses c i, escorted us to the room. When i enter the room in the like writing desk i see small cake, hmmmm....thats my father's cake bday that prepare by aryaduta hotel so surprise and unpredictable for me n fam. Berry so wise he said happy bday and offering help when we need something just let him know. This is i called one stop service and i really feel at home because of him. He take care everything that i need. Thanks berry for kind of your services.
Trans: You can reach all you need, same area with big and famous mall in Bandung, with available many kinds of food and drink. And available also game area with roll-coaster.For our Brother Muslim, in same area available big and beautiful Masjid for your praying.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih is quite pretty with its milky green lake. It is about 2.5hrs drive from the city center but was worth the journey for something different. The smell of sulphur was not overpowering so I did not get a mask but it does cost a far bit if you want to take the car up to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 200K/person and extra 45K with transportation- all the way to the top. Trekking down to Kawa Domas will cost u another 150K/person inclusive of tour guide commission. Going down you will be accompanied by sellers who are pretty nice and will provide simple service like massaging…
Dusun_Bambu: Its a huge area with lots of greens. We took the donut boat ride which was fun for the kids. Lots of beautiful background places to take photos. Kids fed bunnies, went inside a huge ballon and walk on water.. Had a blast. They also have strawberries pickings, horse riding etc.…
Saung_Angklung: My family and I love the show very much, as well as my 2yo daughter, she really enjoyed the show. Really worth to visit, you can sing, dance and play angklung together. Do need any skill, just listen what the conductor say. This place also has a souvenir shop, including selling…
Ciater: My family and I love the show very much, as well as my 2yo daughter, she really enjoyed the show. Really worth to visit, you can sing, dance and play angklung together. Do need any skill, just listen what the conductor say. This place also has a souvenir shop, including selling…
YELLO: I spent 1 night with family. This is the nicest budget hotel which I've ever experienced. Room is more spacious (additional bed is not possible though). Comfortable bed & bathroom, clean, easy check in/out, delicious breakfast, and the environment is so "instagramable". Below the hotel is a nice shopping center. Compare to the other hotel within this complex, Yello hotel will be a better choice.
Aryaduta: It will always be a pleasant stay at Aryaduta Bandung, I love the ambience of the lobby, restaurant, and rooms. Staffs are friendly, especially the housekeeping staffs. Anyway, I love their chocolate doughnut for breakfast.
Trans: The hotel was truly luxurious. The room was excellent. The food were great. The service also excellent. The hotel connect to trans studio and trans studio mall, so it was great escape gateway in Bandung without getting stuck in traffic

White_Charter: A must to come! Bring mask there as the sulphur smell is quite strong.  Overall, it is a place with stunning view
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkabun Perahu is the icon of Bandung and it is "must visit" for every tourist that visited Bandung. But first and foremost please get ready for Bandung traffic jam as it could dampen your holiday visit to this place.  This place is located about 2 hrs drive from the city...of…
Dusun_Bambu: Such a great place for you who want to relax your mind after 5 days working, good view, ambiance, good food and good price..  Take your family time here, and you will never disappointed.
Saung_Angklung: I went with a colleague who lives locally. The kids and the teenage + performers were amazing. Was totally blown away by the ability of the compere to converse with the audience in each of their own langues.
Ciater: I went with a colleague who lives locally. The kids and the teenage + performers were amazing. Was totally blown away by the ability of the compere to converse with the audience in each of their own langues.
YELLO: We stay for 1 night only, and we take a twin bed room, the room are very clean, no smoke smell, my kids are very happy, i will come back again soon to this place, my complain only for the towel, one of them have a red spot, im sure thats not a blood spot, like a lipstick, better for HK to double check the amenities before deliver to the guest
Aryaduta: Very good stay.. Clean and tidy room.. very good services and friendly staff.. I need to adjust the wifi setting in my room for me to be able to watch a football match through my device, and the staff were very happy to help to solve the problem.. So, very much appreciated.. The speed of refilling breakfast menu though need to be better..
Trans: I decide to celebrate our wedding anniversary with trans luxury lv 3 restaurant buffet dinner, we didnt stay at the hotel since we,'re locals but we choose the buffet dinner cos its 'luxury hotel'  we quite have an expectation on it, My husband called to the hotel for reservation, the price is around 350,000++/ person   well ok for a 'luxury' buffet dinner, he wants to make a surprise by arranging flower to be sent but trans cant accommodate the request (my husband call was ping pong-ed to many departments and end up they didnt grant his wish, thats fine, he was patient enough)  we came to the restaurant, but the reception at the level 3 resto didnt have our name on the list, whatever, the seats was available anyway, not many people came for the buffet i guess.  The foods…

White_Charter: It's a long way out and difficult to get to if you don't have transport but absolutely worth it if you can find a way. Beautiful hot spring source in a volcanic crater. Very strong sulphur fumes, be ready for this. Stunning views. It's a local must and you can visit the tea…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If your are foreigner. Please avoid this tangkuban parahu. Why u need to pay enormous amount for the sake of free view created by God. Share and show 'your' beauty. Facilities bloody unproper. IDR 300K (MYR90). Exclude parking/kawah domas.. Gila ka apa?   We do understand that…
Dusun_Bambu: get vacation in bandung we visit dusun bambu theyre located at lembang area the place was good with a view of some traditional restaurant 2 thumb up
Saung_Angklung: A high octane performance of traditional and modern music by an amazing group of local children using local musical instruments. What made it all the more enchanting, besides their skill, was how much they all see,ed to be enjoying themselves. They even got the whole audience…
Ciater: A high octane performance of traditional and modern music by an amazing group of local children using local musical instruments. What made it all the more enchanting, besides their skill, was how much they all see,ed to be enjoying themselves. They even got the whole audience…
YELLO: keep the cleanliness of the pillow sheet and smell refreshing... because last time i stay, the pillow sheet smells no good and maybe can put extra a comb for hair cotton bud,shower cap... overall everything is good
Aryaduta: The staff is nice. All the security staff were very polite, and the check-in / check-out process was very quickly. Rooms was lovely, very well maintained, the aminities complete and also facilities good function.
Trans: Best experience hotel ever.. very recomended hotel..Great room, great food, great swimming pool, great bed, great service, everything was great..We really enjoy and will back again to stay at this hotel..

White_Charter: You will stunned with the view of acid lake on the top of the motain surrounding by the volcanic crater. You may need to bring face mask due to gas released from the water especially during rain. Not much activity can be done here accept enjoy the view, taking photos or wedding…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The crater is just for selfies and horse riding, the real gem is the hike to the hot springs at Dormas Crater.... great fauna and signs which is well worth the time   there are guides for a fee and the entry to the entire Tangkuban is RP300k on weekend and RP200k on weekdays for…
Dusun_Bambu: Ticket IDR 20.000/pax , child under 80 cm free ( previously under 3 years free ).. Parking Car IDR 15.000 , but dont pay to 'officer' in parking area.. the 'officer' at parking area will ask for payment with say " it's Up To You " .. 2 tickets can be exchanged for 1 plant / 1…
Saung_Angklung: I was expecting a boring traditional performance when I arrived. But did they get me amazed! It was not just how they performed the traditional and international music using traditional bamboo music instruments, Angklung, but also how they engaged with audiences and got us…
Ciater: I was expecting a boring traditional performance when I arrived. But did they get me amazed! It was not just how they performed the traditional and international music using traditional bamboo music instruments, Angklung, but also how they engaged with audiences and got us…
YELLO: Very good for value. Improve variety of breakfast items. Location is very close to mall & food court. The best affordable hotel in Bandung. Need to improve the internet speed and also more TV channels including sports.
Aryaduta: The property is still well maintain. But during the high occupancy they need more staff. At the time I stayed there the hotel is fully book. But there is not enough staff specially house keeping and cleaning. The public restroom dirty after used and the floor and lift wet cause of the guest back to the room after swum.
Trans: It's complete "facility" with Trans Studio location. If you like entertainment such as cinema, shopping, and culinery in one location, may be you should try this one. The quality service as good as the price :)

White_Charter: I came to white crater to enjoy the view. Too bad you could only last for about 15 minutes because of sulfur in the air. Aside from the breathtaking view, there's nothing else to do there except for admiring the view and taking selfie.
Tangkuban_Perahu: visited tangkuban perahu and then went to domas crater better to visit kawah domas instead. still one area with tangkuban perahu, escorted with compulsary local guide, walk down extra 3km per way, then you will be able to boiled eggs boiled legs hhahaa yet, still too expensive…
Dusun_Bambu: Visited on weekdays. I highly recommend to visit here. Because if you're looking for an outdoor activities for your children and also a luxury for yourself.  Here's the place. Don't expect a cheap food and every activities need fees.   Entrance fee for person is 20k/pax. Car…
Saung_Angklung: A good experience where they spent the first 2 hours playing a mixture of popular and traditional Indonesian music. After which you'll get to play a song together and have fun.
Ciater: A good experience where they spent the first 2 hours playing a mixture of popular and traditional Indonesian music. After which you'll get to play a song together and have fun.
YELLO: Hotel is located strategically just above Paskal 23 Hypersquare, new hype shopping mall in town. In the back side of hotel, you can find Food Market - a recommended place to find meals.There are many instagramable spot in the hotel for you who like to take selfie!
Aryaduta: Stayed there to celebrate my son’s intimate birthday party. Check-in and check-out were smooth thanks to the receptionist named Asti (she also arranged a complimentary b’day cake for my son the next day), a bit crowded on breakfast time, yeah well it was weekend so very understandable. The staff were professional and superb, they even threw a small birthday celebration for my son during breakfast with the birthday cake. He was thrilled, couldn’t be happier. The security man in the parking lot (unfortunately we didn’t get his name) was very very helpful, he went up and got back down assisting us with the parking ticket. We sincerely thank you for everything, been stayed in Aryaduta Bandung multiple times for their strategic location and we are always amazed by their services!
Trans: A very convinience place to conduct meeting. With a very helpful Banquet Crew, especially Mr. Berry who always gave a quick respons to our request. Even to a sudden changes we ask.From his body language.. I knew.. he is work with his heart. Working with happy feeling will give an excellence output (performance). don't you think sooooo..??

White_Charter: Beautiful bluish scenery reflected from the crater. The colour depends on the acidity of the water.But sometime the sulfur smell is quite dense so you have to wear mask.
Tangkuban_Perahu: First of all the price quoted by all kinds of Taxi or tours operators is a rip off for a day tour of this volcano (IDR 100-200,000 or more). So we decided to book a Cab by 'Grab' which we managed to get for about 30,000 IDR.   But right at the entrance the 'Loot' / Rip-Off…
Dusun_Bambu: located approximately 12 km from Cihampelas, Bandung, this leisure park boasts a number of playground facilities people can enjoy especially during the weekends and holidays. there were buggy 4WD mini circuit, horse riding, fish pond, rabbit feeding, archery mini ground, mini…
Saung_Angklung: The whole show is very entertaining but the only pity is the puppet show that we could not understand the language . I enjoyed very much on the dance and play by the young children , specially when the audience are given the bamboo instruments to play along .   Worth a visit .
Ciater: The whole show is very entertaining but the only pity is the puppet show that we could not understand the language . I enjoyed very much on the dance and play by the young children , specially when the audience are given the bamboo instruments to play along .   Worth a visit .
YELLO: it was a great experience staying at Yello hotel, their staffs are so friendly, comfy room and waiting area, great location, so close to paskal 23 mall and located inside the paskal hyper square. will definitely stay at this hotel again if I travel to bandung!
Aryaduta: Just checked out my second stay and it's still a recommended hotel. Love the place due to nearby BIP and surrounding place to hang out and eat. I like the food(during breakfast) with its variety. well done.
Trans: Well, its been our 30th stay and more in this hotel.. that’s why i call this hotel our 2nd home.. we’re keep coming back to trans luxury hotel cause they have nice room with comfy bed and best amenities, they also have well equipped gym, nice sandy pool “beach”, and the most important think is the club lounge who always give genuine and excellent service for our family.. thanks to Andri, Bagas, Tedi, Hanifa, and Rivaldi during our stay in trans luxury hotel.. keep it up guys..

White_Charter: This is a unique crater lake, located south of Ciwidey, 55 kms from Bandung city. The journey itself takes 2.5 hrs oneway because of heavy traffic. The road conditions are very good. The entry fee is 50k for foreigners and 15k for return shuttle ride. So total 65k from the entry…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If they offer you to take pictures, dont accept them!! Decline it nicely. Why???? I have a nightmare...one of the local offered to take my pictures; At first he will act "friendly" but in the end of the route...He forced! I repeat FORCED! us to buy the things that he have for…
Dusun_Bambu: A good view of the place like in the forest the price is midrange the place is great the access quite heavy if using bus many food options
Saung_Angklung: I am glad that I did not miss out on this very fine angklung music presentation. It was really superb. At some point in the presentation, the audience are each handed an angklung, taught how to use it and encouraged to participate. The result - a first time experience of a real…
Ciater: I am glad that I did not miss out on this very fine angklung music presentation. It was really superb. At some point in the presentation, the audience are each handed an angklung, taught how to use it and encouraged to participate. The result - a first time experience of a real…
YELLO: Clean hotel room, facilities and friendly staff with their greetings and communications. But sometimes the internet connection need an improvement. After all, love their youthful  theme of the hotels! Keep improving, Yello
Aryaduta: the room is very comfortable, convenient, and clean. The staffs are very friendly. The location is strategist, near to BIP mall and dago street for plating, shopping, or eating Very recommended for either business or family trip
Trans: I stay at this hotel for 2 nights with my family and very satisfied with facilities in this hotel. Although we choose the cheapest type of room, but this room is very clean and cozy. The smallest room is 40m2 with king size bed.  It isn't my very first time stay at 5* hotel and there are several things that i didn't find at another 5* hotel that i ever visit.  There is body scale in the bathroom & they also prepare 2 type of hair brush for the amenities in our room.  The only thing that makes me kinda uncomfortable is the wall isn't sound proof at all. We could hear sounds from the outside of the room and sounds from another room beside of our room.  It was raining and we could even hear the sounds of rain drop from the window.  I hope this problem would be fixed.

White_Charter: I must pay 10.000 rupiah and 5000 rupiah for helm storage  from gate kawah putih area and i must  pay again 5000  rupiah from parking official in ticket entrance beware.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is one of the place to go if you are in bandung. The view is breathtaking with sulphuric smoke coming out from the volcanic crater. Be mindful of peddlers who ARE VERY PERSISTANT and they can resort in forcing you you to buy sourveniors.  The price tag is 10x more than the…
Dusun_Bambu: The view and playground were so great. But everything almost above 50k. Food&beverage, kids playground, rent costume, train. Beside those things, the food court was awful, smokers everywhere, very annoying to family with young children like us. We'll think again twice whether we…
Saung_Angklung: We came for the 3:30pm show. It was a good introduction to an ingenious javanese musical instrument. The audience get to learn first hand not only how to use the angklung but also understand that this is essentially a community style orchestra. The feeling of collectively…
Ciater: We came for the 3:30pm show. It was a good introduction to an ingenious javanese musical instrument. The audience get to learn first hand not only how to use the angklung but also understand that this is essentially a community style orchestra. The feeling of collectively…
YELLO: The room and window floor so dusty. We asked the hoise keeping to clean and wipe the floor again. The toilet biset also very awful.. they left something stuck on it.. so yuccky. Breakfast also tastless and not so many choices. Definetely Wont back again.
Aryaduta: the deluxe room is very big, for me with 2 children is very comfortable. So my children can playing around the room without cractc something. The location is very strategist, near to place to eating, playing or shopping
Trans: At the bar at lobby Samba is master of Gin Tonic with Honje flower, excellent ! Restaurant at 18 floor decline  a bit comapare to years ago. Taste not bad but small quantity, and not haing good dessert with the fruit we can find in Bandung is ashame. Rooms still fine but troubles with TV.

White_Charter: at the time we arrive there, its raining so hard and we have to wait till it stops. its a nice experience actually, we drink coffee from the local people there. its a nice place to have a wedding photo shoot too.
Tangkuban_Perahu: A must see legendary place in Bandung. We hire an Uber driver to drive us there and request him to wait for an hour for us to explore around. Few locals will offer to help with photo taking and selling handicrafts. You will do just fine with a monopod and selfies. Reject the…
Dusun_Bambu: I'm going to here with family. I came around 8am,before it officially open. The place is so spacy, have lakes, cottages, outbounds, etc. It also have many spots for photo, for all of you photograph lover. The entry fee is quite reasonable, consider the place is very large for…
Saung_Angklung: Love the ambiance, hospitality and the angklung workshop.  Will be back with my friends and family  Thank you Saung udjo!
Ciater: Love the ambiance, hospitality and the angklung workshop.  Will be back with my friends and family  Thank you Saung udjo!
YELLO: First impression was friendly security guard that greeted me at the lobby n directed me well. Then there goes the well spirited front office officers that makes the first approach once the elevator door opened at level 4. Fast check in process with all smile on their faces. And clean spacious hotel room compared to other formal establishments that i have ever been in Bandung. Good lightings, big bed n tv n cool citrus scented amenities n good water pressure n aircon works well  n no second thoughts of changing hotel. Never never never. I have fallen in love with Yello Hotel. Good vibrant n delightful professional hotel staff suits the hotel hip n retro style. Location is superb on top of one the latest shopping mall in Bandung. What else can l say... im out of words.... keep it…
Aryaduta: A 5 star hotel that cares about meticulous detail in the room and maintained them well. At its room rate, understandably that the facade maintenance could not be done at similarly rigorous way. But hey, what are you looking for in a stay?  Definitely will place Aryaduta first at our next hotel search in Bandung.
Trans: Stayed in this hotel over the weekend and really enjoyed the room and the restaurants. We stayed in the premier club room with access to the club lounge. Andri served us whenever we went to the lounge. Very attentive and friendly guy. Always happy to chat. He tried to help us to extend our stay but unfortunately the hotel was full. We appreciate his effort to help us.   The hotel has good size room with nice view. We stayed on the 17th floor. We also had dinner at the 18th restaurant on our last evening. Magical evening with the city of Bandung view all around. It was a clear night with hardly any rain. Sit outside if the weather permits. Bandung weather is very nice and cool when we visited. Live  band entertained us without being too loud.

White_Charter: 2,5 hours trip from Bandung City, this Crater offers exotic view with sulphur lake inside the crater, that visualize white colour.  You can park your car in the main gate, then using "ontang-anting" (modified open vehicle) to go up to the crater, or drive your car to the top…
Tangkuban_Perahu: this place is so great, just so great, i cannot tell you more than this but you won’t regret if you come here with anyone you loved
Dusun_Bambu: The restaurant offer amazing view with a lot of green. The wood decor in the restaurant matches with the environment.  The restaurant offer local traditional and also western choices.  Dont forget to have the perfect cappuccino.
Saung_Angklung: Loving the place! Especially the interactions during the angklung performance. Especially the owner as he's very funny and interactive with the audiences.  Other performances are great too, the kids are adorable really adorable.  The souvenirs are on the cheap side too, they're…
Ciater: Loving the place! Especially the interactions during the angklung performance. Especially the owner as he's very funny and interactive with the audiences.  Other performances are great too, the kids are adorable really adorable.  The souvenirs are on the cheap side too, they're…
YELLO: I booked for 5 rooms for our program in Bandung. Comfortable stay in great location.  On top of a shopping mall and in area of Paskal which have entertainment and lively area. Will stay again in this hotel whenever comes to Bandung
Aryaduta: Nice place, convenient, maintain its best quality of cleanliness , and strategic location which direct access to BIP.  A short getaway trip with the best value of money , Aryaduta gives all of benefits for business trip or family
Trans: The best hotel,the best environment...  & with dedicated supervisor mr andri from fnb div. superb and friendly and always knows needs of customer . we give <U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F><U+2B50><U+FE0F> to him ...thank you Mr Andri , we will come back again,definitely <U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FB>  #The 18th Restaurant and Lounge #clublounge #TheTransLuxuryHotel #TransLuxuryExperience

White_Charter: The route to get to the crater from earliest highway is quite packed with vehicle and paved, thus it is surely unsuitable for hiking. What a pity, since the route has very interesting view. Once you reach the crater, surely you can't stay there in such long period or even hike,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Located in Lembang, this destination is easy to reach. All you need is going to Jalan Setiabudi then going north (up in the map), and just follow the main road them you will find sign to get to the Tangkubang Perahu National Park. I suggest you to bring your own personal…
Dusun_Bambu: We are a family of 2 young active boys (aged 7 & 5) & a grandma. We went there last Friday.  What we loved: 1. The entrance ticket fee was affordable for us. 2. The whole area is massive. There are many areas for different activities for all ages.  3. Accessible for wheelchairs…
Saung_Angklung: the music and the coreo are amazing which are play with every music genre can not believed that bamboo could created that amazing sound and music, souvenir gave by angklung mang ujo become everyone question among my expat friends
Ciater: the music and the coreo are amazing which are play with every music genre can not believed that bamboo could created that amazing sound and music, souvenir gave by angklung mang ujo become everyone question among my expat friends
YELLO: It's on a top of a mall, walking distance to night food market. I'm visually pleased by all the murals & the amenity designs. Very comfortable room, just wish we can have more TV channels and pillows. Love the 24 hours room service. Love the crew who speaks english very well, helpful and speedy. I enjoyed my 1 night stay. Next time we'll stay here again if we hit Bandung
Aryaduta: Family time is worth staying at aryaduta. Front desk staff is very helpful on a busy and full-booked time, otherwise it will be chaotic time. The good news also is that the hotel is connected to the Mall and in center of bandung, so if we need to visit some excitements, it's easy and quick to reach the place.  Also what we love about is that the room is very nice. Spacious and the bed is so comfort.  Certainly will have another stay there for vacation or family time for few days....
Trans: This was my first time staying at Trans Luxury Hotel but it was not really the experiences I would have expected from a so called a six-star hotel with high room price1. The guest parking area is way too small. I had difficulty to find the parking bay. This situation was made worse when the parking area B3 was completely closed as it was allocated only for wedding VIPs.2. The room is not really sound-proof. The loud noise of music and MC coming from the mall was clearly heard from the room high up at level 17.3. When we left the parking after checking out, we had to wait for 5 minutes because when the car in front of us paying, the parking attendant did not have enough change monies so she had to take some time to go to the office for small changes.I would definitely not…

White_Charter: One has to visit kawah Putih while in bandung. You can't really compare and pick between kawah putih and perahu. It's like comparing apples to oranges. You have to visit both and I must say touting here isn't as bad as perahu.  The views here are definitely worth the drive down…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 1. when we at main gate area, many seller offering us face mask because to anticipate the smell might make us uncomfortable. They suggest ( a little bit pushing us) to buy in the main gate area rather than in the top of volcano cause the price must be more expensive then. Then…
Dusun_Bambu: If you would like to lay back with family, just enjoying the nature and have a little play with our young kid, this is the right place to go. You can really relax.
Saung_Angklung: Not many tourist place have the place like this where you can enjoy the cultural performance as well as good atmosphere. The live Angklung performance offered awesome performance that need high skill to present..... Worth to see!
Ciater: Not many tourist place have the place like this where you can enjoy the cultural performance as well as good atmosphere. The live Angklung performance offered awesome performance that need high skill to present..... Worth to see!
YELLO: overall excellent service and place.. maybe there is some kid zone that not gadget minded like building block that can be play on the floor so more item for play with.. but that only for small improvement coz there is soccer play and horse that my kid love to play too. Yello….
Aryaduta: This is the second stay on this year. So far everything is really good!! I stay in deluxe room, equipment is complete (iron board, iron, towel, hairdryer, refrigator, etc) except for bathrobe, just one (should be 2, isn't it?). Service from staff is excellent!I definitely will be back again!
Trans: Booked for 3 rooms today to attend a friend’s wedding (to be held tonight at same hotel). Arrived at check-in only to be told our booking has been cancelled!!!  1. NO CANCELLATION NOTIFICATION WERE EVER GIVEN!!! 2. We are travelling with small children!! 3. Staff on duty NOT HELPFUL! 4. NO SOLUTION GIVEN!!

White_Charter: Kawah Putih is a must-see when in Bandung. altho the ride is a tad long (not the distance, but traffic instead), when you get there, and walk about the lakeshore's white sandy beach, and look onto the azure bluish waters, there's a calming effect that overcomes you (nope..its…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Suggest u wear a mask as the smell made us rather uncomfortable after 15 mins. Lots of ppl selling stuff and food. Good place to take picture.
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place. Beautiful scenery.  Tasty Foods. Cheap entrance fees. Full of activities for family.  I love it
Saung_Angklung: Playing Angklung has never been so exciting before I came to this site. Mang Udjo, the owner, with all the crews, succeed to make all the audiance realize how rich the sound of angklung. Wait until they play Bohemian Rhapsody of Queen with Angklung only, I'm speachless... It's a…
Ciater: Playing Angklung has never been so exciting before I came to this site. Mang Udjo, the owner, with all the crews, succeed to make all the audiance realize how rich the sound of angklung. Wait until they play Bohemian Rhapsody of Queen with Angklung only, I'm speachless... It's a…
YELLO: It was a great experience!! Nice location, friendly crew and great facilities.My son loves the gaming station, got a few new friends in there. Location is near Chinatown so you can just walk to there. You don't have to worry about food cause it's connecting to the mall.
Aryaduta: Good service and facilities. When i was stay @arya duta bandung every staff giving us the best service and smile.  Comfortable room, nice swimming pool. Best breakfast. Thx for froviding the good service for us
Trans: Thanks to Mr. Ahmad & Mr. Arby from banquet services for being very helpfull on my event in Trans Ballroom at 4 December 2018. Me & My Team would like to said to them "Thank you very much for helping me on my event"

White_Charter: It was a 2.5hrs drive up to this spot of interest & 2.5hrs back. But worth every hour. I'm referring to the sulphuric lake, Kawah Putih in Bandung.   Its not just about shopping. This is my 1st vision of a sulphur lake. Gorgeous. Bluish greenish. Pls visit at least  once in your…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 200k entrance ticket while indo pay 20k. Better enjoy different spot. Surrounding area is very nice to explore. Great views overlooking tea plantation and valley. Nice temperature just above 20c.
Dusun_Bambu: suitable for relaxing trip but the journey itself need to be reconsider as it too average 1 hour to reach there. the temperature is kind of low and have to bring jacket. a good place to walkabout and for family day trip.
Saung_Angklung: It is a very interesting and fun way to peek at Sunda culture! It is not a typical art show where you just sit and watch the show. Not only my family enjoyed seeing the show, we also learned how to play angklung (Indonesia traditional music instrument made from bamboo) in a fun…
Ciater: It is a very interesting and fun way to peek at Sunda culture! It is not a typical art show where you just sit and watch the show. Not only my family enjoyed seeing the show, we also learned how to play angklung (Indonesia traditional music instrument made from bamboo) in a fun…
YELLO: I was having a Christmas holiday with my family and planned stay in Yello for 2 nights only, but when my in-laws decided to join, I extended for 2 more nights. The room was cozy and pleasant, even a baby cot was provided for my infant son. Internet was good, but the requirement to reset the password every 24 hours is a bit annoying. Breakfast was excellent, but it could use a bit of more variety. Having the same menu every 2-3 days is less interesting to go breakfast to. Staff was friendly and responsive, very glad for that. Overall, a pleasant experience and surely come back for another stay.
Aryaduta: A nice experience overall. The view was great. The room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was also nice. It was a memorable experience in Bandung. We were also happy with outside access. The hotel was located strategically for the ease of customers
Trans: Very good hotel, friendly staff, trustworthy staff. I left my I-pad when I checked out in the morning and they kept until I get back on 11PM to take my I-Pad. Everything excellent in this hotel, with all facilities they have.

White_Charter: It's one of the beautiful places I have ever visited. It's also called kawah putih .Little more than 2 hours away from the center of the city  but worth it. The place is bit crowded but the view is breathtaking. We rented a car with a driver from our hotel since there are not…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Its a mountain with sleeping volcano, what an amazing picture of nature, tea plantation around bring a peaceful mind, wind blowing, bird singing, oak tree around....wow...so damn beautiful... Keep green...
Dusun_Bambu: this place so nice to family that have children. Road along the journey so far not so good. Entrance fee 20,000 rupiah per person and 15,000 for car to park inside. You will got one free mineral water when you change two ticket. There are some restaurant with awesome view. There…
Saung_Angklung: It's one of the best cultural show I've ever seen in Indonesia. They performed some of the Sundanese traditional art, such as Wayang Golek (puppet show), Tari Merak (peacock dance), and Angklung (bamboo musical instrument). They also involved the audiences to play angklung and…
Ciater: It's one of the best cultural show I've ever seen in Indonesia. They performed some of the Sundanese traditional art, such as Wayang Golek (puppet show), Tari Merak (peacock dance), and Angklung (bamboo musical instrument). They also involved the audiences to play angklung and…
YELLO: Near railways station, near paskal food market, integrated with shooping area 23 paskal, have pool, in the gaming area the provide XBoX so you can play there if you boring on the room. Staff is very helpful.
Aryaduta: Room was great as always, foods are delightful, staffs was so attentive and genuine; Mira (Chef), Steve Nazie, Garna, Duduh, Nita, Deni (Taruma Kafe) and Febi, Linda (FO Team), Tarlan, Utha, Garuda (Pool).. thank you and will come back to visit you again Aryaduta Bandung
Trans: What a great hotel. Very nice indeed. Loved the staff, our room (bed, pillows, bathroom, the view), the meals and the adjoining mall. Beyond our expectations! The meals and drinks on the 18th floor were an extra treat that we will remember warmly.

White_Charter: Astounding views !  Temperature : 5-10 degree   The view is magnificent and the weather is cooling.   Tips!   Wear thick clothings and covered shoes because I almost fell into the sinking sulphur while taking photo, don't stand so near the area where you see dark green sulphur…
Tangkuban_Perahu: People come here to visit and to see the active volcano. It is interesting to see the smokes coming out from the sulphuric surface of the volcano. However, do prepare facial masks before visiting because of the pungent smell of the sulphur. The weather there is really cooling,…
Dusun_Bambu: Good to have vacation here. Many beautiful spot for our take picture. Unique concept food market and many varians. We have to change our money with their 'money' but dont worry, they have EDC for us who dont bring cash.
Saung_Angklung: The show plays at 3.30 most days and is a great whirlwind tour of the culture of West Java and the Angklung. I thought the show, performed by differing age students from the Udjo was put together really well, featured a variety of different things, the highlight for me playing…
Ciater: The show plays at 3.30 most days and is a great whirlwind tour of the culture of West Java and the Angklung. I thought the show, performed by differing age students from the Udjo was put together really well, featured a variety of different things, the highlight for me playing…
YELLO: Facility is good. Breakfast is great, variety is just enough, plus cheap extra charge for additional guests. Above all, staffs are super friendly.You can spend time hanging out in the mal directly bridged to the hotel.
Aryaduta: Preparing at the Aryaduta Hotel Bandung is a really pleasant experience, with satisfying service, friendly and very helpful staff. Fast check-in and check-out process. Rooms are spacious and clean, bathrooms are complete amenities. Great breakfast and many variations of food. Highly recommended. Thank you
Trans: So glad staying here at the Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung. hey’re all welcoming us such as family, all the members were wonderful of giving service especially waiter named “Dede” He were doing his job really really well for us, the breakfast were excellent all the kitchen staff who served us during breakfast was so warm, me and family really enjoy of staying here, willing to be stay here again next time, thanks.  Regards,  Joshua Agung Prakoso

White_Charter: 2 hours by car from Bandung City - we set off around 815am on a Friday and the journey was smooth all the way  Entrance free 50k IDR per person + 35k local transport in a mini van where they Squash you in like sardines   Relative to the few other attractions we visited, this was…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The closest we've been to an active volcanic crater, <U+0001F30B> Last eruption was year 2013. Great view but expensive entrance fee. For foreigners : 300k for weekend, 200k for weekdays. They will be poeple approaching you to sell their products, just reject them politely if you not…
Dusun_Bambu: It's my firsttimes holiday bandung after 5 years, specially to dusun bambu lembang, when we arrived i feeling so excited, omg the places was very bautiful, and we never get bored even no much activities we can do it coz we are a couple, we went to purbasari restaurant…
Saung_Angklung: It was a lovely break from the Bandung traffic and manic shopping.Also the beginning of the show was a little draggy but it changed tempo and there was even an unexpected twist at the end of the performance for the audience that left us beaming. A  worthwhile afternoon of music…
Ciater: It was a lovely break from the Bandung traffic and manic shopping.Also the beginning of the show was a little draggy but it changed tempo and there was even an unexpected twist at the end of the performance for the audience that left us beaming. A  worthwhile afternoon of music…
YELLO: The hotel has a good enviromental, which surrounded by food market and mall. But due to the surrounded by mall and food market, it quite hard to find parking space. The hotel location is great and near the city center...
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung is very suitable option for your family vacation stay in bandung the location is very good, in the middle of bandung city it is easier for us to drive to Dago pakar, Lembang and punclut (the most relaxing and chill place for family vacation in bandung) spacious room that aryaduta bandung has, its very convenience for my kids next to the Malls, BIP and BEC really saving our time to get all we need during our staycation I really recommend this hotel to all family that want to go to bandung
Trans: Excellent Overall, Wished they give free theme park tickets for the whole family. The hotel is strategically located next to the TSM Mall, one of the best mall in Bandung. There is an indoor theme park too. If you stay at the hotel you get 2 free tickets. We stayed with our 2 year old and 4 year old kid so we need to pay for 2 more tickets. I hope the hotel five away free theme park tickets for the kids too if we stay at the hotel.

White_Charter: This is the place that have a good spot and scenary for taking the picture over the crater area. Kawah Putih is still original till now, the sulfur water is still continue produced and it used for sulfur water bath or swiming pool for tourist.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Be warned that the fees you have to pay to get into this place is ridiculous for a tourist compared to the locals. Decent scenery although crowded with other tourists and locals, cool air with a bit of Sulphur. It's not those volcano with active lava so don't expect that but a…
Dusun_Bambu: I didn't have many experience here as I play nothing. The have some children's playground with rabbits around, a small maze, and some others. It looks cute but I didn't check the price. There are also some boat for us to wander the lake and some other activities which I didn't…
Saung_Angklung: The performance was exciting, with the whole audience being invited to play a song together!! Even as a local I would go back again.
Ciater: The performance was exciting, with the whole audience being invited to play a song together!! Even as a local I would go back again.
YELLO: This hotel is united with Paskal 23 Mall. Located in a good location. View from room is very nice with Mountain View. Room is big, clean and cozy. Breakfast is ok, even though not so many variety of menu.  There is a game station and very interesting &  cheerful. Staff also helpful & friendly.
Aryaduta: Really appreciate for the hotel management and all employee, cause after several years I' m back to stay, they can keep this hotel clean, cosy, comfort, and all for the best. One of rare hotel in bandung that has quite big room, located in city center, connected to Mall and easy to access. Fully recommended !!
Trans: I have stayed in this hotel before and said an excellent things about this hotel. This time I would say the same thing, everything about this hotel were excellent, hotel room, bath room, breakfast, staff hospitality, location, except for one small thing. if you drive, not so easy to get parking spot because parking space also used by the adjacent hotel, Ibis.

White_Charter: I always wanted to come here. I miss out this attractions during my first visit in Bandung (2014), but 2 years later - I'm here. It has a very nice view and there are some vendors trying to sell you masks / sulphur - just ignore it.!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Located at the highland just at the outskirt of Bandung. Tangkuban Perahu Crater is surely a perfect place to enjoy cool air and relaxing sceneries after a series of shopping activities. For a rejuvenating sensation, visitors can continue their journey to the nearby Ciater's…
Dusun_Bambu: The place is very good for leisure, there are a special restaurant with lake view, local food court/market, lodging, treewalk, camping ground, play/games area, boat, archery field/club, etc. The area is far away from the parking area but don't worry, they are providing the free…
Saung_Angklung: It's highly educative and interactive the whole performance covering introductory wayang kulit, Indonesian dances of different regions (like the peacock dance) etc.  The most interesting part is the Anklung lesson! All audiences get the chance to learn from the very patient…
Ciater: It's highly educative and interactive the whole performance covering introductory wayang kulit, Indonesian dances of different regions (like the peacock dance) etc.  The most interesting part is the Anklung lesson! All audiences get the chance to learn from the very patient…
YELLO: Risk of injury at your bathroom door. Bath soap has to be check before the guest coming in. But anyway, I will recommend the hotel to my networks. The location is prime, but parking is a little bit problem. Yello should put somebody to welcome the guest especially how to get the parking easily, plus information about the free parking. Otherwise guests will get confused and starting to calculate how much extra parking cost for a nite
Aryaduta: water so dirty, yellow color water. staff so unhelpful, bell boy just stand at the corner, they move after my wife talk to the security. restaurant adv was old adv. they change the promotion. no coordination between front desk and the restaurant staff. to awful. bad experience for me.
Trans: We are staying during the weekend at Trans Hotel.  We have Breakfast at the Club Lounge, 18th floor. We were served by Andri on Saturday and Sunday. his service is Excellent even many customers on Sunday. The foods are good also and so many varieties. Keep it up Andri.  Regards,  Jason

White_Charter: It was absolutely an amazing spot to visit in Bandung, the color of the lake was so beautiful and the weather was really nice, not to hot up there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great view but at a price.  Friendly but desperate vendors offering help to take photos and act as tour guide but in exchange at the end of the trip you are 'required' to purchase something from them. Stick to 50k - 100k as an acceptable / reasonable price for their goods on top…
Dusun_Bambu: I visited this leisure park almost 2 years ago (February 2015) and it was beautiful and most importantly everything was free of charge. So obviously I was so excited to visit this park again during my Bandung vacation this month. Boy, was I wrong. They now require us to pay to…
Saung_Angklung: usually I am skeptical about these performances but this time I must admit that it was really a nice experience both musically and about the traditions of the area. So I also advice to organise your stay in Bandung to contact Nhusa who organised this visit. She has been my guide…
Ciater: usually I am skeptical about these performances but this time I must admit that it was really a nice experience both musically and about the traditions of the area. So I also advice to organise your stay in Bandung to contact Nhusa who organised this visit. She has been my guide…
YELLO: Book for double bed, given a twin bed. Asked for no smoking room, but given a smoking room, they said they are run out of rooms. The smoke fume is really bad. They tried to get rid of it, but the smell stayed.
Aryaduta: One step away from the most known mall in Bandung, BIP. Very clean and comfortable room that makes you want to stay longer and longer... All staff are very kind and helpful, they always put a smile and greet you! A very recommended hotel if you have a plan to stay at Bandung!
Trans: Location are OK. A little out of central business but next to mall and surrounding with lots of restaurants.  Room are clean and quite big.  The food are good, with delicious and crunchy on pastries.   The staff are responsive and kinds to help. Thanks to @Andri @clublounge for an A-ratings staff. Keep it up... !!!

White_Charter: Tips to go there:  * Wear sneakers * Wear jacket/sweater * Bring sunglass (to get a beatiful picture of course..:)) * Bring your own face /surgery mask, since there you will be offered to buy mask worth 5,000 IDR each (normal is 1,000 IDR). Actually I don't feel it is useful.…
Tangkuban_Perahu: One has to visit this place if you are in bandung. Never mind the expensive foreigner entry fee or the persistent touts. As Long as you know the magic number, you can pretty much survive the touting and yet enjoy the views of this magnificent place.  Foreigner fee is 200k…
Dusun_Bambu: My first impression is, It's a nice place for traveling with your young children.   There is a rice field at the entrance of dusun bambu, you can walk through it to main place of dusun bambu, if you don't want to wait the wara-wiri vehicles ( due to new year holiday, dusun bambu…
Saung_Angklung: Heard about this place before but only this time we visited Angklung Udjo. The performance was great, depicting richness of Indonesian culture. The highlight was when audience were thought to play angklung together with Pak Udjo jr (son of Pak Udjo) and we close with colosal…
Ciater: Heard about this place before but only this time we visited Angklung Udjo. The performance was great, depicting richness of Indonesian culture. The highlight was when audience were thought to play angklung together with Pak Udjo jr (son of Pak Udjo) and we close with colosal…
YELLO: Nice clean, non-smoking hotel, with big rooms with a high ceiling, nice large kingsize bed with a good mattrass, 2 pillows per person.Good shower with hot water.Minus was that the roomsafe was not fixed to the wall, so someone could easily take the roomsafe.Minus was also that we just could get only 1 room key.Good overal tastfull Indonesian breakfast, Personal are kind and helpfull, especially a lovely female front desk employee at check-out, don't know her name, I would surely stay here again when I am in Bandung again.
Aryaduta: The Aryaduta Bandung is a great place to stay when you visit this city, thanks to Hyatt legacy this hotel posses gold standard of 5-star service. One thing that I feel a bit uncomfortable is when I was upgraded the room itself is smoking-room type and left unpleasant smell of smoke and i brought my own air refresher but still the significant smell cannot be removed, but other than that the breakkie the swimming pool the recreation area are still amazing!
Trans: Family friendly.. the pool is very suitable for kids, because the water is warm, and there is a sand near swimimg pool.the room is si cozy and the staff is friendly.. Just take 1 minutes walk to mall, xdefinitely will come back..

White_Charter: Starting from Bandung city center on Braga, I took shared tour on Toyota TRD with other 5 persons.what a long ride for just40kms!!!there was highway contruction on the way to this attraction and its holidays after Ramadan. At the level about 2400++above sea level, It' s very…
Tangkuban_Perahu: tangkuban perahu was repeatedly touted as a a must-visit, when we were planning our bandung visit. so we headed up to North Bandung, the 5 of us....  tip : its Rp200k on weekdays, & Rp300k on weekends (and crowded we were told). so you go thru an alley lined with shops, selling…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a nice place with good scenery..we went to this place on the last day of December 2016. They have a restaurant with various of food choices and they also have some playground for the kids
Saung_Angklung: During our visit, there was a puppeteer performing a wooden puppet drama, traditional dance, a traditional celebration as well as a mask dance. There was also a mini angklung performance and an angklung massal nusantara performance that showcases the dances and costumes of…
Ciater: During our visit, there was a puppeteer performing a wooden puppet drama, traditional dance, a traditional celebration as well as a mask dance. There was also a mini angklung performance and an angklung massal nusantara performance that showcases the dances and costumes of…
YELLO: Personally I enjoy my stay here. Very good location and good service. The room is clean and spacious. However the internet speed and the picture quality of the tv channel is not so good. Need to upgrade about that.
Aryaduta: Location in the city center and direct access to the mall. Swimming pool is big enough. Formerly known as Hyatt Aryaduta, the hotel still serving with high level quality. Need to upgrade toilet amenities
Trans: We have great experience having meeting at The Trans Luxury Hotel. The interior is great, the hospitality is very nice and the food are excellent!!! Would recommend this place to family and friends!!!

White_Charter: Very nice view. To get up there you have to pay at gate. If you have low budget you can use shuttle service  Pay 150k for parking and 20k each adult to get into top. Crater about 5km away from entrance gate with super climbing. Prepare your car  Some locals will insist to tell…
Tangkuban_Perahu: While there are many comments on the ticket prices to the attraction. It is worth a visit, however please avoid weekend and start your journey early by 7 am from Bandung Town. The ticket charge is a tourist revenue to maintain the attraction. The view is scenic and the journey…
Dusun_Bambu: You need to take 6 people food package minimum to eat over here. price itself quite expensive but expected at this kind of places. but compared price to food taste is one thing i can tell its not worth the price and not worth the view. you will rent like small bamboo houses in…
Saung_Angklung: This place is the best education for studying anything about angklung. Angklung is originally Indonesia traditional bamboo music instruments (UNO/PBB). They also provide gift shop, F&B and angklung perform. They have two times perform. Don't came here when school holiday.
Ciater: This place is the best education for studying anything about angklung. Angklung is originally Indonesia traditional bamboo music instruments (UNO/PBB). They also provide gift shop, F&B and angklung perform. They have two times perform. Don't came here when school holiday.
YELLO: Good location , easy to get food , just beside the newest mall in Bandung .In the evening , you can take a walk to Pascal Square which serve alot of food . Very near from the railway station ,  around 5 minutes to the station.Room also very clean  since it s is still very new hotel
Aryaduta: Very impressed with the staffing.Especially the reception staff. The ability communication in English.  Staff went extra mile helping me with small problems such as wifi, power supply in the room. Few minutes settled. Next to shopping complexs. You can get everything there
Trans: I enjoyed my visit to Trans Luxury Hotel to attend a workshop with colleagues. The meeting facilities is maervelous, especially for its coffee break menu, very delicious and recommended, I love Trans Luxury Bakso and the pastries. So, everything is on point, well done!

White_Charter: Worth it for foreigner.. I drove my motorcycle with friend from Equador like less than 3hours from Bandung.. And when we are arrived wow we are very happy.. That area has fresh area and as a people who live in crowded area in Bandung we just very enjoyed visit this beautiful…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I am used to pay a foreigner<U+200B>-fee, but paying 10-times as much as the locals do is just a rip-off. What a disgrace ...
Dusun_Bambu: We had a great day during our visit to Dusun Bambu. The place was nice. The food was a little bit pricey but worth for the price.
Saung_Angklung: I dont want to give too much away because one has to experience it to believe it. This is not just any angklong performance, it is literally a life changing experience. Before going, I was thinking...would I be able to sit through this...Believe me, you will enjoy every minute…
Ciater: I dont want to give too much away because one has to experience it to believe it. This is not just any angklong performance, it is literally a life changing experience. Before going, I was thinking...would I be able to sit through this...Believe me, you will enjoy every minute…
YELLO: As we know that sometimes budget hotel diminish the comfort of the bed and also the room space.In Yello, I found out that the bed is comfy and the room is also spacious. The amenities must need to be completed at the bathroom.
Aryaduta: I was in bandung with my husband and daughter for holiday,we stayed in this hotel for 1 night,the room was very spacious,clean and tidy,(eventhough the hairdryer is a bit old fashion) ,the staff are friendly,check in and check out was fast,perfect locations,we love it..!!I will certainly be staying here again..keep it up..Thank you so much
Trans: I spent two nights here for a business trip and i must say that everything was excellent. The location of the hotel is quite close to my other destination, and being exactly next to a mall is also a plus point.   I had two days mind-consuming workshop and thankfully their coffee break came to the rescue and it was diverse and very tasty.   to be honest it was all i can remember from my workshop yesterday LOL.  I would definetely recommend this hotel to others having a business trip.

White_Charter: We had a wonderful time scrolling and taking picture at the crater. The kids love the color of the crater . Cooling nice. There is a lot of photographer around .A photoshot with a copy printed out cost only $2 SGD. Its really make our trip more worthwhile.
Tangkuban_Perahu: A foreign person "Bule" pays 200.000 rupiah while a native Indonesian only pays 20.000 rupiah. With a family you easily pay 40€ + just to use the badly serviced street that goes up the mountain. I recommend to go to white crater instead. It's much cheaper and you get a lot…
Dusun_Bambu: My boyfriend took me to this place gor my birthday secret getaway. We spend an afternoon having lunch by the beautiful lake.. then ride a doughnut on the lake and enjoying the beauty of its surroundin for 15minutes.. after that, we explore the area next to the food court which I…
Saung_Angklung: Was here for the angklung show, had expected it to be boring but  turned out to be very enjoying  and fun instead.  Not only  we we entertained by the performance but we we taught how to read notes and play the angklung. The MC was very knowledgeable and knows very well to…
Ciater: Was here for the angklung show, had expected it to be boring but  turned out to be very enjoying  and fun instead.  Not only  we we entertained by the performance but we we taught how to read notes and play the angklung. The MC was very knowledgeable and knows very well to…
YELLO: Great facilities and staff. Staff keep greet customers with 'Selamat Pagi'. What are good welcoming to Hotel and BandungCleanliness are good. They provide smokers rooms.Everything in good condition and comfort.
Aryaduta: Love to stay here. The location is strategic, easy to reach the famous Merdeka street and Braga street. The room was nice, clean, comfortable. This is one of the hotels I know that has clean and white towels. Mind you, usually most hotels (even the 4 star hotel) have worn-out towels. Breakfast was good. What I love the most is how excellence the services from all the staffs, from security officers, concierge, front desk, house keeping. All are super friendly and helpful. Thank you for making my stay enjoyable.
Trans: Got a chance to visit this hotel again for half day workshop. The boardroom have high ceiling, comprehensive meeting tools, mouth-watering coffee break menu, and the butler always stand by to help us. I kinda miss this place a lot and quite surprise that every corner still felt the same, the cleanliness, the service, the luxury ambiance, and the people. Good job trans, see you on top

White_Charter: We went here by renting a car for 12 hours (we went not just here but also to a tea plantation, gedang state, museum of geology, and rumah mode).   The trip to Ciwidey where Kawah Putih and Walini tea plantation are situated has costed us 4 hours of travel time. However, it is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's not our first time visit, we love to take pictures here. It's a legendary sulfur well where always nice to visit again and again.  Nothing much different spot still remain the same. Just add another new building at the top spot. The food vendors, souvenir man still there to…
Dusun_Bambu: Relaxing garden with all kinds of bambu, beautiful flowers in naure setting. Playground for children, rowing in the lake, excellent restaurant.
Saung_Angklung: We are very pleased with the show, very nice and well done. The ticket price is reasonable. If you visit Bandung, highly recommended to visit this place.  The gift shop and restaurant also good and price also reasonable.
Ciater: We are very pleased with the show, very nice and well done. The ticket price is reasonable. If you visit Bandung, highly recommended to visit this place.  The gift shop and restaurant also good and price also reasonable.
YELLO: Love it, great for staycation, great for family, near to the mall, great hospitality, good crew hotel, great for shopping, good facility, we will back again next time, please upgrade the breakfast, overall excellent
Aryaduta: Got upgraded to Suite, but unfortunately they only had King bed configuration available (I prefer to have twin beds configuration). Living room, bedroom and bath room are big and spacious. There are separate shower & tub in the bath room. The room is clean, however you can see & feel that the hotel is quite old from the furniture appearance. Hotel location is very close to the mall (Bandung Indah Plaza) and this gave access to shopping outlet, supermarket and food court. Across the road there are cake/bakery shop and book shop. Breakfast is palatable, nothing special to be mentioned. Overall, I'll recommend this hotel to stay and having proximity to surrounding facilities but not for the breakfast.
Trans: The Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung is One of The Best Hotel in Bandung and the right place to spend time with your family. Nice Place, Nice View, Great Pool and Good Service @Ahmad from Banquet Division.....

White_Charter: We went to Kawah Putih on our two days vacation to Ciwidey.Actually, it was my second visit. My first one was pleasant, the sky was shining bright with minimum cloud coverage. The latest one was so unfortunate because it was raining. The fog also covered most of the view.  Apart…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Famous place between Bandung and Subang City, cheap entrance ticket for local people, better use by own car to get here, has one of nice weather, able to take pictures and love the story. Thanks
Dusun_Bambu: This place was so much fun and a lots of attractions for children. They have a place rabbits wonderland ( i forgot the name :D ) the kids can give foods to the rabbits and play with them.  they were cute rabbits and quite big one  My kids were so happy to play with them also…
Saung_Angklung: This show provided a taste of the Indonesian culture with the various performances from angklung to puppet shows and traditional dances from different regions in Indonesia. The children that performed were very cute and pleasant to watch. The show itself was also very…
Ciater: This show provided a taste of the Indonesian culture with the various performances from angklung to puppet shows and traditional dances from different regions in Indonesia. The children that performed were very cute and pleasant to watch. The show itself was also very…
YELLO: My stay was great, smooth checkin & checkout. Just that the internet connection very poor, lagging & connection always cutoff. Recommend to improves on the internet connection. Breakfast was good, all food taste delicious. Overall room is clean and comfortable.
Aryaduta: The lobby is great, have a good ambiance. The room was spacious, worth the price. But the parking lot was a bit complicated, we had several issues with the parking ticket, however you can use valet parking to avoid such things. The room service was dissapointment for me. I've called several times but no answer, my room didn't get make up while I'm out (i did hang the "please make up my room" signage on the door). The kids playground was ordinary, and there is no petting zoo as stated on their instagram. However, there are public parks around the hotel by walk distance.
Trans: All was perfect and this my first time enjoying some food at Trans Hotel Bandung during my business meeting. Great breakfast with beautiful amosphere and nice swimming pool. A big thanks to the staff who give me a good information. Mas Agung with the team Ayus, Hostess, etc. also was great and very helpful. I will definitely come back with my family. See you <U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D>  Good luck !

White_Charter: We visited this place after reading reviews from TripAdvisors. The entrance per pax is 50 000 rupiahs plus if u decide to drive up another 150 000 rupiahs per vehicle. Alternatively you can take their transport. A van accommodating up to 12 pax costing bout 13 000 rp…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The only advantage of Tangkuban Perahu is that you can drive to the top which is also its main disadvantage. Yes you can see the sulphur fumes, the burnt trees from the last eruption, etc. etc. but the feeling of volcano is just not there. Not like Bromo or Ijen anyways.
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is a little secret outside Bandung waiting to be discovered… and better only quite soon after you quickly visit this place having read my review.   The place aims to bring back childlike wonder of rural living but with modern comforts and amenities.   The initial…
Saung_Angklung: You haven't visit this one. Great performances from the kids, traditional dance. And the special one is we can play angklung directly on site, and they teach us for that. We didn't know each other, but when we play angklung together, it just like a family. Cheers up together,…
Ciater: You haven't visit this one. Great performances from the kids, traditional dance. And the special one is we can play angklung directly on site, and they teach us for that. We didn't know each other, but when we play angklung together, it just like a family. Cheers up together,…
YELLO: Stay during weekend and overall stay was satisfying. Decent room, good pressure hot shower and breakfast was ok. Room cleanliness could improve as I still found some hair scattered around the room. Since its above 23 paskal mall meaning it's convenient to get food or groceries. Would I stay again...Yes
Aryaduta: I always stay at this hotel whenever I visit Bandung since 2016. This time me and my family booked 2 connecting rooms.
