We couldn't be happier when we see the connecting rooms is actually not like most hotels. It's more to two adjoining rooms with one main entrance. Each rooms still get privacy but the kids can happily running and playing from one room to another room without having to open the door. The hotel is always try their best to accommodate our request. My previous visit, the hotel was ready with the baby cot in only half an hour after my request. This time, my baby is already 11 months old, so I prefer to have him co-sleep with me rather than in the cot (he is too big for the hotel cot anyway). Also the hotel is ready to provide me with extra towels (as I have two kids…
Trans: Good service, great venue for meering, events, etc.. fast response especially from Pak Ahmad Banquet. Thank you for the service, soon we'll be held event in this place again.. never disappointed <U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D><U+0001F44D>

White_Charter: His real name is Patoha Crater, but more commonly known as White Crater of Bandung. Took almost 3 hours from Bandung City. Please bring your own face mask, a relatively high sulfur content may make you breathless
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is a must do if visiting the area but at all costs avoid weekends. It costs 300000 rupiah per person with no reduction for kids. 1.2 million for a family of 4 then you have to add parking Locals pay 30000 so the tourist is ripped off by paying 10 times the local rate. If…
Dusun_Bambu: The overall ambience, climate and amenities in Dusun Bambu provides an ideal place for families with little kids. Playground, greenery, parks and a couple of good restaurants.
Saung_Angklung: A very enjoyable show with good interaction with the audiences! Strongly recommended for everyone! You will love it!
Ciater: A very enjoyable show with good interaction with the audiences! Strongly recommended for everyone! You will love it!
YELLO: Please fix the breakfast, if you make a fried rice dont use vegetables.. And also fresh milk should be cold.. The other is internet connection was very horrible.. Signal ver bad, and cant watch youtube or playing game..Hope you fix it soon.. thanks
Aryaduta: event the building is not new but the rooms have been restored and bed is in good condition. We felt comfortable to stay overnight at Aryaduta Hotel in Bandung. We'll recommend our friend of this hotel.
Trans: my review of this hotel is, the pool is amzing we can swim all the time because the  water of the pool is warm. amazing...and the bed was large. the mosque is near from the hotel, so we can pray at the mosque

White_Charter: We spent about 3 hrs to go here and I am quite disappointed with it.  Definitely it did not satisfy our expectation at all.  I can see that the supporting facility is very minimum and this place is not organized at all.  First the place to eat in the entrance is quite bad…

YELLO: This hotel is very nice place to stay. Strategic location, very nice staff and good dishes. Clean room and comfortable condition. Hot water is available,everything is very good here. The hotel is beside mall and near to station so it's very easy to find any item you need.
Aryaduta: During parking we are expecting that many security can help us to point the correct direction since it was minus direction on the basement. No one was there until i have to park in mall basement we did not find any differences so i just park and luckily i asked to one of the security and he told me if i park there then i have to pay. What the.....so he offers me to appoint the correct direction and pay the ticket for us. (the great security names is mr. Satria) .  when we first arrived to the room . water is not flowing we have to call someone to fix them. and before he comes the water runs but it was very dirty. and someone comes to tell us to flush down several times. the internet was very slow and most of the times are not working. and breakfast is the highest dissapoinment,…
Trans: It was the best hotel in Bandung especially if want to stay with your kids during the rainy season because they have heated pool. The room and the bathroom is big. The breakfast had many choices and taste good. The staff were friendly and helpfull. The location is next to the mall with many restaurant, movie theater and indoor theme park. The price is worth for the value. I definetly will back to stay at this hotel.

White_Charter: It was kind of sulfur lake at the mountain, good thing for ur knowledge and selfie ... but u cannot stay there for long time, the guide told us 15 minutes only ...

Dusun_Bambu: There's not much activities but this place has nice design (flower garden, restaurants). We choose to walk instead of taking the free shuttle van, we enjoyed the view but we got lost so we had to go back down to take the shuttle van because we couldn't find any restaurants. They…
Saung_Angklung: This was the first time, I come to Saung Udjo (I lived in Bandung).  They introduced some of Sundanese art, such as music, dancing, wayang golek and off course angklung. It was a nice experience, to have this in Bandung, just like in Bali. At last they ask us to play angklung,…

YELLO: Best location. 24 hr check in/out staff. 24 hr open for dining area. Friendly. Good space for room. Warm and happy. Large space at lobby and cozy.Need to improve room cleanliness. Exactly on Paskal 23 Hypersquare mall which is very good. Close to Train station and airport. Estimation time if there is no traffic jam is 20 minutes to airport.
Aryaduta: Clean and comfortable for room but I stay 2 persons housekeeping set small towel just only 1 piece when contact reception that helpful too much. Hotel location good to find out some local restaurant or shopping mall or department store. Well worth to visit :)
Trans: Great hotel and perfect location , room wide and clean very attentive staff .Thank to team at Club lounge they are so friendly especially for Andri, Habib Bagas and Dimas  thank you for hospitality service and give me some useful information to explore my experience during stay  I do really enjoy during stay and definitely gonna be come back when I had change to visit Bandung again

White_Charter: Took a 2 hours drive here from Bandung. The entrance fee is quite expensive and the road condition into the crater should be maintained time to time. Bad condition.  The crater offers breathtaking views and we were lucky that the weather was good then.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was great 2 hours drive from city as bad traffic.reah the peak did usual touristy things n get surrounded by buch of berries and stuff sellers.end up goin down with a phrase from my son 'i saw a volcano!'. Worth a drive up but be ready with the ticket price,its up to you to…
Dusun_Bambu: At the time...I was with friends  tickets....whew...what a long line...and then another 15 mins to wait for the shuttle?!!! Na ah....we opted to just walk across the rice field and the bamboo decorated road....this was where the fun started....I quite recommend doing this rather…
Saung_Angklung: We went to the Angklung show based on the great reviews given on Tripadvisor. True enough this place was a blast. Even my 80 year old mom acknowledge it saying it was the highlight of our trip in Bandung. My little ones enjoyed the opportunity given to all audiences to play the…

YELLO: My first time Hotel in Paskal, very inspire and creative landscape when came to this hotel, the breakfast, wok'tok new concept of order take to room without plate, the swimming pool, view to the road. But the room quite small in 612, but still ok to me.
Aryaduta: The hotel is old but still comfortable. Room rate is not very expensive yet the room is still spacious. The only thing we don’t like about Aryaduta is the parking space. No card or any identification for staying guest, which I think leads to very high occupancy of the parking space. There is valet service though (at an extra cost).
Trans: If you want to stay in Bandung with your family with kids especially during the rainy season then this hotel is sure be the best choice.  The price is worth with the value. Breakfast had a lot of choice with great taste. The room and the bathroom is big enough. The staff are friendly and so helpful. There is nothing you can complain about this hotel. I'm sure always be back to this hotel.

White_Charter: If you love nature & photography, it's must visit place. Starting with entrance gate: you can see the entry ticket price. Foreigners must pay double than Indonesian. You can park near the crater or park about 5 km then take public car. Both ways have price list. It's part of…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Such a beautiful scenery. The sulfur smell was so heavy, but it was worth it. Lots of steps to walk and lots of small shops to buy souvenirs along the path. We were there on Sunday, so the site was full with local tourist. We would prefer to come during weekdays if we had known…
Dusun_Bambu: More enjoyable if you come on weekday. Great view, great ambience, have a lot food variety but the price quite expensive. There's a playground and rabbit labyrinth kids would love.
Saung_Angklung: Perfect. So much fun playing Angkling. We were the only two bule in the audience and they did the moderation in English just for us.  Do not go if you hate kids. Go if you want to see children from underpriviledged families show all their talent, joy and creativity - it gives…

YELLO: Fresh, cool n yello...I like the ambience I like the styleI like the crewI like the viewI like the taste of foodMy kiddos loved the view from room, they could see plan n train. Yess, we were happy spending time @yello
Aryaduta: The hotel is close to the shopping center,  friendly staff,  clean and nice swimming pool. My kids were happy durung stay in Aryaduta.  We walk around the place and so close to the mosque for moslem,  close to the Bandung Electorinic center.
Trans: The Service Was EXCLEENT Andri is atantive for helping us with Handsome and Service from Heart,and I never met The Supervisor Very friendly and clam,, I am Very happy with food is excellent seafood service. And If you come to restaurant enjoy 18th is Very good view

White_Charter: Lovely view when not raining..as we went there on weekend its supercrowded.Its raining and foggy at the same time but managed to take few charming photos..The journey back to the city which almost take 2 hours but its takes us 5 hours !! because of the traffic jam...
Tangkuban_Perahu: We went there on a weekend and I must say there are more sellers than tourist itself. The entrance fee for locals is only IDR30k while as foreigners we had to pay IDR300k which is 10 times the price. The only thing you can do there is to take pictures and enjoy the scenery. We…
Dusun_Bambu: It was raining not long after we arrived, so there's not much to explore. The place is really big, and there's an internal transportation called Wara-Wiri connecting 3 pick up points within the park. From the first glance I can tell that the place was really good with some…
Saung_Angklung: Nice performance from the local kids, you can also learn the traditional music. I also recommended the souvenir shop. Must visit!
Ciater: Nice performance from the local kids, you can also learn the traditional music. I also recommended the souvenir shop. Must visit!
YELLO: Over all is excellent, staff are nice and friendly with good attitude, but d room didn’t have any hairdryer so we need to call the housekeeping for that and only for 2 hours. And the internet connection is bad.
Aryaduta: The check-in process was too long. On the check-out day, we have to pay much money for the parking fee as the front officer who took care of our check-out told us false information. Such a waste. The parking lot is tricky as the building is in one complex with Bandung Indah Plaza Mall, which is good for entertainment but not good for extra cost it may cause.  The room is pretty good but somehow less sound proof.
Trans: Nice staff, Good services, All good things for this Hotel, no complain, we will back next time with my daughter for leisure, i very enjoy & have a new experiences during stay in The Trans Luxury Hotel

White_Charter: Being our first visit to Bandung, we inquired about places of interest in Bandung and Kawah Putih was one of the places recommended. From our hotel in town, the cab took about 2 hours to reach there.  Kawah Putih is a dormant volcanic crater formed by the eruption of Mount…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Closest you can get to a volcano. Avoid weekends and for the trek please wear proper shoes and protect yourself from rains.
Dusun_Bambu: Love this place, the ambience, the view and the activity. This place is perfect for any age. We have an afternoon stroll enjoying the lake and the view, then tried the donut boat, feeding the fish and have lunch at Burarang Restaurant. My kids love the playground. The place is…
Saung_Angklung: It was a very interesting experience for my family, especially my 2 children. Getting to know the traditional musical instruments made from bamboo, and enjoying the show. The show is interesting, combining the traditional instruments with modern musical arrangement. and also…
Ciater: It was a very interesting experience for my family, especially my 2 children. Getting to know the traditional musical instruments made from bamboo, and enjoying the show. The show is interesting, combining the traditional instruments with modern musical arrangement. and also…
YELLO: We stayed here for 2 nights and 3 days. Really good location and staff was very friendly. Overall facilities and cleanliness was pretty good and the rooms were perfect. Really enjoyed our stay here and will come back again.
Aryaduta: It was a pleasant stay here. All staff very nice and friendly, they will ask what you need. Spacious and clean room, comfortable bed, great view. Nice bathroom. Breakfast menu is varied and tastes delicious. Very recommended.
Trans: I had a pleasant stay in this hotel. Very nice location, next to a mall where you can find restaurants and cafes, and also walking distance from nearby street food.  Room was big, not the biggest but big, modern, luxurious and neat. Bathroom also nice, one huge bummer was there's no lock to the bathroom. Amenities were also great.  Breakfast was good, many choices, and tasty, only few types of food were bad. LIke cold and moist croissant! Croissant should be thin, crispy, and flaky!  Personally the warm water in the swimming pool was not good at all, because it was a warm day. I prefer to swim in cold pool.  It was a nice stay, nice 5 stars hotel, but no the best...

White_Charter: Strong sulphuric smell. Max allowed near the shore is 15 mins. Water edge visible with yellow sulphur deposits. Took 4 hours from Bandung by car on Sun to reach this place and can view only 15 mins. Terrible jam. Was told weekdays traffic is much better.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Did the usual tourist thing, paid tourist price and went on a Tuesday. Our guide Deidi, was great, we (group of 6) tipped him 300k rp.   If you like having an entourage, this is the place to be! You will be waited upon, treated like a king, as your many followers and subjects…
Dusun_Bambu: very happy while having trip to this spot. like the concept very much. nice view in every single stop. absolutely will be back again
Saung_Angklung: The road to the place..  when the cars come out (after previous show) it was.. so much crowded..  Google map is correct.  but I was constantly suspicious until I have arrived in the performance.  The first section, a puppet show,  it is a little scary for little foreign kids.  …

YELLO: Located beside the 23 Paskal mall, this hotel is in a good locations for the first timer like me. It’s not too far from the Alun-Alun (2,6km south of the hotel) and also PVJ (3km north of the hotel). Could be said that this place has an easy access to everywhere in the city. Excellent service by all the friendly staffs, including the security officers who always helped me during my stays. The only thing concerned me that they’re not providing you a shower cap which is pretty important for women and also no fridge in my room, but everything else was fine.
Aryaduta: All staff very helpful from reception, housekeeping, waiter, poll attendance.  Service very Excellent the location is superb....next to famous mall Bandung Indah Plaza  there is circle k in front of hotel Thanks to Mr Stevie for helping us
Trans: Everytime I came back to this hotel, feels like coming home.. the staff is so friendly, I always been treated well at all part of the hotel , from the receptionist, the welcome drink that always come to my room, the concierge staff, the housekeeping, all are nice and friendly. The breakfast varieties, the pool.. Love it !  Thank you the Trans for making  my stay memorable..

White_Charter: Visited during labour day weekend.. a big mistake. People everywhere, basically shoving your way through the crowd.. nonetheless, the crater still exuded its mystical ethereal like beauty.. Highly recommended but NOT on long weekends!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Priceless View, and fresh air everywhere. I love the facility add by Goverment Mosque, nice Shelter, Parking area etc. Cheap Entry ticket. If you want to get Free Oxygen come here.
Dusun_Bambu: forest alike, a small lake with villas to rent. fresh and cool air, suitable for relaxing. there are some restaurants with local food.
Saung_Angklung: It was worth the drive over.  I brought my elderly parents.  They loved it. Don't miss this show while in bandung.  Very reasonably priced : Rp 60,000 for locals and Rp 100,000 for foreigners. Go for the 3.30pm session as it has English introductions. Arrive at least 1 hour…

Aryaduta: I stayed there for 7 days and I used golden bird taxi. But I could not charge my taxi fee to my room. It was very inconvenient for me because I have to prepar cash every day. I used to use 13th floor lounge when I stayed there but no more service available in there it was also very inconvenient for me
Trans: Everthing good and ok. Room big and have bathtub.nice view.Good pool. And the water is warm.Not really like the breakfast. The selection of the foods. I really enjoy staying here.Thank you so much.

Dusun_Bambu: relax time for family..we spent our weekends here and very nice view...silent and the weather is good ..escape from busy city ...
Saung_Angklung: We were meant to go on a countryside trek, but due to bad weather that day, our friends booked us a visit here instead, as an itinerary program replacement. It was a surprise and it was great! Enjoyed our time listening to and watching the young performers and participating in…
Ciater: We were meant to go on a countryside trek, but due to bad weather that day, our friends booked us a visit here instead, as an itinerary program replacement. It was a surprise and it was great! Enjoyed our time listening to and watching the young performers and participating in…
YELLO: I spent 3 weeks in Bandung for business trip and I spent these 3 weeks in 8 different hotels, accros Hotel Brands: Kagum Group (Zodiak, Serela, Grand Serela, Gino Feruci), Topotels (Vio), Meize, Accola (Fabu) and Tauzia (Yello).   I managed to stay 1 night at Yello Hotel, I must say that Yello Hotel provided best services that have been performed by their staff compared than the other 7 hotels that I stayed. The staff is not only young and energetic - but you can immediately feel their genuine & humble hospitaility from the first time you interact with them.   - I arrived in the evening and the security genuinely welcomed and greeted me and helped to open the door then gave short explaination about the lobby location and directed me to the elevator.  - The front desk staff is…
Aryaduta: Clean, Tidy and spacious room, well maintained property. Location is the best, the shopping mall is on the same place, so dont need to run around for grocery or food. Staff are friendly, polite and always willing to help.
Trans: I always had wonderful stay at Trans Resort Bali and so I decided to try Trans Luxury Bandung last week for a girls weekend. .  At check-in, we requested for access to Club facilities and was given at a reasonable premium by the friendly lady at the front office.  After the welcome drink and cold towel, we went up to our room. As we opened the door, we just love the luxurious room from the decor, the furniture, linens, bathroom to the toiletries. Everything was faultless.   After unpacking, we then continued to the Club Lounge on 18th floor for high tea.  There were light local and western light foods.  We did not have too much as dinner would be served on the same floor from 5 to 7pm.   We then went to the Trans Mall next to the hotel.  We passed Arsa, the boutique selling…

White_Charter: It's a bit messy cause the price were a bit pricy even for the local tourist. But still worth the view.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is our first time here in Tangkuban Perahu. We expect a lot before came here because this place is really famous, but the view isn't exactly meet our expectation. When we arrived, the fog almost covered up the mountain so we only got to enjoy the view just not more than 30…
Dusun_Bambu: The place is big, it supposed to have lot of attraction, but most of them are still coming soon or in process. But it is a great place for refreshing seeing a lot of greens, great for people who are looking for a walk in park, escaping for work for a while to refresh mind and…

YELLO: I really love the design, it's very present...but there is one thing that I think is unsafe, there is a part behind the bed that can cause someone to get hurt because of that part, my child  collides but does not cause injury...warning sign or added soft material will be very useful
Aryaduta: We stayed in Aryaduta Bandung for 2 nights.. The hotel is quite old in terms of decoration and furnitures...  There are 2 things that surprised us..  Firstly, the quality of the food is extremely improved.. We enjoy the breakfast buffet very well...  Secondly, the staffs are very polite and sincere... We would like to appreciate Stevie and Steve at the restaurant for giving excellent services during our breakfast..
Trans: Stay here for annual meeting for two nights. The staff was really nice and helpful. The room itself was amazing. They also add personal touch by adding our name into TV greetings. The breakfast menu was huge and various. Every dish were carefully prepared and taste delicious.

White_Charter: If u never been to any site like this, then u will appreciate Kawah Putih.   Pro - beautiful, nice cameraman option (pay and print on the spot) Cons - cant stay too long because of the sulphur. If you have any health issue, suggest to go there less than 15minutes.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This attraction is on highland Lembang , just 1 hour and half by motorcycle. Going on weekend is nightmare because a lot of traffic both locals and tourists. MOREOVER blood shedding ticket price for tourists:300000Rp plus vehicle fee ( upon car or motorcycle , can be bikes.)the…

YELLO: There's a shopping mall with some notable brands (H&M, Zara, Sephora, etc.) just right below of the hotel. There's also an entertainment corner (Xbox 360, etc.) at the lobby area that located just right beside of the elevators. Swimming pool is just opposite the restaurant which serves breakfast. The room is clean and tidy but it doesn't have refrigerator. The bathroom has shower head only. The staffs are really friendly and helpful.
Aryaduta: Nice stay at Aryaduta Bandung, friendly staff, strategic location (near from BIP mall), free parking at hotel. Easy to find "kuliner" place near from the hotel. For pray, Masjid Al-Ikhlas very near only 200 m.
Trans: I stay from 26 into 27 oct 2018 everything is excellent at 22.00 when i want to sleep suddenly there is lady fighting crying loudly next to our room in 14th floor ... we wait for 5 minutes not stop and keep going so we decide to press stars .. and complain is accepted and they offer to us to give rooms in the corner more spacious at the same floor thanks to bu lia and her teammates though we are sleepy we decided to move out ... we really enjoy and stay at trans luxury .. if we have 10.00 rating we will give to them.

White_Charter: The view was decent. A good spot for those who have not seen a crater before. The sulphur smell was bearable, although our throats started to itch 20 minutes later.   The attraction is supposed to be near the city but due to the amount of traffic, it took us 2.5 hours to reach…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Typical spot for tourist when visiting Bandung. Ambient up here was good but not as expected. So many sellers approaching and promoting their products but if you don't want to be followed, ignore it but do it politely. Temperature and weather is quite chilly and breezy, so bring…
Dusun_Bambu: Chaotic food court. Crappy service from foodstall. Non refundable coupon is the only accepted payment. There's only a handful of activity that can be done here beside eat and taking photos. For lunch/dinner I recommend the burangrang or purbasari, avoid pasar khatulistiwa/the…
Saung_Angklung: Everybody knows Angklung, a traditional music instrument made if bamboo, frim west java. Akready exported to many countries and even their orchestra has been performed overseas.
Ciater: Everybody knows Angklung, a traditional music instrument made if bamboo, frim west java. Akready exported to many countries and even their orchestra has been performed overseas.
YELLO: The hotel is located at Paskal Hyper Square, next to Paskal 23 Mall. Just 5 minutes to get to Chinatown and Paskal Food Market, also near from Bandung Train Station, Pasar Baru Trace Center. The room is clean and comfortable enough
Aryaduta: A nice express lunch at Aryaduta's Restaurant right before leaving Bandung. Chef Anton's cooking creation is good, but i still prefer their Tiramisu and Black Forest from their Cinnamon Pastry Boutique since i do prefer sweets rather a heavy lunch.  it's not that lousy inside the restaurant too even though we are right next to a crowded road. Friendly service, overall a nice experience.
Trans: the room was spacious, we loved the cookies and mixed peanuts that serve on our room. my kiddos super love with the kids club and the pool. suggest to take the king bed room because they have sofa on the room.

White_Charter: This place has a beautifull and amazing scenic. The crater is big. It was crowded when we were there. We only spend about 10 minuites there. Use your mask to avoid the smell. I suggest you to go there before 10 am so you can enjoy the view.

Dusun_Bambu: It has a really nice view! The weather is cool and everything looks good. The restaurants and parks.  Talking about food, you should eat somewhere else. It's kind of expensive and it doesn't taste that good. So it doesn't worth your money. There's not much to visit. 3…

Trans: We stay for 1 night here, and we are very happy with this hotel... they got a lot of kids activity...the kids club is good and they sell ice cream inside of their kids club, but the beach in the pool was the one attracted us to stay here, kids love to play sand on their pool beach. Trans: nice staying, breakfast was so good, services provided was good, enjoy while staying there. they concern to detail to satisfy the customer. the ambience was great, only few minute to shopping mall and entertainment and all can be reached by foot.

Aryaduta: When in Bandung, i love to stay in this hotel. the place is near to train station and has a beautifull view. i like doing exercise in the morning and the gym already open at 6:00 am. breakfast is a must for people like me, so i really enjoy breakfasting there, the services is excelent.
Trans: We had four nights stay here with our dad and kids. A great bonding time. The Hotel staffs are very well experience dan always attentitive to guests need. Having my dad with a wheel chair we choose this hotel for comfort and its location beside a great mall. The room housekeeping is superb and pool facilities for the kids are lovely. It has pool with sands too. Breakfasts choices are great and we had the pleasure to go a dine at the 18th Floor Club Lounge. Great view and again the staffs are great and very helpful. A special thanks to Pak Teddy (18th Floor manager) for his warm services and some magic tricks to the kids. An absolute great choice to stay in Bandung

It was bold and yummy.Can't say I experienced the same during my breakfast at Yello Paskal Bandung, yet the Rendang Fried Rice I had was bold and yummy.The major things of a good hotel was accomplished very well by Yello Paskal, it's just the little things that annoyed me a bit.The room was clean, it just had a faint smell of a newly painted room.The TV channel was equipped with minimum channel and had a bad picture quality on the TV, it kinda hurt my eyes.And this hotel didn't had a Gym... the one in Yello Harmoni, so I kinda had…

Trans: Hotel with beautiful classic touch, great service, Friendly staffs and Fast response. Was staying for 2 night in club premiere room. The room are spacious and very clean. the bed are big and comfortable. The room amenities are amazing!!  The bathroom also spacious and clean, but unfortunately the shower room’s door has bad design, the water always leaked out from shower room after i took shower.  The pool looks so amazing. The Breakfast are buffet; superb, delicious, full range and good quality. The hotel location is in outskirt of city but its fine because the hotel is next to big mall and connected to trans studio with free ticket   Overall, this hotel is recommended. Definitely will comeback soon.

White_Charter: The place is amazing but it is prone to fog which leaves very little visibility. It can be very cold which most people are not prepared for. Would love to come back when there is better visibility.

YELLO: This was a staycation trip I planned with my 4 year old daughter without the husband, so the main reason to choose Yello was its proximity to train station and the shopping malls. It surprised me that with the price we paid, room was sleek and clean and constructed well unlike most budget hotels we've experienced before. We loved the full sized mirror, the all-Amstad washroom and the spacious bedroom with very reasonable price. We would want to come back the next time we plan another Bandung trip. Thank you.
Aryaduta: It was a pleasant stay at Aryaduta. Room is quite generous and spacious, typical hotel built in the 80s. The lobby is, let's say, elegant. The hotel is family friendly, they provided us with free and clean baby cot for our 9month old baby. The hotel itself has facilities such as swimming pool, sauna steam bath amd jacuzzi, close to all facilities (walking distance) such as shops amd shopping centers (such as Riau Junction where we easily bought vegetable and fruit puree for our baby), street vendors, even children hospital. However, some parts of the hotel need renovation (such as gym and wellness area, some doors at the corridors, ceiling in the breakfast bar,...). But overall, it was a nice and comfortable stay.
Trans: friendly service, good facilities, comfortable beds and a swimming pool that is very attractive for children .... must come here when you go to Bandung ... everything is here, just a few steps to the mall ... all facilities are here.

Trans: My wife and I stayed at this hotel during our Bandung holiday. We booked the Club Premiere Room, which is the same room as the Premiere Room, but with Club Lounge Access.  The hotel has made a great impression on us, thanks to its decor, facilities, and great service. It's a beautiful hotel, and the room we stayed in at the 15th floor was top-notch in many ways. They provided complimentary laundry services up to 4 pieces per night (including undergarments), which lessons our after-holiday work to do the laundry!   We also tried out the gym, the sauna and steam rooms. Equipment in these places were of high-quality, and the hotel provides towels and bottled water so it's convenient too for guests. We didn't get to try the free classes though, which takes place almost everyday.  As…

Lobby hotel is located at 4th floor of this shopping mall building. The room is clean and cozy.

Trans: We stay in a club premier room on the 16th floor for four nights from 12.9.18. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. The bathroom was spacious too save the shower door was very badly designed. After shower, water leaked out from the shower room to the adjacent toilet room and bathroom doorway through the door sill. On our first day we were given an apple, some peanuts and cookies but not any more for our second day. I asked a staff why and I was told they only gave it the first day. But their website says it gives daily. In the interest of the hotel, I still told them they have to value their long stay guests rather than just one day’s guests. The club lounge was nice. But the entrance was dangerously elevated with a step that could catch the guests by surprise,…

From train station, it took around 10min. The enterance of hotel is on the right side of mall entrance.  The reception area is on the other floor, so you need to take the lift.  Check-in process was fast. Friendly staff.  The room was clean. Large bed. Cold air-con. Limited aminities  Since i had an early meeting, so i was not really enjoyed the breakfast menu. But for the variety, it was less menu that i could see.   Check out process also great. The staffs were very helpful.  There will be 2nd stay, for sure.

Trans: This hotel is the height of luxury and is accommodating to people of all ages. The room was absolutely stunning and the hotel was very clean. The staff were also very friendly and welcoming which is always great.

Saung_Angklung: Been here during year end schools holiday. It's pack with visitors from locals and overseas. Entrance fee is very affordable. A lot of local schools organized trip to this place for their students. Angklung is a music instruments made from bamboo. It's founding father, Udjo made…

YELLO: only short stay at yello paskal for business trip. Room quite small (for praying at room the space too small). New hotel but looks like this hotel already 2/3 years. Pool quite large enough, bed not real bed but like mattrass protector. We order some food at Room service, the staff was said waiting for 15 minutes but the food was coming for 45 minutes. Simple breakfast, taste average.
Aryaduta: Thank you all services aryaduta team, me and my family trully happy and the room also huge and clean, swimming pool also loveble and the staff was helpfull. Breakfast abit crowded but dont worry, all staff will helping you with care.
Trans: Spend 3 days 2 nights at the hotel for weekend getaway with the children. The room were stunning, makes me feels like home, its so cozy. The layout for the bed and the bath was designed proportionaly.  The kids club and the pool also amazing. I think they give full attention by giving the best for the services but not for the breakfast, i would say the food were so so score. There is nothing special and tasty in the restaurant for the the breakfast.  The location is near the mall and themepark so can just walk towards them. It is also easy to find only using ms. gmaps all by myself.  And overall, it was great.

White_Charter: This is truly a wonderful place to learn about our earth and to enjoy a magical scenery. It has a very big potential as the crater lake is really pretty. However, prepare yourself with poor "traditional" local tourist site management.  Some points to be aware: - Car entrance fee…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Always pampered with the massive crater view, perfectly looks like Windows Wallpaper in real life :).  Instead of the view, they also have local stalls along the way, to sell local souveniers and foods.  Not only Kawah Ratu (Mother Crater) as the tourism object, they also have…
Dusun_Bambu: The only thing we regret coming here was that we didn't allocate enough time, in retrospect, we should have stayed the night and gave the kids 2 full days to enjoy the park.  The activities that we did experience was fun... Archery, animal feeding ... Everything that was fun for…
Saung_Angklung: I never thought that angklung could be a great perfomances. Entrance fee for about 60K. You will be experienced a traditional perfomances from angklung performed by mostly sundanese kids that also play some traditional songs from some area in Indonesia. Angklung is traditional…
Ciater: I never thought that angklung could be a great perfomances. Entrance fee for about 60K. You will be experienced a traditional perfomances from angklung performed by mostly sundanese kids that also play some traditional songs from some area in Indonesia. Angklung is traditional…
YELLO: Hotel is clean not sure if it is because the hotel is new or because the hotel maintenance is good. But overall we satisfied of hotel cleanliness. Hotel location very recommended since it's near the mall.
Aryaduta: If you are going to Bandung for business / holiday, and you want to stay in a hotel, in the middle of the town, this is one of the hotel that you can consider.  Located in the heart of Bandung, next to shopping mall and Factory Outlets (Jl. Riau/Aceh), surely give you easy access to food & shopping.  :)  Check-in process smoothly, of course with a normal procedure where they validated your payment etc.  There was a concierge service that assist you to bring your belonging to your room.  The room was tidy enough, with some exception, sometimes you might get a bath robe and sometimes you don't.  The hotel towel although it's smell soap, dry & clean, you might find some marking of prior user.  The swimming pool was our family main entertainment.  It's clean, less chlorine (not…
Trans: I love this hotel cause easy access by car from jakarta , just exit to buah batu gate n then not crowded into this street. You will feel atmospher of bandung,most friendly with traditional meals around. This hotel very good service, i like interior as glamour n elegent, quite spacious room for 2 adult n 2 kids with fragrant from acqua de parma. Pool kids with white sand as like at beach.

White_Charter: Entrance ticket for local is 20.000 IDR/person (almost 2 dollar/person) and for international is 50.000 IDR/person (almost 4 dollar). If you bring private car and want to park in lower parking lot, you just need to pay 5.000 IDR/car. After you park, you may continue with ontang…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view was very fantastic, there was souvenir shops, horses to ride, coffee to drink, etc. There was crater to visit, you can have your feet soak in those small pools with high temperature, the water contained sulfur that is good for skin.
Dusun_Bambu: I'm Ardian  Dusun Bambu is very nice place for everyone <U+0001F618> There have restaurant , Villa and many things can do there  And the view also perfect because have lake and traditional House from West Java  Just look my picture :)
Saung_Angklung: This is a must-go place if you wish to understand the local culture better. Not only do they provide traditional musical instrument show, but also traditional dances, ceremonies, and songs from various provinces of Indonesia.  During the show, you get to see how big Indonesia…
Ciater: This is a must-go place if you wish to understand the local culture better. Not only do they provide traditional musical instrument show, but also traditional dances, ceremonies, and songs from various provinces of Indonesia.  During the show, you get to see how big Indonesia…
YELLO: At first I was very happy to stay here, because the location and design were quite interesting, but it turned out that for people who need time with the internet to be over expectation and morning breakfast just average like other hotels nothing specialTq,
Aryaduta: I didn’t read carefully for the check in policy, that I have to show my credit card physically, so I was forced to swipe another card and void the previous transaction. But up until now I didn’t get any update and guarantee how long the refund process will take.
Trans: I noticed that the hotel is nice, the room and services are excellent. I stayed in the deluxe room and it was huge, they provided free parking for the guest who brings a vehicle, so it was all worthy. I consider to have another stay at the hotel if I visit Bandung.

White_Charter: This is the first time I went with my family here. The wind brought a cold season to live right on christmas eve. I took so many shot along with my family. And we were having fun although we cannot do it too long since the sulfur smell was so strong.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This park had been privatised and therefore charges quite high entrance fee. There's a lot of people selling souvenirs and they can be good tour guide/photo taker. Do try the stalls where they serve hot spiced ginger tea (bandrek) and char corn.
Dusun_Bambu: We stayed in the tent for 3 nights. Nice way of taking the children camping without all the work and dirt. Housekeeping, room service and the front office were just a phone call away. Hot shower also provided in the bathroom near to the tent.   We had the staff start the bonfire…
Saung_Angklung: My parents and I have enjoyed the show very much. Well done and keep it up. The souvenir shop sells interesting stuff too.   It would be good if there's a screen to show subtitle for the puppet show. Also, probably need more toilet cubicles for ladies.   The entrance ticket is…
Ciater: My parents and I have enjoyed the show very much. Well done and keep it up. The souvenir shop sells interesting stuff too.   It would be good if there's a screen to show subtitle for the puppet show. Also, probably need more toilet cubicles for ladies.   The entrance ticket is…
YELLO: We were traveling to bandung and looking for budget hotel with kid's swimming pool facility, closest hotel to food market. Planned to stay more than 1 day but weekend rate little bit higher than others. Good breakfast but need more variety with menu.
Aryaduta: I like this hotel. Located in the middle of the city, close to everything we need. Perfect size of rooms, clean and friendly staff. They have gym and swimming pool. They even provided a praying mat when they noticed that I used towel. Just a suggestion to properly maintain the elevators. For the last 2 days of my stay, I had problem getting to my floor. I had come to the reception and reprogram my card, but still had the same issue. And it happened with other people too. So it must have been the elevators. Other than that, it’s a nice hotel
Trans: very good hotel for a family with kids but a bit far from the hang out place and restaurants. over all the hotel is excellent. the next door is the trans studio where the paradise place for the kids. need provide the cash to make kids happy:)

White_Charter: My mother said the place is really hot, so i should wear longsleeves to cover up to avoid tan. i am suprise that upon entering the village, The weather is getting cold and became colder as we get closer to the lake. I am wearing a coat, jeans and shirt. And still, I felt very…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The entrance fee is expensive (IDR200,000) for just 1 crater, if u want to visit the other 2 craters you have to fork out extra $$. Touts everywhere, initially 1 was following us and 2 more followed. They kept offering to take photos for us and say that they are legit tour…
Dusun_Bambu: Awesome place to go for camping. So funny, we were expecting that this would be an ordinary camping but hell no! You have decent toilet in the area and in intercom so you can actually ask for towel or anything you might be needing. We had our camping, had barbecue, roasted some…
Saung_Angklung: Anyone travelling to Bandung should watch this show. It gives you a quick and entertaining cultural experience. You even get a lesson or two on playing the angklung! Additionally, while only the 3.30pm session has the English speaking emcee, it will be perfectly fine to attend…
Ciater: Anyone travelling to Bandung should watch this show. It gives you a quick and entertaining cultural experience. You even get a lesson or two on playing the angklung! Additionally, while only the 3.30pm session has the English speaking emcee, it will be perfectly fine to attend…
YELLO: big  size, but only for door at bathroom has some noise sound like a mouse. the wall color is nice, yellow is good color for funny, charming, energy feeling. AC is good, clean is best, and no smoke smell, is good for us
Aryaduta: We love to stay there, the staffs were very nice, very friendly. Nice breakfast,many choices. Big room,comfort, clean and we love the swimming pool. Location is so perfect, we can go shopping to the mall.
Trans: I stayed at The Trans Luxury Hotel for 3 days 2 nights in few days ago. I was following MG Table Top which held in Trans Hotel. I really satisfied during I stayed because of the staff are very friendly and helpful starting from the lobby.   The breakfast is delicious and many variant. Also the good thing is this hotel is located in city centre and I just walked to the Trans Studio Mall, which it is a nearest to our hotel.   This hotel is very clean, completed aminities, great hospitality, and very recommended for all trip purposes.   The last, I am so satisfied and want to back again to this hotel someday.

White_Charter: I visit this place more than twice. Still, the color of the lake amazes me like the first time. It's perfect. Be careful of the sulphur, cover your nose to avoid you from gettin cough and dizzy. I certainly recommend this place.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Just visited Tangkuban Parahu this morning. I think it's only worth the visit of you're local as the entry fee for locals is Rp20k, but for foreigners it's Rp200k! On weekends it's even higher at RP300k and very crowded, from what I hear. Today (Friday) there was still a lot of…
Dusun_Bambu: We visited this place was because we were attracted by their unique bird nests cafe and also we would like to experience the hot air balloon through the website introduction prior to our visit. But we were disappointed that the hot air balloon was no longer in operation and the…
Saung_Angklung: Special place if you're diggin' music, as this place will offer traditional angklung performance, performed by yourself after brief lesson. Fun place and a must go for music lover.
Ciater: Special place if you're diggin' music, as this place will offer traditional angklung performance, performed by yourself after brief lesson. Fun place and a must go for music lover.
YELLO: No hair dryer was provided in the room. When we asked for it, they said not enough to share so we have to wait. They said the next morning will send to us however I m not showering the next morning!!! How can this happened!
Aryaduta: The room was bigger than my expectation, clean, and so comfort with its high ceiling which i really love. My two kids could get enough space to play and still have room for our luggage that is quite a lot.  The location was great because it was near many city attractions.
Trans: Comfortable room with complete amenities, friendly staff with good location.  connected directly with malls and theme park. get free theme park ticket.  breakfast space was a bit tight but lots of foods selections and friendly staff.

White_Charter: Visited this magnifient place on earth. Was really amazed at how beautiful the scenery was. I was not dampened by the rainy weather in fact it helped to reduce the sulphuric smell it had. No regret coming here. I had an enjoyable honeymoon here! <U+0001F44D><U+0001F60A>
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is a popular destination for Bandung visitors. Located some 30km north of Bandung city, this dormant volcano can be reached by car or tourist bus.   Took less than 2 hours to the highlands of Tangkuban Perahu, it depends on traffic. Sights on the way up to…
Dusun_Bambu: I came with with family to this place. There is an admission fee to enter into this place. They have three Main Restaurant, I choose purbasari restaurant, they have nice traditional sundanese food. The restaurant is just like a gazebo on the edge of the lake. It's very nice and…
Saung_Angklung: Angklung is the traditional music instrument that made from bamboo. How to played it? Simply shake it.. This place is one of my favourite places to learn sundanese culture. Everyday at the afternoon, They have a sundanese show and performances from the "arumba" the bamboo band.…
Ciater: Angklung is the traditional music instrument that made from bamboo. How to played it? Simply shake it.. This place is one of my favourite places to learn sundanese culture. Everyday at the afternoon, They have a sundanese show and performances from the "arumba" the bamboo band.…
YELLO: Good Location & Facilities for restime in bandung, enjoyable of breakfast menu & had Child Zone (games).  The staff - especially Housekeeping staff had Execelent Service, for make room & facilities keep tidy and cleans properly. Good Job
Aryaduta: overall satisfied, stay 2 night in the business room, check in and check out fast and simple, friendly staff, large and clean room,  Bandung Indah Plaza next door, close to BEC, toilet clean need attention,
Trans: Excelent club lounge Service and view bandung city and mountain with bandung weather during you enjoy afternoon tea ..or dinner there ..All staffs in club lounge very help full and full services .thanks

White_Charter: We took Grab car up to Kawah Putih w/o realizing it would be bbbrrr cold. First team to reach early in the morning at around 8am. We booked the van up at 330.000 for 3 pax. Usually they have to wait until the van is full (12pax). We didn't wait as we were the only ones there.…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I have been visiting this Tangkuban Perahu since I study in Jakarta, and I really enjoy all my visits. The road to the crater just getting better each year. The view is still the same, spectacular.
Dusun_Bambu: Visit this park with my family. The view is nice. Accually you can enjoy this park if not in crowd. So for me avoid visiting during the school holidays.
Saung_Angklung: This place has a superb performance, with angklung you can enjoy fantastic perform by them. You can also instanly play the angklung its amazing performing rite? Because the visitor feel in the inside of performance.

YELLO: Good place, good location. The place is convinience espesially for family. Location is good because it is in the mall. We can easilly buy something in the mall. We just go to the first floor and thats the mall. But we find that the bathroom doesn't have its key. So we find it a bit uncomfortable.
Aryaduta: It took ages for lift (elevators) to go down. I have to wait for 15 minutes to go up or down. Did they do the maintenance or not? I believe they didnt do any maintenance at the particular point of time.
Trans: very nice, the rooms are very clean and the breakfast is very varied and the clerk is very helpful ... only the bathroom is now not too fragrant especially around the toilet. very little drinking water ...

White_Charter: The view is like no other lakes I've visited so far. Blue-green lake water surrounded by dead black trees and thick blanket of white fog. Weather was chilly and windy, smell was quite strong of sulphuric gas (you'll get used to it after sometime). It feels out of the world (ok I…
Tangkuban_Perahu: After a 2 hour journey we arrived and it turns out they have a racist policy for tourist and charge us 10x the local price so instead of 30k they want 300k for just one person,  this is like price in London. Was really disgusted.  We got to the top and the mist is so bad we can…
Dusun_Bambu: Stayed in a double camping deck at Sayang Heulang, Dusun Bambu. This is Glamour Camping, which means it gives you camping without camping's little inconveniences. For example:  1) The tent is set up for you, complete with mattress and sleeping bag (for that experience!). While…
Saung_Angklung: Angklung itself is amazing. Made of simple straight bamboo pipe that produce pentatonic notes, under Ujo's direction you can play various pop song from One Direction's to Queen's Bohemian Rapshody! You can learn how angklung is produced, play them in an orchestra, and buy your…

YELLO: The room is small but clean and comfortable. The window is a little bit dirty but I can just cover it with curtains, so no problems. The bathroom is also clean, but no soap in the liquid soap dispenser in the shower. The water in the shower is weaker than I like.Breakfast was delicious with various menus, but when its run out not every menu is refill, so you may want to eat breakfast early.The staffs is polite and friendly. The interior is also nice.The location is great, it is inside the mall so I can enjoy various restaurant and shopping. But don't expect to see beautiful view in this hotel. All I could see is parking lot and rooftop.
Aryaduta: over all is perfect,check in & check out  process so simple & fast, breakfast menus are great, with friendly staff  in the hotel, but in the bath room only bath towel available, there are not face, hand & floor towel. so I should call housekeeping first  one thing, we are love room (so big) & the location, there is connecting door to Bandung Indah Plaza thank you Aryaduta, we'll be back to stay
Trans: We booked the hotel thru the official website, hoping to get a room with king size bed, looking exactly like what the website showed us.   So we paid the room using the website online payment. The reason why we wanted to stay at the hotel was because we wanted to see the Boyzone concert at the hotel. Its a five star hotel, why not?  When we arrived at the reception, the lady officer told us, the room available is only 2 separate single beds. She told us the only solution is to upgrade the room type and pay 3 million rupiah. No other solution. Hmm I thought this is a hospitality business. Didnt feel the hospitality at all.   Feeling really tired, we just wanted to get into the room, so we ask her to show us the room,  and ask whether the 2 beds can be combined into one bed just…

White_Charter: Kawah Putih or White Crater is the sister attraction to Tangkuban Perahu.  Another Volcanic crater you can access quite easily.  Entrance fee still a reasonable 50K Rupiah (IDR), much cheaper than Tangkuban Perahu. Stop at the foot then change to a small local open-air vehicle…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Upon arrival, we were approached by a tour guide. He says he's a legit tour guide as he showed his pass and we carry on with him. He then brought us to a information centre and informed us that we were to pay 200k to enter the domas crater.   After much discussion we carry on…
Dusun_Bambu: This is my first time visiting Dusun Bambu and I'm suddenly falling in love with this place from the first time I entered the gate. Good food and breathtaking scenery view!
Saung_Angklung: It's just one word that can describe my impression after watching the performance here, everybody's got entertained!
Ciater: It's just one word that can describe my impression after watching the performance here, everybody's got entertained!
YELLO: Overall is good, especially location and service. Near mall paskal 23 and food market. But I dont like the parking, when busy time, its difficult to find parking because mixed with mall. Better if they have a special lot parking for guest
Aryaduta: All is perfect, we like the breakfast Staff friendly from the front door till the pool guy Location is gold, we just go by side wing door to go to bandung indah plaza to find we missed in the bag Thanks to Aryaduta
Trans: This is our second time in The Trans Luxury Hotel and we’re so happy that we’re here again! It’s the best hotel in Bandung so far, from the lobby to the rooms to everything. All the staff are very helpful and friendly.  So satisfied with my staying at this hotel!

White_Charter: It is irresistable to take many pictures there. The unique view nature has provided will make you wanna stay there longer. But you can only stay for 20 minutes due to health risk. If you stay too long you will get breathing problem. They also recommend you to wear mask to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Read the review before we went.Although this is the 1st time the expectation is not worthwhile for the entrance fees paid..Manage to see the Kawah Ratu ..take some pictures and then the heavy downpour dampened our mood further...what a day to spoil our visits..
Dusun_Bambu: Cool park filled with a great line of activites. Cheap entry fee. Tried sniper and archery game and it was awesome I tell you. Would definitely come back to try more!
Saung_Angklung: We arrived not knowing what to expect. Generally this was a demonstration of traditional Indonesian cultural activities. Included demonstrations on puppetry to tell stories, traditional music, and dance. The audience actually got to participate in the musical portion of the…
Ciater: We arrived not knowing what to expect. Generally this was a demonstration of traditional Indonesian cultural activities. Included demonstrations on puppetry to tell stories, traditional music, and dance. The audience actually got to participate in the musical portion of the…
YELLO: Location is great, connecting to a big mall. The room is small but clean. Unfortunately, no shampoo and I couldn't get any shower-cap. It seems that the hotel is designed for men only. Breakfast should be improved.
Aryaduta: The service from the hotel staffs are top of the line. Since checking in to checking out there was no hassle at all. Eventhough I actually made two separate bookings for two days and the room types are different, the transfer was very smooth. The hotel facilities are also top of the line, easy access to shopping mall and retaurants, huge pool and kids club, and big size rooms.
Trans: Partner and I were there for honeymoon. It was the best decision we did to choose Trans as our hotel in Bandung as everything was amazing. There was also complimentary cake and deco was also amazing! The breakfast spread was superb and amenities in the hotel totally exceeded our expectation. Staff was also well-dressed and always on hand to help out with any questions. Connected to the Trans Studio Mall and the Trans amusement park. Very convenient place. Totally had an amazing stay!

White_Charter: This place known as Kawah Putih, is two and a half hour drive from Bandung City under normal traffic condition and can be much longer during weekends.   This is an inactive volcano whose crater has now become a lake hence it's name White Crater Lake. The lake is filled with…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I visited on a Monday morning, and it wasn't packed with visitors. At Rp200k per person (foreigner rate; on weekends it's Rp300k), plus a further Rp25k entry fee for vehicles, it is a rather pricey trip. One is also at the mercy of the weather. When I visited visibility was fine…
Dusun_Bambu: We spent 3 days and 2 night in 2 rooms cottage. A very traditional wooden housing, which surprisingly very comfortable and clean. The services were fantastic from the entrance to the checkout.  The food were very good. The leisure facilities were also very nice. We enjoyed…
Saung_Angklung: Good place to know about Sundanese culture in a very awesome way, and they even going to ask you to play along
Ciater: Good place to know about Sundanese culture in a very awesome way, and they even going to ask you to play along
YELLO: This is my first time staying at yello hotel and i enjoyed my holiday. Maybe i'll back again or tell my friend about this place. Good service and good facilities. The weakness is internet, so slow and need improvement. Thank You Yello Hotel
Aryaduta: i like the location, i love the staff. But the carpet in my room smells damp and the food looks so cheapo (sorry to say that but its fact). i remembered when i was stay at Aryaduta Medan it was so awesome. i hope Aryaduta Bandung can improved the standard.
Trans: The hotel and facilities are really nice. Gym and the equipment are clean. Good spa services. Staff are very courteous. Great selection at the breakfast buffet, service is very slow. Took a while to get a cup of coffee. The 18th floor serves good food with a great view.  Had an issue with next bedroom guests, they were making so much noise at 10:30 at night. Had to call manager twice to ask them to ask the guest to keep the noise down,. They should have handled it after the first call.

White_Charter: It is certainly unique in the sense that you might not see the same attraction in other countries. The long drive to the crater which is inside a nature park makes for a very good road trip though the roads are bumpy and doesn't regularly notify of the distance to the main…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tips -  Do not go in weekend...too many people and 100k extra for foreigners  For public transport , go to Lembang then get on an elf or any bus to subang area for 15k. To save money you can walk the 3.5 km ...it took me 50 min to up and 40 Min to come down in the road...not…
Dusun_Bambu: I was travelling with 2 kids, 7 and 2yo. They both love the Rabbit Wonderland and the Bamboo Playground. Spent about 3 hours playing and feeding the rabbits. We travel during wkdays..recommend to avoid the crowd. Plenty of food stalls in the area, very convenient for the kids.…
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo offers a very entertaining show. They perform traditional Sundanese puppet show, dances, and the main show itself; angklung performance. They also teach the audience how to play angklung, and then play it together to create a beautiful music. I loved the…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo offers a very entertaining show. They perform traditional Sundanese puppet show, dances, and the main show itself; angklung performance. They also teach the audience how to play angklung, and then play it together to create a beautiful music. I loved the…
YELLO: Really good location, it's like a place with full entertainment, they have gaming station, netzone, and the main point they located in the mall area. Although the room is small, but the services are so good, the staff was very friendly and helpful. Hope you can keep this excellent service!
Aryaduta: A place to stay when in the heart of Bandung, next to the mall, near yogya super market, good service, nice staff, nice big room with bath tub, good variety of breakfast, but the swimming pool is too cold,
Trans: It was a pleasant hotel that I ever stayed. Very recommended for all trip purposes. Very friendly staffs. Great services. Best facilities and nice to experience. I'm not kiddin', try it yourself. Lovely Luxury Hotel.

White_Charter: It is called Kawah Putih in their local language. The place is nice, weather is cool. You have a choice to drive in but enter fee apply or using their ready transport with cheaper price. Do buy the mask before you enter the crater, sulphur level are quite high, you can cough or…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Very popular with locals on the weekends. If you are 'white' plan to get accosted for souvenirs and gifts as soon as you step out of the car. There is a small tourist information centre where guides give you a small briefing on the volcano. Plan on at least one hour drive from…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is a relaxed place outside the town. But what if you come on weekend, it turns like a crowded market. It is better to go on weekdays. I love the birdnest and man-made river streams along until the man-made lake. It is quite relaxing.
Saung_Angklung: Saung udjo is right place for know aobut sundaneese culture. There is performing stage for showing kind of sundaneese show such as angklung, jaipong dance, wayang puppet. This place also sold kind of sundaneese sofenir.
Ciater: Saung udjo is right place for know aobut sundaneese culture. There is performing stage for showing kind of sundaneese show such as angklung, jaipong dance, wayang puppet. This place also sold kind of sundaneese sofenir.
YELLO: If you want an area with less traffic , near to a good modern mall , good food availabilty .. and yet good central location with reasonable price  .. this is a highly recommended hotel .. and good for family too.Have been visiting Bandung frequently - this has to be my best hotel choice so far in Bandung -  Will be back here soon ..
Aryaduta: this is my 3rd visit in Aryaduta for staycation, the room clean and big, kids love to swim and play at the kids club, room service are good, we stay for 7night and still enjoy our staycation.good choice for family and strategic location to travel around bandung city
Trans: The hotel with luxury touch and great service, fast response. The breakfast variety was quite expand from Indonesian, Japanese, Chinese, Arabian also Western food.  The coffee break and lunch during meeting was representable.

White_Charter: Entrance fee Rp. 50,000 per person Shuttle Van Rp. 15,000 per person  If choose to take own car up (don't want shuttle van) Rp. 150,000 per car  We went on thursday. While there's bad traffic in Bandung to Ciwidey, I'm unsure if it's normal or if it's because there's a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is crowded of tourist. If you want to come here, do not come in holiday because you've got traffic jam!. The weather is cold you must bring a jacket and also you must use mask.

Uniquely to get to the lobby, you have to use a special elevator from the side of Cai Lobby Mall 23 Paskal and go up to the 4th floor. The check-in process is fast, the receptionist named ADI serves very well and helps the check-in process. Good job, Adi! On the 4th floor besides receptionist, there is a dining room as well as a breakfast place, children's play area, swimming pool. Because I ordered a smoking room, I got a room on the top floor. Staying in Trans worths every rupiah, imho.

Dusun_Bambu: First time visiting Dusun Bambu. But I think I was in this heaven in the wrong season (high season, which is in New Year), yet this is all the time I've got since I have been working. Well, it has lovely view, nice weather, and clean situation. I felt like I was somewhere…
Saung_Angklung: When i came, the atmosphere refresh my mind, the air and design of bamboo building so welcoming to me. The attraction just so exciting at all. Really fun when the kids bring us to play the angklung and dance with them. The Orcestra was very gorgeous. "Two Thumbs Up!"
Ciater: When i came, the atmosphere refresh my mind, the air and design of bamboo building so welcoming to me. The attraction just so exciting at all. Really fun when the kids bring us to play the angklung and dance with them. The Orcestra was very gorgeous. "Two Thumbs Up!"
YELLO: Everything was very satisfactory except the aircon in the room is a little weak. The breakfast, however, is so much better for a low-cost hotel. Location is the best as it is directly above 23 Paskal Mall.
Aryaduta: I was in Bandung for solo trip, i spent 2 days and i must say that everything was excellent. The location of the hotel is the center of the city, which is good you can reach some of area (ie. Jalan Riau by walking distance).  As for the room even though being old, but it is excellent, clean, very comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel to others having bussines trip, solo trip even family trip as the room very spacious.
Trans: Around 1 week before 2018 World Cup Final, I already booked 10 pax to watch the final in that hotel because they provide big screen for customers who want to watch.  Ms. Dhani (Trans Hotel Sales Officer) already confirmed "OK" for my reservation..  On the D-day, I even ask her once more time to confirm about my reservation & she said still OK.. Few hours before World Cup Final Kick-Off,,I also even tried to confirm about my reservation to the person in charge there (Mr. Hilal)..  At first he said my booking wasn't in their system.. But after Mr. Hilal talked with Ms.Dhani,, afterall he said my reservation was still OK..  Then when i came at Kick-Off time, they suddenly asked ud to leave the venue! They said that we had to leave because there were miss-communication in their…

White_Charter: It so amazing , it was so beautiful.  White crater with the fog surround them. You will never forget it.
Tangkuban_Perahu: A volcano hill that still active in Indonesia.You can enter here with entrance fee.Don't miss this popular tourist spot in Bandung.Don't forget to bring along the face mask especially if you have asthma etc.
Dusun_Bambu: Good outing but way too crowded especially since you have to wait for shuttle to bring you up. The nicest part is the manmade lake surrounded by mini houses. Remember to redeem your free water that comes along with your ticket.
Saung_Angklung: We visited the Saung Angklung Udjo show at 330pm. By the way, there is only 1 show per day. Please also get  your hotel staff to check if there is a show on the day that you plan to watch. I gather from the show that on adhoc basis, the group may perform outside of Indonesia.…
Ciater: We visited the Saung Angklung Udjo show at 330pm. By the way, there is only 1 show per day. Please also get  your hotel staff to check if there is a show on the day that you plan to watch. I gather from the show that on adhoc basis, the group may perform outside of Indonesia.…
YELLO: FO didn't tell me in advance that the entire floor will be closed for carpet cleaning.They asked me (or rather forced me..since they said I have no choice) to move ASAP.I had to cancel some of my plans because of it..Im sure they already have the schedule in advance..and I would be more than happy to move out IF only they tell me in advanceMy wife almost lost a necklace..but the HK were vigilant in cleaning the room..hence I gave it a two stars instead of one.
Aryaduta: The room is very clean and also have a nice view. The check in and check out process is fast, all of the staff is friendly and fast response. Aradaduta's location makes it easy for us to visit famous places in Bandung.
Trans: Stayed for 2 nights. The location of the hotel is in the outskirt of the city. Room was clean and large. The only downside was that the walls of the room was too thin. I had to request for a room change which I was eventually was able to obtained.

White_Charter: Cool/cold you better bring along raincoat or jacket and umbrella as well. Strong smell don't stay too long, drink morex water after visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This mountain volcanoes is certainly worth visiting at least once. I have been twice, both times on a week day which meant fewer crowds. Both times using my KITAS which allowed me local price without much problem.   They tried to trick us the first time but we were informed and…
Dusun_Bambu: This place gas a great view. You can also do such activity like archery and shooting.  But, the food is poor and the food price is very expensive.
Saung_Angklung: Was recommended to watch this traditional musical by our driver and we never regret going for it.  Paid appx $11sgd per pax & was entitled to free popsicles/mineral water. Host speaks great English which makes it so much easier to understand enjoy the show (as my partner and I…
Ciater: Was recommended to watch this traditional musical by our driver and we never regret going for it.  Paid appx $11sgd per pax & was entitled to free popsicles/mineral water. Host speaks great English which makes it so much easier to understand enjoy the show (as my partner and I…
YELLO: Located in a shopping center area is an advantage for us! Easy to find food! <U+0001F44D>I just complained about the smoking area next to the pool. As a person who does not smoke the smoke is very disturbing. Moreover, many children swim there. Room also smelled of cigarettes when we arrived. Maybe you should strickly prohibits people to smoking in the room or other area in hotel. Keep up the good service!Thanks!
Aryaduta: marvelous breakfast with so many kinds of delicious foods which will attract us to come back.. Large and clean room showing beautiful city view. I always take my overseas customers to stay there and they are satisfied.
Trans: good services with friendly staff and excellent room. pool, etc. good location, and also cleanliness is very good. I want this sleep quality with my family can be remembered by Me and my family. thank you.

White_Charter: the admission was rather expensive as for my pte driver to drive in with my son and myself cost a hefty 250k ruppiah.the masks were not necessary for me but lucky it was quite cheap at 5000 ruppiah only.but we drove very long to reach the sulphuric lake..i heard the live volcano…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Foreigners pay 10x the price of locals, nice way to rip-off money. Not worth it, even with champagne on the volcano. Indeed a turist trap.
Dusun_Bambu: went to dusun bambu with my husband's families. it was a beautiful place with nature environment. the air was so fresh and the view were very beautiful,especially there is a small river and lake.also provide many kind of foods at the restaurant. great experience
Saung_Angklung: A bit off from city centre... But we came over from our trip to Tebing Keraton and Taman Hutan Raya Ir. H. DJuanda... So it is relatively near... Shows at 15:30 to 17:00 everyday, all year round as they put it... IDR100k per entrance for foreigners... In, for Local Arts???…
Ciater: A bit off from city centre... But we came over from our trip to Tebing Keraton and Taman Hutan Raya Ir. H. DJuanda... So it is relatively near... Shows at 15:30 to 17:00 everyday, all year round as they put it... IDR100k per entrance for foreigners... In, for Local Arts???…
YELLO: Awesome..great location and comfortable, the staff is very nice and friendly, taste of food very delicious! And a lot of variants, the lounge and restaurant is instagramable, i like the coffe maker in yello harmoni<U+0001F44D>
Aryaduta: visit with family and always stay here when visiting Bandung. very recommended hotel with big room, nice pool, friendly receptionist and  lobby has a very nice fragrance, and connected with mall where you can find many option of food and others.
Trans: Like the pool, like the breakfast, love the amenities, dark lift, love the environment, we love stay 2 nights at Trans Luxury Hotel...Just stay at the hotel, and all reserve. It is easy to find food for kids.

White_Charter: An experience not to be missed. It is about 15-18 C. Better bring something warm. Remember not to take the back seat of the shuttle bus that brings you to the peak. Bring along a mask if you are afraid to breathe too much of the sulphuric air. Smell of unburnt petrol and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I came here together with my family about a year ago. The only thing that I really didn't like were the people around you, will keep trying to sell you something. My tip for this is... go with a local tour guide they'll either help you to negotiate or tell them that you are not…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice place to bring family and young children. Nice playground, and have alternatives place to relax. Food is quite nice, with reasonable price at the food court.
Saung_Angklung: If shopping is not your main itinerary in Bandung and curious to know basic Indonesian culture particularly angklung, please allocate at least 2 hours for the musical performances.  The shows began with myriads of musical shows with children (students of this academy)…
Ciater: If shopping is not your main itinerary in Bandung and curious to know basic Indonesian culture particularly angklung, please allocate at least 2 hours for the musical performances.  The shows began with myriads of musical shows with children (students of this academy)…
YELLO: It was very pleasant stay in Yello Paskal. Warm welcome form the security staff at the entrance staff followed by Ubay at the reception. The room was very neat and quiet. The bed was comfortable and shower was great. Overall the hotel is very clean. Breakfast had varieties, tasty and sumptuous. Very convenient shopping at Paskal 23 next door & with lovely restaurants to choose from. All staff at Yello were friendly and helpful. Most of all my thanks to Celine whom I find to be very friendly, helpful. customer oriented, enthusiastic and proactive. Thanks for making my stay in Yello very pleasant. It was great experience at Yello Paskal, Bandung. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who needs a pleasant and relaxing experience in Bandung.
Aryaduta: Food is good. Room is clean, good place to stay with families or business purposes. Some light slighty dim especially on the hall way 6th floor. Make some air fragrance or aroma therapy to make more comfy
Trans: Overall, I stayed here and felt comfortable. The service started from concierge during luggage drop off, check in process, very friendly. The room also good, even it os the lowest type but still comfortable to stay. The breakfast also good. Keep up the excellent service

White_Charter: Totally worth to visit if you have never been to a crater. Awesome scenery. But the pungent smell from the crater lake is awful, you might want bring a scarf or face mask.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's really a hit and miss for me. On 1 hand, you get to see a live volcano. On the other hand, it is so crowded that you are looking more at ppl than the volcano. And once you taken the necessary photos or selfie, that's it. It is a bit more interesting if you take the hike to…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a good getaway place with friends or family, not too far from Bandung city. They have several restaurants that offer nice view (inside the bird nest or at a lake side). They also have various playground for kids: mini zoo, maze, archery, strawberry picking. On top of that…
Saung_Angklung: this was just amazing the Angklung is a traditional Indonesian instrument made from bamboo.  The sound is distinctive and pleasant.  The show went for an hour and a half and at first I was worried because it consisted of one man controlling some puppets that started fighting it…
Ciater: this was just amazing the Angklung is a traditional Indonesian instrument made from bamboo.  The sound is distinctive and pleasant.  The show went for an hour and a half and at first I was worried because it consisted of one man controlling some puppets that started fighting it…
YELLO: Pleasant experience, wonderful check-in process (without any hassle and very helpful), comfortable and clean atmosphere overall. Minus: internet connection was not good in the room, despite full signal bar.
Aryaduta: Very Strategic location not far from the center of town n near from Bandung railstation also Bandung Indah Plaza mall.  The hotel crew was so nice and friendly,, they have such a huge room for bussiness package
Trans: Well ,words are less to describe the experience we had at the trans luxury hotel. Best part of the property is their service and staff . It was a lovely stay at the trans luxury with amazing ameneties provided. We stayed fot 4 nights and we are vegeterian family ,the resturant staff made sure we have customized veg options during breakfast and whenever we had special request. Gosh those noodles and nachos :) . I would recommend everyone who visits bandung to experience this gem of bandung also. The trans mall besides is cherry on the cake for shopoholics like me ;)  Thanks trans luxury for taking care of us very well.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih ( white crater) has a very great view. Unfortunately when we were there, it was heavy rain, so what we could saw was really limited by fog.
Tangkuban_Perahu: But then the entrance fee of 30,000 can be multiplied by 10 times for farangs. So go with a local friend to avoid this scam or you can go early in the morning before the guards come. There should be no fee to get to the top. The trail can be from the lava flowed hole so just…
