Dusun_Bambu: Nice mountain scenery with beautiful flower park. The supporting like restaurants, kids playground not good.
Saung_Angklung: whether you are a traveler or into the music, this is one place you should not miss while visiting Bandung. I gave ++ for this attraction. In this place you would learn more about traditional music Angklung of west Java. They let you play one of them, too. Don't forget to buy…
Ciater: whether you are a traveler or into the music, this is one place you should not miss while visiting Bandung. I gave ++ for this attraction. In this place you would learn more about traditional music Angklung of west Java. They let you play one of them, too. Don't forget to buy…
YELLO: simple and unique design. room is clean. service is excellent. great facilities. First time I book, I think that this is a budget hotel types. But, absolutely, this is great 5 stars hotel with unique design in the best location.
Aryaduta: Room are very spacious, and value for money. Connected to the mall so we don’t waste our time in traffic. The service are excellence, breakfast variety was wide.  Hopefully we could visiting this hotel again
Trans: I have no complain at all. My stay was really satisfying. The room was great and the staff also friendly and helpfull. The one that really gave me good impression was the housekeeping staff who came every 8 PM asking whether we need anything for the room. I do not recall his name but he was really friendly with big smile. It just impress me that he can have that smile even though  he's working at night. The hotel location also great, right next to the mall. It was easy if we want to eat out and i can shop too...he...he...If i have the chance, i will definitely come back again to this hotel.

White_Charter: Nice cooling place. Needed to wait for the fog to clear to get a better picture with the mountains behind the white crater.
Tangkuban_Perahu: At the gate of the volcano park locals pay 30 000 and foreign tourists pay 300 000. That is not acceptable. Do not go on Sundays as the whole spot is overcrowded. Way back to Bandung costed us 2,5 hours. The volcano and the hot springs are worth to see but surely not for this…
Dusun_Bambu: Its a truly leisure park either with family or friends. A unique concept in a huge areas supported with villa's, restaurant, playground for children, market spot and beautifull view. Variety menu's of Sundanessee will satisfy your stomach with suitable price.
Saung_Angklung: Bamboo music, traditional dance and wooden puppet show. Good cultural experience. The participatory Angklung playing experience is unique.
Ciater: Bamboo music, traditional dance and wooden puppet show. Good cultural experience. The participatory Angklung playing experience is unique.
YELLO: My first time stay here only one night was amazing, Have a game corner and many good spot for taking picture (instagramable)  i think this hotel still new For the staff really helpfull,this hotel one area with mall 23 paskal so more easy when u want to shopping or eat (with operational mall) The room spacious but not much channel tv if u want to watch tv even in tv local View in pool area is nice also the breakfast i think is good If u bring car dont forget to ask receptionist coupon free parking.  Will come again with my family soon..
Aryaduta: The location is in the heart of Bandung, attached to BIP mall. Though the hotel is considered old but in general service area and rooms are very well maintained. Rooms are spacious and clean. Wide variety of menus selection for breakfast. Since it was managed by Hyat group until Aryaduta taken over the property, The hotel has always been one of our top pick for staying in Bandung.  Special thanks to Ms. Nuke, she is always very helpful in assisting us as regular guest at Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: To be honest, this is our favourite hotel in bandung,we’ve been staying quite often recently.. trans luxury hotel is the most luxury hotel in bandung by far, we love to stay at this hotel because its has the best hospitality in bandung, they also have great amenities, sandy pool, well equipped gym, and  nice spa, they also has the comfy bed and feather pillow, and the club lounge has top notch service, thanks to mas bagas, mas rahmat and mas roy.. their hospitality is second to none.. cheers to that..

White_Charter: Breathtakingly beautiful scenery. Worth a drive to see this beautiful tourist attraction.It was a volcanic crater situated roughly 50 km south of Bandung. The low pH and Sulfur created this gorgeous Aqua color lake.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I wanted to visit as this is one of the most popular site near Bandung.The crater and surrounding area are natural beauties but not the best compared to other craters in Indonesia.   The first "trap" are the touts. They will follow you around and act helpful , before trying to…
Dusun_Bambu: Very good for kids. Nice set up.  Clean and good management. Definitely will go back for kids.  Sadly some play houses are not accessible to enter,  just stopped in front.
Saung_Angklung: Saung angklung Udjo is the best place when you want to hear somethin new harmony for your soul and life. Its traditional musically orchestra from Bandung, West Java, Indonesia. You can hear, learn and play a new music and soon renewly charging your soul and mind. Dont miss this…
Ciater: Saung angklung Udjo is the best place when you want to hear somethin new harmony for your soul and life. Its traditional musically orchestra from Bandung, West Java, Indonesia. You can hear, learn and play a new music and soon renewly charging your soul and mind. Dont miss this…
YELLO: My first experience to stayed here. And YES this one of my favourite hotel! Easy to check-in/out, the staff was very friendly. Good ambience and view, and for the unique concept and furniture. I also recommend for others to stay here. Thank you, Yello!
Aryaduta: the service is good, the rooms are comfortable, the food is good, the atmosphere is like home, the available parking is enough. The reach of entertainment and shopping is quite close. The services provided by officers are quite helpful. With a home-like atmosphere, children become more happy. The price provided is quite affordable. The information provided by the receptionist is quite clear and friendly in service
Trans: We decided to stay two nights at Trans Luxury as we heard the pool was awesome and it did not disappoint us at all. The hotel is next to the shopping mall, so plenty of food and snacks to choose from. The kids did not want to leave the pool they loved it so much ( the slide, the sands, and the waterfall). There is a kids club near the pool. However, there are not enough activities compared to other kids club in other hotels. The kids did some colouring and free play at the club. Overall, it’s a good family hotel.

White_Charter: Wonderful to see, such special colours and the smoke makes it magical. Vus rids up there is also quite an adventure. It does rain a lit and super hard so take something for the rain!
Tangkuban_Perahu: we are not allowed to walk down to get close to the volcano site... however you can click pretty good pictures... walk up the hill for an awesome view ...the walk up may be a little steep and you got to be careful with your steps...besides that, there is pony rides available for…
Dusun_Bambu: avoid to come during holiday, as it would be crowded! specialty: dining in the cage, need to do reservation first. there is a toilet cage as well! quite a lot of activities can be done: ATV, archery, boat ride, walking in the park, strawberry plugging, children playground woth…
Saung_Angklung: This is third times i came here but still amazing.. I really enjoyed the show.. If you want to sea some attractive, beautifull, and traditional show.. Come to saung angklung udjo and i promise you will never regret it..
Ciater: This is third times i came here but still amazing.. I really enjoyed the show.. If you want to sea some attractive, beautifull, and traditional show.. Come to saung angklung udjo and i promise you will never regret it..
YELLO: Great as always but internet WiFi still lacking stability and consistency. Otherwise enjoyable stay. Location, staff and rooms are great. One of the better yello chains I have stayed. Food was average but location had plenty of other options too..
Aryaduta: old hotel in Bandung, good greetings. Room standard with old atmosphere, i take my suhoor breakfast, anchovy fried rice really salty, salty beef bacon, watery scrambled egg, the dish are dissatisfy. Room and service are good. The dish arent
Trans: The hotel accommodation and all facilities are very good. I will rate you excellent and thank you very much for providing good facilities during my stay in Bandung. it is not only hotel with facilities that suit my need for business but also for holiday with family or friends

White_Charter: Beautiful view and the ticket price is cheaper than Tangkuban Perahu. Sulphur smell is quiet strong so get your face mask ready.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Gorgeous spot, no doubt, with picturesque scenes and great photo ops. However, the entrance ticket is terribly expensive for foreigners. The touts here, disguised as kind local guides, are ruthless and use emotional blackmail and play on your sympathy to make a quick buck. They…
Dusun_Bambu: Back to nature... im enjoy to visit this place... have beautiful view.. must try this place if you visit bandung
Saung_Angklung: We have always wanted to come here. Every time when we are in Bandung we would include the 3.30pm show in our itinerary. Unfortunately, we would cancel it each time due to our time management and traffic jams.  On one Friday afternoon in September, we managed to come here for…
Ciater: We have always wanted to come here. Every time when we are in Bandung we would include the 3.30pm show in our itinerary. Unfortunately, we would cancel it each time due to our time management and traffic jams.  On one Friday afternoon in September, we managed to come here for…
YELLO: The room was good, clean, n comfort. Like the big window <U+2764>, nice scenery of Bandung town both day n nite.The bathroom was nice n clean, but better if they put small rack inside the shower room (I cannot put my own shampoo).The minus for me is the bathroom door, cannot lock n i pinched my finger.The staffs were polite and helpful.
Aryaduta: #NAME?
Trans: Overall, it was a good experience... Took so long for check-in, waited 2 hours. Check-in time at 5 pm. Love the 18th's restaurant, great view... at night, you can see the beautiful city's lights. Love the pool too, but it'll be great if the water is warm... because too cold for the children.

White_Charter: This place is good for taking a picture and so many people sell many sovenir at this place, ad some foreign come to this place
Tangkuban_Perahu: A day trip here.... Nice view from the top of the volcano.... Lots of things sold here..... Must go if in Bandung...
Dusun_Bambu: Enter this place you have to pay around 15K..they provide a car to bring you from front gate into restaurant area..there are  also hiking ground, camping hotel, children playground, restarurant which divided into 3 main area, canoing, boat. We ate in Saung area..in saung area…
Saung_Angklung: I came to Bandung this time to attend the conference.  The organizer had organized a one day city tour which included a visit to this place.  It turned out to be the best of the one day city tour.  The show were fascinating.  I think the auduances enjoyed a quick lesson on how…
Ciater: I came to Bandung this time to attend the conference.  The organizer had organized a one day city tour which included a visit to this place.  It turned out to be the best of the one day city tour.  The show were fascinating.  I think the auduances enjoyed a quick lesson on how…
YELLO: Yello hotel is strategically located at 23 paskal shopping mall. we can easily find everything here, convenient store, ATM, restaurant. it was walking distance to sudirman street, paskal hypersquare. Location is very good.  The hotel itself is new, modern style interior on the lobby, check in process was fast. I booked 2 room, and 1 of the room had a smell of paint so they got us another room.  The room is minimalist, clean, has a comfy bed, everything we need is provided. There is also a swimming pool and game area.  I'm glad we chose Yello Hotel. This hotel is more than what we expect, really love the ambience and will definitely come back!
Aryaduta: Over all is very good Room is good  people is good   room view is good  play ground is good  swimming  pool is good fitness is good  food and beverage are very standard for 5stars hotel  please be upgrade your taste
Trans: our family feel satisfied and very happy at TLH,and we will suggested our friends and colleagues to stay at this hotel too, thanks for the trainner at fitness centre, she is very friendly, my kids very like her, everyday they go to the fitness centre, spa, sauna and swimming.

White_Charter: It's fairly easy to navigate, you go to the 'ticket box' at the back of the car park.   PRICE We read a lot about different prices. It's much cheaper for local but we are happy to pay a little more for the tourist price.  We payed 50.000 each for a ticket and a further 15.000…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu are known best for the scenic views that surrounds the crater. It is also one of the famous attraction for pre-wedding photoshoots.
Dusun_Bambu: We reached Dusun Bambu pretty late in the afternoon, by then most of the attractions were already closing (wished the staff at the entrance would have informed us, though).  The compound is very well managed - shuttle bus with high frequency, clean washroom and well-managed…
Saung_Angklung: Nice space to learn about Indonesian traditional instrument. The tour include briefing on the history of the place and later watching performance from the children and teenagers at the centre. We were given traditional ice cream 'es lilin' while watching the performance.  After…
Ciater: Nice space to learn about Indonesian traditional instrument. The tour include briefing on the history of the place and later watching performance from the children and teenagers at the centre. We were given traditional ice cream 'es lilin' while watching the performance.  After…
YELLO: Overall we enjoyed. Best location best services, friendly staff, good breakfast, good facilties such as game zone & swiming pool for children. Nice decorrations , recomended hotel for family or business
Aryaduta: This was a one night stay with my family during the Holy Month of Ramadan at this old and former Grand Hyatt hotel in the heart of Bandung city. The hotel is connected to Bandung Indah Plaza (BIP), an old but large shopping mall as well as being across the road from the big Gramedia store and a short walk to the famous Jalan Riau area where many factory outlets and restaurants are located.  When I arrived at the hotel and mentioned that I wanted to check in, the security guard asked me to park in the underground carpark where there is a spacious designated parking area for hotel guests. The carpark is two floors down from the hotel lobby and there is no elevator so remember to drop off any luggage before proceeding to the carpark.  We had booked a Business room which is the…
Trans: we have a nice stay at here...very fun time. the hotel have a great swimming pool. my kids are very enjoy staying at here. the hotel also just nearby mall..so its easy for us to having lunch or dinner. thank you

White_Charter: Entrance to the crater only opens at 8am. You will need tickets to get up the crater as you will need to take this open air minivan to shuttle you to the top. The driver will insist that there are 4 people per seat and will not go off unless the van is a full house. Once on top,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I've always love mountain and that's why I love Tangkuban Perahu but my visit was unfortunately was during a holiday season thus the place is packed with tourist. Such a shame that a beautiful place like this is full of trash and street seller which makes it messy and hard to…
Dusun_Bambu: I visited this leisure park with a friend. We rode a small motorbike. It was a pleasant ride from the hotel. The air was cool & refreshing despite the traffic jam while in downtown bandung. This park is on a higher ground than bandung. Recommended for taking photos & selfies.…
Saung_Angklung: This is my first time to coming here "The Saung Angklung Udjo" that located is in centre of West Java at Padasuka Street. I have to going with my all group from company working. We are spending time here almost 1,5 hours, I saw any actraction from of few traditional dance and…
Ciater: This is my first time to coming here "The Saung Angklung Udjo" that located is in centre of West Java at Padasuka Street. I have to going with my all group from company working. We are spending time here almost 1,5 hours, I saw any actraction from of few traditional dance and…
YELLO: New hotel. Still clean and tidy. Room spacious. Attached to a big nice shopping mall paskal 23. Very easy to get food. Only 10mins drive to Bandung station.Only there's no hairdryer in the room. And shower water pressure  is quite low.
Aryaduta: We love Aryaduta Hotel Bandung because of their lovely staff, their hospitality, foods and facilities. Five star ratings for you. We surely come back to this Hotel at near future.  Highly recommended for family :)
Trans: We stayed at the Premier Ckub Room with my teo girls and were mesmerised with the services and ambience provided. All the staff were very friendly and genuine in their greetings and assistance offered.

White_Charter: One of the places with very nice view, you might spent 30 mins - 1 hour here. The view is very good at anytime of visit. - Distance between car park and crater is up to 10 minutes driving, the place provide traditional shuttle/vehicle - No food stall in the crater, but there is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It is famous since ages a go At least you need to go here once Although not too much to see, but of I go here, I hunt for strawberry or  They sell lots, seller will come to you, just do the bargain Then I will blend it at hotel (bring your handy juicer)  But I would surely love…
Dusun_Bambu: This is for group/family vacation, many options to dine or just relax. Meals are available at Pasar Katulistiwa. Selfies's playground.
Saung_Angklung: This is second time i watched angklung performance and i don't feel boring. and i interested with children dance and invite tourist for dance together. They are so cute and care. So you have to schedule to come here! :)
Ciater: This is second time i watched angklung performance and i don't feel boring. and i interested with children dance and invite tourist for dance together. They are so cute and care. So you have to schedule to come here! :)
YELLO: Best hotel, this is my first time stay in Yello Hotel. And i so happy, staff in hotel very friendly, good service, affordable prices with good facilities and i recommend for those of you who want to vacation in Bandung
Aryaduta: everything was good from check in process, room service, friendly staff at the front desk. until next morning i came down from 9th floor to 3rd floor by stairs because they only had 2 elevators worked on that day. a staff approach me and said "excuse me mam, could you please change your wardrobe before having breakfast?" me and my husband were shocked. i was wearing a dress and sneaker (the one that i wear to the mall all the time). i felt humiliated but didn't want to make a scene than i went upstairs and change with pants and shirt. demand to talk with fnb manager at that time and he did not give any logical explanation since lots of people in the restaurant at that time wearing sleeping pants even sleeping dress. untill end of conversation we still did not hear him apologize…
Trans: You get the most out of your money, true luxury hotel, and deserves a perfect 5 star rating, the swimming pool is a must try, the gym is nice, the hotel is door to door with the mall ( almost 60meters walking ), the bed is so comfortable, and the pillow choice is extraordinary. The fact that the restaurant of the hotel is one of the top 5 restaurants in bandung is a win win situation.

White_Charter: White Crater (Kawah Putih) in Ciwidey is a very photogenic location, which makes it a favorite for pre-wedding and themed photography. This site is far to the south of Bandung city, with winding, small albeit smooth access roads. When we got there the sulphuric cracks were…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu offers a beautiful view of active volcano. They also have Kawah Doma. However, we disappointed with the tour guide. As we need local tour guide to Kawah Doma, so we took local tour guide on the spot who was official tour guide officer (they will show you the…
Dusun_Bambu: This is our firat experience as a family camping in Dusun Bumbu. The area allocated is suoerb with loa of greenery and semi forest area. The place is very well maintained and the staff are vwry polite and ready to assist you whenever you approach them.for direction or…
Saung_Angklung: Great experience playing the angklung. If you're looking for the express cultural experience, this is where to go. Awesome!
Ciater: Great experience playing the angklung. If you're looking for the express cultural experience, this is where to go. Awesome!
YELLO: Hotel budget dengan fasilitas lengkap dan memuaskan.sarapan enak dan bervariasi.keep up the quality....Lokasi di atas mall dan selangkah ke paskal food market.good price and very comfortable.wifi a little bit slow.but overall a great hotel.
Aryaduta: Good hotel, good location, good food, friendly service (everyone smile, great hospitality), good quality wifi (my kids happy with qualitu of wifi). But need to improve AC condition (5 stars if this has been improved). Overall; great experience during stay in aryaduta bandung.
Trans: Trans luxury hotel in bandung is really a hotel to recomend. Perfect serfice and a perfect rooms. Surpricingly finding this hotel in Bandung, short to shopping, great resturants and great staff. I was really surpriced having been in Bandunng several times finding this perfect Hotel.

White_Charter: 1st experince to Kawah Puteh. Loving it. Beautiful view. Natural. my family loves the place too. Nice place to have photos taken. They have camera mans there. But of course with charge not free.. Price affordable price.
Tangkuban_Perahu: To be honest,this is also the first time with my family. We went there with my family. Most of people wanted to see is the crater but too bad we cannot go further inside of the crater except another crater called domas crater. And since the traffic jam from Lembang is quite bad,…
Dusun_Bambu: This is the first time we took our sons camping. We were enjoying our time there, the tent is good, clean and comfy. They have a very clean and private restroom for every tent. We enjoyed the barbeque at night with api unggun there.  In the morning we were amazed by the view and…
Saung_Angklung: Very cultural and fantastic performance highly interactive. Parking is easy? Travel to the place is bit far but worth it.
Ciater: Very cultural and fantastic performance highly interactive. Parking is easy? Travel to the place is bit far but worth it.
YELLO: Yello Hotel Paskal is one of new hotel in Bandung. The concept is unique with dominance of yellow color. The hotel located at Paskal 23 shopping mall and nearby paskal food market. It one of best point for traveller who looking city center hotel. My room quite spacious with twin bedroom also some amenities, the most amenities that I love is the slipper. The staff was friendly since check in to check out. The breakfast was good but the pool too small with a few of sun beds. The hotel also provides game center. Over all Yello Paskal is Very good and recommended. (Special notes : there are a lot of spot for take a photo)
Aryaduta: It's an old building but it's well maintained. The room is clean and cozy. Food is good. It's just next of BIP so easy to catch something. Great for family occasion. Parking lot is quite limited but we could park at BIP.
Trans: A very good hotel. smells good at all places. Kids are having so much fun. The pool are nice, and the sand pool.. Breakfast is very very comfy and delicious. And the room, all the pillow and amenities, they all just WOW.. Bravo Trans. :)

White_Charter: This was my first time to this crater. The journey took about two hour from city center. We read all information about this place first. There has upper and lower parking and surely, park your vehicle at upper side is expensive. We ask our driver to park at down side. The price…
Tangkuban_Perahu: we took 2hours to get there just to see a place that look like a disused quarry. We are out in 30mins later. There is other better place than here.
Dusun_Bambu: A beautiful, serene and relaxing place to go to enjoy Bandung's beautiful mountains. Was not able to fully enjoy the park as it was raining very, very heavily when we were there. Will definitely visit again.
Saung_Angklung: This is an incredible entertaining and funny place. The whole show was really amazing listening to these instruments. Personal highlights... the audience was introduced how to play and achieved playing songs as a big group. ... The last pop performance of the gifted ones that…
Ciater: This is an incredible entertaining and funny place. The whole show was really amazing listening to these instruments. Personal highlights... the audience was introduced how to play and achieved playing songs as a big group. ... The last pop performance of the gifted ones that…
YELLO: The hotel is very clean and organized. Need to maintain that cleanliness in the future. However need to work on the internet connection. It was so slow so I did not use it. TV need attention because it was dark, even after I increase the brightness. The rest is good. Breakfast is also good, lots of choice.
Aryaduta: Room was very comfortable (we had suite room on the top floor), complete amenities, got fruits as compliment . Hotel staff were helpful n accomodative. But breakfast was just standard in taste n variety
Trans: For those who want to stay in a luxury hotel where a suitable place.. The price of her high but in accordance with the facilities and comfort that is served, located right in the middle of town, close to the mall, and the game in Bandung Trans Studio..The view of a beautiful city at night, you can enjoy on one of the restaurant is provided here. Have the concept of romantic and luxurious, of course.

White_Charter: Came here during rainy season, I cant see the crater clearly because of fog and windy rain. Suggest you bring your own umbrella & mask so you dont have to rent. Not remember how much entrance fee because I came with large group. Very good place to take some photo & video and try…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It opens at 7 am. That's the best time to see Tangkuban Perahu, It's very clear scenery, no fog.  I come here for several time, but usually at noon time. This time is the best. Because if we come here a noon or afternoon, we can't see the caldron clearly, it covered by…
Dusun_Bambu: this place is ideal for those who are looking for a relaxing weekend out of jakarta. Closer to bandung and being on height, the weather is ideal for a day out with family.  Man made lake, surrounded by huts which are used to relax or have lunch. One side of the hut opens towards…
Saung_Angklung: Learn and study about local culture. This place is highly recommended. Angklung ( bamboo music tool) produces sound very nice and in love with this place.
Ciater: Learn and study about local culture. This place is highly recommended. Angklung ( bamboo music tool) produces sound very nice and in love with this place.
YELLO: Its a modern setting with basic facilities. Some may have the swimming, other doesn't. Bring your personal care amenities, they don't provide much of it. The hotel is meant for resting, not much activities can be done in the hotel
Aryaduta: I found the room a bit outdated but the bed was great, shower OK and internet with about 10Mbs is fine. Location is fine as well.  ·  Breakfast for me not fantastic, but such is personal. I eat bread at breakfast and the quality of bread the hotel offers is not what I eat because I like the darker, whole grain bread. But for especially the Indonesian people who eat rice at breakfast, I am sure it is OK.
Trans: Bed and pillows are comfy, room is spacious. But the best part is the pools. Kiddie pool with slide, sand pool, whirlpool, my kids can play here all day. The adult pool is a little small though, maybe the space is taken out by the kids pool, but its ok.

White_Charter: Entrace fee 20.000 rupiah per pax.if you want to bring your own car to go to inside you have to pay 150.000 rupiah. Or you have to use ..uhm like open pickup share with others with price 15.000 per pax. The view is nice. If you come when fog down just waiting then you will see…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Located outside of Bandung city,traffic jam at the weekend. The ticket is cheap for locals about $2.5, but 10 times of the price for foreigners. The volcano view is unique, some sellers sell local souvenirs, they are quite attractive. If you has never seen the volcano, you may…
Dusun_Bambu: Highly recommended this place who love nature likes me. U can saw many cages is build from twigs of trees.
Saung_Angklung: If you're a fan of good ethnic music you have to come and visit this.  For a fair price of fare you will enjoy a series of performance in a serene theater that at first you won't believe exist in the middle of a big city.  The opening performance is a puppet show in traditional…
Ciater: If you're a fan of good ethnic music you have to come and visit this.  For a fair price of fare you will enjoy a series of performance in a serene theater that at first you won't believe exist in the middle of a big city.  The opening performance is a puppet show in traditional…
YELLO: Toiletries need to be improved   included soap etc .... the hotel is very unique ....suitable for young guys.....the location is very strategic ...nice ... train station is very near   .....so many place for culinary
Aryaduta: We had been two times staying in this hotel. And we just love the room which is spacious, the location in the center of the city and connection to Bandung Istana Plaza which is very convenient for us. Thanks Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: Best swimming pool. Warm water and have a sand beach. Delicious breakfast and have a lot of variety food to eat. Room so tidy and luxurious. Bed was so convertable and have many pillows. Get free fruit and snak.

White_Charter: This is a lake formed in the crater of an active volcano. One can see the burnt trees and shrubs on one side, high mountains peaks on the other and this quiet large lake which is absolutely green due to the chemicals like suiphur. One can still see some sort of smoke emerging…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Amazing view of the Ratu crater. Nice scenery with good photo taking opportunities. Bring a mask if you think you will be bothered by the sulfur smell. The place can be windy and chilly so bring along extra clothing or a shawl. There were street peddlers everywhere, offering…
Dusun_Bambu: We stayed at 2 big "double room" tent. There's 2 campfire   Upon arrival we must do the flag ceremony and sang our national song. Surprisingly there's wifi! The restroom was not bad, there's hot water and some amenities. But dont expect too much.  Our camp was in a private area,…
Saung_Angklung: There are about 8 different performances including Wayang Golek (traditional Sundanese puppet show), traditional Angklung performances and cultural dances. Definitely worth a visit when you go to Bandung. There is also a shop at the location where you can buy the wayang golek…
Ciater: There are about 8 different performances including Wayang Golek (traditional Sundanese puppet show), traditional Angklung performances and cultural dances. Definitely worth a visit when you go to Bandung. There is also a shop at the location where you can buy the wayang golek…
YELLO: Connected with Paskal23, one of the most hype mall make it so comfortable. The room charge also very reasonable. Easy to go to city center as Paskal only 2-3 km away. Definitely will coming back again.
Aryaduta: I have been staying in this hotel since it was build as Hyatt Bandung and always having good experience. Hotel located in the centre of Bandung city, connected to shopping mall (Bandung Indah Plaza).  The staff is very friendly, especially the staff in the "former Regency Lounge".    Unfortunately the lounge was simplified.  Although the lounge was not as before, where most of business peoples are gathering in the early evening, but it is still okay for me. Hope the lounge will be activated as before and getting warmer for the loyal guests.
Trans: Very Good for all, good service, nice meals, nice and all of nice. I can't tell every word My Family very happy and we will back again the other activities and should take another my big family for our pleasure

White_Charter: IT'S A CRATER!! Before anything, please take the time to realize how AWESOME that is! The fact that we can actually step in into a crater and marvel at its beauty is one of the things you should put on your bucket list indeed. So here's how it goes. From Bandung City, I took a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A popular tourist spot located in the north of Bandung. A one hour car ride from the city takes us to this volcano crater. There were some persistent tourist touts and sellers around but we just ignored them. As long as you don't talk to them, they will leave you alone after a…
Dusun_Bambu: It is the newest attraction in the hilly Lembang area of Bandung. The climate is so fresh and lucky us is not raining at that time. The concept is bamboo conservation and many bamboos are used for ornaments and stuffs. It represents 7E philosophy : 1. Ecology 2. Education 3.…
Saung_Angklung: Very entertaining, educational and fun. Play angklung, dancing together, and learning about angklung in the most exciting way...
Ciater: Very entertaining, educational and fun. Play angklung, dancing together, and learning about angklung in the most exciting way...
YELLO: Stayed with family with one kid. Very nice facilities, very good location & new hotel (i heard they just opened on May 2018) . Located at 23 Paskal shopping centre & only 2km from the airport. Recommended.
Aryaduta: I'm a regular customer in Aryaduta Bandung (since Hyatt) and this is my first hard complaint for your parking services and Reception, im late for my morning golf tee off because i have to wait almost 30min for your valet service to get my car which surprisingly they parked it at BIP which i already told to the valet guy in the evening that i need my car early in the morning so please manage the parking spot for me. I back to hotel from golf at 12.05 pm and asked for late check out till 1pm ( with explanation) and without said sorry and doesn't want to hear my complaint about parking, they insist to charge for 1pm late check out.   So good job aryaduta Receptionist team !!  Ps I stay at room 1320 and 1321
Trans: Overall, Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung is awesome!!! Front Desk with a nice and friendly staff. Swimming pool with good & friendly for kids. A clean Bathroom with complete of amenities (super like it!).  Definitely will be back here!!!

White_Charter: Beautiful scenery in a very limited space, you can walk around this park in one hour. A very good photo spot. Beware of the sulphuric air. My nose went wild after 1 hour stays.
Tangkuban_Perahu: a must visit! The only flaw is the sellers who would persuade and sympathetically as you to buy their keychains and other items. If you buy from one seller the rest of the seller will say it is unfair that you don't buy from them. They will even offer to take photos for you but…
Dusun_Bambu: In short, this place is huge, beautiful, fun (there are some attractions inside it), and is perfect for hanging out with friends or family. One of the must visited places in Bandung.
Saung_Angklung: Cultural performance showcasing dance and songs from the major provinces/ethnicity of Indonesia. Entrance was IDR100,000 per person, with entry by displaying a miniature angklung which also served as a unique souvenir. Programme includes the involvement of the audience - each…
Ciater: Cultural performance showcasing dance and songs from the major provinces/ethnicity of Indonesia. Entrance was IDR100,000 per person, with entry by displaying a miniature angklung which also served as a unique souvenir. Programme includes the involvement of the audience - each…
YELLO: It is a simple yet good hotel. I would love to go back if i go to Bandung. I hope you can provide charging spot for one who does not carry the cellphones charger. It happened that while i was staying, my charger was accidentally wet, and the staff only provide the charging at the reception desk.
Aryaduta: Good service, great spacious rooms, great buffet breakfast, perfect location in the central of Bandung. There is nothing to be complained of. Only one thing i would suggest for front office crews to smile little bit more<U+0001F609>, from checked in until checked out, i saw different staffs in the reservation who were cold. I like F&B crews in the restaurant for breakfast, they were all nice, smile and friendly All in all we had good time there, we probably come back in the future
Trans: Memorable one night in Trans hotel , nice location. View from 18th floor is amazing. Food , service and rooms are good. Reciption is bit slow during check in.staff is friendly and ready to help you, will back soon Trans ...

White_Charter: This volcanic crater is small and very white with a very strong smell of sulphur vapour. It is about 2 hours drive from center of Bandung, the traffic is heavy even in weekday.  Unless one is visiting other attractions the car ride is abit far.
Tangkuban_Perahu: The Crater provides some really good photos for you to bring home. The top is really cooling, with strong winds alway coming in, I suggest bringing along a windbreaker or sweater if you are someone who cant stand the cold.  Things to note  1. Pricing I personally found it…
Dusun_Bambu: Despite the long journey to get there, the scenery is definitely worth it. You can see how they put their heart into planting the beautiful flowers and designing the park. The park is a good escape from the big and busy city, especially going there with family.  The bird cage…
Saung_Angklung: This plc was nt covered during our full day sight seeing tour outside kota bandung. So my friend n I decided to visit SAU on our own the next day. We took a taxi fr our htl in downtown bandung n was charged only 35k rph. We reached quite early (one half hr b4 show) so we decided…
Ciater: This plc was nt covered during our full day sight seeing tour outside kota bandung. So my friend n I decided to visit SAU on our own the next day. We took a taxi fr our htl in downtown bandung n was charged only 35k rph. We reached quite early (one half hr b4 show) so we decided…
YELLO: It was fun. The food taste good. The location was also good. After all, me and my husband enjoyed our stay in Yello Hotel Paskal. The service was awesome too. Just keep up the good work! Definitely gonna be back :)
Aryaduta: Good hospitality, kindly staff very helping from security, receptionist, cleaning service and also restaurant's staff. Comfortable and clean room. Thanks for all, Me and my husband feel enjoy spending night in Aryaduta Hotel Bandung.
Trans: The hotel is very nice, clean, very helpful staffs, especially the concierge, since I need to put my breastmilk in their chiller and freezer. Very friendly staff in every department, such as at The restaurant, breakfast, room service and housekeeping staff. Very recommended hotel to stay.

White_Charter: Going to the Kawah Putih (The White Crater), It's take a long time from Jakarta. It's about 2,5 hours from Jakarta. Entering to the Kawah Putih area, we have to wear the masker because of the Sulfur aroma. But That's the beatiful view !!!!! The most beautiful White Crater that I…
Tangkuban_Perahu: No doubt on a good weather the view would be great but the price in for tourist is a bit high compare to most of Bandung other places of interest. The throngs of unrelentless touts selling items at more than triple the price does not help situation either.
Dusun_Bambu: We went there and really enjoy the view and the creative structures.. The food is so so and quite expensive.. Pretty crowded at that time.. Temperature is nice in this area.. Cool but not cold..
Saung_Angklung: the best performance of Angklung, I enjoyed and happy to see this. fantastic. every guest can also play the angklung and play and sing international song.
Ciater: the best performance of Angklung, I enjoyed and happy to see this. fantastic. every guest can also play the angklung and play and sing international song.
YELLO: Easy to reach from stasiun Bandung. We can check in earlier and staff always being friendly. Room is neat and clean, tv cable provide HBO though not in HD resolution. They have swimming pool and sometimes people wet the elevators. Should give them information to dry themselves before going up.
Aryaduta: Great location, near food court and shopping mall. Staff are friendly. Clean and comfy room. Breakfast is delicious. They have fitness center and kids club. Too bad the swimming pool isn't with warm water :(
Trans: Very high end hotel room with biggest room size, very comfort & clean. my children were very enjoyed staying & swimming.  Very near shopping mall & Trans Studio amusement park..   staff were very accommodate & friendly

White_Charter: Luckily when I get there the weather was good, so the White Crater looks so beautiful at that time. It was really a beautiful view to see and also taking photos. The people there suggested us to use mask, to prevent to strong sulfur smell, that can make you dizzy, or sort of…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I and my boyfriend come to Tangkuban parahu for enjoying the view because i know bandung is known with this place. i go there on sunday damnnnn so many people there. the traffic also bad i can't handle it :( however the views pay eveything!!!!!
Dusun_Bambu: we go there with family ..have lunch there ..food is avarage..first we buy money like monopoly money and cannot return ..make sure you spend all your money there for food ...food is not too bad..standard with the price..the view is nice and the weather is very good..not tooo hot…
Saung_Angklung: This was an accessible introduction to some traditional Sundanese artforms: Wayang Golek, Angklung, etc. The interactive segments towards the end of the 1.5-hour performance (audience members forming an Angklung orchestra, as well as the voluntary dancing onstage with the kids)…
Ciater: This was an accessible introduction to some traditional Sundanese artforms: Wayang Golek, Angklung, etc. The interactive segments towards the end of the 1.5-hour performance (audience members forming an Angklung orchestra, as well as the voluntary dancing onstage with the kids)…
YELLO: Good location (near to the mall 23 paskal), nice room (wide, beautiful view, clean), Great Crew (always helpfull, friendly), nice pool with cool water so breezing. Please info to all guest about free parking
Aryaduta: It was indeed very great experience to finally stay at Aryaduta Bandung. The check-in process is very smooth, I was welcomed by Mr Noel Tete the Duty Manager and Mr Febi at the Front Desk also done a fantastic job.  The room is spacious and clean. The hotel is very majestic and has beautiful garden and swimming pool so we can enjoy our stay. The breakfast is superb, I like the local touch "Lontong Kari" and it has very many varuesty of food.   Quick tips : Request for room at 3rd floor, it has direct access to the garden and swimming pool and also have balcony. But if you prefer for quit stay, ask for higher floor.  Surely I will come back to Aryaduta Bandung whenever I visit Bandung. Cheers
Trans: I stayed for one night only for family holiday. It was high season period so the check-in process was taking a bit more time since many people are waiting in lobby. Here are by reviews; - They gave me room #1424 (pool view), located in the corner and away from elevator, but it was ok for me. Score : 4/5  The room was incredibly spacious and luxury as its name 'the luxury hotel' Bed quality score : 5/5, - Bathroom with complete & luxury amenities (bath-tube included). Score : 5/5   - Pool was amazing, they have 5 pools on it. Score : 5/5 - Breakfast was amazing as well. Taste & Variety Scores : 5/5  Overall I loved & enjoyed my stay. Thanks alot The Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung. I'll be back soon for sure.

White_Charter: It's an inactive volcanic crater and the view is just stunning. The water is minty green and clear that even the clouds and mountain reflect on it. There is a hint of sulphur in the air but nothing too choky.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Paid about 200k rupiah a person and ended up being swarmed by guides. Locals told me not to interact with those guides as an Australian once got scammed so badly he ended up losing 5mil rupiah there.
Dusun_Bambu: Two hours stuck in traffic jam, 30 minutes waiting to be seated in restaurant, another 45 minutes waiting to our order. And the taste is not worth it with the price. The price of the menu is too expensive. Not recomended at all
Saung_Angklung: I like been here but i hate for waiting for longer time. I wish next time not much time to waiting. Cool place, and so entertaining!
Ciater: I like been here but i hate for waiting for longer time. I wish next time not much time to waiting. Cool place, and so entertaining!
YELLO: I bet, you will really love stay here. Not just unique amenities but also next to 23 Paskal Mall. You can find anything you want.  Anyway you have go to 4th floor from lobby entrance with unique ornament. After that energic lobby ambience will welcome you to reception.  Go to next level to room floor, with yellow and bright color. Comy bed, smooth, and have bench sliding glass door to bathroom.
Aryaduta: Hi, I am from Jakarta and I stay at Aryaduta Bandung for a couple of days.  Check-in went smoothly. And when I opened my room, it looks great. It's spacious (compare to other hotels in Bandung area), the room also get enough natural lights (big windows) and room lights. At first, the room air-con is also so cold.  My room comes with bath-tube, big closet, big TV, hot water, and all standard hotel amenities.   Aside than, water closet worked by itself at night, and little bit smelly when flushing, plus comment on air-con not cool enough (even after we put it to 17 degrees), the rest is great.  Yes, the building might looks old, however the swimming pool is clean and little chlorine.  We can see the mountain while we were swimming (plus morning sun glory).  Breakfast is delicious,…
Trans: The hotel was revommended for family trip, very family friendly, there's so many intertainment for kids and parents also. Have a very pleasant experience stay in this hotel. Even the price quite expensive but it was worthed

White_Charter: It is a narrow & winding roads going up towards mount Patuha at southern part of Bandung. Entrance ticket IDR 20k per person plus IDR 150k per car to get parked at the upper parking spot otherwise park your car/bus at the lower parking spot and get a ride by public minivan to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Expected to see some geothermal activities in the main crater but there was none, hence it feels unreal that this volcano is still active. Nevertheless the view is great! Entrance fee for local 20K for international 200K (weekday). The staff will ask you to produce local ID if…
Dusun_Bambu: This place is a bit far from Bandung city and worth the trip (only for weekdays). We visited during the weekdays, since we knew during the weekend the place will be packed with 10.000 to 12.000 people.   Since the entrance fee is affordable, visitors are packed from local and…
Saung_Angklung: Very entertaining! Make sure to put it in your agenda when you have a chance to visit Bandung.  One remarks anyway, the opening wayang golek is a bit boring as not everyone understand the language. It would be helpful if they could put the story / transcript on the screen.
Ciater: Very entertaining! Make sure to put it in your agenda when you have a chance to visit Bandung.  One remarks anyway, the opening wayang golek is a bit boring as not everyone understand the language. It would be helpful if they could put the story / transcript on the screen.
YELLO: when I was looking for a hotel room to stay one night in bandung, I found yello hotel, I see the room design is very urban modern, complete with other facilities that are not inferior to other hotels, and also the price is cheap but with excellent quality. .
Aryaduta: It is not a new hotel but well maintained. The room is spacious and has bathub facilities (very plus point for me who traveling with baby). The staff is friendly and courteous. The kids club is good, even they cover the wall so it's safe for children. The swimming pool area is instagramable (LOL), unfortunately can't take a great photo due to weather condition. Hopefully when I stay again in Aryaduta again, I'll get experience the suite room :)
Trans: This is my first time stay at TransLuxury Hotel...hotel interior was really good and the room also smell good..and i really enjoy breakfast, all really delicious and fresh..i also got a free cake on my room..i hope one day i back stay there again

White_Charter: The white crater at south of bandung is was wonderfull scenary... Only 2 hours from bandung town to get in white crater.. On the way to white crater we'll past trough the nice view of terraces rice field,greenforrest and villages
Tangkuban_Perahu: Planned to visit this dormant but not extinct volcano, Tangkuban Perahu which is a tourist attraction.  Stunning 360 degree views of the surrounding countryside & Bandung city.  Sister attraction to another Volcano - Kawah Putih. Tangkuban Perahu means upside down boat. Last…
Dusun_Bambu: Traffic jam, bad road, climbing trip. When You arrive, you will find dusty road. Dust surely come into your nose, because you have to walk from parking space to reception area. Worse thing to come, you will find snacks with price way beyond ordinary, expensive! By the way, you…
Saung_Angklung: If you want to learn about Indonesian culture, this is the place to be.  The place is a very simple place reflecting an Indonesian community.  There are cottages made of bamboo and a restaurant that serves local cuisine.  They also have a souvenir shop where you can find  a lot…
Ciater: If you want to learn about Indonesian culture, this is the place to be.  The place is a very simple place reflecting an Indonesian community.  There are cottages made of bamboo and a restaurant that serves local cuisine.  They also have a souvenir shop where you can find  a lot…
YELLO: The location was in the city center, easy to reach though the traffic is heavy and difficult to find the parking space. But location wise is okay. The hotel is very clean with modern interior, LED TV is a big sreen. The water in the pool is too cold.
Aryaduta: The best thing about Aryaduta Bandung is the staff. From the bell boy, receptionists and restaraunt staff, they were all genuinely friendly and went out of their way to be helpful.  Will definitely recommend to friends and family
Trans: Trans Luxury Hotel was give my family holiday amazing experience since we stay there. Fantastic swimming pool for kids and adult also Kids Club that make our holiday full of happiness. If any other facilities likes billiard and karaoke, its makes Trans Luxury Hotel become One Stop Hotel and maybe one night stay there is that enough.

White_Charter: Was quite lucky coz when I was there, it was quite dry and the smell of sulphur is not so strong... read review that its smelly there but when I went, I was there taking photos for 1 hour... although the announcement on the loud hailer advise maximum of 15mins to be in there...…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is a nice place for family to take pictures with good scenery. But this place require you to walk hard on stairs and sometimes the smell is not nice.
Dusun_Bambu: hard to acces this spot using public transport, decided using taxi. very worth it many photo spot and ange. Recomend for all of you
Saung_Angklung: I have been here thrice. First when I was in kindergarten, then when I was in elementary school, and then the last time when I am a college student, to record the place for the middle-term exam documentary assignment. I went there with my friends of three. Each visit has its own…
Ciater: I have been here thrice. First when I was in kindergarten, then when I was in elementary school, and then the last time when I am a college student, to record the place for the middle-term exam documentary assignment. I went there with my friends of three. Each visit has its own…
YELLO: the location is strategic, close to the shopping center and Mall, the service is friendly, room clean and comfortable, but the breakfast menu is not much choice ... Overall is Very Good… and I recommend this hotel…
Aryaduta: The breakfast is very good. I have stay for 14 days and all food was  tasty & varieted,even the facilities here are very good. Thank you chef anton for acompany me when i stayed here. I'l be back soon to aryaduta.
Trans: Stayed here several times, always a pleasure. Either for business or for family trips, this hotel will not disappoint. Staffs are well trained, but of course, not all is up to excellent service standard.

White_Charter: This is my hometown. The scenery is astounding. Amazing. A lot of photographic sites. A little bit disappointed with the entrance ticket for the cars that are parked near the crater. You have to pay idr 150k per car. Another choice is available, if you decided to park the car…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Mostly it is a sightseeing place where you can see from a high distance. Crowded on December because it is holiday.
Dusun_Bambu: I love to come to this place. The saung area is too expensive. IDR 150000/person with min. person is 6. It's actually including meal but too expensive for us. We chose the bird-nest area. It's pretty spacey, nice, enough for 7 of us and the price of the meal is pretty fair. Good…
Saung_Angklung: I wasn't sure what to expect when we arrived here, but it turned out to be a very fun and inspirational experience for the whole family. We came with my 70-year old mother, my cousin and her 10-year old son, and everyone had a great time.  The show is not just about the…
Ciater: I wasn't sure what to expect when we arrived here, but it turned out to be a very fun and inspirational experience for the whole family. We came with my 70-year old mother, my cousin and her 10-year old son, and everyone had a great time.  The show is not just about the…
YELLO: good, the receptionist very nice, and I very recommended to my family or friend. the location is effective, not far from station and near the mall.  the security nice and kind. I will be back to yello hotel.
Aryaduta: The service is very good and and the food are excellent I met Chef Anton Pradipta who guide us to Argaloka Resto and tried such tasty Indonesian Treats that have very strong uniqueness  I really enjoyed my 7 days visit at Aryaduta with my husband and I would like to thank Aryaduta for the best moment ever with all the hospitallity and marvelouz services
Trans: My kids love this hotel very much, good facilities but can be improved in term of services and honestly I expected bigger room as I visited this hotel chain in Bali which is more excellent for me and my family.

White_Charter: This was amazing! Reviews were right about not being able to stay there for long. It rained heavily upon arriving there and could only get a few snaps of the place. Take it from me, if it rains please wear a raincoat and not just use an umbrella. My boyfriend got really sick as…
Tangkuban_Perahu: First be warned of the exorbitant entry fee for tourist which is Rp200,000 per person on week days and Rp300,000 on weekends or public holidays. The locals pay only Rp20,000 per person.   There are two places you can visit. The first is the Queen Crater which is the main…
Dusun_Bambu: It's my first time went here last month, since I planed to go from several months a go. The place is quite far from Bandung city. during weekend, be patient with the traffice. So many vehicle want to go to Lembang area, which is the same way to go to Dusun Bambu as well.  During…
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo puts on a spectacular display of traditional Indonesian music and a bit of dance, readily accessible for visitors from outside.  It comes with a large shop where the temptation to buy an instrument made here is well rewarded.  The show itself is the main…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo puts on a spectacular display of traditional Indonesian music and a bit of dance, readily accessible for visitors from outside.  It comes with a large shop where the temptation to buy an instrument made here is well rewarded.  The show itself is the main…
YELLO: Please provide liquid soap and shampo in a separate can. 3 in 1 soap, shampo and conditioner is not a best way.  Position of closet is too narrow to the wall. Just turn several degree to better position is recommended.
Aryaduta: I love the spacious and clean room. Friendly and helpful staffs. Nice view from room. Food choices is good but it would be great if the breakfast menu change daily. Convenient location with mall and eateries nearby.
Trans: Amazing hotel to stay, what a joy to go back to a hotel wheres the experience begins from start to end. I was staying with my family for severals days. I feel at home and thats so important which most 5 hotels have missed out. The facilities especially the pool on the top floor with sand and the breakfast were to die for!  Minus only the security staffs in entrance and out hotel never help customers car who enter/out to hotel.  Overall perfect! Definitely would recommend n return for another special occasions.

White_Charter: Quite a distance from town centre but worth the visit . Is a beautiful place for photography , the place is cold .. And windy , interesting place to visit
Tangkuban_Perahu: Going there during Ied Fitri holiday, this crater is very beautiful. We can ride by car until near the crater. Don't go there during cloudy season. The wind is very strong and cold. Also the smell of sulphur is very strong. Prepare yourself using sport shoes for easy walking…
Dusun_Bambu: If you looking for the fresh air..you can find it hear..Lovely place for relaxing and refreshing..close to the nature..
Saung_Angklung: Honestly i'm stunning with the show and the concert. Angklung is one of Indonesian Unique Traditional Musical Instrument made from bamboo. It's one of Sundanese Ethnic Cultural Heritage. The Grand Master will teach you by himself with easy to understand method,mand after that…
Ciater: Honestly i'm stunning with the show and the concert. Angklung is one of Indonesian Unique Traditional Musical Instrument made from bamboo. It's one of Sundanese Ethnic Cultural Heritage. The Grand Master will teach you by himself with easy to understand method,mand after that…
YELLO: All facilities and services are excellent, but still lacks off the connection signal in my room. The room is quite comfy and so clean so I love to stay at Yello Hotel Paskal Bandung. Everything is very good.  Maybe i
Aryaduta: Vacation with family at Hotel Aryaduta Bandung awesome.......Im so happy because hotel near the Mall........because hotel near food center.......because hotel near shopping center......that's the amazing Aryaduta Hotel Bandung. Tq
Trans: ~They know a Quality of Service definition! ~ During breakast, all Chefs busy to check 1 by 1 all stalls to keep food tasty. ~The hotel location in super mall. ~ Kidz zone is great. ~ All staff warm & kind.

White_Charter: Worth the trip. we went on a Monday and it was not crowded. Smell of sulphur bearable. Driver will need to pay 150,000 IDR but ok cos it's another 10 min from entrance to the crater. can't recall how much was entrance fee but it was reasonable..
Tangkuban_Perahu: After reading through all the reviews on TripAdvisor and just got back from there! You would have to book a driver to take you to Tangkuban Perahu if you're staying in Bandung. The driver would then drive you around various spots in Lembang (area name) which is much needed when…
Dusun_Bambu: Came with the family including 2 toddlers and stayed at the camping site for one night over a public holiday.  First day on arrival, overall was impressive, very nice landscaping. There was a great attempt to make kt look natural, even tough it was too idyllic to be true.  The…
Saung_Angklung: We went for the second time in two years, the show doesn't change but it's so nice to see these children enjoy to perform. The interactive part is fun too. Don't skip this when you're in Bandung
Ciater: We went for the second time in two years, the show doesn't change but it's so nice to see these children enjoy to perform. The interactive part is fun too. Don't skip this when you're in Bandung
YELLO: the crew was very friendly, fast response and fast check in process.. i like YELLO ROAR also. The location is easy access from train station and air port, nice food park near hotel and public facilities.
Aryaduta: We stayed at deluxe room and the room size is quite big. Very recomended for those who travel with family. The building is a bit old but they can manage it very well so its not a problem at all. My only concern is breakfast variety, it would be very nice if they can add some more variety and can provide a decent coffee for breakfast.. Anyway we still have a great time there :-)
Trans: Very good hospitality, quick response staffs, wonderful breakfast, nice swimming pool, good location, and many more. Surely this is my favourite hotel ini Bandung. Can't wait to stay in this hotel for my next trip to Bandung.

White_Charter: to parking you car near to the spot you have to pay Rp.150.000 and you have to pay another ticket Rp 20.000 person imagine if you are with famz 7 people in the car.nothing special in there guys.that was my bad trip ever
Tangkuban_Perahu: I went on the weekend and hence pretty steep entry cost of 300,000, for local 30,000, then car was 35,000, so for me solo, my guide and the car and driver it cost us 365,000. I think the car and local cost is fine, but really, 300,000 for a non local, thats way too steep, be a…
Dusun_Bambu: Great location for mass vacation where you can dine, enjoy music, and enjoy the lake. Although the fine dining may be a bit expensive than the food court (street food style), but you can enjoy at the lake level and without a line.
Saung_Angklung: Didn't think they could play Michael Jackson's song! It's an enjoyable 1 hour solid performance by children from as young as 5 years old.
Ciater: Didn't think they could play Michael Jackson's song! It's an enjoyable 1 hour solid performance by children from as young as 5 years old.
YELLO: The location is great for me but if i bring my kids it's difficult because of very limited connecting rooms. My other concern is wifi quality which is very bad for me and the speed is very slow especially in the room
Aryaduta: Great entree, but boring rooms and 2 of 3 restaurants closed!  No complains about staff and friendly servants. Long waiting times for elevators. Not a great choise at the  breakfast buffet. In compare with aryaduta Jakarta, your score is less.
Trans: Arrived around 12pm and checked in at the front desk with Ms. Nisa, she’s really helpful and smiles a lot ^^ Booked the premiere room for a special price and it was excellent (so suitable for family)! Got the room with a pool view. The room’s really comfy, and the bathroom is heaven. Breakfast was niceeee<U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FB> Can’t wait to go back soon!

White_Charter: I've been here to this place since 1986 and this place still a favorite place to visit. Even there were so many changes about this place and also the entrance fees are keep hikes. But the scenery and the surrounding are not much changing.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It is without a doubt a beautiful place to visit but i find the entrance fee extremely expensive  INR 200,000 per person.  There were 6 of us so we had to pay 1.2 million ruppiah.    The facilities provided were mediocre. One more thing i find irritating are the sellers there.…
Dusun_Bambu: Came here when it was long weekend (sat, sun, and mon). OMG! First chaos was bad traffic to reach this place. And when I got there, lot of people had filled this park. Then, it was very difficult to find a place to eat. I should wait around 1 hour to got seat at Burangrang cafe.…
Saung_Angklung: We went from Bandung centre by taxi after visiting the geographic museum. We asumed that the show would begin around 15:30 so we made sure we would arrive an hour prior to that. It turned out to be good choice. Our boys were quite interested in the instruments displayed and that…
Ciater: We went from Bandung centre by taxi after visiting the geographic museum. We asumed that the show would begin around 15:30 so we made sure we would arrive an hour prior to that. It turned out to be good choice. Our boys were quite interested in the instruments displayed and that…
YELLO: Good location but very bad for needs of parking space. My first vacation in hotel was bad experience in brakefast..., have bad appetite. There is still plenty for other means, the rooms is clean and well analyzed. TV cable needs up date to HDV programs.
Aryaduta: Great service from front desk and waiters in breakfast room.  Good location near from jl Juanda. Breakfast meal is good, choice of menu are faboulous, taste is delicious.  I wish that i will come again to stay in this hotel.
Trans: I gave a surprise for my wife's birthday. birthday cake, flowers etc. this hotel is very supportive of the whole surprise plan, until my wife was touched. really thanks and appreciates, especially for all the employees that night.

White_Charter: Nice volcano crater. Entrance fee costed 50K IDR. They charge 150K if you want to get in with the car. Looks expensive first but worth it because you can drive behind till a viewpoint on the crater. Amazing view also on tea plantations! Note that it requires good driving skills…
Tangkuban_Perahu: When i was a kid, i used to came here before. Grow older and i came back again. Haha! Tangkuban Perahu is really clean and beautiful. I would totally recommend you guys to bring a face mask coz of the smell of the sulphur. There will be a crowd of people selling stuff there.…
Dusun_Bambu: It was a nice place for having family outing here, they have restaurant with the lake view, also some outing activities.  Nice food, fast service, and excelent location. The only things i am not agree is they limited you for 3 hour lunch only, because a lot of people waitinv…
Saung_Angklung: Great location to take visitors to Bandung.  They will have the opportunity to learn about part of the Indonesian culture especially in regards to the shadow puppets, musical instruments and dance.
Ciater: Great location to take visitors to Bandung.  They will have the opportunity to learn about part of the Indonesian culture especially in regards to the shadow puppets, musical instruments and dance.
YELLO: everything is good just the internet connection is still less likely because my room is in the corner. for the food and the amenities are all good, because I take the child so I can swim.because the hotel is on the mall so easy to find whatever we want. hotel recommended if longer in bandung
Aryaduta: The room are bigger than average The hospitality of the staff The location near from shopping center, factory outlets and place to dine The technician act fast after we had electric troubles But our room was left unlock after cleaned
Trans: Stayed 2 nights at Trans Luxury, the hotel are clean and lux, just one step to the theme park and mall so very easy to get food and everything.   The staffs are very friendly and services are excellent. Early check-in they gave us is an unforgettable moment and really appreciate it.  One downside during our stay is wifi only allowed for 3 devices.

White_Charter: Its a bit far and need extra effort to visit white crater. We started from Jakarta at 6 am and with bad trafiic we finally arrived at 12.30pm. 6 and half hours later and we got to experience the breathtaking scenery. It all paid off<U+0001F60A><U+0001F60A> Weather was super nice too!! So happy!! We…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I always bring friends here whenever they visited Bandung, weather they be Indonesian or foreigner. The view's incredible, and you should definitely go here while you're in West Java. But beware for those who haven't got Indonesian ID, the entrance ticket's ridiculously high. As…
Dusun_Bambu: Great view and atmosphere. They offer great place to stay and eat  Even their restaurant offer unique view. From man-made lake to mountain view. A good place to take a photo..  PS: should come in the morning because it will be crowded with people in the afternoon
Saung_Angklung: Only if you are a fan of culture and arts,this place is definitely worth the visit.Cheap price,lots of entertainment packs for 2 hours.
Ciater: Only if you are a fan of culture and arts,this place is definitely worth the visit.Cheap price,lots of entertainment packs for 2 hours.
YELLO: Your hotel is very strategic near mall and downtown, Food and culinary everywhere. this is the First time i visited Yello Hotel, the concept is Art street and related to young generation. It was great experience.
Aryaduta: All aspect is the best in its class. The Hotel attached with the mall. The BEST one in Bandung City with its cost. Less parking lot. Nice staffs. Nice ambience. The Hotel with full view inside the building not like modern building hotel, getting worse. This hotel is good.
Trans: I had twice experiences for stay at Trans and it still luxurious as i remembered and next time i will stay with my family The room is quite tidy and very close to holy mosque and the mall so it have easy access to all facilities nearby

White_Charter: Don't miss it if you at bandung. The view is so amazing and good view for foto and some other make prewed foto at this place.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I had a similar experience with the prev traveller.. Everything must pay for entrance now  n its not cheap .. On top of that go to kawah domas must  have a guide n must pay - more than the entrance fee .. I paid 200k entrance for  7 pax  (total 1,400,000) .. N 400,000 for the…
Dusun_Bambu: Just don't go here in holiday season, the traffic was so freak and so crowded. But, you can taste freshness air in here. Really great place to visit with your family.
Saung_Angklung: We went on a class trip and it was really nice to see them performing. Other than that, we were also demonstrated on ways to construct an angklung.
Ciater: We went on a class trip and it was really nice to see them performing. Other than that, we were also demonstrated on ways to construct an angklung.
YELLO: Need to maintenance for guest facilities in meeting room, because we find plug not in proper condition. the plug was uprooted from the wall so we can see cabling inside. It should be repair soon considering for guest safety.
Aryaduta: I came to Aryaduta in the last minute on January 01', 2019. We planned to back to home but after i checked Traveloka, Aryaduta had good price, and we're so excited to expand our holiday in this hotel because at the first time i came here, it was amazing and i like all the things of this hotel like the services, breakfast, facilities and the room
Trans: Excellent service,friendly staff,best price,various menu for breakfast,overall really excellent. I really satisfied. I will tell my friends to stay at Trans Luxury Hotel. I will be back with my big family.

White_Charter: Good place but need better manage for public transportation going up and back to the pool. The drivers should not speeding when they take the guests. Also need better manage for queuing line on the way back from the white crater to the station. Due to there is not queuing line,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: When I see the crater of Tangkuban, I felt standing in other planet. The entrance ticket is 10times expensive than local but its worthy to feel the natural wonder. There are many sellers who sell souvenirs if u enjoy the bargain, this is the best time to show yr ability
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun bambu has an amazing landscape and view, great architecture and nature. But I think it can be more than just a family leisure park, it can broader the concept to be more educative to the visitor, becauce it have so much assets on variety of plants, nature area and villages…
Saung_Angklung: Positif: A very nice show with lots of interaction with the audience. Tiny angklung entrance ticket is very creative.  Negatif: The reservation should be more informative to guests who plans to visit as small group / family. At first, me & my family was rejected with reason that…
Ciater: Positif: A very nice show with lots of interaction with the audience. Tiny angklung entrance ticket is very creative.  Negatif: The reservation should be more informative to guests who plans to visit as small group / family. At first, me & my family was rejected with reason that…
YELLO: Swimming pool for kids should be warmer, because the weather at Bandung is freezing. The internet connection in tbe guest room should be faster than the lounge area. Maybe you could ask the provinder (Telkomsel, XL, Indosat) to boost their signal..
Aryaduta: First of all, this is the worst hotel that i ever stay. my wife fell in the bathroom until her hands and feet were swollen. but when we complaint to the front desk they take it casually or not seriously. Food on breakfast i can said need to improve the taste
Trans: This is a third time I come to this great hotel.. Trans Luxury is absolute lux hotel.. I love the design, service, meals, facilities that make me have a great experience in Bandung.. Near to the mall and fun park. Great Hotel, Lovely Bandung..

White_Charter: Loved the crystallized turquoise hue of the lake once the sun shone upon it! From afar, it appears like a giant puddle of milk — thanks to its turbidity — which makes a visit to the site quite a surreal experience. Some people kept sneezing and coughing when they went near the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If you're someone who's travelled extensively especially to places like Nz where you'd be spoilt for postcard-worthy picturesque places, then you could consider giving this a miss. But for those wanting to get more of the Bandung feel - other than just the endless factory outlet…
Dusun_Bambu: Came here when holiday and it was so freaking crowded. The queue was so long, no table left at the foodcourt. Decided to walk around, but the weather was too hot. If you want to come, try to come when an usual day, not at peak season. Or try to stay in their hotel, it's a nice…
Saung_Angklung: It is no wonder that the show performed by Saung Angklung Udjo is successful.  It is a unique experience even for a local.  The children performers were constantly smiling, enjoying what they were doing.  Theirs are not forced smiles, which as a result made me happy watching…
Ciater: It is no wonder that the show performed by Saung Angklung Udjo is successful.  It is a unique experience even for a local.  The children performers were constantly smiling, enjoying what they were doing.  Theirs are not forced smiles, which as a result made me happy watching…
YELLO: It was an excellent trip to Bandung with friends after 9 year, We 5 were very much happy and comfortable staying in Yello with all their  hospitality, surroundings and facilities.  i am very sure, will be visiting Bandung again with my family soon and definitely not other than YELLO !!!
Aryaduta: Formerly Hyatt Regency, I remember visiting this hotel when I was a kid. Operated now under the management of Aryaduta, the glory of its Hyatt period is still reflected through the hotel's interior. I would say this 20-year-old hotel is a beautiful charm in the city.   Entering the hotel, I was (again) mesmerized by the art deco grand lobby. Three vertically arranged ceramic murals made a perfect backdrop for the hotel's bar, reminding me of the Britannia Restaurant onboard RMS Queen Mary 2 (the ship was completed in 2004 but it really has a vibe of a 1930s ocean liner). The 15-story-height ceiling was complemented by a hexagonal skylight. Checking in was quick but I spent some more time at the lobby, sitting while indulging myself in a nostalgic vibe.   Our room was on the 12th…
Trans: 1. very good for children and family, but menu for breakfast need to improvement (variety and taste). 2. very good pool 3. location hotel wih mosque that great 4.interior its so luxury 5.tv in room if can change with tv touchscreen

White_Charter: Definitely must place to go when you are in Bandung ! I amazed by the beauty of this place <U+0001F60D> n glad that I visited it. Be prepare to bring some jackets . <U+0001F606> face mask is available to purchase at the entrance . I think it cost around $1 each or less.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Don't understand why is this 'attraction' being listed in many travel guides as must go! I had to pay 1.2 million rupiah for my family of 4 to visit this place to get cheated by the guide and so many ‘salesmen’. My driver had already warned me before coming that there will be a…
Dusun_Bambu: Incredible Architecture Upscale Attraction Nice Transportation Clean, Neat and Tidy Beautiful Interior of the Restaurant  but too expensive foods & drinks Availability of Parking Poor signal and no Wifi Recomanded for Family and Friends
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the best place to visit... It's actually very interesting such a traditional instrument can make a nice and heart warming sound which I believe it's was the sound of Indonesia. If you happen to be in Bandung do make a space on your schedual to visit…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo is one of the best place to visit... It's actually very interesting such a traditional instrument can make a nice and heart warming sound which I believe it's was the sound of Indonesia. If you happen to be in Bandung do make a space on your schedual to visit…
YELLO: Overall very good, but it's still have 1 place to improved, it's the internet connection is so bad, wifi signal so poor also for the internet speed is so slow, 1 stay 2 night with my little family, between this 2 day we enjoy the facilites also the staff are friendly.
Aryaduta: Stayed here since feb 2018. The hotel has thousand of ways to disappoint me. Today it went higher level because while I was brushing my teeth, super yellow water came out from the pipe. I have a video of it but I can’t upload the video. I have my working permit registered under this hotel. I have no choice but stay here. Otherwise, I would never ever recommend Anyone to stay here! Btw, today I enter the room with super dirty bedsheet too. And I have to made request to have luggage rack, iron board and ironer to be sent to my room. <U+0001F44F><U+0001F3FC> good job!
