Trans: I had a very good time spent in this hotel, just one step away from the mall and trans studio. The staffs are very friendly and the most important thing for us was the room are ready when we arrived at 10.00 so they gave us an early check in, really appreciate it! :)

White_Charter: I left Bandung centre at 6.30am as I wanted to avoid any crowds. I also travelled on a weekday which helped. It was worth the two hours in the car through tea plantations, strawberry and vegetable farms. The drive itself was enjoyable - at that hour of the morning you watch the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We went to both the Tangkuban Perahu and Kawah Domas. Both views are beautiful. The walk to Kawah Domas is about 1.2km, it took us about 20 mins to walk to the hot spring. We tried some boiled eggs and the foot bath there. The guide is friendly. As we are going with some…
Dusun_Bambu: I think the website has oversold the place. I came to Dusun Bambu with high expectation but ended up disappointed as it was not that stunning.
Saung_Angklung: Sometimes you don't have expectations and you end up having the best experiences. My group went to the Udjo school for the traditional puppets (Wayang Golek), finger dances and angklung orchestra.   The program is all performed by children from 2 - 12 (or maybe 14). They are…
Ciater: Sometimes you don't have expectations and you end up having the best experiences. My group went to the Udjo school for the traditional puppets (Wayang Golek), finger dances and angklung orchestra.   The program is all performed by children from 2 - 12 (or maybe 14). They are…
YELLO: an amazing concept hotel, there's gaming area at lobby so guest can play while waited for check in/check out even just spend time. area from lobby to bedroom so cheerfull, love the rooftop pool, surrounded by culinary area
Aryaduta: We took a Grab from the train station (which took about 10min) and 13k IDR. Taxis at the station wanted to charge us 50k IDR for the transfer to the hotel. When we entered the lobby we were like wow - very specious, very nicely decorated, felt quite luxurious. They even had a pianist playing one evening at the lobby. Rooms were spacious and very nice as well.  The location of the hotel is very good  - it is connected to a big shopping mall and within the mall and close by are many eateries and shops. The area around the hotel has proper side walk and one (unlike in Jakarta) does not feel endangered while walking. The hotel has quite big areas to host events and many facilitates, which except for the swimming pool did not have time to explore other. My only complain was the…
Trans: all of this hotel are excellent and price compare with value is suitable. i would like to come back again if i visit bandung for business or vacation. my next plan stay here with my family,they must be like to stay!

White_Charter: This place is bit underrated in the lonely planet but do visit it if you are undertaking a day trip south of Bandung. It is simply a breathtaking site!
Tangkuban_Perahu: I was here 2 years ago and same as most reviewers, my friend and I were "robbed" SGD 70 - 90/pax for some awful keychains and beads! Even when we told them we don't have much cash with us, our OWN guide told us it's ok, he will follow us back to hotel and we can pass him cash…
Dusun_Bambu: they have a very good architecture. Provide wide range of food, but in average quality, and too pricey. They also provide games for kids. This place is too far from Bandung.
Saung_Angklung: I have lived in Bandung for long, but throughout my stay in Bandung I never manage to visit this popular hotspot. Ironically, I eventually manage to visit this place only after I moved to other city.  I initially thought that the show would be just an angklung musical…
Ciater: I have lived in Bandung for long, but throughout my stay in Bandung I never manage to visit this popular hotspot. Ironically, I eventually manage to visit this place only after I moved to other city.  I initially thought that the show would be just an angklung musical…
YELLO: Just so-so. 1. the room rate is too expensive for the facilities. 2. Variety of the food is little. 3. Location is great and near from every destination in city center. 4. Check in and check out process is easy.
Aryaduta: I was here with my husband and his big family to attend a relative's wedding. We travelled to Bandung with train (me and hubby) and we reached there at night; so it was a very short trip and time that we spent on this hotel. Our room was on the 9th floor, view is nice (city view) - when we saw it in the morning; we also see the pool. Room itself, is not modern, a bit colonial style but very spacious i must say. It has basic amenities, thou we only have 1 room slippers, but they do provide complementary water, toilettries (shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, body lotion, hand soap, shower cap, botton buds, sanitary bag, shaving cream and razor, toothbrush and toothpaste, etc.). The bathroom also quite big with bathub in it; i found that even if we add anti-slip mat, it still…
Trans: Visited this hotel for two nights during a work trip to Bandung and had the opportunity to stay in both the Premier room and Celebrity Suite. Both are gorgeous spacious rooms and keep with the luxurious theme of the hotel in red, gold, and cream. Nice toilet amenities, big bathroom, and pretty comfortable bed for a nice sleep. Plus, both rooms overlook the city and it's very nice at night.  Trans Luxury has a nice restaurant on the 18th which serves international, local, and Western-focused dishes like steaks and soups. Very decent taste for what you're paying for, and if you want, the classic cocktails are quite good too. Downstairs at the pool floor there is another buffet restaurant for breakfast, and the international spread is very huge - anything you want, they have it.  …

White_Charter: I went with my 2 daughters.  Drove from Jakarta to Ciwidey, starting early in the morning.  Arrived at Kawah Putih at around 10 AM.  The drive to the Kawah Putih area was great, clean air, wonderful views of tea plantations, the mountains, a nice change from the city views.  I…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If its your first time visit, you're not going to regret it. The view is beautiful and the place is clean.
Dusun_Bambu: #NAME?
Saung_Angklung: A fantastic palce to go though a bit convoluted to get there. Its a school where they teach people how to play the bamboo angklungs.The sophistry is immense and they can play complete songs and an orchestra largely on multiple instruments played by the same player.Very Very…

YELLO: all services are oke , facility ok, cleaning ok, maintain your good services or increase the service , make it different than other *** hotels  increase quality of wifi signal,  thank you for your all services
Aryaduta: I came to bandung for 1st time and choose this hotel for my wedding anniversary..hotel provide small cake for us and upgrade our to balcony type..thank you aryaduta ;) In short my review: 1.room-very clean and comfortable 2.staff-so polite..very friendly especially at check in / check out counter 3.food-very tasty..we ordered in room dining for reasonable price..breakfast more to indonesian type..but i like it..im so impressed with jamu section during breakfast 4.environment-so calm..not busy except if any wedding function etc at night 5.location-very strategic and access to mall 6.safety-i feel so safe here  Although its old hotel, it managed well and i think they still in process to upgrade their  service and give the best after tookover from hyatt regency.. Overall im happy…
Trans: Good Hotel for Business & Leisure.. if you'd like to visit Bandung, stay at Trans Luxury Hotel, it's all good with many facilities and great hotel has to offer.. Mall, Amusement Park, Cinemas, good restaurant and more..

White_Charter: I've been here a few times, usually whenever family or friends visit us in Bandung we'll bring them here. The place is excellent and involves a bit of walking but not far to go down the steps to the crater. Nice to see sulfur deposits around the lake although the smell is not…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban perahu is still fine if you are a first timer. But, do not advance further to kawah domas as it will be the worst experience you ever had. As mentioned by many reviewers here, visitors must beware. Although kawah domas looks good, do not go. The hike is 1.2 km and it…
Dusun_Bambu: Very nice place to enjoy nature, great restaurant with beautiful lake view. The food is good as well.
Saung_Angklung: If you want yo know more about a place, visit their cultural place, and I think saung udjo were worth to try for. They open at 3pm. What you are about to see? An angklung gala performance where your ears pampered by angklung dan calung (traditional musical instrument). And I…

YELLO: Located in the Paskal 23 Shopping Centre. This hotel has strategic location. The room is clean. The front desk greeted nicely and the check in and check out process is fast. The wifi worked normally. There is also swimming pool for kid.
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Hotel Bandung before was Hyatt Regency Bandung, quite nice and convenient 5 star hotel in Bandung. Eventhough already about 20 years old, the hotel is well maintained, and has a very good service and friendly staffs. The room is spacious, the suite room has dining area, living room, spacious bedroom, closet, spacious bathroom with standing shower, bath tub. 2 bathrobe/kimonos made from cotton - linen soft & comfy of nice color, nice pattern of room sandals, bathroom amenities by one of Indonesian senior designer. The deluxe is room are spacious too, with sofas/ sitting areas before the bedroom area.  The swimming pool has quite warm water, with approx 25 metres length, and 1,7 metres depth and has a baby pool area too at one corner of the big pool. And in the pool area…
Trans: one of the reason for staying in this hotel is for staycation. the atmosphere and the facilities made us feel relaxed and pampered during our short escape. when we visited the pool during breakfast hour it was kind of crowded but it was ok because of the weekend.

White_Charter: Last July holiday I went to kawah putih ciwidey with my big family. The wheather really support our visit. Crystal clear sky make the beauty of kawah putih looks so stunning. The crater so greeny very contrast with surrounding, sulfur smell comes and go. When you look around you…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view is beautiful especially this time of the year when the mist is thick. However the dozens of sellers spoil the fun and beauty of the legendary mountain. They will offer to take your photos from various angles and story the legend of the place. They will then tag along…
Dusun_Bambu: We decided to stay in eagle camp (glamour camping)   Price is expensive that you can have suite in 5 stars hotel in city, but who cares? One time experience that you sleep in a tent with more than enough facilities and own bath room too.  Tent can accommodate 10 people. There is…
Saung_Angklung: feel the angklung atmosphere here. not far from surapati area, you can find another traditional situation in the middle Bandung's hustle.
Ciater: feel the angklung atmosphere here. not far from surapati area, you can find another traditional situation in the middle Bandung's hustle.
YELLO: yello paskal hotel, i highly recommend it, with full facilities and very friendly service, so make a chance for a chance again at yello paskal hotel. my brother also feel at home can stay at yello paskal hotel, essentially my brother and I are very comfortable being dibandung by staying at yello paskal hotel.
Aryaduta: My sister held a wedding ceremony over there, but the hotel services were still kinda bad. Especially for room access. My fam n the bride lived in the different floor and we had a lot of stuff to do with her, but we hardly could go to her room because we didn't have the access to her room. We had to keep asking to the team wedding organizer or worst case was go to the lobby to ask the FO team to help us, which was very inconvenient. I think it's better for groom n bride's fam have cards that can access to the floors which rooms are used by family members.  We also asked for a bellboy at night after the ceremony to help us bring our stuff down (gowns, bags, shoes, mannequin, etc) but we had to wait for a long time. Then, we decided to bring it by ourselves. When we (2 girls)…
Trans: This hotel also has good swimming pool especialy for kids. Because it has sand pool. Your kids will be very happy to have holiday here.   There is also big and beautiful mosque beside trans studio mall.

White_Charter: We've finished one year academic.. we closed it with holiday in Bandung. One of place we visited is White Crater (Kawah Putih) in South Bandung.. the view was so beautiful.. even this place's often used for photoshoot or prewed photo.. but, you can't take a bath or swim in this…
Tangkuban_Perahu: From visiting a nature sight perspective, I truly enjoyed Tangkuban Perahu. The scenery is quite amazing, especially if it is your first time in the volcanic area. There are several hot springs in the area, all of them with different temperature, if I remember correctly, varying…
Dusun_Bambu: Avoid visiting this place on weekend or holiday season. The road to this place is uphill and narrow. We have to parked our car to second parking lot (P2) which is uphill and dusty. The place itself is cozy because it's still new. I like flower garden the most. There are many…
Saung_Angklung: I think a good entertainment is an educating one. Like Saung Angklung Udjo. It is not only fun, beautiful and interactive, but the audience actually learn a lot of things about local Sundanese culture through the performances. You can see dances, traditional ceremonies, wayang…
Ciater: I think a good entertainment is an educating one. Like Saung Angklung Udjo. It is not only fun, beautiful and interactive, but the audience actually learn a lot of things about local Sundanese culture through the performances. You can see dances, traditional ceremonies, wayang…
YELLO: This my first time stay here :  Check in - Was smooth even wait more than 10 minutes. But i get all what i need, high floor and double bed.  Breakfast - I never try, due my booking just room only and wake up late.  Security - friendly enough  Room - I found little hair some on my bed sheet, make sure room are clean before guest check in.  Room Boy Staff - i met some of them but they not looks energise in the morning shift level 8.  Wifi - The connection damn slow, that which is i cant browse and hard to sending email. Even i plan to play some games, the connection horrible, this my first time stay at Yello and really make me feel not comfortable.  Location - Easy access to Paskal 23 Mall, near to famous souvenir shop Kartika Sari, Too bad our grab need to pay the parking fee…
Aryaduta: Stayed here for 6 days. First time to Bandung, the room was not consistency e.g the second room I stayed was without hair dryer. The first room I stayed, due to the door card sensor was malfunction, thus I requested to change another room. Overall cleanliness was OK. The room a bit old, but comfortable.  The staffs are very friendly and good service. Smiles a lot. Personally like to sit at their Lobby, and have a cup of nice Latte in the morning before kick start my day :)  Every evening after our tired day, reaching hotel, we will have a short catch up with drinks and chips at their lobby.  Staffs are always refill our chips, best service! And they remember our name... greeting us all time with happy faces.  Staffs are all time attentive.  My colleague got the service to change…
Trans: hotel worth your every penny surrounding with modern mall and amusement park that makes you don't want to leave so soon. for business gathering, they have more than enough rooms for meeting and a big hall for big event.

White_Charter: First time here, the weather is not cold anymore. We were lucky as the weather was good, crystal clear sky and crystal clear lake. The nature is soo beautiful and peaceful yet leaving a dash of mysterious and ancious as it is still an active volcano. We were recommeded to buy…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Foreigner has to pay 10x entrance fee. (AU20 weekdays, AU30 weekend and public holidays)  And you have to bring the guide with you if you want to go to Kawah Domas. (AU30)  We started with 1 guide and then there were another 5 followed us.  We had no idea that the walk is bit…
Dusun_Bambu: going the earliest in the morning on monday. Dusun Bambu has been packed with tourists at 9 am. Reserved seats for lunch at Burangrang Cafe, as the khatulistiwa market is unbearably too crowded during midday. The picturesque lake, with tall trees and small cottages is still the…
Saung_Angklung: The show is entertaining. It is also educational regarding a traditional musical instrument. Definitely one of the highlights in Bandung. It engages audience to take part at the end is like icing to the top of an already sweet cake.
Ciater: The show is entertaining. It is also educational regarding a traditional musical instrument. Definitely one of the highlights in Bandung. It engages audience to take part at the end is like icing to the top of an already sweet cake.
YELLO: The service is easy and very good.. Its location is adjacent to the mall, so staying in Yello is not boring, easy to find food. And most importantly its location is very close to the train station. The location is very easy to reach especially for me who like to travel with public transportation.
Aryaduta: No need to explain too long. Start from check in to check out everything run smoothly. The hotel located at strategic location (connected with Bandung Indah Plaza) and easy to access. The room is spacious and comfy. Breakfast with various menu and friendly staff. The facilities is good but the fitness center too small with limited equipment (hopefully can add more class for guest like yoga maybe). So far Aryaduta Bandung is great !!
Trans: We are so happy to stay in trans luxury hotel Our children and my parents very excited to use all facilities in here The food very delicious and various This hotel very recomended for business n leisure

White_Charter: White Crater has a nice scenery for photo shoot. The area is clean, and we only need 5 minute walking from parking area to the crater, but car parking is too expensive, we need IDR 150.000 for it and IDR 20.000 per person. You can park your car at a front gate, it is free but…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We've got the shock to have to pay IDR180,000 per pax and ended up paying IDR900,000 for the five of us. The facilities are mediocre. What disturbed me & my family the most is the persistent sellers of souvenirs that prowl on the foreigners. They won't leave you alone until you…
Dusun_Bambu: A new recreation park in Lembang. At 8.30am I already arrived there. The park was still pretty much empty, not more than 20 visitors. It was heaven. I enjoyed the boat, the lake, the river, and taking picture so much. It was so serene, we decided to stay on one of the gazebo,…
Saung_Angklung: I brought a friend from abroad and we totally enjoy the show. The angklung songs was good, plus they y give an opportunity for the guests to participate in playing angklung.
Ciater: I brought a friend from abroad and we totally enjoy the show. The angklung songs was good, plus they y give an opportunity for the guests to participate in playing angklung.
YELLO: This is our first stay in paskal area. Great place to stay. Strategic location. Great for family or young couple. Facilities quite good. The 23 mall just right below the hotel. Good city night view and the mountain range view from the window. Every convinient store you need and the resto/ culinary is right in front of your eyes surrounding the hotel.
Aryaduta: We always use this hotel since it was managed by Hyatt and it always be a long staying visit in this hotel when we are in Bandung. It connects with a mall so it is easy to find food and your daily needs. lt also has a strategic location, closed to the airport or train station. The room is comfortable and always clean. The turndown service is thumb up!   However, this year visit was not a satisfied one compared with previous years. As I noticed that most of the Front Office staff are new and they are not as friendly as the previous staff. Even I found out that the Duty Manager that I saw also not friendly. It such a shame that as a costumer service based business, you need to build a good relationship with your guest especially the repeater and long staying guest. By doing this,…
Trans: This is the 4th times we have stayed at this hotel. Our children really love to stayed at this hotel because of the Kids Club and the 'beach' pool. Easy access to the Mall. You will get unforgetable moments if you stay at this hotel with your family..

White_Charter: Great scenery for both day and night visits. During the day, panoramic view is breathtaking. Night time is the best for star gazing.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This Volcanic crater is considered as a tourist trap and we can understand why. Awesome view and there are few view point area. One view point overlooked the crater and Bandung city. Make sure that you arrive there before 12pm as the fog will cover most of the view and leave yu…
Dusun_Bambu: This place offers a new experience for visitor in Bandung Area.Situated in Lembang (mountain area) offers a fresh and cool air and some restaurants, rooms and tents to stay in and several activities.  I would start my review from the restaurant : we went in to one of the…
Saung_Angklung: we went all the 5 of us and was really entertained with the show there. the show was nearly 2 hours long and we enjoyed every bit of it. we got to sing, play the angklung and watched the kids dance their traditional dance.
Ciater: we went all the 5 of us and was really entertained with the show there. the show was nearly 2 hours long and we enjoyed every bit of it. we got to sing, play the angklung and watched the kids dance their traditional dance.
YELLO: Overall about facilities, location is okay...but wifi was very poor..I don't know why I couldn't connect wifi along stay in there.. And hope in future Yello prepare facility for water dispenser which is, in my opinion very helpful for all the guests..thankyou
Aryaduta: I booked 2 rooms with connecting doors. The location is good if you plan to shop in some of Factory outlets in Riau bandung. This hotel also has direct access to a mall so easily for you to buy anything needed. The breakfast has many varieties, kids also love its kids club and garden. With its location and facilities, I love to spend my holiday in Bandung in Aryaduta.
Trans: Stayed in this hotel during business trip and had a great event here,  also yet I found that they have great facilities for family. Food was amazing! Staff are very helpful. Room was very comfortable with complete and great quality of amenities.

White_Charter: I came here during holiday. It was crowded. And the traffic was crowded too. Idk during regular day    If you want drive your own car til' crater you should pay IDR 150000 for your car. And entrance per pax IDR 15000. Or You just leave your vehicle in the parking lot. And take a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The volcanic crater lake is absolutely amazing. Pristine ...  the temperature is relatively pleasant compared to the heat of bandung or Jakarta. Avoid going on weekends as you are sure to get stuck in the traffic for hours!
Dusun_Bambu: It is good place to take a photo and the air is fresh. But the food is average. They have flower park in the centre. The food is average.
Saung_Angklung: On the crowded traffic of Bandung, this saung angklung udjo offer the different environment. Cozy place, refreshing environment, also the unique show of traditional angklung of Indonesian and you may play it with all the audience! What a good experience! I recommended for any…
Ciater: On the crowded traffic of Bandung, this saung angklung udjo offer the different environment. Cozy place, refreshing environment, also the unique show of traditional angklung of Indonesian and you may play it with all the audience! What a good experience! I recommended for any…
YELLO: Great location. Clean. Comfortable.  But the pool its too cool like ice water. Cannot enjoy it. Parking area at mall n very hard to find a space to park my car. But we can walk to the mall to find some food or just hangging around.
Aryaduta: It was a good one night stay in Aryduta Bandung. I was asking the FO staff to print and scan my documents and they did it well as I noticed one of them is Agung that he is so communicative. Also in my breakfast the ambience was relaxing and I pointed to a trainee named Riky that he was eager to serve everyone. But the fried rice is a bit too salty as it is already mixed with salted fish. In addition, it is a good hotel with a beautiful rooftop park and the swimming pool as well and also it has a nice cozy room to sleep.
Trans: If you want to find hotel that have one stop solution for entertainment, beside Dufan, can find this hotel. Good price too for Trans Studio ticket.   The hotel have very good room, especially at corner. Have lots of places nearby to find souvenir.

White_Charter: Went here few days ago, and found that this place is magnificent. It is a must visit place especially if you go to ciwidey area. You will have to pay IDR 35,000 (including transport), and maybe this price is only during national holiday, and only for local.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This volcano has a multitude of legends around, so if you want to have a view on the crater, drop by this place. You will love it. But be prepared, the admission is outrageous for foreigners.
Dusun_Bambu: The place is beautiful, but it is overpriced in everything. The Food in the restaurant and the stalls are totally overpriced compared to the taste or quality. I think if they continue the system, they'll shut down in a couple years. Their payment system is using voucher, we have…
Saung_Angklung: Fantastic performance by the kids playing the angklung (Indonesian music instrument) and various dance and singing performances. If you are in town you cannot afford to miss this show. It's really worth the time and effort. Ticket price is 100.000 IDR. Which is too cheap for the…
Ciater: Fantastic performance by the kids playing the angklung (Indonesian music instrument) and various dance and singing performances. If you are in town you cannot afford to miss this show. It's really worth the time and effort. Ticket price is 100.000 IDR. Which is too cheap for the…
YELLO: It's comfort & colorful hotel. Staffs are friendly but it took times to check-in. Closed to paskal food market (outdoor) & food court of paskal hyper square. Parking lot is sharing with the mall but no special parking lot for hotel guest.
Aryaduta: I only want to sincerely thanks all the welcoming staff and the very good services and quality  provided by this hotel.The room and bathroom are clean and spacious and I will rate the wifi and internet access 9/10.The breakfast is huge and diversified and the staff is very caring about the service they provide you. Access to downtown is already at your door when you exit the hotel and the environment very warm and pleasant to live.There are huge shopping malls where you can enjoy shopping and restaurants.All is perfect !
Trans: Good service and quality stay. Nice and beautiful hotel with friendly staff. Really love the club lounge service and spectacular view from the lounge. Nice swimming pool and view. Will come back again.

White_Charter: Super nice beautiful panorama.  Place still natural, quite clean n tiddy. The view very fantastic n good for photo shoot.  But for car its charge 150K IDR n its quite over priced n when u out also u shud gv tip to the "attendant" aka "tukang parkir" there.   There's also no…

Dusun_Bambu: We stayed there for a night. It is a nice place  but overprice especially for a guess who is staying there. They gave us a free voucher for sampan ride but only for 10 min. We still need to pay for other facilities there. Service is bad..need to ask a few times for voucher,…

YELLO: hotel in strategic area, easy to access paskal shopping mall and paskal food market.their staff very helpful and cheerful.hotel room and cafe also clean and comfort to guests.suitable for travel with kids
Aryaduta: This is the only hotel connected to Bandung Indah Plaza, whereas you can find food and other entertainment with more reasonable price provided. The hotel was very clean and well maintained and the most important, all staff has smile on their face. Truly hospitality business services.
Trans: Excelent hotel very near with shopping mall and trans studio welldone, very good guest aminities and friendly staff, bfast was busy but the staff very attentive, helpfull, show their profesional manner.

YELLO: Great location with very good interior design and cute hotel amenities. I like the smell of soap and that slipper...oh so cute design. Anyway breakfast is good. Excellent service. Wanna stay again soon!
Aryaduta: This is a high level hotel. Super clean, super friendly staff. This place has a superior view when you enter the hotel. The rooms are very space. The breakfast is perfect. And the mall is around the corner. This is the best choice in Bandung.
Trans: We stay in the suite room 1619. Excellent services provided by Trans Luxury with room on beautiful view both day and night. Food provided were excellent and good and prompt services attended. SPA and gift shop with good quality and trendy design on Batik. Overall - Value for money and worth for couple trip to stay for 3D2N break away from work stress.

Tangkuban_Perahu: What I really like it here, the temperature, so fresh, far away from noisy. You can find souvenirs and local foods, you should try the foods. And please find the history about this site from.the board near the location. Don't forget to come to Tangkuban Perahu.
Dusun_Bambu: Unique design, nice restaurant buildings and landscape with some activities for the young and family.  But nothing much to do if spend too much time there.
Saung_Angklung: We were there just in the nick of time, where we had the chance to take picture of all the preparation. To be honest, the first act was a bit confusing cause I can't really hear the act properly but afterwards, the show/concert was a whole lot of fun!  Was really amazed how the…

YELLO: Great and excelant Hotel.. all of amazing staff,room very clean and all in hotel. Thank you for your Servis and we will come in next to stay here.and recomended for my friend and family thank you for all staff.
Aryaduta: This hotel offer very good price per value. Room is Big, Location is super, next to the mall and a lot of restaurant nearby. Fitness and spa facility are very nice, would relax and spend a lot of time in there. club lounge relatively small compare to other club lounge hotel in its class.
Trans: For me this is the 2nd stayed at Trans Luxury Hotel and 4th for my wife. The hotel big enough, clean and luxury. That's why this is 5 star diamond hotel. Luxury hotel with outstanding services. All the staff are very polite and friendly. Start from the lobby (security and door men), receptionist and house keeping. We only stay 1 night but we are very happy.  House keeping offering additional services if needed. Thanks to Mr. Fitria, he is very polite and helpful. Room is very big with L sofa bed. Welcome fruits, mineral water, tea & coffee in the room. Luxury bathroom with bath tub, shower box and toilet. Toiletries very complete. Hotel location is very strategic with big mosque, shopping mall and theme park (super block area). Just need some steps to reach there. Breakfast menu…

White_Charter: We set off at 9am in the morning from Bandung, and arrived at the entrance ticketing booth at 11.30am.  Entrance for foreigners costs Rp50.000 person and Rp150.000 per car. Toilet break here costs Rp5.000 per person (no kidding) but when you have to go, you have to go. From here…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We (7 ladies) were in Bandung Indonesia,  and wanted to visit a park or natural attraction and were recommended this place. The entrance fee was quite steep -S$30 considering there wasn't much for us to really have access to on our own. The moment we disembarked from our…
Dusun_Bambu: It goes with the tag line "Family Leisure Park", nice park with man made stream and a very nice setting.  Many activities are available from ATV, camping ground, food court, shooting ground and many more.  Most of the activities ceased when the day break but people can still…
Saung_Angklung: get to know this place from tripadvisor (thank you guys!) and although it has highest ranking and everybody is saying how great this place it, i was really blown away by the performance. seriously. it has a part where grown ups played the instruments, it also has the part where…
Ciater: get to know this place from tripadvisor (thank you guys!) and although it has highest ranking and everybody is saying how great this place it, i was really blown away by the performance. seriously. it has a part where grown ups played the instruments, it also has the part where…
YELLO: Nice room, hot air con , terrible parking ( when the mall crowded u will have parking slot , air con not cold ( already change the room but not much cold enough, still hot ) , friendly staff, breakfast so so
Aryaduta: I was in Bandung for a part business/part leisure trip. My stay at Aryaduta Bandung was pleasant, and I must say, the city is quite charming too.   My partner and I quite enjoy the breakfast spread they have, which included Indonesian food along with other more tourist-freely staples like bread and butter. The hotel is right next to the mall and is a great place to chill or just grab a quick snack.   While the room is clean and roomy, I felt that the toilet needed some refurbishing. The shower head and tap look ancient. The room is dark after sunset, with only several warm lights to lit up the room. In general, I think the room could have more lights.
Trans: The room and the facilities at The Trans are exceptional. Room fittings are luxurious, amenities are plenty, and everything is clean and proper. The swimming pool is one of the highlights, our kids were having extremely good time there, and we were happy there was a lifeguard on duty. Breakfast there has very vast variety, and taste-wise quite good and acceptable. We also loved the gym and spa facilities. Everything else was great.

White_Charter: The entrance fee is IDR50,000 and the fee for the car is IDR150,000. If you take shuttle bus/Ongkot anting-IDR 15,000 but you have to wait for the bus to be fill up with 12 passengers before it takes a ride up which is a 7 mins ride up to the crater.   To save time, pay for the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is the most famous mountain vacation in around Bandung. Accessible with cars until the top of mountain. Here people could see Tangkuban Parahu crater. Beware, the fence are little bit small, to avoid falling down.
Dusun_Bambu: i loves this place! landscape of this place is superb! whoever love green & nature should go to this place. there is  restaurant too. but i didnt try it, only manage to eat waffle ice-cream that cost me IDR25000.  dusun bambu have a very nice lake & man made river.   overall, it…
Saung_Angklung: I am not worry late to joint a wonderful bamboo concert playing favorite songs since afternoon performance is available between 15.30 PM till 17.00 PM local time. No need rush to catch morning session after all
Ciater: I am not worry late to joint a wonderful bamboo concert playing favorite songs since afternoon performance is available between 15.30 PM till 17.00 PM local time. No need rush to catch morning session after all
YELLO: The hot or cold water can’t mix for warm water, i think the shower didn’t works for that. Hope you can fix it soon The breakfast taste is so so, nothing special, especially the porridge. But the cleanliness, the kindness is great! And the location is very good, next to the mall
Aryaduta: I love the facilities because i bring my children along on this trip. The food was good, the service was even great. The location was near to Bandung Indah Plaza dan there are quite many choice of food even it was not too nice.Thanks for Aryaduta Bandung and keep the level service you have right now.
Trans: Definitely I will be come back again if we visit Bandung. Enjoyable experience especially for my toddler son who loves to swim and slide in the pool. Near the mall is an advantage to find foods for the family.

White_Charter: As shared by other travelers , the journey to Kawah Putih is arduous , however the view is to die for! The water glitters like thousands of emeralds under the afternoon sun and leaves you spellbound ! Also, the gorgeous would surely leave you breathless (not taking into account…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I went there twice because of good wether , cheap berries , smell natural and most important is it not too far from city .    Riding horse , eat grilled corn , action with life volcano. All just on your nose.
Dusun_Bambu: i like this place because they have unique room for dine in.. the first like a bird cage and second palce near the lake they built a small house.. each room is private.. thats why this place suite for family gathering.. the food  is delicious,they have a unique way to make a…
YELLO: Good location, very close to train station and paskal 21, good price, nice and friendly staff, clean room. but bad variety and taste for breakfast, room not to quite, you can hear noise from aisle or other rooms
Aryaduta: Very recomended hotel, clean rooms, cozy and also the restaurant and foods is very good.Easy acces, staff is very nice. Complete facilities, if going to bandung again, this hotel is highly recomended
Trans: First Time we arrived, the doorman and vip receptionist give the best service. and they give an apple juice so refreshing and the room, food and all about this hotel is very good.  stay cool and keep being a good hotel

White_Charter: Ok, heard a lot of this place from reviews, internet. Flew into Bandung for a short weekend trip. Happened to be also the weekend before the holy fasting month. In short I learned my lesson. NEVER travel to Bandung on a weekend, and especially during or just prior to a public…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We pay for the admission fee for 2 adult 2 children with 1.2 million rupiah, then when we arrive our driver introduced us to one guy which he say the manager of Tangkuban Prahu, The manager suggest us to go to Kawah Domas. Need to pay extra 300K rupiah for 1 guide. He promise no…
Dusun_Bambu: About an hour drive from city, a very nice place to visit.  Children n adults will both love this place.   Arrive early to book a room at the bird nest rooms, charges applies.  Can buy food from the food court (using coupon) and eat inside.  Really nice place.
Saung_Angklung: I have been to Bandung on countless occasion, but I have only visited Saung Angklung Udjo only once. I decided to visit this place due to seeing an episode of the Amazing Race. I was pleasantly surprised. I actually enjoyed the performance, and found it very entertaining. I also…
Ciater: I have been to Bandung on countless occasion, but I have only visited Saung Angklung Udjo only once. I decided to visit this place due to seeing an episode of the Amazing Race. I was pleasantly surprised. I actually enjoyed the performance, and found it very entertaining. I also…
YELLO: Why I stayed at yello, because it was close to mall. First impression of walking to the hotel, the hotel was unique and fun, but unfortunately our room was smelly :( I thought it was just because the room was rarely used and the smell will go away after we turn on the air con for a while but it wasn’t. The amenities was not cleaned properly, I saw the trace of toothpaste in the cup placed in the bathroom (which is gross) well luckily it was changed after the housekeeping make up the room. And the soap container was empty when I checked-in :( Well overall it was a good stay and I will come back again, butplease make it room cleaner.
Aryaduta: Location strategic connected to mall and close to city park. Breakfast, room average if not 4 star level. Room spacious, no safe deposit box. Dirty plates during breakfast not taken right away. Variety and quality is 4 star.
Trans: We love the fine dining at the club. Enjoy the warm pool and spa. Will be back again. Near shopping mall and Trans Studio. Can find cheap and varieties of food at the food court mall. Will come back again.

White_Charter: It took abt 2.5 -3 hours from bandung city to reach here. Foreigners need to pay more. 50,000 per pax and 15,000 for the van. The toilet outside costs 2000 per pax and they are clean. We went on a weekday and there were a few sellers trying to make you buy the berries and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Cool place to be at. Remember things sold here are 3 to 4 times expensive than normal price. Try your best to reject politely. They will help you take pictures and to lure you to buy their things. They will make you feel bad that you wouldn't hesitate.   Irwanjoe  #GCMSG…
Dusun_Bambu: I went here in 2014. The location quite far from main city so I guess you should use private vehicle. Dusun bambu has big place, all I see is green. Fresh air, nice ambience, and they have unique concept for the restaurant, they have trees restaurant. You can stay in their…
Saung_Angklung: This is a great place to experience the traditional Indonesian culture and learn about the musical instrument angklung. The show is a colorful display of puppetry, dance and music, and even includes an interactive portion where audience members get to hold and play angklungs…
Ciater: This is a great place to experience the traditional Indonesian culture and learn about the musical instrument angklung. The show is a colorful display of puppetry, dance and music, and even includes an interactive portion where audience members get to hold and play angklungs…
YELLO: This is my first experience staying in this hotel. This hotel is located really close (even in the same building) with my favorite shopping mall in Bandung, also not far from Bandung Central Station, a good option for those who travel to Bandung using train. The lobby is not on the ground floor, (you gotta use the elevator to go to the lobby) a bit confusing for first timer, but a helpful security guard will help you. I like how this hotel is designed, it has fun and playful atmosphere, really great for those who's between 20-30 years old. The room itself is comfortable, with chic, clean and minimalist design. An apple of the eyes of interior design enthusiasts! I was traveling to Bandung during Ramadan, and the hotel also offers suhoor service for those who fast. The food is…
Aryaduta: Just a short escape from the hectic situation in the capital. The point is almost all the service is good, the room was spacious, maybe just because it was the weekend that make the situation when breakfast is very crowded and some of the menu is out of stock but they replaced it immediately
Trans: All the services was very very great. No minus, just perfect. I had an amazing birthday celebration there, the people are warm and kind. Unforgetable moments. This hotel is highly recommended! Thanks trans hotel. Gonna be back soon.

White_Charter: It was nice to see this valley during my visit to the southern area of Bandung. It's easy to access this place from Bandung than Jakarta.  The Ciwidey valley is a striking crater lake and tourist spot in a volcanic crater. Most people were coming from Bandung area. You may stay…
Tangkuban_Perahu: So i went to Bandung part of shopping trip and to go to both kawah putih and tangkuban perahu . Stepped out of the car and boom !! all the street sellers will swarm you non stop from the time you get out of your car all the way to the end of your trip. Saying NO dosent deter…
Dusun_Bambu: photo paradise, tree house restaurant concept is great, didn't eat there thou, resto house by the lake is nice also, but also didn't eat there. there's another eating area, food court/pasar alike, with lot of local cuisine and snack. Go to 2nd floor for more relaxing eating. We…
Saung_Angklung: Must see performance of contemporary and popular composition using angklung and modern instruments. Feel the difference when you hear popular songs played with the traditional music instruments. Here you can also learn to play angklung in a brief class and buy your self or…
Ciater: Must see performance of contemporary and popular composition using angklung and modern instruments. Feel the difference when you hear popular songs played with the traditional music instruments. Here you can also learn to play angklung in a brief class and buy your self or…
YELLO: A good location if you stay for short time.If you like to eat, surrounded have a lot of places to eat. They have mall under the hotel if you like to shop. It is quite convenient. Will come again for sure...
Aryaduta: I have stayed at Aryaduta Hotel Bandung a number of times and as usual always have a wonderfull experience. Their overall service was excellent. One of my favourite hotel in Bandung. And recommended hotel with fair price.
Trans: No words can explain about the experiences when stayed at this hotel...  the breakfast was WONDERFULL  the room is great ( even I don't think is big enough for the hotel with this level )  Bath tub in the room  Sandy beach Pool with Warm Water!  Execellent!

White_Charter: To reach this area of Kawah Putih a.k.a White Crater you have to drive a long way south of Bandung to a remote area but trust me the journey is really worth it. When reaching the area of Mount Patuha you have to take a transport to go to the crater which is a scary ride because…
Tangkuban_Perahu: To get to the top we needed to change from a big bus (which we came in) to smaller buses which could meander up the steep climb. The view from the top is scenic during clear weather though on your way up you will notice the pungent smell of sulphur in the air. There were lots of…
Dusun_Bambu: We went here because my friend told me this place was awesome, the view was great, fresh air, unique and artistic resto concept and it was right.  Located outside bandung city and near to lembang area, and they provide shuttle bus to get to the main area from drop off zone.  We…
Saung_Angklung: I've been here for many times, whether it's accompanying guests or I'm the guest. The performance is consistent, why? Because they almost always play the same performance and story. For the wayang play, I think it's only understandable by local people, it's funny for the local,…
Ciater: I've been here for many times, whether it's accompanying guests or I'm the guest. The performance is consistent, why? Because they almost always play the same performance and story. For the wayang play, I think it's only understandable by local people, it's funny for the local,…
YELLO: Yello Paskal is located in the heart of hype shopping center in Bandung, Paskal Hyper Square. There are many famous restaurant here, from traditional until international food. If you want to go shopping, you can simply going down from the hotel to 23 Paskal Shopping Mall.   I’ve stayed at Yello Harmoni Jakarta before, and the ambience here is as nice as Yello Jakarta eventhough the playing area is not as big as Jakarta. The room was very clean and spacious enough, so does the bathroom.   Will choose this hotel again for another occasion.
Aryaduta: It was an old hotel with good maintenance. The room is spacious completed with comfy bed and feather pillow,great pools and kids club,my children really enjoy stayed at this hotel. And i really love their services, the staffs are very friendly.
Trans: i have no other choice but this hotel. It gives a maximum service to their guests. They provide good bed, i also like their amenities. They provide with qualified amenities such as body wash, shampoo and conditioner. I also like their coffee when i got breakfast. They also provide cappucino and caffe latte. They also have gym and provided you with shoes if you dont bring your own shoes. Very maximum services.I will pick this hotel again to bring my family to have our vacation in this town.

White_Charter: We visited the crater during our stay in Bandung. Driving towards the crater (from Bandung) takes about 2 hours but is nice because you see a lot of nature and also the local people.   When you arrive at the entrance it's possible to go with your own car or by shuttle bus. My…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance IDR 200k/pax (Babies enter for free) + IDR25k/car (weekday) to get to the top of the main crater, Kawah Ratu. You'll get to see, on a clear day, which we were blessed with that morning we visited (Thank God, coz that's prolly the only highlight of the trip) a panaromic…
Dusun_Bambu: I was there with my families during my short term visit to Indonesia.   It was quite far away from the city, so private transportation is a must.   The view was nice, the foodcourt has lots varieties of traditional and street food.   The facilities are clean, new and being well…
Saung_Angklung: This is one of the most attractive function I attend during my stay in Indonesia. A big number of school's children leaded by Kati (Wonderful Lady), she was really happy which makes our day happy as well. A professional way to use the bamboo tree sticks in making a beautiful…
Ciater: This is one of the most attractive function I attend during my stay in Indonesia. A big number of school's children leaded by Kati (Wonderful Lady), she was really happy which makes our day happy as well. A professional way to use the bamboo tree sticks in making a beautiful…
YELLO: Overall's good, the food, the crew, the location surrounded with restaurant and mall, swimming pool, but the aircon at my room not functioning properly. already fixed by the maintenance but still not too cold.
Aryaduta: I arrived at the hotel at night. I stayed just for a night. The hotel looks a bit old, but the room is very spacious. I stayed at deluxe club room. The location is so strategic, next to a shopping mall. Nothing problem when I was checked in. Everything is great. The variety of breakfast are good. The facility of the hotels are complete. My husband went to gym at night after meeting, and they still open at night. I guess this hotel still need some improvement, the furniture looks old. I think they need new replacement. But overall it was good.
Trans: Trans Luxury Hotel offers an integrated location for business and leisure. Most preferred destination for someone who is looking for convenient  venue for business and at the same time enjoying an ease leisure escapade

White_Charter: White Crater is Kawah Putih. Located in the south of Bandung. To view the White Crater, I took the orange shuttle van from the base of the mountain to the top. The journey was only 10-15 minutes ride up the green mountain. I was there late in the morning, and it was chilly.…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The difference of entrance fees for foreigners and locals is 5-folds. The people selling souvenirs are very annoying and pestering. They are selling them at exorbitant prices.
Dusun_Bambu: a little a bit weird when you need to take a shuttle bus to reach the restaurant (just like safari shuttle for around 10 persons' and you need to wait for another shuttle bus if the all seats are occupied).. after you step down from the bus, you will see a really really…
Saung_Angklung: This is one of a must visit attraction in Bandung. Traditional West Java art performance with angklung as the focus of the show. The overall performance is well managed and innovative. I have came here for several times and they always come up with something new and interesting.
Ciater: This is one of a must visit attraction in Bandung. Traditional West Java art performance with angklung as the focus of the show. The overall performance is well managed and innovative. I have came here for several times and they always come up with something new and interesting.
YELLO: Good place, clean room and hotel, good service, good design and the room have the different design, strategic location because the hotel above shopping area & near food market. For the price not expensive
Aryaduta: We had an amazing 3-night stay at this hotel recently. The hotel is centrally located, just next to a shopping mall and very close to the major factory outlets. The airport is 20 mins drive away. The hotel looks a bit dated but very well maintained. The rooms are huge and all essential amenities are provided. The best part was viewing the sun rise between the mountains every morning. Make sure to get a room on a higher floor for the best view. The staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast spread was great and had a lot of options. The restaurant food was also quite good. All this at a very affordable nightly rate. We would definitely stay again if we get a chance.
Trans: Nice place and very friendly staff. Complete facility and amenities but the breakfast need more upgrade ( not to much recommended for family with baby due to the facility for baby limited so much). Over all the place is good

White_Charter: Kawah putih  or white crater is the famous and the best spot if you want to see perfect crater in bandung,west java. White crater is in the south of Bandung around 2 hours drives from bandung. You can go there alone but I suggest if you could take your friends with you, because…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Very expensive for entry ticket just for foreigner.  Nice place to visit but you will be bothered by a lot of hawkers. You can't enjoy the scenery in peace. My advice, if you are in Bandung and want to visit a volcano go to Kawah Putih (white crater), it is cheaper and has much…
Dusun_Bambu: At thursday, me and my family, we get late night hungry. Around 7 PM, we think we can get a good food but there's nothing more than a closed stand and no other way we can enjoy the lake view there. Why they dont tell us to come tomorrow? We can't enjoy anything and we lost our…
Saung_Angklung: THe visit to the Angklung Art Performance was great.  The music was AMAZING.  joining in was amazing - how one person could make 100 people in the audience play music in PERFECT time was amazing.  Dancing really great and the puppets were lovely toooooo.  Well done to the puppet…
Ciater: THe visit to the Angklung Art Performance was great.  The music was AMAZING.  joining in was amazing - how one person could make 100 people in the audience play music in PERFECT time was amazing.  Dancing really great and the puppets were lovely toooooo.  Well done to the puppet…
YELLO: The hotel was very clean, and location was very strategic, but parking lot is very hard to get because the hotel in shopping mall. maybe better if we can get dedicated parking lot for every gust whose stay in the hotel.
Aryaduta: Stayed here for the most of our visit in Bandung since February. Located adjacent to Bandung Indah Plaza (BIP) this hotel considered good after they took over from Hyatt. Staff are friendly from front desk, to lounge, house keeping and also bar.  Lounge at level 13 serves light breakfast until 10am and later snacks from 6pm to 8pm.  Their Sop Konro is a must try dish be it room service or you can have it at he lounge/bar not to forget their martabak asin and fried calamari.
Trans: We stayed from Apr 20-22 on the 9th floor overlooking the Bank Mega building. On a Saturday morning (21st) we were woken up at 6am by an event (complete with stage and booming speakers) in Bank Mega’s parking lot. We called the front desk and the best they could offer was earplugs. The event went on for almost three hours with very loud noise! Generally the room was noisy too from street noise- the window is very thin and lets almost anything in. It’s a glitzy building- with nice facilities and a good breakfast- but not at all peaceful. And service could be a lot better given the high price- ie desk could have offered to move us to a quieter room, but they didn’t.

White_Charter: Journey to the White Crater took 3 hours, I started at 8am and reached there around 11am plus. As I took a private van, it took me directly up to the summit. From the drop off point, there is a short walk and flight of steps down to the crater. Did not use the mask as that day,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Let me start with saying that we were overwhelmed to see a volcano for the first time!   The view however was spoiled by the fog so that influenced our experience.  You can walk around the crater. Didn't felt like we were harrased by the guides or sellers at all. It was actually…
Dusun_Bambu: first impression felt like a bit of gardens by the bay spore mixed with bali safari, i love rustic themes, this place is a leisure place coz it helped by the cool air in the area, becoz it's placed more in high ground than other similar place. didn't explore much coz i bring…
Saung_Angklung: At first, i didnt put any excitement and was quite worried that this show will bore me (1.5hour show) . But as the show started i am very much amazed! Excellent show and it doesnt bore you at all. Kudos to the management. We specifically love the part where the audience are…
Ciater: At first, i didnt put any excitement and was quite worried that this show will bore me (1.5hour show) . But as the show started i am very much amazed! Excellent show and it doesnt bore you at all. Kudos to the management. We specifically love the part where the audience are…
YELLO: First time stay at Yello hotel, it's a nice hotel with good location. The staffs are very friendly, we can early check in. Love the room's decoration. Near Cibadak street where we can find so many foods there. Definitely we'll back again to Yello Hotel.
Aryaduta: Please never ever book this hotel!!!! The personell steals from the guests At the last day of my stay I noticed that clothes was stolen from my room. I had also a massage at my room and massagegirl stole cash money from my room!  The management really sucks and they say sorry and do nothing for you! This is not even a one star hotel worth!!!! People book a hotel that you can trust!!! Never go to Aryaduta Bandung<U+FFFD>
Trans: clean hotel, complete hotel amenities, clean bathroom, nice and beautiful pool (there is an artificial beach for children). the taste of food (breakfast) is tasty and quite varied. friendly staff. minus: parking area is less roomy

White_Charter: Being Asian and looking like a local, I paid the local price which was only a small fraction compared to what foreigners had to pay. Walking up or DIY to the crater is impossible as you are forced to take the tourist van up which was strange. How this came about remains a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Why is so expensive because you already pay expensive for foreigner but no one handbook for the maps etc in english language, only in Bahasa hahaha lol so many foreigner need to pay more for the tourguide who will help you show area in english. So bad isn't right? Better you…
Dusun_Bambu: We arrived there around 11 am after a long and winding car journey via Lembang. It's actually uphill and is near the elephant sanctuary, Kampung Gajah. Took the rented MPV around an hour to reach this park from Holiday Inn in Bandung. The only restaurant with Wheelchair access…
Saung_Angklung: When in Bandung - you MUST watch the show, they are very good and entertaining. It s one of a kind - you ll not find another group like this any where else.
Ciater: When in Bandung - you MUST watch the show, they are very good and entertaining. It s one of a kind - you ll not find another group like this any where else.
YELLO: I stay here with my family on vacation. Hotel is freshly new, everything is okay except for the wifi is very poor connection and cleanliness on public area need to be concern for hotel management. Breakfast area is too crowded maybe its on holiday so many people are at the same time having breakfast
Aryaduta: As a five star hotel, I can say that Aryaduta is cheap with all the facilities they have. Service of the staffs are good.  I drove my own car to this hotel, and at the lobby, as I have drop my family and my luggages, there was no one telling me that they have valet service. So I drove my car to the parking area in the basement. Following the "confusing" sign at the basement, I drove my car to the shopping mall parking area, and it was horrible because of the crowd and jam. But at the end, I did manage to return to the hotel parking area.  And then I ask the front office desk officer and there she told me that they provide valet service.... hahahahha...  As we want to enjoy the swimming pool, I called the guests service to confirm that they provide towels in the swimming pool…
Trans: Room's facilities are trully luxury, it feels like in palace and my family is a royal family.  From welcoming sign on television mention guest name,  personalized and appreciated. Welcoming fruit that fresh and waitress come to give more fruits, excellents. The bathroom amenities is trully luxury, the hot tub with bubble. Tremendous amenities in room. Choices of pillow. Slippers that foam and thick. Love it and worth with the price.

White_Charter: Omg it is very cold here. Silly me because i went to Kawah Putih wearing t-shirt and short pant. Serve me right. Hahaha. Every 2 minutes i felt like going to toilet. By the way , the entrance fee for foreign tourist is 50k idr plus 15k idr for the transport to climb up to Kawah…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The bad experience started right at the entrance. I travelled there with my fiancee (who has Indonesian citizenship) and the income price was 20k rp for her and 200k rp for me. I do understand charging a bit more for foreign tourists but 10 times the normal price?!!…
Dusun_Bambu: Nice escape for couples, family, and with your friends during holiday.   Unfortunately, brunch buffet at Burangrang Cafe does not really taste good. So I'd say it's quiet expensive for Rp 150k (excl. Service tax 7.5% and govt.tax 10%).  Overall about the view is really…
Saung_Angklung: Fascinating to see how the bamboo is carved, then "tuned" by someone with perfect pitch.  The demonstrations of the instruments, dance, and puppets was charming and amazing.  The children were very skilled and the Mistress of Ceremonies was hilarious and had lots of audience…
Ciater: Fascinating to see how the bamboo is carved, then "tuned" by someone with perfect pitch.  The demonstrations of the instruments, dance, and puppets was charming and amazing.  The children were very skilled and the Mistress of Ceremonies was hilarious and had lots of audience…
YELLO: This hotel launched on May 2018 so quite clean and smell good. When we went there almost 2 hrs waiting for check-in, maybe bcos peak season during Hari Raya. The room nice, clean, and bright. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Swimming pool not so good. Small and the water not clear enough. But no refrigerator at room. And so hard to find parking slot since parking area is same together with area parking of mall Paskal 23.
Aryaduta: Nice hotel. We booked 9 rooms here for the holiday.Old but well mantained. Room is spacious, clean and bright. Breakfast is splendid. And what win my heart here? The friendliness of the staffs..starting from the security, front desk, waiters till everyone. The only set back is the very limited parking lot. Will come back again.
Trans: We stay here for 1 night in 2 corner room. The room was super spacious. Super complete amenities. The kids love the swimming pool. The sky terrace restaurant was super cool. Near trans studio, recommended if you wanna play in trans studio to stay at this hotel. All the staff really helpful.

White_Charter: The weather is very cold.. its like living in a refrigerator.. its 5-15 degrees celcius... anyone going there should definitely wear a sweater or jacket.. i didnt wear them.. im fine though.. but i kept putting my hands in the pocket of my brother's jacket... there's people…
Tangkuban_Perahu: When we got here the fog just cleared so we managed to get a few snaps before the fog starts to cloud the view. Lots of touting from the streets sellers trying to push you to buy their souvenirs and such. Paid an exorbitant amount for the entry fee of 300, 000 rupiah per pax…
Dusun_Bambu: I just came to Dusun Bambu once but will come again and again another time. Located in Lembang area, a very good place to relax and chillin with friends or family. Very nice weather, ecofriendly building, friendly staffs, excellent mountain view and have a unique cafe named…
Saung_Angklung: This is my first time watching the show and speechless was my first impression,  as Indonesian people, I am so proud with amazing culture of Indonesia,  for both Local or Foreigner this place is a must to be visited if you are at Bandung.  It's totally worth it, and I'll be back…
Ciater: This is my first time watching the show and speechless was my first impression,  as Indonesian people, I am so proud with amazing culture of Indonesia,  for both Local or Foreigner this place is a must to be visited if you are at Bandung.  It's totally worth it, and I'll be back…
YELLO: Pillow is too hard, can't sleep. Pls choose the soft one's. Pool the water quality too much chlorine. Food is great, location great. Problem was PARKING LOT not available, it make trouble to loading all staff.
Aryaduta: This is our second experience staying at Aryaduta Bandung after renamed from Hyatt Regency Bandung. This time we stayed with a large family and booked three business rooms directly to the Director of Sales & Marketing Bapak Christo Gultom. We are very glad that we get satisfactory service starting from they give us very good price also very fast service from sales team.  There was a doubt whether my family would be satisfied considering we usually stay in the suite room and we planned to stay for long stay in this lebaran seasons. My doubt is not proven, the 34M2 business room is very large and comfortable, the rooms are also clean and well maintained so there is no defects at all. The bathroom was very clean, the towels were very clean and I commended the house keeping team who…
Trans: Very recommended hotel to stay in Bandung. I really enjoyed my night in here. The facilities and the service is nice. The interior is luxury. The food is delicious. Next to the hotel, there is Trans Studio Mall so we can go shopping there. Beside that, you can also play in Trans Studio Theme Park.

White_Charter: The hardest part of the trip is the drive there. From the city of Bandung, its about 3hrs to get there. But the scenery on route is beautiful and the little homes and villages on the way bring it to life. I would suggest getting there as early as possible since it does get…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The cons. 1) Quite pricey for Malaysian. RM60 or 300 IDR per head. 2) The sulfur smell can be quite overwhelming. Go early in the morning or late afternoon. Our driver told us, if the sun is hot, the smell can be quite strong. 3) There will always some guy wanted to sell gifts…
Dusun_Bambu: Firstly, for first timers visiting, it is easier access from Lembang, I was misguided by GPS Google maps to exit at Padalarang/Cimahi, DON'T TAKE THAT ROUTE. I think it's better to exit at Pasteur even if it's traffic jam, the roads are bigger and safer.   Upon entering the…
Saung_Angklung: The location is a bit far from the city center with bad traffic, but its worth visiting and see how the actual Angklung is played. Fun for family and kids as they have children performance.
Ciater: The location is a bit far from the city center with bad traffic, but its worth visiting and see how the actual Angklung is played. Fun for family and kids as they have children performance.
YELLO: Pros : <U+2764><U+FE0F>Room prices start from IDR.384K <U+2764><U+FE0F>Cozy hotel above Paskal 23 <U+2764><U+FE0F>near Paskal Food Market <U+2764><U+FE0F>5 minutes from Bandung Rail Station <U+2764><U+FE0F>Spacious room and clean with tea maker <U+2764><U+FE0F>Connecting room available on req <U+2764><U+FE0F>Comfy and fluffy bed <U+2764><U+FE0F>Instagramable spots <U+2764><U+FE0F>Awesome murals <U+2764><U+FE0F>Friendliest of hosts  Cons : <U+0001F494>The pool is small + standard and the design is so so lah but have a great view <U+0001F494>The breakfast was pretty standard  We enjoyed every second and definitely recommend this hotel. Love it!
Aryaduta: Got a connecting room with single beds and a large bed. The view from my room was quite fantastic and the breakfast here was sumptious and crumptious. All the facilites here were well mantained. A nice hotel to stay indeed! The downside of this establishment, however, was the service. Had to wait to check in, and waiters were not too responsive. Overall, got a pleasant stay here in Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: Stay for leisure with my Mom. The Front Desk staff was friendly and attentive. I came to the hotel at 10 am for only dropping our luggage but the staff informed me that there were 1 room ready for us to check in. Good presentation, good taste and lots various of breakfast menu.

White_Charter: I could not believe the website introducing the White Crater "Mystical Lake above the Clouds" until I went there.  This is the most beautiful place I visited. It was worth while to spend 3 hours drive there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was quite a pleasant walk but be careful of "tourist trap price".  They charge 20k for locals for entry fee but 200k for foreigners. 150k for locals for a guide but 300k or more for foreigners. We had beautiful pics taken by our tour guide but not worth paying 300k for.
Dusun_Bambu: A magical place to visit!  Once you park, you are taken by a multi-coloured bus to the main entrance and from there can choose a number of places to walk.  There are several restaurants to choose from or food stalls also cater like street vendors.  There is a large playground…
Saung_Angklung: Nice place if you have overseas guests or bring kids.along...We all enjoy the activities. .specially towards the end of the whole show. love it.
Ciater: Nice place if you have overseas guests or bring kids.along...We all enjoy the activities. .specially towards the end of the whole show. love it.
YELLO: Bedroom was clean, breakfast was ok thought they didnt have cappuccino (only black coffee), internet connection  in my room was poor. Except when i was at the lobby,  it was quite ok.  Staffs were friendly and helpful
Aryaduta: Spent 4 nights during lebaran, the place was packed and fully booked.  The room was very nice and cozy, the sheets and toilet were clean and well provided woth toiletries.. the staff were very friendly and professional, although we had a few problems from the rooms's door (my door lock was unresponsive to my card, seems like it runs out of battery and the other room keycard was keep resetting its key... so my friend was keep running to reception to get new key  He parking space was limited, when its full, you have to go to mall's parking space   Overall, this hotel was nice for family and business, comfy rooms and good service, they just need to ugrade few facility to avoid complaints which could disturb the comfort of their guests.  I would defijitely recommend this hotel to…
Trans: super recommended hotel to stay in Bandung... just a minute walk to the connected mall, 5 min to the theme park, and 15 minutes to my fav factory outlet for heavenly-shopping-experience... Kids surely will love to stay here....

White_Charter: This is a cauldera lake that is still simmering with suphourous gases evaporating. You can smell the sulphourous gases when the winds that descend into the cauldera blows in your direction, which some would liken to rotten eggs. Unlike other volcanic craters where you stand and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Dont come here. Very expensive but after you pay that costly price, you cannot enjoy the scenery. Street vendor keep disturbing you like hell!
Dusun_Bambu: If you want to come for relaxing time then go to burangrang cafe. Dont expect too much for food and service, we had bad experience there. Better you go to Pasar Khatulistiwa if want to lunch or looking for snack.
Saung_Angklung: Really this is a good spot for everyone the musical instruments .. music touches .. rhythmic experience .. lovely but entry fee nearing Rs 350/- is little bit expansive for Indians .. only shows .. anyhow feel good don't think the money ..
Ciater: Really this is a good spot for everyone the musical instruments .. music touches .. rhythmic experience .. lovely but entry fee nearing Rs 350/- is little bit expansive for Indians .. only shows .. anyhow feel good don't think the money ..
YELLO: The Best location in one building with pascal 23 mall, and good facility for 3 stars hotel and good services of hotel staff but need to improve in variety of foods. Overall i will recommend this hotel
Aryaduta: Had stayed here when it was still managed by Grand Hyatt. Now just recently stayed here for couple of nights when its already managed by Aryaduta. I guess it's a burden for Aryaduta to try so hard to become like it's predecessor. The differences is so...so.... significantly.......... different?
Trans: i went with family with 2 kids, they had a great time and fun. the hotel is beside the mall with big supermarket and an indoor theme park. the hotel pool is excellent with soft sand. the kids club also great.

White_Charter: Selfie is a must here. It can be quite chilly and it rains quite a bit while i was there. If you have asthma do limit your time there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Blatant Discrimination. I travelled with my indonesian friend on her motor bike, the entry price for her was  aud $2 the price for me was aud $20. When my friend questioned why the enormous difference in price, the attendant replied because I am a foreigner and foreigners have a…
Dusun_Bambu: Straight to the important point  Location = all the way to the top you can reach these using gps, tried this and verified its good. Advice not to go at night you will have problem if its raining or fog and its dark.  Food : ok food but remember they have 4 restaurant I only try…
Saung_Angklung: If you're a tourist then this is a must place to visit and even If you're Indonesians, you'll see Angklung in a different light, you'll be amazed on how such a simple Angklung can make music like that  They have a daily show of Angklung performance at 15.30, but during weekends…
Ciater: If you're a tourist then this is a must place to visit and even If you're Indonesians, you'll see Angklung in a different light, you'll be amazed on how such a simple Angklung can make music like that  They have a daily show of Angklung performance at 15.30, but during weekends…
YELLO: Good hotel,service and breakfast are good,room are clean,wifi are fast enough,very close to mall paskal 23,location are ok,maybe biggee swimming pool will be much better so everyone can swim in there.
Aryaduta: It is our third stay at this hotel.  We were more than happy at this time. Everything is getting much better comparing to our first and second stay.  We were pleased with the services. Breakfast was great. Hotel is old but very clean and very well maintained. It seems that they renovated the room (love the new decorated room). Lovely pool.  Keep up the good work!
Trans: I really enoyoed stayed at trans luxury hotel, and i will come back again. My child really like this hotel, because they can play at the pool that look like a beach with the sands at this pool and like to play at the playground

White_Charter: Beautiful scenery. Lovely nature view. After rain, the group of cloud will surrounding the area. Heavenly!!!
Tangkuban_Perahu: The scenery was beautiful but we were underwhelmed and did not find it worth the price we paid which was Rp300,000 per pax plus Rp150,000 for the use of our own car to go up. Perhaps the fact that there were no signs explaining what we were seeing and the presence of so many…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a sight to behold, but why bother having magnificent restaurants if the food is so bad. I have yet to encounter a good dining experience in a venue which doesn't bother with spell check. Several items not available including the duck so we ordered chicken which arrived…
Saung_Angklung: 1st. impression, expensive! Several shows that include the pros & amateurs. Then, U will get 2 learn the basic of playing 'Anglung' with lots of other foreigners & local visitors as well. Very interesting! U c traditional dances, musical instruments, songs, etc. Once,they even…
Ciater: 1st. impression, expensive! Several shows that include the pros & amateurs. Then, U will get 2 learn the basic of playing 'Anglung' with lots of other foreigners & local visitors as well. Very interesting! U c traditional dances, musical instruments, songs, etc. Once,they even…
YELLO: good as new comers hotel in town in best location where one stop shoping and public transportation (railway station) closest ever. recommended for family leisure also potential for business purpose. see you there sometimes...
Aryaduta: The staff is amazing.They have helped us a lot with the information that we need. You can book for a day trip to Ciwidey (White Crater) with them and they are pretty ok with negotiating.They are friendly and tend to our needs/requests immediately. The breakfast spread was pretty good too.  Although this hotel is good and clean, sadly, the management will need to invest in some refurbishing work...The hotel is mostly dark, I am not sure if it their way of saving electricity...which is a waste as this hotel, although old, is really nice and beautiful.
Trans: My family so far always satisfied to stay at this hotel .. all is excellent for us from rooms, food & beverage, all hotel facilities, front desk services till parking staffs. Thanks. We'll surely be here again.

White_Charter: If you're visiting Bandung, I suggest you to plan a whole day trip to Southern Bandung to visit White Crater, Ranca Upas, Ciwidey Strawberry Plantation, and Situ Patenggang. Of all the places I mentioned, White Crater is the best among all. Breath-taking view, cold weather, and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Driving to the top of the Tangkuban Perahu Crater was easy. Walking down a path to see the steam pools was unpleasant.  The view if the volcano is lovely, the interesting features and effects of volcanic ash were quite fascinating, but perhaps the most awkward part of this visit…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a must when u go to bandung. The view is amazing, love it so much. The food is nice at the food court, and not so expensive. Have to be here again.
Saung_Angklung: A unique cultural experience that teaches the audience about this new musical instrument with exciting performances and hands-on demonstrations. A sensory experience that you will find nowhere else on earth.
Ciater: A unique cultural experience that teaches the audience about this new musical instrument with exciting performances and hands-on demonstrations. A sensory experience that you will find nowhere else on earth.
YELLO: Location near mall, but unfortunately the parking lot is not ok because there’s no special parking for yello guest in mall parking space. Breakfast average. Room is a bit small but clean, pool is small.
Aryaduta: Old Hotel but Classy.. we stayed at connected business room.. the room was very spacious, clean, and comfy. The food is great.. we ordered fried rice and aneka sate, it was really tasty.. the location is great <U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FB>
