Trans: I like stay here because bed room very comportable. The Interior very good, Lighting in bed room amazing. Bathroom very clean and make us relax. The food also so delicious in restaurant. The location of hotel so close to Mall and Entertainment center.

White_Charter: I find that Bandung and Yogyakarta are quite similar with the former being a tad more hipster-ish. Visited Kawah Putih (White Crater) in Bandung and Mount Dieng in Yogyakarta which was my first crater experience - the smell of rotten egg! It was raining season when we were in…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The scene is absolutely beautiful but the entrance is expensive for tourists! For locals its only 30.000rp and for tourists its 300.000rp!! I don't think it's reasonable
Dusun_Bambu: Located in Lembang, near Cimahi Waterfall, Dusun Bambu Family Leisure Park is a park you must visit if you want to spend a time with your family.  In Dusun Bambu, there is a tree house restaurant where you can have some snacks and other meals. Although it's quite expensive, you…
Saung_Angklung: We loved the show. It builds up beautifully and everyone gets pulled into the joyful atmosphere. Anyone who likes music will love it but so will people of all ages who just like a good show.
Ciater: We loved the show. It builds up beautifully and everyone gets pulled into the joyful atmosphere. Anyone who likes music will love it but so will people of all ages who just like a good show.
YELLO: Located in 1 area with Paskal 23 mall. Drop off at Cai Lobby then you can see their glass door.   Budget hotel with standar facitilites.  Clean and neat room.  We got toiletries but no hairdryer at bedroom.  Small swimming pool just for kids.   So overall nice one
Aryaduta: Came solo for a work trip. It’s a somewhat old building but been tidied up well, the staff are incredibly attentive, food is very good too. Lots of nice touches and overall a great stay. Oh and fantastic views :)
Trans: i was coming at 10 am with my tired children and they’re all asleep. I made my registration and the front desk staff were very helpful and friendly. i could have a room for no longer waiting. room was very clean and comfort. Kids pool were excellent but crowded at sunday morning.

White_Charter: A must go to when you're in Bandung. It has a beautiful view but you cannot stay there for a long time. There are many people even on weekdays but you can still get a good photo. Make sure to bring your own mask (they sell the mask for IDR 5000 each).
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is really amazing and it is called the White Crater. It is a giant crater formed as a result of a volcanic eruption. The last big eruption here happened in 1969. It is a one big range of mountains with 12 craters. This specific crater had smoke erupting since last 7…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu is located about 45 minutes driving from Bandung's city centre (depends on the traffic, the location itself is not too far away from the city). Go there early and on weekdays whenever possible because during weekend the place could get overcrowded and the traffic are…
Saung_Angklung: It's a great place to know about Sundanese culture (not just Bandung culture).  They will introduce you to Wayang Golek, Tari Topeng dance, and also the main attraction, Angklung music.  The interesting part is in the Angklung music part. They're not only doing a performance,…
Ciater: It's a great place to know about Sundanese culture (not just Bandung culture).  They will introduce you to Wayang Golek, Tari Topeng dance, and also the main attraction, Angklung music.  The interesting part is in the Angklung music part. They're not only doing a performance,…
YELLO: good: everything except, for the bad things below. bad: no signage and proper lobby to stop and take our luggage to the hotel trolley.  cannot go to basement because the parking guy said it was full despite of telling him that i want to go to the hotel and load my luggage.   No Parking for the hotel Guest. mixed with mall guest.   booked 2 rooms, Check in at 3.30pm and hoorayyyy my room wasnt even ready. had to wait another 40 mins. whereas I'm with a family of 1 toddler, 2 kids below 5 and a granny.
Aryaduta: Stayed during ramadhan month, hotel provided Sahur start from 03.00 AM with good selection of foods. Room condition was good. Clean bathroom, nice bathroom amenity kit. Location was good, near from train station and taman lalu lintas, which is nice park for kids.
Trans: The staff was friendly and kind, and we had our own butler. It can be extremely crowded, it is worth it for kids. The rooms are very comfortable and the price is very good considering the amount of amenties you get with booking it.

White_Charter: We came on a Monday morning and found the car park relatively empty. Wanting to save money, we still opted to take the shuttle bus up to the crater although our driver said we will have to wait for long. Sure enough, there was not a single other visitor on the shuttle when we…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Bit more pricy than expected (entrance in the natural reserve park), but a nice place to discover. If you bring your bathing suit you can dip in the HOT spring pools and even get a mud massage.
Dusun_Bambu: I went to this place with my friend and enjoyed cafe with nice view. This place has very nice view make me felt on village. They had public transportation like small bus to take visitors central place ( cafe , or cottage ) and it's free. I really enjoyed my time in there.…
Saung_Angklung: I came here for the first time when I was a tour guide and brought a group Singaporeans in 2010. I was amazed, and always am, with the way they serve the cultural euphoria to the guests. I had goosebumps when the children came together to the stage & played Angklung. From that…
Ciater: I came here for the first time when I was a tour guide and brought a group Singaporeans in 2010. I was amazed, and always am, with the way they serve the cultural euphoria to the guests. I had goosebumps when the children came together to the stage & played Angklung. From that…
YELLO: The room, cleanliness and service is very good. The food is average but value for money. Our stay is just for one night with 4 rooms and my family very enjoyed our stay in Yello.  Overall, Yello hotel is very good and highly recommended. If we have to stay in Bandung, for sure we will go back to Yello again.
Aryaduta: We held a charity break fasting with orphanage and what a surprise and great help from the hotel. They provided all of our needs with heartfelt service. Especially Pak Reza (FBM) & Ibu Yuli (HRM) who gave fabulous assistance to make our event run smooth & memorable. And, we really enjoy the delicious food served with rich variant. If you have meeting or event, this is totally recommended.
Trans: perfect place 4 stay in bandung with family, nice room, pool, kids club, delicious breakfast, clean and nice view from the room and also near mall so we are not boring stay all day at hotel, just can say this is perfect hotel 4 family

White_Charter: Our visit to kawah Putih Ciwidey was quite disappointing as it rained heavily when we arrived.  Waited for a while but it continued to rain so we decided to braved the rain and with raincoat and umbrella we walked to see the crater. It would have been a better view if it has…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view is fantastic but really not happy with the price, charged IDR200,000 that was for me too high just for sightseeing that crater. To me it is only once in your lifetime visit, don't think will come again for that price. Also, i was really annoyed with the sellers, keep…
Dusun_Bambu: Went here during weekdays (please, i know how harsh it can be during weekends and holidays) arrived early in the morning (i think they just open when we came) so the place is very quiet and all for ourselves..   Do some sightseeing, and notice it's going to rain, we decided to…
Saung_Angklung: Came here with my family today (Christmas Day) for the afternoon show.Extremely appalled by how the staffs treat us international guests compared to local folks.It's ok for them to cut ques and enter the hall first,but not us international guests who like them,are walk-in…
Ciater: Came here with my family today (Christmas Day) for the afternoon show.Extremely appalled by how the staffs treat us international guests compared to local folks.It's ok for them to cut ques and enter the hall first,but not us international guests who like them,are walk-in…
YELLO: The hotel is part of the Tauzia group of hotels that includes the Harris and Pop Hotels. This one has the same feel as Pop Hotels and is located above one of the best shopping malls in Bandung.  Check in time is at 2pm and I arrived at 1.50pm and was told to wait ten minutes for my room to be finished. The lobby area was very cheerful and colourful with lots of windows and great views all around the city and the hotel staff were friendly and helpful.  The room was small, very similar to Pop Hotels I had stayed in in the past, with a large flat screen TV and sliding glass bathroom door. The two things I like in a hotel is a good wifi signal and good air-conditioning. While the WiFi was excellent unfortunately the airconditioning was not very cool at all. I reported this to the…
Aryaduta: The stay was pleasant & satisfying. The hotel had provide us anniversary cake as a complementary, but the wording is incorrect since it stated 'happy birthday' instead of 'happy anniverdary'. But that doesn't matter to us since the hotel still had fulfil our request for the complementary cake. The room as spacious & clean. The breakfast choice of food was plenty & delicous.
Trans: first class service for first class hotel, it is my 2nd visit here, i would love to revisit TLH soon, hope there will be frequent guess surprise from TLH's frequent guess, it would bbe nice for me and my family

White_Charter: The place is very beautiful...its a different experience...white lake...strong sulphur smell..better to bring a mouth mask while visiting this place..tea plantations and strawberries farms can be covered on the same dayas they are near by...
Tangkuban_Perahu: Haven't been to many volcanos so this was interesting. Not much volcanic activity but it was nice to walk around the volcano rim. You can actually walk a fair way around, just not down into the crater without a guide. A bit expensive at $200,000 plus about $100,000 for transport…
Dusun_Bambu: Bandung known for its creativity, and this place is one of proof of it. The scenery is average, but they combine with artificial shape, path which make it wow.
Saung_Angklung: Goose bumps all the way! Excellent performance, with famous songs and the public get to interact playing with the traditional instrument.
Ciater: Goose bumps all the way! Excellent performance, with famous songs and the public get to interact playing with the traditional instrument.
YELLO: The hotel needs to provide parking space for hotel guests out of the shopping center. It is very good location. The food is good but not enough variety. Rooms are very clean and comfortable. Check in and check out process are very fast
Aryaduta: Just don’t visit the Chinese restaurant in the hotel. Everything else is fine to visit. It has a shopping mall very close by so kids can play till late hours. Cabs know where th hotel is and it’s easy to get around in taxis.
Trans: Very crowded in weekends, especially in restaurant, pool and kids club, and services might be slower. But overall good experience, nice food and helpful staff. People with long stay might need a more variations in food and beverages, because it's almost the same menu everyday, only few changes.

White_Charter: First impression is : way beautiful than I imagined. I finally had a chance to visit White Crater, for all this time i only saw it from tv.  White Crater located at Ciwidey, it took us two and a half hours to go there from Bandung City. it was long weekend and the road was…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 300.000 rupiah on weekends for foreigners. Locals: 30.000 rupiah. I turned around and went back home, not going to let them rip me off
Dusun_Bambu: A very comfy place to visit with couple or young children! Enjoyed the nature and view....basically everything. The food is also nice. Try Tahu Garam Pedas at Burangrang Cafe if you crave for something spicy. But not recommended to be visited on peak season as the road to here…
Saung_Angklung: this place belong to Mr.Ujo the famous and historic bandung artist. he is the master of "Angklung" again, ones of Indonesia traditional music like Batik. if you go there they can teach and we can play the angklung for all of the songs....becuase angklung so uniqe like Batik, all…
Ciater: this place belong to Mr.Ujo the famous and historic bandung artist. he is the master of "Angklung" again, ones of Indonesia traditional music like Batik. if you go there they can teach and we can play the angklung for all of the songs....becuase angklung so uniqe like Batik, all…
YELLO: Yello hotel is the best choices when you want to spend your holiday in bandung or do anything like meeting or do gathering with friends and the location is very strategic. About price is very worth it, I hope this price doesn't go up hahaha. For a breakfast,  they have a little variety and have a little trouble with toaster and coffee maker hahaha please fix it and make a more variety.
Aryaduta: it so fun and happy to stay in aryaduta bandung, have a large room, large swimming pool and have kids corner. so easy to have lunch and dinner because near to the shopping mall.. we have 3 days staycation in this town.. bandung is always 'ngangenin'..
Trans: It was my first time and i'm impressed with the room and swimming pool. The room is beautifully decorated, large, bed size is big for 3 adults, comfort sofa, big tv. I also like the bathroom, very convenience, nice shower, big bath tub and separated water closet. The swimming pool is astonishing. With beach concept, we can play with sand and build sand castle. It has water slide and beautiful water fountain. While my friend swim, i simply enjoy the fresh breeze sitting at pool side. Nezt trip to Bandung I surely hope could enjoy this luxury hotel with my beloved family

White_Charter: Well, this white crater is worth place though we could spend time on the way to this place (if there's traffic when long weekend). The air feels so cool, cold actually. Many interest spot to take picture.
Tangkuban_Perahu: we visited this place last week. i could have spend more time enjoying the view but the street vendors keep annoying us. not recommended to visit for tourists.. the management should better trained their street vendors..
Dusun_Bambu: Set in some beautiful country side surrounded by market gardens and nurseries a nice spot for a traditional meal and snacks. Affordable.
Saung_Angklung: I have always love the sound of the angklung. The performance by the young people is really very excellent. I also enjoyed the audience participation section where each person is given an angklung and we learn how to make beautiful music together.
Ciater: I have always love the sound of the angklung. The performance by the young people is really very excellent. I also enjoyed the audience participation section where each person is given an angklung and we learn how to make beautiful music together.
YELLO: This is new hotel, and everything still perfectly good. Fresh yellow color dominate the hotel interior.   Hotel location is above Paskal 23 Mall in Paskal Square complex (with shop houses, minimarkets, nightlife clubs, open air food court). The complex is at Bandung city center, expect traffic jam at surroundings.  When checked in, i need a room with double bed because i have a toodler to sharing bed, i put a note when i reserved the room, but apparently they didnt aware, and didnt prepare/sold out this type of room for me (although i already booked it and paid in advance). With that situation (already paid), i had no options, but accepted twin bed room, with "solution" from the reception girl that i can put the twin bed together. Silly suggestion from the reception staff. This…
Aryaduta: Great hotel near the shopping mall, it takes only 15 minutes from the train station. This hotel has a helipad that can be used for a pre wedding photo shoot or even for a yoga class in the morning with a beautiful city view,not to mention the amazing experience of breakfast at the rooftop.
Trans: By emphasizing the excellent service, can be an optional option for lodging in bandung. From front service to room service all using standardization and in my opinion satisfactory and can be a recommendation

White_Charter: A visit to the White Crater is a must for travellers! Interesting lake which still has 'smoke' coming out of it at one part of the lake. It's green because of the sulphur.  Great place to pose for couple or family pictures. Also, it was not too crowded. View is fantastic!
Tangkuban_Perahu: The weather was not that good when we visited the site. It was tad rainy but the view didn't disappoint. I would say that it lost a bit of its ecological inclination as it has become extremely touristy - a long alley of souvenir shops, ambulant vendors, flocks of people and…
Dusun_Bambu: Far from everywhere, this so called theme park offers some food stalls with price range way above average for less quality.   They could do better with more activities options for families and couples.
Saung_Angklung: How wonderful to see so many children involved in music.  The style is a combination of traditional (the instrument) and western (diatonic scales, rather than pentatonic).  Passing out single note instruments and using universal hand signs for tonic sol-fa, they are able to…
Ciater: How wonderful to see so many children involved in music.  The style is a combination of traditional (the instrument) and western (diatonic scales, rather than pentatonic).  Passing out single note instruments and using universal hand signs for tonic sol-fa, they are able to…
YELLO: From zero to ten, if I may give score they deserve to get 10, don't expect to much with facility, they don't have SPA Massage or Gym Centre. not much but enough,trust me they provide genuine service, smile and hospitality like 4 star hotel. Meet ludwig the reception he'll give personal attention in detail from bottom to top.  For sure I'll be back to this hotel
Aryaduta: Clean  luxury hotel Good location in great mall Delicious food Soo helper staff Everything was ok  I like this hotel so much i will stay again in this hotel soon Thank you Aryaduta bandung...............
Trans: Trans luxury hotel is a excellent hotel and the hospitality is great. Me and gamily really enjoy stay in this hotel. This hotel is higly recommended for holiday. It is expensive but you get what you paid.

White_Charter: Although the location is a bit far from Bandung city centre, this place is definitely worth to visit. The place is well maintained. But nothing much you can do here, just for taking photos and sightseeing. This place will looks very good in your instagram page.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Crowded and really nothing much to see. The vendors were very persistent and a nuisance. Crowded with tourists
Dusun_Bambu: I read some reviewers said that this place is not that good, but I really like it! It's not easy to find a man-made place that has such a natural feel like this in Bandung or around Java. I like the flowers the most, I like how they design the terrain, it was open but not too…
Saung_Angklung: I enjoy visiting this place each time, the music is great and its a place where you can see children and adults enjoying themselves through music. The owners of this place does such a wonderful job in teaching people all about Angklung music. Highly recommended place for a visit…
Ciater: I enjoy visiting this place each time, the music is great and its a place where you can see children and adults enjoying themselves through music. The owners of this place does such a wonderful job in teaching people all about Angklung music. Highly recommended place for a visit…
YELLO: It located beside 23 Paskal, or it even part of 23 Paskal building. The staff was so polite. They welcoming us warmly. They had the Game spot, for me this facility is so rare to be found in other hotels, so it becomes the "plus point" for this me. The room is so cozy, and for me it is very worth the price.   + The location is near to 23 Paskal The location is near to Food Market The staff was so polite Have the Game Spot facility Cozy room Worth the price  P.S : To every guest who have a car/motorcycle, you can showed the parking ticket to the receiptionist, they will make it free of charge for 24 hours. So we don't need to pay the parking fee.  Unfortunately i don't take the breakfast, so i can't review it yet. Maybe next time :)  Recommended hotel !
Aryaduta: This is my favourite hotel in Bandung, I always stay, because everything is easy fro check in to check out. The staff are very friendly and because I am a long time visitor know my preferences even to the drink I like at breakfast. Highly recommended and convenient for the shopping mall next door. Try it you won’t be disappointed.
Trans: Hotel is very good and excellent place to spend holiday  And don’t forget   The swimming pool are white beautiful perfect and nice  The rooms are perfect and beautiful and comfortable   Reki is very kind person I recommend to speak with him

White_Charter: About an hour's drive from the city, the roads climbing up the volcano presents an adventure by itself.   as with most tourist spots, at the rest stop before the journey up the volcano, loads of people peddling local produce and I must say they are quite insistent.   Avoid…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Located in Lembang north of Bandung. Quite a winding roads going up to the mountain. Entrance fee for people and car is applicable. The crater it self has dried up compared to kawah putih (white crater) in mount Patuha south of Bandung. The place can be overcrowded on weekend or…
Dusun_Bambu: We came here during rainy season in December. Yet the place is still very crowded!!! If this place is not so crowded, it would be very nice and romantic. Meal is quite nice, though expensive. We have to buy meal using coupons which I think too much work to do. But they have a…
Saung_Angklung: The performance was great, and we got to learn how to make our own angklungs and knew more of the production of angklungs there.
Ciater: The performance was great, and we got to learn how to make our own angklungs and knew more of the production of angklungs there.
YELLO: its location in the most famous mall in bandung, near bandung train station and husen sastra negara  airport. The design is unique, there is a place to play games for gamers,   nice room, and surely will be back to this hotel.
Aryaduta: If you are seeking a break from daily routine, this is the recommended luxurious place to stay in the heart of Bandung City with the Dutch Art Deco building and tropical ambiance touch. Next to Bandung Indah Plaza Mall with a wide range of restaurant, shopping center and cinema. I am very happy to be here.
Trans: First of all i would like to say this hotel very great.  Amazing interior and for sure this is luxury hotel. Staff are professional, helpful and did well done for every request from me.  The lounge is amazing, really amazing from the top to see bandung city of west java. Love the room even i got twin instead my request to get single bed. Overall i love the warm hospitality from this hotel.

White_Charter: The place is amazing. You can really go down at the mouth of crater. Smells sulfur of course. A bit far from Bandung city and not much to do in the area except see the crater. But still worth the visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: A cool place to see a volcano with all its splendor. Visit this place in the middle of the year as it is the coolest and the surroundings is kept to its natural best without any modern buildings and amenities. Truly reflecting the natural beauty of a volcano.  Along the way up,…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun bambu family leisure park has beautiful view & nice park. They also have two beautiful restaurants, food stalls, souvenir shop, minimarket, hot balloon air, children playground, etc. They also provide free transport from the car park to the main building, but you can also…
Saung_Angklung: Saung angklung Udjo was very nice culture perfomance, where here you can see Angklung perfomance by kid an other perfomance such some traditional ceremony show and also you can sing together will student of this saung. lovely place. Recomended places if you come to visit…
Ciater: Saung angklung Udjo was very nice culture perfomance, where here you can see Angklung perfomance by kid an other perfomance such some traditional ceremony show and also you can sing together will student of this saung. lovely place. Recomended places if you come to visit…
YELLO: One of best hotel in bandung, with great location its only 5 minutes from Train Station. They have pool on the 4th floor with great view in bandung. Under the hotel, there's a Paskal 23 shopping mall.
Aryaduta: It was weekend, it seems the hotel was full booked, fortunately i managed to get a room for 1 night. Since the hotel location connected with Bandung Indah Plaza, the plan was to get some rest, dine out & watch movie in xxi with wife & kids after work. Thank god, everything worked as planed.  It started with the welcome drink. After checked in, the staff told us to go to 13th floor to have welcome drink. I thought, why should we go long way up to have some welcome drink ? Turns out, it was a club house that serve not only welcome drinks but also snacks. There was lots of drink options, you can find drinks such as tea, coffee, milk, soda water, soft drinks, etc. The snacks was also nice.  At night they serve also different snacks from day, you can find cakes, breads, fruits,…
Trans: Thank you for making my stay enjoyable and memorable.  My son really enjoyed the pool area and play around the sand most of the time.  The hospitality that we got from the staffs were very good.  Thank you.

White_Charter: Sucha cooling and great experience. Can never get it elsewhere. Standby your phone and snap snap photo/video as you wouldn't want to miss it. Would definitely come back again.
Tangkuban_Perahu: If you are not a local, this place is not woth the money they ask. You have much better volcanoes in the country so skip this one. Tourists pay 200.000 (300.000 in weekends) while locals pay 20.000 and 30.000. We are willing to pay a bit more, but this is just abusive.
Dusun_Bambu: The new hype in the middle of Lembang forrest, its cool place to visit with very nice landscape. You also can play in the middle of lake just in the center of a leisure park. Visit when on the less crowded people and you will enjoy the scenery of the park with zip of bandrek…
Saung_Angklung: It gives you a cheerful feeling and mood when listening to the bamboo musical, the unique atmosphere and the children involved in the show. As an Indonesian, I'm proud that we have this unique Angklung and really appreciate Pak Udjo and his family who care to preserve this…
Ciater: It gives you a cheerful feeling and mood when listening to the bamboo musical, the unique atmosphere and the children involved in the show. As an Indonesian, I'm proud that we have this unique Angklung and really appreciate Pak Udjo and his family who care to preserve this…
YELLO: its new and good hotel, good breakfast, nice room hotel and strategic near town, station, train,taxi and Supermaret. I have enjoy stay at Yello hotel Paskal and recomended it. You must try it and enjoy this hotel, thanks
Aryaduta: We arrived at hotel on 13 April for 5 nights’ stay. Check in was fast and staff was very friendly   We were give city view and I asked for a garden view. Staff said the room wasn’t ready and we need to wait for an hour  So we waited in the room for about 45 minutes and decided to have lunch We came back 1 and a half hours later and the room was still not ready  We waited for another hour and the room was still not ready  We were getting tired of the excuses given by the staff At last we got room 801 and I was very happy with the view The room is spacious and clean and even the aircon was in good condition   Buffet breakfast was very good and the staff were professional. The manager Ridwhan is very hardworking and helped out his staff. Nita is another helpful and pleasant staff…
Trans: I was staying at Trans Luxury on Feb 23rd in two superior connecting room. The check in time is 15.00 WIB, while a bit unusual for me since most hotel I was staying check in time in 14.00 WIB. But it was okay anyway. Since our room was superior connecting room, there will be a lock to separate the room. We were waiting around 1 hour for they unlock the connecting room. It was a bit disappointment for me, I tried to call room service even housekeeping service, still they said please wait. And around 1 hour they finally unlock it. The room is spacious and good though, that was a plus for me and family. Also the restaurant is serving various food and it has good tastes. It is also a plus point. The other plus point is the mall is just beside you. So, you can easily go there and…

White_Charter: It was amazing experience for me to saw this amazing place. At first I was so skeptical about this place because the route to there was very inconvinient. But when I get there, it was payoff. Such amazing near and spectacular beauty. When it rains there you get romantic yet sad…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This was my third visit to the place.  I am upset to see the commercialization of the place.  The entrance fee at the main gate is 30k for locals and kitas holders and 300,000 for tourists...that is crazy high and not worth.  We have a colleague who had forgotten their kitas and…
Dusun_Bambu: It's a restaurant surrounded by a leisure park. Loved the scenery and the chilly weather. Quick tips: Bring a driver. in case you get caught in a heavy traffic jam, you can walk up to Dusun Bambu :D
Saung_Angklung: If you can spare a couple of hours or so, take a trip here. Worth a visit for their Angklung performance alone. Came on a Saturday and it was crowded with many tour buses. We had to be on a waiting list to buy tix for the Angklung performance as it is usually booked by travel…
Ciater: If you can spare a couple of hours or so, take a trip here. Worth a visit for their Angklung performance alone. Came on a Saturday and it was crowded with many tour buses. We had to be on a waiting list to buy tix for the Angklung performance as it is usually booked by travel…
YELLO: everything almost perfect, 1. internet connection in my room was worst near the window and table, i must be around the bed and toilet which is very annoy 2. just an advice the water shower is not very strong, so i cannot take a quick shower when i need to.
Aryaduta: It's a great hotel, the room is clean and yummy breakfast. Perfect location in the city.  Unfortunately, be aware if you want to use massage service! I went to the spa reception ask about the massage but the guy didn't tell me there is other charge (such as belly massage wasn't included!). The masseur asked when I had already half a sleep and asked to pay her there. When I finished, I paid double!! Please always tell the customer what they will be charged! Don't be sneaky! Thank you!
Trans: super recommended hotel because of their professional service. Super cozy room with many facilities. Best place to stay for family and business trip. The hotel is next to the mall mosque. Love the swimming pool.

White_Charter: An hour drive from Bandung town. Best to visit in the morning, cool weather + mist = perfect for photography.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Drive up to the top to get a great areal view of the volcano which last erupted in 2013.  There are multiple entrance fees. To walk down to the crater you need to pay again IDR 300,000 for the guide and you will have 4 addons vendors trying to sell you things through out your…
Dusun_Bambu: Loved everything abt it! The weather was perfect, cool and breezy! Great photo taking sites overlooking the mountains.
Saung_Angklung: I was here several times and never got bored. This is my 4th visit, this time I was travel with my big family as they never been here before. My 4th years old daughter was very excited watching the show. She really enjoyed the show and very excited when they were teaching how to…
Ciater: I was here several times and never got bored. This is my 4th visit, this time I was travel with my big family as they never been here before. My 4th years old daughter was very excited watching the show. She really enjoyed the show and very excited when they were teaching how to…
YELLO: This hotel has a great location, located inside hyperpaskal square and below this hotel you can connect directly to 23 Paskal Mall. Have a great ambience, very clean hotel, nice staff, and most of it the price is very affordable.. its nice to stay and have an experience in this hotel
Aryaduta: On our 9th wedding anniversary we decided to take short stay break 3 nights in Aryaduta Bandung ( based on our experience in Aryaduta Makassar was good) and their location. Check in process was smooth, instead room Upgrade we got club access however we don't get information any information about Club lounge or any facilities in the hotel.   We love our room in 15th floor and has great view,  amenities and very clean too.  As we excited with club lounge since receptionist said there event in late afternoon but she doesn't explain detail and even timing so we called concierge who doesn't have any idea too and transfer us to club lounge.   I could said club lounge is our favorite in this hotel,  privacy,  good coffee and view from our table are just perfect combination.   For me…
Trans: Overall the hotel facilities and service is very good except for disappointed information from waiter at 3rd floor restaurant who informed me that the next day they will serve "bubur kacang hijau" but I can not see the "bubur kacang hijau" at the next day.

White_Charter: We were excited to be here at first, unfortunately the staffs on the front gate was trying to mark up the price for us to pay. Not really a good impression considering that we are local tourists. The price list was shown clearly, but the staffs gave us twice the price stated…
Tangkuban_Perahu: First time visiting a volcano crater and this was amazing! It took awhile to get up there by car due to the jams but the wait was worth it! The temperature was around 18-20 degrees so a jacket is required if you cannot stand feeling chilly. There is another crater behind this…
Dusun_Bambu: THe place is basically a park. YOu can sit, relax and daydream here. The air is clean, the place is clean and beautiful. Dont bring ur own food here because u will be charged rp.250000 for eating ur own food. They encourage u to buy their food which to me is nothing special and…
Saung_Angklung: The place is quite hidden from the main road. It takes 2 hours to reach here from Ciater Hotspring.   Please be advise the place is easily booked by the travel agent (seats in the auditorium  will have travel agent name) it is always macet (traffic jammed) surrounding the place.…
Ciater: The place is quite hidden from the main road. It takes 2 hours to reach here from Ciater Hotspring.   Please be advise the place is easily booked by the travel agent (seats in the auditorium  will have travel agent name) it is always macet (traffic jammed) surrounding the place.…
YELLO: Excellent location on paskal 23. Clean and fresh look. Great staff. However internet connectivity was still lacking in the rooms. Not consistent. All in all definitely will return when back in bandung
Aryaduta: Staff is very friendly and helpful, food is awesome. The area is convenient near to shopping mall and the mall have a cinema. Room is nice. From the time we enter the hotel from the entrance to the lobby reception also to the breakfast and operator all service is excellent.
Trans: Trans Luxury hotel Bandung always win my heart. Several time stayed there...and even right now staying here...always beyond my expectations...every single part of hotel always give their best to fulfill guest satisfaction... They even notice ALL my special request (iron board, no painting @room, ect) and surprise me with personal handwriting welcoming message from general manager. Room is spacious and comfortable (one of few hotel that's able to make me sleep well at the first night). Breakfast is various and delicious. They also make me no worry with my breastmilk storage during my 10 days business trip because they do handling it just like I do at home. Definitely it's the best hotel in Indonesia!!!

White_Charter: This place offers unique experience of naturally occured sulphur lake surrounded by a mountain..the best part is we can  have  nice and unique view of this as close as it can..no water activities allowed only taking picture and sight scene..you can also opt to trail along the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is nice to learn about the evidence of active volcano activity. It was easy to reach and perfect for family trip. Be aware that the management put a wide different price for local and foreign tourist!
Dusun_Bambu: Great view and concept. There are several restaurants with different concept. If you just want to sight-seeing, taking picture go to Pasar Khatulistiwa. There are many kind of Indonesian street food but you should change ur money to their fake money to have transaction with no…
Saung_Angklung: The 1.30 hr performance is very high energy with enthusiastic performnce by childdren as young as 2 years old. A couple of highlihts Play Angklung Together, fortunate to be trained by the son of the late founder of Saung Udjo, and be mesmerised by the Angklung Orchestra.
Ciater: The 1.30 hr performance is very high energy with enthusiastic performnce by childdren as young as 2 years old. A couple of highlihts Play Angklung Together, fortunate to be trained by the son of the late founder of Saung Udjo, and be mesmerised by the Angklung Orchestra.
Aryaduta: Remember to bring long pants as the aircond can be cold at night. I tried to adjust the temperature, but it was still quite cold. The hotel is next to a mall, it's very convenient. There are swimming pool and gym facilities at the hotel.  Room dining food is not so nice, recommend to eat outside if you can. The breakfast food is alright.   The chinese restaurant food is quite nice, but the service is very slow even though there is no other customer.
Trans: Nice place for family leisure, comfort classic room, good restaurants, enjoy the pool for kids and adult and the water is warm. fantastic gym too. there is a mall and indoor theme park. so many options to chose your holiday

White_Charter: The lake formed from the eruption of Mount Patuha, with white soil mixed with sulfur and turquoise water is truly stunning natural scenery. Ambient air is cool enough, although sometimes a bit strong smell of sulfur.
Tangkuban_Perahu: There is a very interesting legend for the place . Let me copy and paste the legend for everyone .   A place for nice photography and painting.   Once upon a time in west Java, Indonesia lived a wise king who had a beautiful daughter.   Her name was Dayang Sumbi.  She liked…
Dusun_Bambu: It was a first visit to the attraction, given the attractive photo of the site found on Google ;) Access was pretty easy, with OK road condition, and clear direction to the site.  We visited the park on last Saturday morning, arrived around 8AM. There was no long queue to enter,…
Saung_Angklung: I have heard about the Saung Udjo Angklung place for several years, but never had a chance and a desire to go... until last weekend (Nov 15, 2014). Me and my 3 friends drove from Jakarta to Bandung, and we wanted to go to Bukit Moko, where we had to drive through Saung Udjo, so…
Ciater: I have heard about the Saung Udjo Angklung place for several years, but never had a chance and a desire to go... until last weekend (Nov 15, 2014). Me and my 3 friends drove from Jakarta to Bandung, and we wanted to go to Bukit Moko, where we had to drive through Saung Udjo, so…
Aryaduta: I noticed front office staff are very young, but their thinking & respond was slower than senior one. When I arrived in Bandung, I called to inform that want to check in after lunch. Officer via phone confirmed the room would be ready by 1am. I arrived in hotel at 1.30am, and you know what? Room was not ready yet and they asked me to waiting in the club. I said my baby was sleepy and need sleeping now. Their respond still insist to waiting the room is cleaned and promised within 3am. They dont have customer centric spirit to create customer experience is positive, if they do, they will immediately offer upgrading room as their commitment to customer. Finally I waited in club until room was ready! 16Feb, 7pm, when back to hotel, stuck after gate until 30mins!! Any police officer…
Trans: I always stay at trans luxury hotel every time O come to bandung. The hotel is very good. The room, the food, the kids club and the pools are wonderful. My kids love them. The location is strategic. Near mall. Easy to find everything. Also next to trans studio

White_Charter: The lake formed from the eruption of Mount Patuha, with white soil mixed with sulfur and turquoise water is truly stunning natural scenery. Ambient air is cool enough, although sometimes a bit strong smell of sulfur.
Tangkuban_Perahu: nice view. not just only view, the weather are very nice. temperture are low. but not to forget shopping there. really worth it
Dusun_Bambu: I visited this place last october with some friends..and we're quite satisfied with the ambience of this place..it was very refreshing (fresh and chill air added with beautiful scene of nature..lovely!!)   one of their spot was closed for renovation (the lutung kasarung) during…
Saung_Angklung: We play all kind of songs by angklung with the advice of the conductor. But we did not get a free angklung as we heard from other travellers.
Ciater: We play all kind of songs by angklung with the advice of the conductor. But we did not get a free angklung as we heard from other travellers.
Aryaduta: We decided on the choice of hotel after looking through TripAdvisor's hotel reviews. Glad that it is really nice and comfortable. Reception was quick in checking us in and informative about the eating/shopping places as well as the day trips to the outskirts.  We requested for connecting rooms upon making the reservation and was granted the rooms. Rooms were clean and well equipped although slightly worn out. Location is great as it is connected to a shopping mall. Other recommended eating places are not too far away - 10 mins walk.
Trans: The Trans Hotel in Bandung is a luxurious five star with a sense of down-to-earth hospitality which makes us feel close to home. The room are spacious, the facilities are superb, and especially the human resources, they looks like friends and neighbors.

White_Charter: This very acid lake (pH 0.5 to 1.5 according  to  Wikipedia ) as an intense  and variable  blue color  making it very pretty. I believe  there is a similar  sulfur lake in the north east  US. It of course has a sulfur  smell   (hydrogen  sulfur, the gas in rotten  eggs). This is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited this iconic crater with great expectations but we were disappointed.  Entrance fee is quadruple of what they charge locals and half of the craters were closed off due to being dangerous. Most annoyingly, we were only notified of this once we had paid and there is a…
Dusun_Bambu: If you want to visit this place in high season, u should consider about it, since it will be a bad dream for you. Except u are ready for queueing and eat in food court where  there are only few food with good taste.
Saung_Angklung: Most people that going to Bandung either buying clothes from the factory outlets or trying new places to eat as culinary tourist.. However some people like going to see museums like geological museum or KAA conference museum... there are also a place like what i visit now Saung…
Ciater: Most people that going to Bandung either buying clothes from the factory outlets or trying new places to eat as culinary tourist.. However some people like going to see museums like geological museum or KAA conference museum... there are also a place like what i visit now Saung…
Aryaduta: Stayed with Aryaduta Bandung as they offer a perfect location, first of all..  Arrived in the midnight was not expect much, but the reception walk extramile to go out their counter to explain how to access the lift and open us the room - First impression Room 1402 indulge me with a serenity view in the morning, Mountain and city of Bandung !! look down, swimming pool and garden.. deep breath, exhale Breakfast variety and taste is comparable to other 5 star hotels  last, when i asked operator where is the prayer room, the operator nice and clearly answer then she offer me whether I need a pray mat ?? for me that's just the next level of service Since then, i feel like im home and 2 night stay is not enough because im sure there is much more impressive service they could give …
Trans: With city view from upper floor at that time, make our small meeting really awesome. The interior design so amazing. Congratulations Trans Luxury. And I hope I can stay for vacation at this hotel.. and one thing, friendly staff here.

White_Charter: Before this I just hear, see and read about Kawah Putih often mentioned in the documentary on television. For me, it is quite impossible for me to get to distant places like this.  But now I'm like a dream being able to White Crater my formerly impossible to track.  The…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Mount or Gunung Tangkuban Perahu, is an active volcano which last erupted in 2013. The main park area offers a nice view of the main crater, Queen Crater or Kawah Ratu. The sidewalk vendors here can be very persistent. Haggle if you must buy from them. There are outlets offering…
Dusun_Bambu: I love everything about Dusun Bambu. It has one-whole complete package for Family to go holiday. They provide Restaurants (there are several types to suite your needs), Food Court, Huge Park, surrounded by pine trees, rivers, center lake, Villa, Camping ground, EXCELLENT!  I…
Saung_Angklung: Not just entertaining but also educating. You can watch the angklung show and also try to playing it.  They also involve some little kids (less than 5 years old) in the show, to train them about their culture especially Angklung early. So they will love their own culture and…
Ciater: Not just entertaining but also educating. You can watch the angklung show and also try to playing it.  They also involve some little kids (less than 5 years old) in the show, to train them about their culture especially Angklung early. So they will love their own culture and…
Aryaduta: Hotel Aryaduta Bandung is winning by its perfect location, since it is located just next to Bandung Indah Plaza (one of the crowd in Bandung). They have a big and deep swimming pool (including kids pool), kids corner, fitness center and sauna, tennis court. If you are looking for food, you can easily find it either in the mall or street hawkers. We can adventurously experience cullinary excitement near the area, especially for street food.
Trans: Luxurious and comfy hotel, nice sand pool for children to play. Cozy bed and family room, it was wonderful experience for the whole family. Surely be back at this hotel for the next trip, would recommend this as well!

White_Charter: The price or the latest tariff entrance fee Ciwidey Kawah Putih Bandung is IDR 18.000, - per person. Ticket is valid for all domestic travelers. As for foreign tourists / Foreign Tourists (foreigners) the tariff is IDR 50.000, - / person.  There are two parking space provided…
Tangkuban_Perahu: View was good enough, but it felt more like a guilt trip because of souvenirs sellers and tour guides. Thought they were being sincere, but no.  It turned out to be just insincere fronts. We did tell them beforehand that we're just visiting and are not keen to buy souvenirs…
Dusun_Bambu: Dusun Bambu one's of Lembang new attraction, address Jl.Kolonel Masturi Km.11 Lembang, Bandung Indonesia. In that area there's floating market where a lot of Sundanese cuisine can find there...Also we can relaxing time at Cafe Burangrang restaurant with beautiful view of mount…
Saung_Angklung: Daily show at 3pm. Really worth your money as you will be truly entertained. Go abt half an hour earlier so you can visit the souvenir shop.
Ciater: Daily show at 3pm. Really worth your money as you will be truly entertained. Go abt half an hour earlier so you can visit the souvenir shop.
Aryaduta: the all staff at aryaduta verry helpfull and friendly . specialy for pak iwang in restaurant for breakfast . the location hotels strategic in area bandung city . over all good service for housekeeping staff and front office staff
Trans: got upgraded from premier to celebrity suite yesterday. It was real luxurious room. Details attention - just like fresh fruit on the table (really fresh), fresh flower and automatic curtains makes this room feel more comfortable .  Thanks !

White_Charter: I drive to Kawah Putih at 9 am from Bandung and had 1 stop to have lunch in a restaurant at Ciwidey.  I arrived in Kawah Putih around 01.30 pm, the sky was cloudy. I parked my car near the souvenir stall and take ontang anting to the creater. It took around 10 minutes from the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Located north of Bandung up in the mountains above the city, there are great panoramas to be seen here when the weather is good. The entrance free is about RP 30,000 for locals/foreigns with KITAS/KTP, but it's about 10x that amount for foreigners, so plan accordingly. Hawkers…
Dusun_Bambu: This is one of Lembang's new attraction venues which is crowded with local tourists who crave for new happening spots to spend their weekend at.   The highlight of this place must be the treetop dining experience where we can book a private treetop cocoon-like dining rooms…
Saung_Angklung: I was come in early of 2007. Until now(2014) i always fall in love with this place.... a lot of children and so many people/tourist had been come from around the world to this place. so many attractions held as part of the show,  the first we'll find Wayang Golek Demonstration,…
Ciater: I was come in early of 2007. Until now(2014) i always fall in love with this place.... a lot of children and so many people/tourist had been come from around the world to this place. so many attractions held as part of the show,  the first we'll find Wayang Golek Demonstration,…
Aryaduta: This s my first time coming to Bandung. The first impression is great building. I knew it was old building but looks like modern one.  Not only about it but also friendly staffs and helpful, especially reception named kiki. We always forgot to bring the room key and sure we asked the reception to insert the lift. He always kept his smile and help us even though it happend more then 3 times. Thank you so much Aryaduta Bandung <U+0001F64F>
Trans: Nice and comforting place. One stop place to have business, leasure and a day off.  Great ambience with nice and helpful staff.  Will go back someday to have great time with family. Just need some improvement in the breakfast time (it's too crowded)

White_Charter: Again it has a great scenery and an excellent view! but beware of the strong sulfuric smells! Grab a mask if you cant handle it~ You'll get compliments strawberry juice! its like pure juice so its not sweet!
Tangkuban_Perahu: entrance ticket for foreign tourist is quite expensive, Rp200,000 during weekday and Rp300,000 on weekend. Nice weather
Dusun_Bambu: This place has a very great concepts. I was amazed, that the management has great planning in developing this leisure park. Despite the location that is very far from Bandung, i really love this place.    This place also has a very wide variety of food to offer. They have one…
Saung_Angklung: The bamboo musical instruments was played beautifully by the local musicians. You will be amazed with the arrangements of musics and the participations from the local teenagers and small children when the perform such a beautiful melodies n dances. Towards the end of the shows…
Ciater: The bamboo musical instruments was played beautifully by the local musicians. You will be amazed with the arrangements of musics and the participations from the local teenagers and small children when the perform such a beautiful melodies n dances. Towards the end of the shows…
Aryaduta: Spent 1 night in Aryaduta Hotel with my little family. The room is spacious and has bathub. We got room in the 15th floor which is the highest floor here.  As a five star hotel, the service is not represent a five star hotel, no welcome drink and the reception is not so welcoming. The unpleasant moment happened when check-in time, the hotel staff told me to park our car in BIP while the hotel's parking area still empty. They also have kids club near the swimming pool. But we don't have time to try this kids club.  The breakfast was so good and tasty. Various choice of breakfast served in Taruma Kafe. The staff are also friendly and helpful.  Regardless the parking area, this hotel is recommended for staying with your family.
Trans: This hotel is equivalent to Shangri-la Singapore. Everthing is top-notch about this hotel. I cannot seem to find any flaws. I highly recommend everyone visiting Bandung to stay at this hotel. Its location very convenient as it is connected to a shopping mall. The mosque is within walking distance. Best of all the staff are super friendly, courteous and pro-active with high initiative. They are also very honest as my sister left some cash in her room which was meant for tips for the housekeeping team and my sister did not put a note, the hotel staff rang me and asked if we have inadvertently left cash in the room until we told them it was meant for tips for the housekeeping. I have never come across any other hotels who does this.

White_Charter: I've never been to a volcanic place before, so I didn't know what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised to find out that the place is cooling, since it's at the top.   The crater itself is a sight to behold. But the place was really crowded, and photographers were trying to get…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We popped up here from Lembang -- the volcano is actually remarkably close to Bandung, and easily accessible by car.  Another option: lots of people ride bicycles up from Bandung, if that's your thing.  Like many places in Indonesia, Tangkuban Perahu is mobbed with people. …
Dusun_Bambu: It's probably not as great as The Hobbiton but this place is one of the most relaxing touristy place I've ever been! perfect place to take a leisurely walk around man-made nature that's well maintained.  head up to their restaurant and enjoy the view of the garden. i love their…
Saung_Angklung: The musical and dancing shows are wonderful but what i most like is the interaction between the performers and audience. We are given the angklung to play and selected audience are asked to dance together. The little kids though, too adorable!
Ciater: The musical and dancing shows are wonderful but what i most like is the interaction between the performers and audience. We are given the angklung to play and selected audience are asked to dance together. The little kids though, too adorable!
Aryaduta: Aryaduta is 5 stars hotel with best professional staff, service & have Delicious food...Specially Front Office Guy Mr. Kiki very friendly and very helpful what we need during our stay, from check in until we check out. We feel warm & feel like stay at our home, almost all staff still remember us every time we stay at this hotel... the important is this hotel have best location in bandung, near shopping plaza & in center Bandung City,even this hotel look old but if u stay here, you never regret it facility is great, Spa,gym and very big swimming pool...for sure we'll be come back and come back again ;)
Trans: Best place to stay in bandung. Love it. Would.definitely come again. The area is very accessible whereby mosque is near, the mall is near. And even the indoor theme park is near. Service was tip top always.!

White_Charter: This place is definitely the place for Instagrammers and photographers. It is a beautiful crater but the air wasn't suitable for me. I felt suffocated and had headache after the trip. But the road winding up to the crater was beautiful too, with the mist making it look like some…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Despite the distance and the pricey entrance fee 300,000Rp. It's worth a visit. It has a scenic view. A nice walk around.  Remember to just move away from all the local seller at the entrance/ parking. These people are quite aggressive. They will offer to take picture, be a…
Dusun_Bambu: Everything here is full of nature sensation.. There're so many delicious foods here. The temperature is cold and i guess you have to bring your jacket. Absolutely i guarantee, you'll never regret it for visiting this place. Oh yeah, do not forget to bring your camera too.. To…
Saung_Angklung: Not only see, but you can also play angklung there. They teach you in the smart way so that you can play it directly. Super.
Ciater: Not only see, but you can also play angklung there. They teach you in the smart way so that you can play it directly. Super.
Aryaduta: Must credit their Housekeeping team for very prompt service, breakfast restaurant staff for their positive service and helpfulness.. my boy wasn’t well and vomited, they brought him to the in-house clinic, and allowed extra porridge to be brought to room.. breakfast also has good variety rather average food and some that suit young kids like noodle soup. Their front desk was also helpful, superior twin room upgraded to business room with view upon feedback. They also gladly allowed late check out till 1.30pm. In house Nurse brought medicine to the room after consulting the doctor who wasn’t around on Saturday. It was great they had an in house clinic and the nurse was able to help take temperature, do basic examining and suggestions on how to help the child feel Better.…
Trans: The staff are friendly, we're really enjoy the room and hotel facilities. Trans studio mall in walking distance make us easier to buy anything we need during vacation. I'm really satisfied and recommended this hotel for spend the time with family.

White_Charter: White Crater a.k.a Kawah Putih is one of the best Bandung Natural Park, Don't forget your mask to cover your lunge.  White Crater give you the view of white sand and green lake.  It's match for your prewedding photograph.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee is abit expensive. Overall a good experience. U can boil an egg at the crater,and soak your tired feet after the hike to one of the crater. Recommended for visit. On a side note,beware of seller selling souvenier. Their price is on a high side and u get the things…
Saung_Angklung: everyone who come to this place has a chance to play bamboo musical instrument.  siting in the circle and hold the instrument then just follow the conductor when you shake the instrument  almost all the song is able to be played by all the guest by wonderful conductor and…
Ciater: everyone who come to this place has a chance to play bamboo musical instrument.  siting in the circle and hold the instrument then just follow the conductor when you shake the instrument  almost all the song is able to be played by all the guest by wonderful conductor and…
Aryaduta: I stayed here just for one night to celebrate bloggers day 2017 at the end of October. The location of this hotel is very strategic, we can go to factory outlet and restaurants by walking not so far form hotel. Located in jalan merdeka, besides bandung indah plaza mall in the heart of bandung city. The staffs in reception and concierge were friendly and helpful, My room was spacious, comfortable and clean, but the room looks too old (the paint, the mirror, etc) probably need renovation in some area. The bathroom was clean and have a big size bathtub. The Breakfast served at the Taruma Kafe was good many varieties available, but very busy. The pool looked great, with the resort style double loungers and beds. Unfortunately i didn't get to try out the pool as the weather was too…
Trans: Had a very wonderful moment during our stay in this hotel, very nice and friendly staff. My request for anniversary set up also fulfilled. Very nice view of Trans Studio Mall , with the background of Bandung City from 11th floor. Love to come back here again

White_Charter: One of the most beautiful place I have been to. It's a long drive from the city (we had a driver) but I find the view along the way so scenic. It's chilly so bring a light jacket or a wrap. The entrance has eateries, toilet with shower and a open area musollah. If you plan to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I put an average because the price difference between domestic tourist and international tourist is 10 times more. As an international tourist, we don't mind paying more but not 10 times higher and what we have seen is rubbish everywhere. Plastic, papers, mineral water bottles,…
Saung_Angklung: a must visit place when you are in bandung, very entertaining, fun and engaging, great to see the sundanese culture and kids enjoying their performance
Ciater: a must visit place when you are in bandung, very entertaining, fun and engaging, great to see the sundanese culture and kids enjoying their performance
Aryaduta: I have booked 1 room at Aryaduta Bandung to celebrate my birthday with my family. When i entered the room surprisely i saw theres a gift that i do really wanted!! You know what?? My boyfriend has arranged it with Arthur the famous marcomm manager in Bandung.Thank you so much for this unforgettable moment!! <U+2764><U+FE0F>
Trans: This is my several times I stayed at Trans Hotel Bandung. Basically no comment anymore, cause everything is good.  My child like the pool, and my wife enjoyed her time with spa and treatment (not asking about it, she just said: nice...)

White_Charter: This kind of leisure you can not miss. Its around 25km away from Bandung, West Java. The road to the place is a bit dangerous, the small roadt were up and down, you have to be carefull. In a way there, I stop in a restaurant, which name is Bebek Unti, they have a good meal and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I had a terrible time finding information about this site online before going, so here is everything I found when I arrived: There are three craters in this park, you can walk to two of them along paths that are lined with small shops with crafts and snacks (check out the Batik…
Saung_Angklung: Don't miss it or you will regret it! We had fun! My friend took her teenage daughter along with us. No regrets at all..great entertainment.  The kids in the show were awesome! The guests were invited to join in the fun. Really a brilliant performance!
Ciater: Don't miss it or you will regret it! We had fun! My friend took her teenage daughter along with us. No regrets at all..great entertainment.  The kids in the show were awesome! The guests were invited to join in the fun. Really a brilliant performance!
Aryaduta: Not recommended, not aure how this hotel got 4 stars,  Service not reliable, promise to he able to check in at 2:00 PM, but then declined as they said the rooms is not ready. Thia should not happened with a 4 star Hotel, sorry to say that. People queueing to check in, only 3 officer avail
Trans: I stayed in this hotel during my recent business trip. The service was good, the staffs were friendly. The room was quite spacious and clean. The amenities were good quality, It had a very nice pool and gym as well. One more thing, the wifi connection's very strong

White_Charter: <U+0001F600>: a special place to visit. We saw a couple doing pre wedding photoshoot there. Wondering how they could stand the sulphurous smell for few hours!  <U+0001F602>: itinerary was white crater, situ lake, hot spring and strawberry park. However after visited white crater and left for…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If you happen to visit West Java, specially Bandung, this is a must place to go. It's quite close to the West Java's capital and easy to reach, just 40 minutes. In Tangkuban Perahu you can see several tourist attraction such as Kawah Ratu crater, Kawah Domas crater, tea…
Saung_Angklung: It is much too commercial, but also fun to make. They are beautiful musical instruments for the children to play. Also, the dances funny to see. The tourists are brought here with lots of buses. The entrance fee is very expensive! They say it is a school, but it is more a fraud.…

Aryaduta: Let’s face it - it’s due for a bit of a birthday. But doesn’t that mean it needs it? No not necessarily... don’t expect to get blown away, but the staff are friendly and the place is clean. The gym was well equipped but the elevators were painfully slow!
Trans: Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung is a very recommended Hotel for family leisure. overall my family are very happy in staying here. very comfortable with one stop concept for family entertainment and salvation.

White_Charter: It's really nice to see this Ciwidey White Crater, beautiful, quite unique and rare. It is sizeable highly acid lake which changes color from bluish to whitish green, and it's interesting to see different colors of the lake, but when I visited this place twice the color I see…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I have visited this attraction three times. This is one of the historical site that have its own story. If you want to know about the story, you can read a well known Indonesian folklore called Sangkuriang. The crater is believed as a ship that kicked out by Sangkuriang when he…
Saung_Angklung: We arrived a bit late due to congested roads. When we arrived, it was about 15 to 10 minutes before the show's end. However, credit should be given to them, we we're totally amazed with the performance especially on how they make traditional instrument become an international…
Ciater: We arrived a bit late due to congested roads. When we arrived, it was about 15 to 10 minutes before the show's end. However, credit should be given to them, we we're totally amazed with the performance especially on how they make traditional instrument become an international…
Aryaduta: we stayed 1 night at this hotel. the hotel was located in jalan merdeka, besides bandung indah plaza mall. the hotel was quite old, rebranding from hyatt regency. the room was spacious, but the parking space was really small we have to park at the mall.. the pool and gym area was big. the food was so standard, not like any other 5 stars hotel.
Trans: Really enjoy our stay in Trans Luxury. Enjoy the huge swimming pool area, the comfy hotel room, incl. the bath tub with bomb soap.. We are very satisfied with the various range of breakfast menu.. Everything was excellent! Will definetely come back for our next trip in Bandung.

White_Charter: It's a beautiful picturesque attraction. Lots of photo opportunities but be prepared to climb lots of steps. The crater  is not paved and there is lots of small stones. Heels are not advised! The trip up is winding but beautiful. The scene is worth the long long trip up. <U+0001F60A>
Tangkuban_Perahu: We go there with family by own car. The weather is good. very cool here. The Entrance is IDR 20K / person, and IDR 25 K / Car. My family think there is another place more interesting than this place. So we here just 30 minutes. Too many car and person.
Saung_Angklung: We really enjoyed this traditional musical performance which is designed to involve the audience. The kids all get involved with the performers in a dance session at the end. The session with the anklung was very entertaining and quite creative. They included well known 60s hit…
Ciater: We really enjoyed this traditional musical performance which is designed to involve the audience. The kids all get involved with the performers in a dance session at the end. The session with the anklung was very entertaining and quite creative. They included well known 60s hit…
Aryaduta: We stayed for 5 nights. It was comfortable stay. My son loves his unlimited cartoon channel. Is in conjunction with a small shopping mall (dont expect too much) Within eorking distance to factory outlet along riau street ( cheap with low quality).  Staff are friendly.  I left my jacket after breakfast. The next morning Pak Ridwan managed to got it back to me. Thanks Pak Ridwan.  Our room was clean. Aircon and water is good.  Overall we are satisfied with the hotel.  Thank you.
Trans: If you are seeking a break from daily routine and want to enjoy your self , this is the place to stay. Next to Trans Studio Mall with a wide range of restourant and cinemas. You may also want to do some shopping or look for fresh fruit at the hypermarket.

White_Charter: Among one of the famous volcanic crater in the city of Bandung .You can go down to the bottom of the crater but are advised to wear masks and not too long in the region of the crater because the smell of sulfur gas can cause you to feel nauseous and dizzy.
Tangkuban_Perahu: As the country of volcanoes, the ring of fire, Tangkuban Perahu is one of the still active volcanoes. Last erupted on 2013, the volcano is still safe to visit. The shape of the mountain is like a turned upside down ship-relating to a folklore. It has 4 crater and you can see…
Saung_Angklung: The show was so much fun and entertaining. Never thought that with angklung, you can play all kind of songs, in various genre.  So glad that they play many kind of songs, a proof that this music instrument is great! Proud to be an Indonesian!!
Ciater: The show was so much fun and entertaining. Never thought that with angklung, you can play all kind of songs, in various genre.  So glad that they play many kind of songs, a proof that this music instrument is great! Proud to be an Indonesian!!
Aryaduta: My group stayed in this hotel for two nights. We founds the hotel rooms to be large and spacious. The beds were large and comfortable and the bathroom was clean . The window view from our 11th floor hotel was most impressive as we had a totally unblocked view of the city. The hotel staff were friendly. The breakfast spread at the Taruma Kafe was good and comprehensive .  We will definitely stay in this hotel again on our next visit. Wilkerson
Trans: I have traveled for whole my life around the world for business purposes but this place is really exceptional!! I never been in lovely hotel as this. Super cleanliness, fabulous staff, great food. I would recommend this place to everyone who likes luxury care for reasonable price. GM of this hotel can be really proud of employees.

White_Charter: It took us about 3 hours to get here from Bandung by van.    According to our guide, this crater doesn't dry up as it always filled with water from underground.  The crater is approximately 100 meters in diameter.    You can walk from the car park to the crater and the distance…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I was very impressed with the beauty of this mountain & this is one of the active volcano in Bandung! The things that sold in the market was pretty cheap if we're to compare with floating market, but you have to try your very best in bargaining the price.
Saung_Angklung: Overall it was very very entertaining. The music performance was so so lovely and beautiful. I really did not see this coming though, I thought it was just an okay angklung performance. But it was so beautiful. Don't worry if you don't speak Indonesia though, it is a very…

Aryaduta: It was a Hyatt property with its standard...   I haven’t been there for years, lobby was nicely refurbished and my reception Mr. Yandhika was very pleasant.  I was given a proper greet, an early check in at 11:45, and I got a neat room with only 5 minutes check in process. Did not get an upgrade but it was okay :)  The hospitality was very good, but too bad the property has not been renovated nor very well maintained.   The towels was grey, had to asked for a floor mat, the water had makes me wondered which frequently turned green-yellowish (Bet their piping isn’t good or they didn’t use water treatment anymore).   Furthermore, I’ve been using their sauna and jacuzzis, grossed out as it seemed the facilities hasn’t been deep cleaned for 10 years.  Breakfast was very busy but its…
Trans: The pool is big and awesome, theres's sand for kids pool. The breakfast so much variety and taste excellent and I like the room, big-comfortable-clean and quiet. I will come again for sure with my family <U+2764><U+FE0F>

White_Charter: The crater is all that the images promise. Turquoise water, sulphurous smell (though, very mild an rare), as well as white sediment create an alien environment amidst the green forest.   We took an Angkot (local minivan) from the central bus station to ciwidey (IDR…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This trip takes a full day with an early start from Jakarta to avoid the traffic.  We hired a Grabcar for the day which was cheaper than the regular tours and gave us flexibility.  We went right up to the Ratu Crater, so no walking, and it was spectacular with plenty of photo…
Saung_Angklung: I must say I was a bit apprehensive at first, especially in the puppet show which kicks off the proceedings and was difficult to understand (but then so is Punch and Judy to non-English speakers). But then it was sheer delight, as firstly dancers came out and then the angkungs.…

Aryaduta: Hotel location is good and rooms are also spacious. Lounge is good and services at reception are good. But there are no facilities for vegetarian people for food. When we go at breakfast, everything is written in their language and since we do not even eat egg, it was very difficult for us to eat anything in food. Since we participated in conference there, we even took lunch and dinner there but all the time fried vegetable rice.Staff is very polite and courteous. Hotel is good place for organizing conferences and then it has good shopping mall. We enjoyed the stay but could not eat. Further business center should also be improved.
Trans: Nice hotel, near mall & amusement centre. i like to road access (toll exit is not the bussy access). quite far from the Bandung places of interest (culiners & factory outlets) but you have big mall & games park near the hotel area, no need to go elsewhere...

White_Charter: Driver told us usually it would take 2-2.5hours to reach Kawah Putih. But we visited this place on Sunday (CNY eve). It took us 4 hours to reach Kawah Putih due to jam along the way.  We spent less than 10min coz there is basically nothing except strong sulphur smell. Huge human…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This visit could be a good one... But the street salers were very harsh and  overwhelming.   It's a long trip from our hotel.  We ate grilled corns, bought photos, bought some fruits, ride horses and bought some souvenirs.   We Always try to support local business... Whish it…
Saung_Angklung: LIKE : eventhough i don't play angklung..but the show is true entertaining cultural show. DISLIKE : NA

Aryaduta: We enjoyed our four night stay at the hotel. In our experience, booking directly on the hotel's website gave us the best deal/rates, compared to hotel booking sites. We had breakfast included and a next room category upgrade, which was wonderful. Such amazing value!  Location is very central. The attached mall with a hypermarket is so convenient. If you are into outlet mall shopping, there are quite a number within walking distance of the hotel. Plenty of food options as well.   Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful, particularly the doorman and front desk personnel Kiki who was so eager to make our stay a pleasant one.  Breakfast buffet spread had a great variety of local and western food choices. Some of the menu is changed on a daily basis so you won't get bored of the…
Trans: Very nice hotel i have plesent stay right here.  i will come back again for sure! my kids very happy stay in here. Kamarnya sangat besar bersih pelayanannya juga cepat. untuk karyawannya sermua disini snagat ramah dan cepat tanggap.

White_Charter: It's a beautiful place! But seriously though, pictures make it look SUPER AMAZING, while in reality it's not that amazing. And you shouldn't stay there too long, 30minutes max, otherwise you'd end up huffing and wheezing the next hour or so. It's a great place to take pictures,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: My husband need to drive about 45km from city. There nothing to do.. just chillin' with some of fresh air n taken photos for memories.  The merchandise sellers quite annoying but what we can do? They r earn from that.  For view its just okay... like a normal mountain area but…
Saung_Angklung: This attraction is a 20-minute taxi ride from Jalan Braga area and a bit outside the main city area. The entrance fee is 110k IDR for foreigners which includes a free drink or ice-cream.  The staff is polite, friendly and professional, and the performances are enjoyable and…

Aryaduta: We enjoyed the ambience and the swimming pool. They recently placed gazebos and lazy chairs around the pool which made it relaxing and top notch! Only downside on the first day is the pool attendant refused to give more than two towels per room, we had two little ones with us. I complained and they changed the policy right away which was good. At least they respond to feedback promptly. Restaurants were also good. We tried the buffets and they had lots of choice so they are worth it.  All in all it was a pleasant stay
Trans: It's really the luxury Hotel as mentioned.  Me and my family are very satisfied at maximum with all hotel facilities. Rooms , food, staff, amenities,cleaning type,every thing there is really top and luxury .

White_Charter: I went to white crater on sunday, a day before lunar year. The traffic is very bad. Since the road is very small, and many cars and buses were there for vacation, traffic jam happened for >4hours inside ciwidey. I was intended to go out on 4pm and i successfully reached…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is a popular destination for tourist. Tangkuban Perahu is an active volcano, with outstanding scenery. There are many souvenir seller who actually very friendly and will offer to help you take picture. But after that they will try to sell key chain, bracelet, toys, or…
Saung_Angklung: I have been there 3 times and each time was like a new beginning for me. Almost everyone plays and owns at least a set of Angklungs, A musical instrument made from bamboo. But Saung Angklung Udjo is somehow different. Their mission and determination sets them different from the…

Aryaduta: great location since it is located in the city, good breakfast with quick and friendly staff, big room, everything was good.  we had good time staying here and always love staying here.  we can go to factory outlet by walking not so far.
Trans: We stayed there for 3 nights. Luxury big corner room with pool view. This hotel is next to the BSM shopping centre so it's very convinience to go around for food or shopping. Breakfast was good with plenty to choose from. The people who work there are friendly and professional. I will be back for sure next time
