White_Charter: After all these years, I just got a chance to visit Kawah Putih (White Crater) recently. Since the only spare time I have is during weekend, I went there along with my friends. From Jakarta the trip took almost 6 hours. We arrived there almost noon. The smell of sulfur sometimes…
Tangkuban_Perahu: According to our tour guide, the name "Tangkuban Parahu" is a Sundanese language, literally translate as upturning boat, referring to the local legend of its creation. The weather was nice. There's also some shops sell sourvenirs including rabbit's fur hat.
Saung_Angklung: Wonderful show by some very talented musicians (including some very young children!) Getting to join and play the 'angklung' was a great experience.
Ciater: Wonderful show by some very talented musicians (including some very young children!) Getting to join and play the 'angklung' was a great experience.
Aryaduta: when booking the Aryaduta Hotel, we felt two things were going for it :  a) it was previously the Hyatt (so cant go wrong);  b) its attached to a mall (shopping therapy at hand). pricing is affordable at USD60/nite for a standard king room. its good sized too. however, the bathroom clearly shows the hoel's age : towels are well worn; the taps are without a hot/cold water mixer system; the shower conduit old & water jet not strong...  small things that make you go "hhmmm..." and question things. however, the breakfast spread is very good -- both western & local/Indonesian -- making the daily start fun from the the very beginning. service, we felt is patchy : housekeeping & the bell service very helpful; but  front-desk a mixed review. (we were 5 in 3 rooms) and as i spoke with…
Trans: I always have a great time whenever I stay in this place. Everything’s just so perfect! All credits to all transluxury hotel bandung staffs, Mr Reki, Mr Dion and especially to a beautiful, nice, humble, and smart woman Ms Debby Rince Ronauli Tampubolon. God bless you all <U+0001F64F>

White_Charter: Famous with pre wed photo shoot, this crater is indeed beautiful but it could be a bit crowded during holiday time. The air around crater also not so good for asthma person.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I went to Kawah Ratu (Ratu crater), the most famous spot for tourists to take pictures. I was quite disappointed because as an active volcano, it erupted several times so the form keep changing. This year, the geyser had stopped, so we hardly could see any nice blue lake in the…
Saung_Angklung: In here you can see an Aklung Perfomance, Shadow puppet attraction and also Traditional dance perfomance. Saung Angklung Mang Udjo can make Traditional Instrument art become a international taste and its well performed buy the artists. I've watched this attraction for 2 times…
Ciater: In here you can see an Aklung Perfomance, Shadow puppet attraction and also Traditional dance perfomance. Saung Angklung Mang Udjo can make Traditional Instrument art become a international taste and its well performed buy the artists. I've watched this attraction for 2 times…
Aryaduta: Their breakfast service is the worst I've ever encounter and to think that we were having it at the Club Lounge make things worse.  Their parking is so crampy as well, never bring big cars.  We used to stay here when it still managed by Hyatt, boy, has the service deteriorating since then.
Trans: We stayed in Trans Hotel a year ago. The hotel is considered new and luxurious five stars hotel. And indeed, it met the expectation of luxurious hotel with great services and facilities. The location of the hotel is also excellent as it is just located near the Bandung Supermall, in fact it is connected to the mall, Thus it adds to the convinience for the hotel guests. The hotel also has a good facilities for kids to enjoy. The swimming pools has a man made beach for the kids to play. And the kids room is also excellent with playground, playstations and xbox for kids to enjoy. It is very reccomended to stay in this hotel provided you are willing to spend extra bucks to enjoy the luxiry of the hotel.

White_Charter: This place is so faaaaaaaaaaaaaaar, but the view you got is a full payback for the effort. A beautiful white crater in front of your face. Its a large crater, a little bit like a lake but its a crater so be careful. The suggestion is you only allow to stay near the crater for…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I enjoyed looking around the crater. We went on a longer walk around it and hardly saw anyone else. Further along a guide will offer to take you down to the lakeside, which we didn't do. In retrospect his suggested price of 100K was expensive as well so you might want to try…
Saung_Angklung: I give two thumbs up for Saung Angklung Udjo because they make traditional instrument becomes international taste.  They perform not only music but dance and make audience interactive with the angklung instrument. They give us the angklung one by one and at the end of the…
Ciater: I give two thumbs up for Saung Angklung Udjo because they make traditional instrument becomes international taste.  They perform not only music but dance and make audience interactive with the angklung instrument. They give us the angklung one by one and at the end of the…
Aryaduta: I've been staying here since it was a Hyatt. Luckily most of their excellent staff has remained.  They have renovated the lobby and pool areas. The rooms, and hallways not so much. For the second stay in a row, the phone wasn't working in our room. The beds are a bit uncomfortable.  The Executive Lounge is better than when it was a Hyatt. Meiske and Linda are our favorites, and are so helpful and friendly.  Now, if we could only get the hotel to stop emailing asking for feedback, but in other peoples names.
Trans: I stayed with my family for two nights on the weekend, when the earthquake happened on 15th December. During the earthquake, most hotel staff were panic and obviously did not know how to handle emergency situation. I asked for muster point at least three times and no single word came out (most likely they did not know where it is). Hotel guests were spread over the place and rushing to get out without guidance from the staff (seems like they were busy saving themselves). That's not the right way to handle earthquake, as far as I know, people must remain calm and stay under the desk (triangle rule) or next to pillars during the earthquake.  Additionally, when we were waiting outside hotel staff were smoking despite the fact there were a lot of children and babies, which aren't…

White_Charter: very beautiful natural crater in Bandung, a bit far from city centre. How to get there: Exit at Kopo Toll Exit, turn right and then go straight approx. 1 hr, and find direction to Ciwidey. many places to visit at Ciwidey, but Kawah Putih definitely one of the best place to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Just enjoy the view and there was nothing to do. We took some pictures for memories and then went back to city. To enjoy more, you must do some trekking there. ^^
Saung_Angklung: It has been more than three times I came here. In addition to easy access is achieved, the attractions of the children and the Angklung's players is very exciting. We not only watch, but also come into play Angklung. It's better to come in the afternoon and do not forget to buy…
Ciater: It has been more than three times I came here. In addition to easy access is achieved, the attractions of the children and the Angklung's players is very exciting. We not only watch, but also come into play Angklung. It's better to come in the afternoon and do not forget to buy…
Aryaduta: I stay in this hotel several times when it still under Hyatt management. This was one of the best hotel in Bandung due to near to Bandung Indah Plaza, near to many factory outlets in Riau street, its 5 stars hotels and lovely food. Under new management (Aryaduta), this was my first time. Few comments: - this hotel need renovation soon...lift was old and its floor indication already broken, the room looks too old (the paint, the mirror was moldy, etc) - food during breakfast and i order one food in its restaurant, the taste not the same as we (my wife and I) remember few years ago. maybe the chef already different.  Pros: - location still the best for shopping lover (factory outlets!) - pool still good - staffs service were good - have good ballroom (well it need renovation…
Trans: Everyone and everything was perfect for an unforgettable family trip . The view, reception, hotel staff, restaurant atmosphere, location close to shopping mall, room services , mini bar, coffee was free from 7 to 9

White_Charter: We were going there in 2015. We went from jakarta at 5 am and arrived there around 8am. It is beautiful if you arrive there early in the morning like we did. Don't forget to bring your own mask there because they will charge you idr 5k per mask.
Tangkuban_Perahu: First, it is WAY out of Bandung! Second, its packed with people! Third, the most annoying...locals trying to persuade you into buying their merchandise! Fourth, its too expensive...rp200000/pax! I wont recommend this place. Its better to go to Kawah Putih for a more up close…
Saung_Angklung: The Saung Angklung Udjo is a performance with music,  dance,  wayang puppet play and a friendly interaction with the audience.  It is of course commercial,  but the children playing and dancing and their families benefit also from these performances. The traffic in Bandung is…
Ciater: The Saung Angklung Udjo is a performance with music,  dance,  wayang puppet play and a friendly interaction with the audience.  It is of course commercial,  but the children playing and dancing and their families benefit also from these performances. The traffic in Bandung is…
Aryaduta: The hotel was good and the staffs were very helpful. The problem was that because I chose the room near elevators, it was located in the front side of the hotel. I could heard the motorcycle noises from the room at 11-12 pm and made my sleep was disturbed.
Trans: Room services was excelent , helping me with my stuff.. about Room interior and decoration is the best we love it. i love the most is when having breakfast in rooftop, its best experience of all. we will be back next month

White_Charter: Ciwidey is far enough from center of Bandung City. But, when you arrived in White Crater, the scenery will make you totally stress released. The staff and management is pretty good.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visit this amazing vulcano, mountain tangkuban perahu. Its was amazing view from the top. My daughter love it very much, especially when she got the tour by ride a horse. Recomended place to visit
Saung_Angklung: I got a lovely experience here. What a beautiful instrument. They gave us an Angklung for being part of the show.
Ciater: I got a lovely experience here. What a beautiful instrument. They gave us an Angklung for being part of the show.
Aryaduta: All staff friendly, Bed, pillow was comfort, room nice even old style with Big TV. Linen, Towel was clean  Breakfast so many variety and attractive looks and tasty. Some carpets at corridors must changed I guess.   Service excellent and value of money.   Mall is behind of hotel. It is connected  Very best location. I will be back . Recommended!
Trans: I’ve stayed at the Trans a number of times and it never fails to impress. Very well appointed, clean and comfortable rooms. 1st class service and excellent food. Nice pool and a really good shopping mall just next door. What’s not to like! Highly recommended.

White_Charter: The journey here was horrendous but well worth it! Had to pay my guide extra to bring us here. The beauty is remarkable. I immediately googled and read up on it once i left the place. It is amazing how the colour of the lake is this blueish/greenish colour. I came when there was…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The sight of nature here is amazing. You can still see steam coming out of the parts of the crater. Tangkuban Perahu is more than 2,000m and was to have last erupted in 2015. A gentle warning for those who intend to bring the elderly - there are quite a few steps and a majority…
Saung_Angklung: I especially liked the interactive segment where all the audience get their own angklung and play according to instructions of the angklung maestro.
Ciater: I especially liked the interactive segment where all the audience get their own angklung and play according to instructions of the angklung maestro.
Aryaduta: Stay here for couple of times since i was in high school (and when it was still Hyatt Regency). and now able to spend my short getaway here with my little family. always choose to stay in club room since they have evening cocktail serving canapes (and cold beer hehe ). room is big but old compared to modern/newly renovated hotel. but service is great still. very convenience since it has connected access to BIP. Facility is well maintained. i used to play basketball with my brother but now spending my quality time with my baby in swimming pool. stay here is surely bring back good old memories.
Trans: Very nice hotel,my family always like to stay at this hotel,complete facilities,the breakfast is good,and the staff are friendly, i think next if i  goes to bandung with my family,i will choose this hotel again

White_Charter: #NAME?
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee for tourists is Rupiah 200k compare to local at Rupiah 50k. On top of that , u still need to pay Rupiah 50k for car entrance fee!! Told by local the price increases when it was privatised. Local only pay Rupiah 50k.
Saung_Angklung: Angklung is a music tools that is made from bamboo. It has a very unique sound and it makes your mind peaceful. Go to Saung Angklung Udjo and pays about 100.000 but I think it is worthed beacuse you can't see something like this in anywhere else.
Ciater: Angklung is a music tools that is made from bamboo. It has a very unique sound and it makes your mind peaceful. Go to Saung Angklung Udjo and pays about 100.000 but I think it is worthed beacuse you can't see something like this in anywhere else.
Aryaduta: I used to come here a lot when it was Hyatt because of the location next to BIP, and Pasteur. But I gave up in disgust years ago due to lack of maintennace and genral poor service, leaky broken showers, toilets that did not work etc etc. But tried again as Iunder new owners and was pleasently surprised. MUCH IMPROVED, now a 5* again. Good staff with good english, great breakfast. Everything works in the room - good water supply, etc. greta. Now please get proper 5* big fluffy towels instead of the tiny harsh worn ones you have now.
Trans: My family enjoyed in The Trans. . .One location with Trans Studio Mall, then it' s easy to shop, eat and leisure for my children specially. The Trans is one of my memorable hotel in Bandung, and i will come to the Trans next time

White_Charter: We took almost 2 hour from Cihampelas to reach here. Actually the distance is within 40km but it was so jammed. Before reach the peak,we stop by for welcome drink. Please try their otak-otak. It was so delicious as we can't stop eating and ordering. The strawberry from Street…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I was lured in the with pictures from the colored lake, but as it turns out its very grey, and barely a lake. So if you want to go there for the view of the crater, don't. However, if you like a little bit of hiking you will love this place. The air is very clean and fresh…
Saung_Angklung: This performance is a perfect combination of instrument playing and dancing by children in beautiful costumes.
Ciater: This performance is a perfect combination of instrument playing and dancing by children in beautiful costumes.
Aryaduta: Room is quite big enough for two, bathroom is ok with bath tube , swimming pool also OK  i can swim at 7 pm , location is near BIP / shopping center, the lobby is big enough and represent a good hotel, overall is very good
Trans: Wonderful place to stay with family especially the kids clubs and the pol . Friendly staff , good food, very clean room and located close to shopping mall , very easy to find restaurants. Definately will be back again

White_Charter: We travelled about 2 hours from Ciumbelieut to Kawah Putih, and all I can say is that its worth the trip.  The main area itself isn't that big, but there's something about the milky bluish-white lake that makes you keep staring and looking around in awe. As we are very high up…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Not a good experience.  They gouge you on the price.  It is 100,000 rp for each person plus 25,000 rp for parking the vehicle.  We parked at the upper parking area where an official tour guide will immediately approached us and took us to the tour office.  There, they charged…
Saung_Angklung: Always loves the place- great cultural show! The kids like it and cant stop to play angklung at whole time. Definetely a must visit when you are in Bandung.
Ciater: Always loves the place- great cultural show! The kids like it and cant stop to play angklung at whole time. Definetely a must visit when you are in Bandung.
Aryaduta: We stayed two nights during weekend. The hotel has a connected access or door to Bandung Indah Plaza, so...it's quite convenience. The breakfast menu was various and taste good.  One thing that needs to be improved is the lift or elevator, since some of the buttons is not working properly.
Trans: Very nice hotel, staff and location. I stayed there first week of January and the hotel is quite full since it is still holiday for children so it was bit crowded , especially in the pool. Many children swimming and there was games for children with prize which is good, also for breakfast there was a special menu for children at the special corner for them, children are enjoyed it.

White_Charter: nice view even though the smell is quite unpleasant (due to sulphur or something like that. we can only stay for a while because of the sulphur
Tangkuban_Perahu: took the mountain shuttle from our bus to the top of the tourist spot where there are horse riding in the cold and misty morning.   I was not prepared for the cold temperature and it is always good to bring along a jacket if you are visiting in the morning. Had a local guide…
Saung_Angklung: suitable for kids and people who wants something different.. they will teach you how to use Angklung - bamboo music equipment. need to try..
Ciater: suitable for kids and people who wants something different.. they will teach you how to use Angklung - bamboo music equipment. need to try..
Aryaduta: Thank you for providing such a wonderful stay to my family. We had a really good time. Rooms were clean and comfortable despite their age. The attitudes of the staff was what really wowed us. Always smiling, no task is too much for them. Very professional. If we come to Bandung again, this is where we shall stay.
Trans: My son was happy with pool, this hotel is close to shopping Mall and easy to find some food at around the hotel. The PR is friendly and helpful The location of the hotel is easy to reach The cleanliness of the hotel is very satisfactory

White_Charter: Breathtaking views albeit a little foggy but then again, what a view!!! It's quite chilly up there so make sure you are properly dressed and of course, for safety reasons, wear a mask to protect yourself from inhaling too much sulphur! And of course, for a better experience, go…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's quite amazing to walk around the whole park and see the crater in action. Be wary of the peddlers though, a firm no usually worked but i felt it spoiled my experience a little. Personally I also felt 'Kawah Putih', 1.5hrs drive away was more stunning visually.
Saung_Angklung: A great place to explore Indonesian culture. Fun audience participation. Love all the kids, and their performance.
Ciater: A great place to explore Indonesian culture. Fun audience participation. Love all the kids, and their performance.
Aryaduta: Stayed in a superior room, upgraded and have an access to club lounge.  The positive first: - Location - Location - Location - Size of the room - Size of the bed - The firmness of the bed - The club lounge, it is quiet and nice addition to the hotel.  The NEGATIVE - The room is old and tired, everything in the room screaming for renovation, from a battered wardrobe, to fugly toilet, to old funny smells towels. Forget about fluffy towels you get in five star hotels. - Worst for me is their carpet. I asked the reception if the room is very clean since I can not handle non clean room, and he assured me that it is. It is not.  - Do not let me start with their duvet and pillows. It is heavy with dusty smell.  - The staff do not seems too happy to attend to you, the only good…
Trans: So comfortable staying here, starting from check in process, bedroom facilities, and hotel facilities. Employees so helpful with information needed. Surprisingly about extra pregnancy pillow and bolster provided, makes my wife felt so happy

White_Charter: It is a very beautiful view. Like a lake in white sand. It was very chilly especially when wind come. You need a jacket or sweater.    Most people just watched, enjoyed the view and took some photos. That's the only we could do in the site.  To get the crater, we needed to drive…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We took about 1 hour ++ from Bandung to reach Tangkuban Perahu (depends on traffic). It is located near Cikole Lembang, tea plantation & strawberry farm so you can do side visit after that.   Since Tangkuban is touristy, the ticket charged is pretty expensive if you ask me.…
Saung_Angklung: This is a working musical school so the performers are students and do an excellent job.  The audience also gets a chance to join in with simple angklungs and we really enjoyed the whole experience.  The variety of musical scores that this instrument can play is amazing.
Ciater: This is a working musical school so the performers are students and do an excellent job.  The audience also gets a chance to join in with simple angklungs and we really enjoyed the whole experience.  The variety of musical scores that this instrument can play is amazing.
Aryaduta: The three of us stayed in the superior room. We got to enjoy a scenic greenery and mountain view. The bed was comfortable, the TV worked with no problem, the bathroom was spacious, clean, tidy and well-functioning. Breakfast was fine. Loved the hotel lobby relaxed ambience and beautiful interior that rejuvenated us after a long day on the busy streets.
Trans: Good job , always like if i sleep there . I like breakfast in luxury , i like swimming , and view in room . Karyean nya overall ramah sekali . Everything in luxury hotel over all i like it . Semoga always my favorite hotel .

White_Charter: Kidding! There is no zombies like those on walking dead. Zombies define the sellers there. They will sell you to rent their umbrellas, keychains, etc. It was drizzling there, so we rented from one of the vendors for 50k rupiah. Down at the crater there will be many photographers…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A good place to visit and see the volcanic craters. We drove up to the top of the mountain. Kawah Ratu is the biggest crater and visitors are able to view it from the car park.  Kawah Domas is located about 45 minutes walk down the mountain. I had the same experience like most…
Saung_Angklung: The performance from all the students of Udjo school are awesome! You will have an opportunity to play angklung together. Make sure to come on time. The evening show will start at 1530. Do not come too early as you won't have anything else to do there.
Ciater: The performance from all the students of Udjo school are awesome! You will have an opportunity to play angklung together. Make sure to come on time. The evening show will start at 1530. Do not come too early as you won't have anything else to do there.
Aryaduta: It was a good stay at aryaduta bandung, one thing that needs an improvement is the house keeping response to a guest. I told the operator that equipment in my room was broken and it took about 20 minutes later to be called by the house keeping. The breakfast was also good but a little bit too salty for several kind of foods. But i will come back again to aryaduta bandung, hope there will be an improvement already. Thanks!
Trans: I was staying with my children. He was very like palying at the swimming pool with the sliders and sands. The reception girls was nice. Room was very big, amazing bathroom and amenities, very cozy pillows, and easy to trans mall.

White_Charter: Lovely place for a quick snapshot. Fumes are tolerable and u dont really need a mask. Nice coffee place at the foot of the mountain if you need a drink. Leave early to get to this place as traffic is really bad.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Mout Tangkuban Perahu is easily access from Bandung, only within 1 to 1.5 hours, depending on how bad the traffic is. The road to the location is serene and beautiful, especially if you go through Dago uphill.   Reaching Tangkuban Perahu, I was captivated with how beautiful it…
Saung_Angklung: Awesome experience of interactive Angklung musical performance. The instructor and performers are enthusiastic and proficient giving and entertaining performances. The participant audience and children are truly captivated and enthralled.
Ciater: Awesome experience of interactive Angklung musical performance. The instructor and performers are enthusiastic and proficient giving and entertaining performances. The participant audience and children are truly captivated and enthralled.
Aryaduta: When it comes to welcome by all hotel staff, thank you very much, especially for the concierge at 16-07-2017 at 1pm, the check in process runs smoothly And quickly, we get a good room And the room was quite large, all the facilities in This hotel can be used well, the management in this hotel is good, the breakfast is ok its a lot of choice, the server man And the woman good, sorry (noted) but on the 2nd day the main menu fried noodles And vegetable toge not fresh tastes like food yesterday The warm up again but no problem, my family's overalls are satisfied, if I go to Bandung I make sure I will come back again to stay overnight at Arya Duta Hotel.
Trans: everything just perfect, we have great experience stay in this hotel. nice staff, pool area is one of favorite place for my kids. the hotel also connected with the mall and Trans Studio. surely will go back again to spent our next vacation in this hotel!

White_Charter: It's an amazing crater to visit however u need to get prepared for 3 hours drive to get there. bandung has a really bad traffic.  Maybe u should leave very early to skip the traffic. It's not a crowded place u can walk next to the crater and even touch the water.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Nice change of scenery of craters and volcano, away from city and cooler weather up... However, entrance fee is 200,000 rupiah per person .... On top of 25,000 rupiah for car entrance and additional 2,000 for parking .... Upon reaching, approached by many tauts selling…
Saung_Angklung: It was a performance we enjoyed. The performers, mostly young people were very enthusiastic and competent. We were exposed to the sounds of musical instruments made primarily from bamboo. Must watch.
Ciater: It was a performance we enjoyed. The performers, mostly young people were very enthusiastic and competent. We were exposed to the sounds of musical instruments made primarily from bamboo. Must watch.
Aryaduta: Stayed here for three nights with family. The location is strategic, in the heart of Bandung and side by side with Bandung Indah Plaza, the oldest shopping mall in Bandung. The staffs in reception and concierge were friendly and helpful and the room itself was spacious and clean. The breakfast buffet was great, but very difficult to find an empty table especially from 8 am onward because although the table is empty but has not been cleaned. It looked like the restaurant lacked of employee in charge of cleaning the tables and to serve the guests because I could only see like 3 - 4 waitress in the restaurant. The other thing that bother me the most was the elevator. When I want to go to my room and finally arrived in 10th floor, the elevator door won't open! And the elevator…
Trans: The experience of having breakfast  at the 18th floor restaurant was amazing, the room and service  was spacious and above expectation. Few notes: the check in procedures could be faster, i arrive late and there was only one attendant

White_Charter: We took around 2.5hrs from Hilton Hotel to Kawah Putih. It includes some traffic jam. The road to the mountain was bumpy but scenery are beautiful and the weather is super cooling. The smell of sulphur is strong. It is more worth it than going to Tangkuban Perahu because the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I just visited the Tangkuban Perahu last week Thursday. it was the third time I went there. The scenery is amazing and easily resembles a film setting like Lord of the Rings or some other magical movie. The two grey coloured craters are erie and overwhelming and the 1.5 km long…
Saung_Angklung: This very awesome art & cultural of sundaneess place. We can found extraordinary cultural performance with modern taste.
Ciater: This very awesome art & cultural of sundaneess place. We can found extraordinary cultural performance with modern taste.
Aryaduta: I was stay on the room 1207 last week. The room was spacious, comfortable, the Hotel looks so old, probably need renovation in some area. The Valet service was too slowly. The concierge staff named Porta was so Rude. On Sunday 9th July 2017 we had to waiting around 20 Minutes for Valet the key given to concierge named Porta, then don't know why he pass to other and the service was very low. When try to ask about my car to him, he just left and no explained.
Trans: We enjoyed every minute of our stay here. The pool area is amazing, it has sandy beach and mini slide for children. They have children play area as well, the play area is not big but it is enough for 2-5 year old. The room is impressive, it is huge and the toilet is equipped with a bath tub. The most impressive part of this hotel is the service, they never ever fail to give us the best service. One morning we went to the breakfast lounge and we saw that the lounge is full, the manager approached us and escorted us to 17th floor for breakfast. The hotel is connected to a mall and children entertainment center (trans bandung).

White_Charter: After the disappointment of the previous day with another creater. This one was totally worth the visit. Very beautiful and interesting spot. Entrance fee is reasonable but the fee for the car when travelling by private car or taxi is expensive. It cost 150.000 per car apart…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We went with a native guide, Jeffrey who was very helpful and explained the place well. There is a mesmerising feeling with the deep smell of sulphur and the hissing sound of the active volcano letting us know it's alive. We were at the place along with deep thunder and…
Saung_Angklung: 1) object .. Valuable 2) Admission fee .. Valuable  3) Facilities .. To improve rest room and parking lot 4) added the simple process to make Angklung ( traditional bamboo music ) can using Video..
Ciater: 1) object .. Valuable 2) Admission fee .. Valuable  3) Facilities .. To improve rest room and parking lot 4) added the simple process to make Angklung ( traditional bamboo music ) can using Video..
Aryaduta: Pro: - Old hotel but the staffs are helpful and nice.  - Good location, in the middle of bandung. Not far from factory outlets and restaurants.  - Have a shopping mall next to the hotel and connected to the hotel.   Cons: - Have 3 Lifts but they moved very slow and the sensor is not working properly so the door can suddenly close and hit you.  - Only 1 person in reception so we have to que for quite a long time.  - Can't swim at night. No lights at swimming pool.  Total dark.  - Nobody and no activity at kids club.  - My husband got locked inside the bathroom in our room. After some times they freed him and took out the whole knob from the door. We end up with a hole in our bathroom door
Trans: I stayed here on January 6-7,2018. I found difficulties to find a parking space.  No staff there to help me park the car too.   Well, I thought for the one who stays at the hotel has a privilege to park near the basement’s entrance lobby but, no.   It was full for the guests that attend the wedding ceremony held in the hotel.  I have no choice but to wait and park very far away from the basement entrance.  No staffs offered to bring my stuffs from the beginning (check-in). Even the securities didn’t help to open the door when they saw me carried a lot of bags.  When I checked in the staff also didn’t ask if I need help with my stuffs.  The room was fine except the toilet.  When I sprayed the water I could smell the sewer. I’m not sure where does it came from but it happens…

White_Charter: The beautiful scenery and the awesome view!! We rent the car from Bandung and when we arrived, we just took the public car to get inside. It's better that way, then you don't need to pay for the car entrance fee.   You can buy a face mask for Rp. 5000 there. Sometimes the smell…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We made the trip to Tangkuban Perahu on a weekend. Entrance fees alone were RP300,000 per person and RP35,000 for the car. At the top of the mountain there will be a lookout which over looks Kawah Ratu (Queen's Crater). An "official guide" came up to us to introduce himself and…
Saung_Angklung: A visit to the Saung Angklung of Pak Udjo is an excellent opportunity for families with children to have direct contact with the music and dance based on the angklung very much used by the locals. Maybe the entry fee is somewhat high for the families.
Ciater: A visit to the Saung Angklung of Pak Udjo is an excellent opportunity for families with children to have direct contact with the music and dance based on the angklung very much used by the locals. Maybe the entry fee is somewhat high for the families.
Aryaduta: Formerly HYATT, now under new management Aryaduta.   Good job for the new management on maintaining the rooms condition, eventhough it's an old hotel, the decor and the atmosphere are well-kept.  The room is very quiet, we barely hear any outside noise inside the room, so that's a big thumbs up for us. The room is also quiet big, the bathroom has the actual big size bathtub; another plus point.  The hotel connects with Bandung indah plaza Mall which is very convenient for us to shop and buy stuff during our stay.  The only negative thing is the breakfast. I feel that the quality and variety definitely have gone way down compare to the one under HYATT management before.   But the hotel still is the best choice when you stay in Bandung. With such a great rate, it definitely worth…
Trans: - this hotel will give you beyond expectation experience - happy to stay at this hotel - this hotel is suitable for business, leisure and ME TIME - great experience - feel like home - the room is not soundproof and the lobby is to small for 5 star hotel

White_Charter: Had to travel at least 3 hours and if you encountered their infamous traffic jam, it may end up 4 hours to travel. Unless you are already staying in Ciwidey area.  The photos you see from the net looks amazing and beautiful. But you have to be there yourself to witness and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We were excited that the volcano was so close to us.  It was really a good experience. But the entrance fee is too expensive.  According to our tour driver, entrance fee for weekend is more expensive. We were fortunate that we came on weekday.
Saung_Angklung: What a nice show. I had fun and the price was reasonable. Only young actors (Anklung school) but they seemed to enjoy what they did. A mixture of different styles and dances. A free drink comes with the entrance fee.
Ciater: What a nice show. I had fun and the price was reasonable. Only young actors (Anklung school) but they seemed to enjoy what they did. A mixture of different styles and dances. A free drink comes with the entrance fee.
Aryaduta: yes, this hotel is old but well maintained. the room is spacious and comfortable, the air condition works well and the hot water for your bath always available. excellent facilities : swimming pool, gym, fast wifi. location is great, right in the middle of the city. the hotel is connecting to a mall. staff all polite and friendly. very good service too.  area that still can be improved : breakfast foods, the selection is good but the not the taste.too standard.  overall, my family is very happy staying in this hotel.  but my son still have this question : why under 16yo can not use the gym? in other hotel, he usually accompany me to use the treadmill for a slow run.
Trans: I had a nice experience to stay in this Hotel, everything seems perfect but not with the service of the waiter in the restaurant when I was having breakfast.  The waiter was very unfriendly, even they were ignoring my request to have some eating tools such as knife and spoon.  Until there's a waitress came and provide what I need.

White_Charter: Our whole family enjoyed the beautiful crater. It was a fantastic experience and the kids  had the chance to touch the warm water of the crater. Great place to take pictures! We we able to walk around peacefully to enjoy the natural beauty. No peddlers chasing after you. Stalls…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's an amazing place to visit, beautiful natural environment and an experience which you have to live.  The only negative is the extremely high entrance fee for foreigners and that you have to pay extra guide that will lead you to the crater.
Saung_Angklung: Worth doing if you want to see a bit of local flavor, but it's a bit of an assault on the senses, especially if you're not all that into bamboo instruments. The kids are cute, though, and it feels like a tourist trap.
Ciater: Worth doing if you want to see a bit of local flavor, but it's a bit of an assault on the senses, especially if you're not all that into bamboo instruments. The kids are cute, though, and it feels like a tourist trap.
Aryaduta: It was very nice to be stayed in here with our family. We had stayed for 2 nights in suite room.  I love the suite room, especially the coffee maker, I can make it by myself and drink espresso anytime :-)
Trans: It was a great experience for me and my family for staying at Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung. Everything was there and we even don’t like to go other place beside than staying and using all the facilities. The kids was very happy with the kids club and the beach. Me and my wife was fully enjoying the club, morning to evening. The ambient also bring coziness. All the staffs was very friendly and helpful. It was a great experience.

White_Charter: Compared to Tangkubang Perahu, it is much quiet and less sales people running after you.  But that is all to be seen, just white crater after a long drive from Bandung city.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is one of the famous local myth. It says that it is not actually a mountain, it is actually a boat. I personally love this place. It is reachable with any kind of transportation, I usually ride my motorcycle here, because this place is actually not that far from…
Saung_Angklung: This school is worth a visit, even for people who aren't a big fan of Angklung music.  The performance the students give is very entertaining, they really know how to get the audience involved.
Ciater: This school is worth a visit, even for people who aren't a big fan of Angklung music.  The performance the students give is very entertaining, they really know how to get the audience involved.
Aryaduta: Well maintain hotel, next bandung indah plaza and very fast wifi.. try to book via hotel web and they give u extra benefit ;free upgrade , breakfast for 2 plus free for children  under 16..their club is a must try.
Trans: The best hotel in Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung The breakfast is very good too plus the bar/restaurant, The rooms are average of what you would expect from a hotel of it's category, although very clean and comfortable

White_Charter: In this area your breath will so heavy, but it will pay with a great view in this place, be carefull dont swim in there. If you a backpacker and doesnt ride your transport, you must go down before 4pm, when you late you will walk in to terminal and its may be 15km
Tangkuban_Perahu: Its a volcanic mountain...its tooo cool and windy.one can even try the hot spring but its costs around 300k IDR per person..but u need a walk a bit to reach the hot spring..climate n location is very good but the sellers will annoy us..they will follow u everywhere
Saung_Angklung: Angklung.. yes its a name for the traditional music instrument from west java. made from bamboo and you can play any song with it. each angklung has its name and different key tone and you can find the name on the bottom of it. we came here arround 3.30pm, i forgot the cost, i…
Ciater: Angklung.. yes its a name for the traditional music instrument from west java. made from bamboo and you can play any song with it. each angklung has its name and different key tone and you can find the name on the bottom of it. we came here arround 3.30pm, i forgot the cost, i…
Aryaduta: I stayed 2 nights in Deluxe room. The room is quite big have a sofa, it's good if you have 2 or 3 children. I feel convenient stay in this hotel. The hotel is in the center of Bandung city, strategic location. It has connecting row to Bandung Indah Plaza mall. So it makes you easier to buy food, buy something.  The breakfast quite good, have some variation for Indonesian and western menu.  The minus value, but minor, is about parking lot. I think this typical problem hotel in Bandung, doesn't have enough parking slot. But for me still OK, since they have free Valet service.
Trans: This is one of the best hotel in Bandung. Hotel is very nice with good facilities and all staffs are very friendly. Breakfast and food in the  Restaurant are really excellent. High recommended to stay here if you visit Bandung.

White_Charter: We enjoyed the beautiful lake. We expected the rotten sulphur smell to be very overwhelming and smelly but it was still at an acceptable level. There is not need for mask. Do be careful to make sure you don't step into the soft areas and get your entire shoe muddy. Stay at the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Firstly I would like to stress that when making trips to Bandung's tourist attractions, always start out early on your journey. Otherwise, during weekends, long weekends, holiday periods, be prepared for gridlocked traffic jams that will eat up your time and reduce your…
Saung_Angklung: Theres just something about this place that screams harmony! Sometimes the beauty lies in nature but there are times, it is in the act of the human being. This institution is run by a family who had always carried values of nature and culture all togetherness since 1966, and…
Ciater: Theres just something about this place that screams harmony! Sometimes the beauty lies in nature but there are times, it is in the act of the human being. This institution is run by a family who had always carried values of nature and culture all togetherness since 1966, and…
Aryaduta: OK, to clarify some confusion, this hotel was previously called Hyatt Regency bandung. Been here many times over the years and they still provide the same service, style and luxury as one would expect from a hyatt brand. Rooms are large, good breakfast, clean rooms and they have  a new stylish lobby bar to unwind from a long day of exploring the city
Trans: I got my room at 5pm with not made sense reasons. I saw small worm (cacing) on beach pool, its so dangerous for kids playing sands there. Great breakfast. Free parking but why guests must paid for the vallet service?

White_Charter: We took the public transport from the entrance of the place to kawah putih since taking your own car is more expensive. The only disadvantage is that when no transpo go up the mountain, none would bring people from up there down to the reception area. The place is great with a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 1 hour away from Bandung. the view is amazing. the traffic during weekends is always bad. not recommended to go on weekends beware because this area has vulcanic smell from the crater. some people wear mask. the weather is okay, not hot not chilly.
Saung_Angklung: Its a great places to bring all of your family, i just visited it for the first time in 2012, i born in bandung and heard about the place, but never had any chances or any wilingness to visit it. my wife is the person who urge me to visit this place, and you know, even the price…
Ciater: Its a great places to bring all of your family, i just visited it for the first time in 2012, i born in bandung and heard about the place, but never had any chances or any wilingness to visit it. my wife is the person who urge me to visit this place, and you know, even the price…
Aryaduta: Friendly and helpful service. Great food selection for breakfast. Enjoyed our stay and will return.  they have a connection to Bandung Indah Plaza shopping mall, so when you need something you can head right away to the mall; very convenient! swimming pool is clean and nice. God Wi-Fi connection.
Trans: This was our first visit to trans luxury hotel. My kids love this hotel very much. The room is so nice, the lovely part in the room is the bath tub bomb. They loved it so much. The swimming pool is so nice with the sand pool. Made our holiday so great. The staffs so nice & so helpfull too.. Can't wait to be back again.. <U+0001F618><U+0001F618><U+0001F604><U+0001F604>

White_Charter: Beautiful crater!  Be sure to bring a sweater/jacket/cardigan to keep warm!  Lots of photo taking opportunities!
Tangkuban_Perahu: I visited tangkuban parahu quite often. I really like the place. I can take my children to see the crater kawah ratu.   The infrastructure is well built. We can take beautiful pictures (selfie and wefie included) at the place. It's no longer as messy as in the past. It's…
Saung_Angklung: Excellent show to watch, great to see so many children actively involved in local heritage. Not easy to find, so ask clear directions. We enjoyed it very much.
Ciater: Excellent show to watch, great to see so many children actively involved in local heritage. Not easy to find, so ask clear directions. We enjoyed it very much.
Aryaduta: Bed too old, should be replace with new one. Breakfast not reflects the 5 star hotel, to sad to say thats.  I think the hotels need to Improve in order to compete with other new hotels.  Its not my option to go back when have travel again.
Trans: It is a great hotel. The meeting room provide good WiFi connection, coffee break and lunch is also good. The room is excellent. Having breakfast in 18th floor is a must. Nice hospitality. The pool is awesome, my kid loves it.

White_Charter: This is the place where you must visit if you travel to Bandung, Kawah Putih is located at the hill side, remember to bring along your jacket if you travel with young children or elderly family members or friends. Be careful when you walk on the white crater =)
Tangkuban_Perahu: The place is really nice and worth going to pay a visit. Things to be careful there:  1. Entry ticket is not cheap. Around 200,000 rupiah per person.  2. If you want to try hot spring eg: soak your legs in the hot spring . You will need a tour guide there and it this will…
Saung_Angklung: I came here expecting a total tourist trap. It was quite touristy, but it was a good display of traditional Sundanese culture. A little pricy yes, but the performances are well worth it.
Ciater: I came here expecting a total tourist trap. It was quite touristy, but it was a good display of traditional Sundanese culture. A little pricy yes, but the performances are well worth it.
Aryaduta: Stayed here for two night. This hotel was managed by Hyatt, so you can see Hyatt's feeling with their amenities. I had good night sleep. Their top notch is the Executive Club at the 13th. I wish I knew this place. I spend great afternoon cocktail and selection of cheese.
Trans: 5 Stars Luxury Hotel in Bandung. Totally in love this hotel from the first time we arrived, friendly customer service. we booked for one night to celebrate my daughter and wife birthday, they assist in room setup which is a very nice setup with birthday cake and teddy bear for my daughter, totally appreciate it. room is spacious, bathroom is cool with bathtub , the amenities is great they even provide bubble bath and bubble bomb, the bed, the pillow which you can request for custom pillow even special pillow for pregnant women, club lounge is great. I recommend for first time traveler to choose club benefit room you pay a little bit more but you get better service, you can have afternoon tea time or evening cocktail, and during breakfast you can have ala carte menu. everything…

White_Charter: There nothing much too see actually except the cold and fresh air of the mountain, most of the good view are during the way up to the crater using special cars. Because when you went up there to the crater it only took a few minutes to admired and enjoy the crater environment…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I found many upgrades on this area since I visit a few years ago. Now we can explore the crater (Kawah Ratu) from many angle. Nothing much to see actually, except the cool & fresh mountain air. Food stall selling almost the same food with reasonable price.  Parking lot for car…
Saung_Angklung: It is a lovely place (albeit a bit difficult to find) with a very good show, but that's about it. The show starts at 3:30 pm daily... Make sure you're there in time for it cos there's nothing else worth the admission price. Also bear in mind that the price is different for…
Ciater: It is a lovely place (albeit a bit difficult to find) with a very good show, but that's about it. The show starts at 3:30 pm daily... Make sure you're there in time for it cos there's nothing else worth the admission price. Also bear in mind that the price is different for…
Aryaduta: Having 2 nights stayed before we were heading to bali. It was lovely room with a great hospitality from the staff. Food variety was Great and all the staff will always greet you with a big smile. Special thanks to night manager who handle our check in process Mr Seni Apriadi. We will surely stay in Aryaduta hotel whenever we are going back to bandung.
Trans: Beside the Trans shopping mall and Themes Park .. so can said one stop stay. Shopping playing dinner .. food all only one step . And quiet room with huge window have a good view . With this 5 stars hotel with reasonable price also.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih (or White Crater) is accessible by visitors who are allowed to descend into the crater. Only the pool of water and the pool side where there is heavy concentration of sulphur content is cordoned off.  The admission fee is RP 50K per person. There are 2 ways to get to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I guess i shouldnt have been so irritated wit this, since earlier reviewers wrote about the exact same things.  With the kind of price we paid, i certainly hope most of it goes to maintaining the area(which looked quite self-sufficient) and paying the guides.  1. Paid 200K each…
Saung_Angklung: Been here twice so far. First to have own experience with angklung n the second time to bring my friends. Basically if u plan to come make sure u are in time with the daily cultural show or else there's not much else to see. The show was run by saung angklung udjo students who…
Ciater: Been here twice so far. First to have own experience with angklung n the second time to bring my friends. Basically if u plan to come make sure u are in time with the daily cultural show or else there's not much else to see. The show was run by saung angklung udjo students who…
Aryaduta: i was invited to stay here by my friends Lisna, Agung & Madina.. the lounge is stunning, and the lobby is very cozy. Highly recommended for having relax time and stay all day cause the room is spacious, ac is working properly, everything is clean, bathroom is gorgeous, so many amenities, breakfast taste is nice and so many choices. Bravo Aryaduta Hotel..
Trans: The Best Hotel in Bandung city for all ocassion. Stayed here for New Year Eve, we found that this hotel very helpfull for senior like my mother who comes with wheel chair, their staff willing to help when we needed. This hotel has a high standard for guest. Thank You Trans Hotel..!!

White_Charter: Foreigner fee 50k rupiah. With a car 150k rupiah. And we can redeem free strawberry drink if bought the car fee at the restaurant beside the ticket place.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Kawah Domas – bad experience just a lil bit  My fren and I visited Tangkuban Perahu, Bandung recently and we did enjoy the scenic view. We were told to hike to Kawah Domas from Kawah Ratu a fee need to be paid plus a guide fee. Other than that no payment were to be paid. We were…
Saung_Angklung: I went with a group of friends to Bandung recently and went to see the Saung Angklung Udjo performance on a Saturday afternoon. The entrance fee was InRupiah 110,000 per pax. The performances by the children in singing, playing the angklung, dancing/singing with guests (at the…
Ciater: I went with a group of friends to Bandung recently and went to see the Saung Angklung Udjo performance on a Saturday afternoon. The entrance fee was InRupiah 110,000 per pax. The performances by the children in singing, playing the angklung, dancing/singing with guests (at the…
Aryaduta: For amount paid, it was great value. Friendly staff in every department. Room was clean, spacious and cosy. Breakfast was good with mix of local and international. Executive lounge was fantastic with great service staff and wonderful environment. Will definitely return to stay in this hotel if ever back in Bandung. Thank you to all the wonderful staff for a memorable stay.
Trans: this is not the first time i visit this hotel, but i always happy when i &family stay in here. the room was nice&luxury. the pool is good and i have a breakfast at The 18th restaurant, a warm greetings from Hanna&Kintan. they are very friendly.. and also the all staff&food is good<U+0001F44C><U+0001F3FB>

White_Charter: Loved the drive through paddy fields, some quaint towns that had horse carriages as a means of transport. We passed some old Japanese bridges, and picturesque villages before arriving at the kawah putih area. There is a fee of IDR75,000 including the jeep transport or an…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The overall experience is average but the entry fee is a little high. Tickets in cost about SGD$30, exclusive of tour guide and vehicle fees for each person.  Tour guide fees is about SGD$30 for the administrative fees, excluding tips which are more or less compulsory.  Due to…
Saung_Angklung: I went there with my husband and 5-yr-old kid. While we are there, they show us their great performance. Full of musical and sounds. We have an opportunity to try the 'angklung' and there is one session where's they come to the audience and randomly chose us to join their…
Ciater: I went there with my husband and 5-yr-old kid. While we are there, they show us their great performance. Full of musical and sounds. We have an opportunity to try the 'angklung' and there is one session where's they come to the audience and randomly chose us to join their…
Aryaduta: 5 star rating is not enough for this hotel, i would highly recommend families with elderly or children to stay here when they visit bandung. Their entire staff went out of their way to assist our elderly family member when we lost of luggage at the airport. They were so hospitable and went out of their way to assist us in every way they could.  Truly the best hospitality i have received till date.
Trans: It was my first experience staying there and it was really great. Great service, great ambience and cleanliness, and I always love the nice smell when you got in to the lobby. In my staying, although it’s just one night, but the service I’ve got was 100% comforting! The hospitality was excellent and the service team really did a great job. It’s unforgettable. No wonder why I had to pay that much to stay, but it’s all worth it!! And sure, I’ll be back again soon.

White_Charter: and this is one of the handful of remaining sites where foreigners are not ripped off with exorbitant fees. The hustlers are not too intrusive. Do be careful if you are asthmatic or suffer from any respiratory conditions as you will get some bronchospasm from the sulphur fumes…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Considering it costed me and my fiancée sgd30 each for just entrance is really on the high side. Wouldn't mind paying if they would provide more information about the volcano. Loads and loads of guides and people hawking their wares and services.  We paid another 30bucks each,…
Saung_Angklung: We visited as part of a tour and I thought I wouldn't enjoy the show as I was told it was based on a puppet show, which I can't stand, but how wrong I was. We were first showed how the Angklung is made, a bamboo instrument. We were given an ice cream and were sat waiting to for…
Ciater: We visited as part of a tour and I thought I wouldn't enjoy the show as I was told it was based on a puppet show, which I can't stand, but how wrong I was. We were first showed how the Angklung is made, a bamboo instrument. We were given an ice cream and were sat waiting to for…
Aryaduta: It was a good experience and got a good service from all the staff starting from the reception, housekeeping, pool attendant, restaurant staff and especially from Mr. Reza, he was so professional and feel welcome. The hotel was unique and old fashioned but it was well maintained. Superb team!!
Trans: Good hotel with excellence and premium room facility, the cleanliness is very good, the foods in restaurant was so delicious, so many variant of food during breakfast,, the pool for kids was interesting, the room is perfect! They just should be improve on receptionist service/arrival service..thanks

White_Charter: i went there in super early morning to get sunrise, and its stunning!! :) . you must go there once in a life, hahaha :D . the oct 2015 was about my 33rd times.
Tangkuban_Perahu: my second time been here. first when I was 2 years old. The second time, I brought my relatives. Paid IDR 225.000 for 6 people including car. (fyi : international tourist have to pay around IDR 100.000, $6 higher than local tourist.)but it's worthy at all.  spend only 1 hour…
Saung_Angklung: With a disappointment on the FO, the food & the traffic, this is the highlight of the trip. The performers in Suang Udjo show how a performer can be packaged into a FUN experience yet giving us a slice of the culture of Sunda, West Java & Indonesia
Ciater: With a disappointment on the FO, the food & the traffic, this is the highlight of the trip. The performers in Suang Udjo show how a performer can be packaged into a FUN experience yet giving us a slice of the culture of Sunda, West Java & Indonesia
Aryaduta: The best Hotel in service and facilities.  Thank you for All friendly staff Aryaduta team who gave us excellent service during our stay 15-20 April 2017. Big thanks to Ms Lisna for arranged swan towels and flowers in our room.   Keep it up to be the best Aryaduta Bandung.   Regards,  Penny & Michael Meyer
Trans: Our stay on 17th to 21st dec for 4 nights, 3 adults and 2 kids. We booked connecting, club executive rooms and was given room no 1725 and 1726. Overall our stay was pleasant and the view from our room was fabulous.   However i would like to provide some constructive feedback :  - We are given VIP check-in at a separate area, a grand room near lift lobby and was served juices. However i am disappointed with the reception that checked us in. I was not briefed at all the perks of booking a club executive room. Which is breakfast area at the club lounge on the 18th floor, the complimentary cocktail and snacks, free 4pcs of laundry etc. The common things like Kids activities, wifi, pool area, breakfast time etc was not mentioned. Basically she settled the payment, i signed a form and…

White_Charter: The journey from the city to Kawah Putih took about 2 hours.  The entrance fee for foreigner is Rp50,000 and car driving up to Kawah Putih is Rp150,000.  If you choose to take the shuttle bus is Rp21,000 for both way.  The locals like to visit this place on a weekend.  The…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is a short drive outside Bandung. A must see for first time visit to a volcano with smoldering lava. Absolutely beautiful mountain scenery up close to an active volcano with a shallow lake. Admission ticket for foreign visitors is quite pricey though. A lot of local…
Saung_Angklung: The main instrument of this place is Angklung  which is bamboo-made so that the building is bamboo-architectured also - it's unique and traditional. When I came,welcome-drink was served too (mineral water or ice cream). Even though the first stage was playing Indonesia puppet…
Ciater: The main instrument of this place is Angklung  which is bamboo-made so that the building is bamboo-architectured also - it's unique and traditional. When I came,welcome-drink was served too (mineral water or ice cream). Even though the first stage was playing Indonesia puppet…
Aryaduta: Formerly Hyatt. Staff well mannered and speak English. Connecting entrance to medium size shopping mall which is useful. Breakfast good range but average. All entrance to hotel manned by security with metal detectors.
Trans: Trans Luxury Hotel is really are what you should get from " Luxury " Hotel. Nice, Clean and Artistic Layout. And also you can just walk to The Trans Studio Mall. The food was really good and i can assure you that this is the best hotel in Bandung or even in West Java Province.

White_Charter: It is a beautiful place! It was pretty chilly when we were there. This place really mesmerized me. The truly stunning view makes me don't wanna leave. Feels like I'm in a fantasy!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Went here to see a relatively non-active crater that said was created from a folklore. Saw some stunning views but that's it. Just spend at most 1 hour here so after saw the crater and take some photo just leave.
Saung_Angklung: Fun show that was interactive and the kids were lively. Having the band perform pop tunes that also incorporated the angklung was a terrific idea. Thumbs up! :)
Ciater: Fun show that was interactive and the kids were lively. Having the band perform pop tunes that also incorporated the angklung was a terrific idea. Thumbs up! :)
Aryaduta: I know that this hotel change the brand from Hyatt to Aryaduta. But I must say that I'm really impressed with how good they run this hotel. All of the staff are excellent !!!  I'm very sure its not just about well trained employee but somehow I feel that they love what they do. How they welcome us from the very step in the hotel, how they speak with my kids, and all of those small things really matter.  Room wise, we take the Aryaduta Club and its very nice, newly renovated and also the access to Club Lounge is excellent.  Location wise also very nice, really a walk distance from a shopping center and also lots of local food nearby  Will definitely recommend this hotel and will come back again for sure
Trans: We stayed for five nights and it was as excellent as our previous stay. Our children love the kids club. It is a great place, especially the x box. The pool has fun slides. We also tried the spa and the massage was great. Room interior and design is excellent.  We love the great breakfast at 18th floor where the city view was amazing and the staff there were very friendly. Even our children love them! Can't wait to be back again.

White_Charter: This place is awesome.  Perfect for pre wedding picture... Actually, nothing more than the scenery .  I will be confused after spend 30 minutes there. Because all you can do is just seen the scenery.  But i guess it worth the visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: one of indonesia best place to take pics with tangkuban view n some writen history....you will got nice weather to,
Saung_Angklung: If you are boring with activities in Bandung like shopping or walking around heritage building. This is the best place for you to watch and play angklung together. Not only that, you can see the Angklung maker when he make angklung.
Ciater: If you are boring with activities in Bandung like shopping or walking around heritage building. This is the best place for you to watch and play angklung together. Not only that, you can see the Angklung maker when he make angklung.
Aryaduta: Hotel has spacious room with beautiful view. Hotel are clean and most of staff are nice and friendly. Located just side by side with BIP mall which one of the benefit staying. Was staying in Club floor and access to club lounge with free wine and cocktail. Breakfast with good option, but waiting staff too slow to clear dirty plates on the table or too refill empty tea on the line. Overall very satisfied stays
Trans: Luxurious rooms with opulent bathrooms, an outdoor heated swimming pool (with an amazing manmade beach), delicious food, an 18th floor sky bar / restaurant with a great view, a beautiful lobby... theses are all fantastic features of the Trans Hotel but what really makes it outstanding is its service. From pool help to front desk, cleaner to Chef, all staff here do their utmost to help you to enjoy your stay. My husband and I recently stayed with our son and we all had a wonderful time. Little touches such as teepees in rooms can be added to make the stay magical for children too. You can easily spend a day or 2 just at the trans complex (as we did this time) as in addition to the pool and the hotel spa facilities, the hotel is also attached to a mall and the Trans Studio indoor…

White_Charter: A very interesting visit. This was my 1st time visiting a volcano. A beautiful site. However, needs to wear mask as the smell of sulfur from the crater was strong.
Tangkuban_Perahu: The one and only place to see active volcano crater and it's not far from downtown Bandung. My kid loves it and keep saying 'woow'. Very nice for photography. Easy to reach by foot to the main crater, ample parking lot, many souvenir shops, cool breezy air. You can also ride a…
Saung_Angklung: We went there on a Sunday. Once it was finished and we went outside it was rush hour. One the street we couldn't find any taxi or scooters to take us back to downtown.   The show was fun to watch. As many others mentioned, it has become a big tourist attraction. I think 80% were…
Ciater: We went there on a Sunday. Once it was finished and we went outside it was rush hour. One the street we couldn't find any taxi or scooters to take us back to downtown.   The show was fun to watch. As many others mentioned, it has become a big tourist attraction. I think 80% were…
Aryaduta: Nice, big and clean room, close to factory outlet so you can walk for shopping connecting to mall if you want to eat or looking for something, easy if only want to sightseeing around the city, very nice place.
Trans: Nice room, nice service, breakfast with lots of options. Swimming pool was great, lots of activity for kids. Everyone in the hotel has fast respond and great hospitality. Ballroom service was great and nice.

White_Charter: We arrived Bandung early in the morning and the driver (supir) told us better to go to Ciwidey in the morning to avoid crowds. It took 2 hours to arrive and the road is really narrow and steep.As this is volcano crater there will be salesman selling mask at the entrance to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view was breathtakingly beautiful. We love this place, fresh air and stunning view of nature beauty.  Highly recommended.  Only grouse was the entrance fee.  Weekend for tourist was very expensive. Not only that, we were followed around by people who is trying to sell us…
Saung_Angklung: Interactive performance where you get to play the angklung as part of the show! Enjoyed watching the kids performing the angklung and dancing with them at the end!
Ciater: Interactive performance where you get to play the angklung as part of the show! Enjoyed watching the kids performing the angklung and dancing with them at the end!
Aryaduta: We checked in early since my son need a quick nap. Only room in smoking floor is avail. Good thing the room is not smelly of smokes. We stayed at #621 i think the room is newly renovated.  Plus: Room is spacious and clean Link to BIP shopping mal Kids pool and kids area are available Breakfast has variety of choices  Min: Location is great but beware of traffic jam around their area.  Tips: Their main entrance is not on jalan sumatra, if you come from jalan sumatra you have to make a long way to get into their entrance
Trans: Very good for family, the swimming pool is perfect, kiddos very happy to play, can get early check in and late checkout, location is perfect, near to the trans mall and trans studio.. Perfect for holiday

White_Charter: Beautiful view worth every penny! Quite far from city area but worth it!its really interesting and the rate is affordable.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I took a private driver from Bandung. Would recommend that if you wanna visit places out of Bandung. Is far more relaxed than public transport. This crater is about 90 min drive from Bandung city centre. My advice: go as early as possible, especially during raining season. Dont…
Saung_Angklung: Sundanese is one of the tribe on Java island. One of the most interesting things of this tribe is their musical instrument, Angklung. Here, in Saung Angklung Udjo, you will watch a sincere and admirable performance that show the cultural heritage of Indonesia. For that, you just…
Ciater: Sundanese is one of the tribe on Java island. One of the most interesting things of this tribe is their musical instrument, Angklung. Here, in Saung Angklung Udjo, you will watch a sincere and admirable performance that show the cultural heritage of Indonesia. For that, you just…
Aryaduta: I did not like condition of my room. The walls were dirty with scuff marks, door frame and furnitures were chipped, phone did not work properly, the bathtub was rusty around tub stopper with many yellow stains, toilet bowl with yellow water stains. The pillow cases were stained. Room really did not meet my expectation of 5 star hotel. On other hand I have to say that hotel stuff was very friendly especially in breakfast restaurant.
Trans: Nice hotel for family trip, the pool is the best part, and the kids club, my child loved it. Near from trans studio n trans mall. Thank you trans luxury. Hope next time i'll be there soon with my family again

White_Charter: I would recommend White Crater to all people who wants to visit Bandung. It's a peaceful place with a very beautiful scenery.   It took me nearly 2 hours from Bandung on Saturday morning. The traffic was smooth. I booked a tour, so, my driver brought me up there I didn't have to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The place is amazing. First time to see a volcano crater up close and still active. Nice cool weather. There are a couple of craters in the area but haven't visited it.
Saung_Angklung: went in june 2014 It is heritage been brought forward. Do not go with a perception of a great show.Go and see how kids are learning this music from bamboos. amazing performance by kids. Mask dance will teach you difficulties dancers face. Puppet show will teach you how it is…
Ciater: went in june 2014 It is heritage been brought forward. Do not go with a perception of a great show.Go and see how kids are learning this music from bamboos. amazing performance by kids. Mask dance will teach you difficulties dancers face. Puppet show will teach you how it is…
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung was previously Hyatt Hotel. It is not a new hotel, but I can say that i love the room (it is spacious, and the bed is really comfortable.  Here are the pros and cons of these hotels in my view:  PROs: - it has a strategic location (near Dago area, walking distance from merdeka area, Riau area (where factory outlets are located)  - the room is spacious - bed is comfortable - they serve good Indonesian buffet breakfast  - staffs are friendly and helpful - it has connecting doors to BIP mall  CONs: - while the room is good, the other facilities (I am talking about the swimming  pool and the supporting facilities) do look old.  -
Trans: A very convenient place for a vacation with family. And location close to the mall. Perfect!! hHghly recommended for families who want to vacation in Bandung. friendly staff and varied breakfast menu.

White_Charter: The place has good viewing and also the forest surround the hills made the feeling stay calm. The infrastucture is good. It is very nice. Recommended one.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I really liked tangkuban perahu but beware when you get to the gates everyone is trying to rip you off! Couldn't believe it at first as if your a local you pay 30,000 rupiah on the weekend and 300,000 if your a tourist!!! That's ten times more!!  Then if you take a small bus up…
Saung_Angklung: On our 3 week tour of Indonesia, we had the incredible fortune to spend half a day at this wonderful place.  The angklung is a true heritage instrument of Indonesia, and the culture of making them and performing with them is due to a husband and wife who understood the…
Ciater: On our 3 week tour of Indonesia, we had the incredible fortune to spend half a day at this wonderful place.  The angklung is a true heritage instrument of Indonesia, and the culture of making them and performing with them is due to a husband and wife who understood the…
Aryaduta: My girlfriend, her parent and I stayed in the hotel. We were pleasantly surprised by the good services and we enjoyed the morning buffet spread. I had also requested for a birthday cake for my girlfriend and it was prepared too (complimentary)! I like to thank RIcky (the reception staff) who assisted with the little surprise for my beloved one. And personally, I like the Easter surprises at the hotel lobby: there are some bunnies which attracted both the adults and little childrens. What a good way to usher in Easter Sunday!
Trans: It is not a surprise that Trans Hotel is the best in Bandung. The facilities, amenities, location, adjacent to the mall and Trans studio. My family loves this hotel very much. We had no problem checking in and out from the hotel. Thanks for making our holiday enjoyable. Keep up the great work

White_Charter: The journey to Kawah Putih took around 3 hours. Our driver told us we he could not bring us up to the place because no public vans are allowed(?) so we got down and had snacks because we were hungry. Then we paid our tickets at the counter and hop on the 'Ontang-anting',…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Paid the tourist price of 200,000rupiah per person. It will be better if they don't raise the entry fee that high. Locals only paid 20,000rupiah. Walk along the path and 2 locals started following us and lead us to the bottom of the tangkuban perahu. Overall experience was…
Saung_Angklung: just pay IDR 100.000 for 1 person you will see a good performance, also you can try to play this traditional music "angklung" made from bamboo but the sound was nice. my daughter doesn't want to stop playing this traditonal music from West of Java. you must try!
Ciater: just pay IDR 100.000 for 1 person you will see a good performance, also you can try to play this traditional music "angklung" made from bamboo but the sound was nice. my daughter doesn't want to stop playing this traditonal music from West of Java. you must try!
Aryaduta: I've been stay here 3-4 times and love it, the building is old building but still good, bed also comfy and have good view, also they have extension to Bandung Indah Plaza shopping mall, so when you need something you just right away to the mall, they have bathtubs which is very nice, room lights also good and swimming pool is clean and nice, breakfast serve every morning and have lots variants every day so you don't get bored, and staff also nice they greet you every time , I'm personally looking for hotel in good service staff and I got that from this hotel.
Trans: A big Thank You for accommodating my request to bring my son to hospital at 12.00am @ 21 Dec 2017. The concerned gesture by the hotel staffs and the warmth reception received when we get back to hotel from the hospital @ 1.30am were much appreciated. The night manager was even graciously send over room service of hot choco and cookies for my son. Thanks for all your kind action.

White_Charter: Absolutely amazed. Stunning turquoise color. But be warned, the smell is bad, especially when the wind blows. Great for photography. Definitely worth the visit.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is our first trip to bandung and unfortunately i do not really enjoy my trip. On my third day i visited (today) Lembang and Tangkuban Perahu and really hope that this trip will make our more meaningfull. The scenary is beautiful however in my opinion not really suitable for…
Saung_Angklung: On our last day in Bandung, we spent the morning at this location. Do not know what to expect but we just go ahead to kill time. Entrance was cheap and it comes with a small souvenir (Angklung). At the beginning I do find it a bit slow but once the kids starts performing, it…
Ciater: On our last day in Bandung, we spent the morning at this location. Do not know what to expect but we just go ahead to kill time. Entrance was cheap and it comes with a small souvenir (Angklung). At the beginning I do find it a bit slow but once the kids starts performing, it…
Aryaduta: The Hotel location was near Bandung train station,  price is cheaper compare other hotel with similar condition. Facility in this hotel was complete and management also  friendly and helpful,  this hotel also has connecting door to BIP mall.  I recommended if you go to Bandung please stay in this Hotel
Trans: Nice Hotel for Family holiday,  3rd floor have nice pool and kids club. Sky lounge 18th floor have best view,  You can try your adrenalin at sky walk. Clean room and luxury class for sleep. Good service from all hotel staff.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih (White Crater) is 50km south-west of Bandung, taking two hours on a weekday to get to the park entrance after a scenic drive through the Ciwidey area (longer on weekends). Entrance fee of Rp 50,000 (US$3.50) for a foreigner (Rp 18,000 for a local) includes a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: A very relaxing place that you wouldn't experience in Singapore. Local sellers are all around but if you say no politely, they wouldn't harm you. Foggy and cooling day it is. Awesome experience!
Saung_Angklung: These guys are professionals and very passionate! A nice highlight to my evening. Bandung needs more of this kind of place. It has so much to offer!
Ciater: These guys are professionals and very passionate! A nice highlight to my evening. Bandung needs more of this kind of place. It has so much to offer!
Aryaduta: One of my family best experience to stay in the hotel. Stayed 2 nights in Club Superior Room. And it was amazing. Direct checked in on 13th floor and waited in the club lounge so we can enjoy coffee some snack for my children while our room was prepared. And It's worth for me to choose Club Room because no extra money for the food. And the best thing that we can early check in on that day (12 o'clock).  Actually the hotel is an old building and when I saw from outside it looks need to be repaint. And for the parking area is to small but you can park your car in BIP parking area. Check out process was so easy.
