Trans: Perfect room, nice food n staff. Not far from train station. I stayed 2 nights with my two kids they really enjoy the room specially the bath room. It has bathtub and they compliment with bubble bath soap including salt ball. It’s really good time to spent with them together in the bath time <U+0001F606>

White_Charter: Tip : you should go to this place early in the morning or in the afternoon so you won't miss the haze.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Luckily we went during the week as the weekend rate is more, and our son has a working visa so paid the local rate. We paid 200,000 rupiah each plus 20,000 each for our son and the driver and 25,000 for the car. That's £24 to drive up to one crater only. To be fair it was pretty…
Saung_Angklung: Entertaing n enjoyable. Love it esp when we were played together. The ochestra performance was great.
Ciater: Entertaing n enjoyable. Love it esp when we were played together. The ochestra performance was great.
Aryaduta: Good location, before it was the Hyatt, now they changed the name and become Aryaduta. The hotel is a bit old, our room was smelling a bit. We let our luggages at 11am and came back fro check in at 6pm... we informed us that our room wasn't ready because of the traffic jam in Bandung....no comments. We had to wait an other 20 min while they were preparing the room. For a 5 star hotel, we can expect much more. The positive thing, it's the food at the restaurant, we ordered severals times ans the food was good but again we were disappointed one night as we ordered a few plates in the menu but the restaurant was running out of stock (pizza, salmon...). For all the reasons, I don't think we'll be back.
Trans: Easy to reservation and while checkin, Luxury hotel and rooms with complete play ground for kids and great pool with warm water, also for shopping cause it close to big shopping mall. Good food and beverage, serve a variety of foods and drinks for breakfast..

White_Charter: Really pretty view and worth the 3 hr car ride. Plenty of beautiful scenery on the way there from Central Bandung too. Sulphur smell is not too overpowering if you don't stay too long. Weather was good, jeans and cardigan advised.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Standing at the hilltop and peeping inside gives a mesmerizing view of white belly and sulphur fumes coming out from it provided us a wow! feeling and we forget the tiredness of reaching there from Jakarta which took almost 6 hours on a busy holiday of Ester.  Entering fee for…
Saung_Angklung: Bandung has soo many thing to offer, nature, food, shopping, and the list go on.. but nothing can beat the experience you'll have and Saung Angklung Udjo. It is amazing have a traditional musical instrument can evolve over time. They can play Indonesian traditional song, Michael…
Ciater: Bandung has soo many thing to offer, nature, food, shopping, and the list go on.. but nothing can beat the experience you'll have and Saung Angklung Udjo. It is amazing have a traditional musical instrument can evolve over time. They can play Indonesian traditional song, Michael…
Aryaduta: We booked for about 1 week stay in Aryaduta.  We were a family of 3 adults, 3 kids and 1 toddler so we booked 2 deluxe rooms. Was pleased with the spacious rooms and comfortable beds. There was enough space that the room doesnt look too cramped with our luggage and contents. Room was cleaned well enough but as per other reviewers, the bathtub was stained (not dirty just stained from years of use) and towels are worn (clean still and fluffy) just not white. Just had 1 unpleasant experience when we were showering the kids - we grab a new towel from the rack and found stains on it (hubby smelled them and said it smell of grease... kinda turn me off and piss me off) so we called housekeeping and highlight to them for exchange - which they promptly did.   Besides this unpleasant…
Trans: A really comfy family hotel with direct access to mall and theme park. Not really suitable for business meeting with its kind of atmosphere, yet had a great meeting room and service. The amenities is in great quality. The food selection quite vary and had a good local taste.

White_Charter: Nice location for photographic enthusiasts. Stay in the upwind direction as the pungent smell of sulphur can be very irritating when the wind blows. Temperature was in the high 20s when we were there in mid-Sep.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Ok, I've given this 2 point because it is a pretty impressive hole in the ground! Go up, take a few pictures (there are some nicely maintained trails round the crater) then wonder why you just paid 15 GBP to come there!! Obscene price for tourists - what are they thinking?!…
Saung_Angklung: A wonderful place to see authentic Indonesian culture. Starting from the shows about angklung, to the traditional music from Sabang 'till Merauke. Here you can enjoy everything Indonesian and will make you feel like you are part of the show (literally!). They showcase a number…
Ciater: A wonderful place to see authentic Indonesian culture. Starting from the shows about angklung, to the traditional music from Sabang 'till Merauke. Here you can enjoy everything Indonesian and will make you feel like you are part of the show (literally!). They showcase a number…
Aryaduta: So far this hotel is totally good,hospitality good service. Good smiwing pool, and the foods also nice. Close to Braga street and BIP. No point bad at all for this hotel. I chose this hotel because I took recommendation from my guide.  He took me to hot spring and he got car also if u need someone who can accompany you during in Bandung. Heres his number (+6285224841347) his name is arid really helpful.
Trans: they really treat us like a king we were stay there for family Holiday, the service away better than Mulia Hotel. Even though they were busy, i couldnt see any failure in service. How can they manage so well? Definately will be back again. Surprisingly just find out that the GM is local. Salute!!

White_Charter: The Kawah Putih was a little dry at the moment we visit, because there wasn't any rain for 3 months. Never the less it's nice to view this phenomenon and see the steam coming out of the craterside. It's very different then Tangkuban Perahu. There are a few photopoints at the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: An easy drive from Bandung. The act drives all the way upto the crater and then an easy walk down to Dumas crater with hot springs. The walk down is very scenic and the guides are helpful and friendly. 150 rupiah is the guide fee for locals plus a tip. Totally worth it.
Saung_Angklung: I have been to this attraction 3 times now and even though the experience is always the same, it's such a great experience that you don't care. On arrival you buy very reasonably priced tickets and you get a mini Angklung keepsake that also proves you're a paid visitor.…
Ciater: I have been to this attraction 3 times now and even though the experience is always the same, it's such a great experience that you don't care. On arrival you buy very reasonably priced tickets and you get a mini Angklung keepsake that also proves you're a paid visitor.…
Aryaduta: Nice location, close to the mall and food center. Staff was very friendly, room spacious and very clean, with complete facilities. The breakfast menu is varied One thing that bothers, when he first entered the room, I found the bottled water that is already open containing a quarter of a bottle of water and not replaced with new bottled water. Overall, the hotel was very good
Trans: Awesome hotel and easy to reach. Complete feature and easy to get to the mall and also entertainment facility (trans studio). Can be reach by public transport or personal vehicle. Despite the rate that quiet high but it worth to spend.

White_Charter: 1. Entrance fee 100.000 Rp 2. Vehicle fee 150.000 Rp 3. Below 3 y.o. free entrance 4. The smell is not so bad at the crater 5. Cool weather 6. Redeem free drinks : strawberry juice, ginger juice, tea
Tangkuban_Perahu: Best to go by car.  You can walk in the path surrounding the crater, or spend your time in the nearby warung. Warung mostly sells instant food and drinks. We went there in the rainy season, so there was sunny moment, foggy moment and then it rained. We didn't spend a long time…
Saung_Angklung: Great introduction to traditional music performed with angklung, a music instrument hand-made from bamboo. It's no mean feat!!
Ciater: Great introduction to traditional music performed with angklung, a music instrument hand-made from bamboo. It's no mean feat!!
Aryaduta: Parking was frustrating. But it was paid off by lovely evening cocktail at the club lounge. Room was old fashioned but comfy, we stay at club floor. But shockingly, breakfast was half empty when we were at club lounge at 9 am. We barely eat nothing. Definitely need to improve.The rest was lovely.
Trans: The most great valuable hotel to stay... great service, great room, clean. It is still my favorite hotel in Bandung. I will always stay here when in Leisure or Business trip in Bandung. Thank you Transluxury.

White_Charter: I never see the more amazing view than this place! cant be described by words. it has a bit cold weather and sulphur smell. but the rest view is awesome. the most recommended place to visit in Bandung. by just seeing it you wont realize you start thinking that God is really…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great scenery, the area also very clean and well maintained. Only got to visit Kawah Ratu due to our rush schedule. Local sellers aren't too aggresive as long as we reject them politely. They also told us there is another creater called Kawah Domas nearby which has more…
Saung_Angklung: saung Angklung udjo is a perfect place to spend your holiday and learn about sundanese culture. In there you can watch the angklung orchestra's performance, dance, wayang golek and the most exciting part is when you can shake the Angklung. Its so much fun!!you'll be amazed by…
Ciater: saung Angklung udjo is a perfect place to spend your holiday and learn about sundanese culture. In there you can watch the angklung orchestra's performance, dance, wayang golek and the most exciting part is when you can shake the Angklung. Its so much fun!!you'll be amazed by…
Aryaduta: Location was nice. Just by walk to find good resto. Also close to BIP. I have to wait awhile since only one staff receiptionist when we arrived. Service so so... not as what I expect. But security service was great.
Trans: Thank you, All. We'll come back to stay at Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung. Everything was so great. Their hospitality was so nice. Breakfast with various selection menus. Children enjoy the swimming pool and the Kids Club. I would recommend you to book the Club Room Type. It's worthed. You can get all the good benefits include Tea Time at The Club Lounge at 18th floor.

White_Charter: After a 3-hour drive from the city of Bandung, we arrived at the park entrance.  From the park entrance to the sulphuric lake took us another 30 minutes.  It was worth every minute of the visit.  The turquoise coloured lake is what remained from the last volcanic activity in…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This place is made of all kitsch nightmare imaginable.  The entrance fee to this National Park has since gone up from 75,000 Rupiah to 330,000 Rupiah.  The price hike is exorbitant.  Let's hope that the money is used wisely to improve the infrastructure over there.  Everything…
Saung_Angklung: This is a place where you could spend your two-hours enjoying lovely Sundanese culture, which includes: wayang golek, helaran song and dance, a beautiful Merak or Topeng dance [performed by three or more girl-dancers], a breath-taking bamboo orchestra played by boys and girl…
Ciater: This is a place where you could spend your two-hours enjoying lovely Sundanese culture, which includes: wayang golek, helaran song and dance, a beautiful Merak or Topeng dance [performed by three or more girl-dancers], a breath-taking bamboo orchestra played by boys and girl…
Aryaduta: I was visit aryaduta hotel bandung ( former Hyatt Regencey hotel bandung ), this is old hotel but excellent service, excellent cleanliness and excellent staff. the room with classic interior and good maintenance. the hotel is one area with BIP mall.
Trans: My second time in this hotel....the staff are friendly and helpful. Thanks to MR Dimas and MR Hilal for extremely helpful during my breakfast. 10 star for this hotel and Mr Dimas n Mr Hilal team. Pasti selepas ini bila saya ke bandung saya akan memilih hotel ini juga utk bermalam.

White_Charter: This is my third visit to White Crater. The amazing things of this place is you can see the crater very close and the color is white. With hills and forest as the background, the scenery is beautiful. However you should not take your time there more than 15 minutes to avoid the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great place to visit for the 1st time, but nothing much to come back for a second visit. Nice cool weather. But the touts and souvenir sellers may spoil your holiday mood.
Saung_Angklung: a cultural place to see creative artists playing traditional bamboo musical instrument called angklung and experience playing with modern and popular songs.
Ciater: a cultural place to see creative artists playing traditional bamboo musical instrument called angklung and experience playing with modern and popular songs.
Aryaduta: This former Hyatt Hotel is in a great location connected to a middle income level mall.  It's a gorgeous building as Hyatt usually delivers.  However Aryaduta had failed to deliver their identity and charm.  Their restaurants lack organization and presentation.  You want to avoid serving stale dinner roles and have empty trays at the buffet.  Furniture at restaurants are old and out dated.  Rooms although clean have out dated furniture, appliances and fixtures. Bathroom drains are slow.  Put in the charm and update will make a difference
Trans: This was my second time staying in this hotel, both for business. The room and bathroom were clean, nice, and comfortable. The aisles were clean also and there was no uneasy smell due to thick carpets. The restaurant and food were ok.  On the 1st day of meeting, one hotel staff gave presentation on safety briefing,  On my 4th night, a 6.9 richter scale earthquake hit some areas of west Java, included Bandung. From the 17th level, where my room was located, the shakiness was very clear and worrying. Hence I did not hear any alarms or notifications from the hotel. So I and other guests who got out from our rooms then guided ourselves to assembly point on ground floor through emergency door, which not releases any sound when it was opened by the way. Until I got to the ground…

White_Charter: It is a place to see a crater with a lake in it, and the lake color is green. When you go here, try to arrive here in the morning, let say before 10 am or in the afternoon after 3 pm. The view is marvelous, so you can make many pictures with different background and angels.…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view is great! Its greenish and foggy and slightly cold. The place is clean and well maintained. However beware of those souvenir sellers...once you asked them, they'll follow you around till you're done with your visits!!
Saung_Angklung: When I landed in Bandung, this wasnt on my list at first, but a few locals whom i befriended brought me to this place, and boy did it took me by surprise! It was such a magnificent performance where you can imagine all these carribean-like instruments resonating all around the…
Ciater: When I landed in Bandung, this wasnt on my list at first, but a few locals whom i befriended brought me to this place, and boy did it took me by surprise! It was such a magnificent performance where you can imagine all these carribean-like instruments resonating all around the…
Aryaduta: The bed was very comfortable. The breakfast was ok, nothing special. Everyone was friendly. My parents got a room with pool view, so maybe next time you can ask for it because mine doesnt have good view at all. Location was great! In the busy road of Jalan Sumatra.
Trans: I was satisfied with the service provided since check in process until check out process. Service that being delivered was very good. Excellent cleanliness throughout hotel property. Very good value for money. Excellent location for shopping. Very good sleep quality and excellent room ambience.

White_Charter: Definitely worth the longer trip. The crater is stunningly beautiful and the child are shining in incredible colors! Lots of tourists and guys that wasn't to take dslr pictures for money but beside that it's so great there. Only watch out not getting sick down there... the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Since this place is a volcanic area, do bring a mask and bring an umbrella because it stinks and it may be hot. It is a good place to take a break from city area to enjoy the moutain views. You can't do much other than hiking around, riding horses (Not Free), buying things from…
Saung_Angklung: It's a real Bandung cultural. The show start at 3.30pm. Every days. The kids is very cute n adorable... I forget my tiredness after a long day trip. N a boy playing the saung angklung like piano so amazing ... Overall I like it. N their souvenir shop is worth to buy n cheaper…
Ciater: It's a real Bandung cultural. The show start at 3.30pm. Every days. The kids is very cute n adorable... I forget my tiredness after a long day trip. N a boy playing the saung angklung like piano so amazing ... Overall I like it. N their souvenir shop is worth to buy n cheaper…
Aryaduta: I still remember a high building if i past away at merdeka street bandung when i was child... An old hotel n classic. But stilll good. With new management make it survive n competitive.  Simple way go to this hotel n join with a classy mall BIP. Just walk n you will find it.
Trans: We have a nice day in the hotel because the services was good and the room was nice too. My kids have fun inthe kids club and in the room because the hotel have a tent for our kids. My parents have fun too with the food and the hotel room. We hope that this hotel gonna be a good hotel forever.

White_Charter: If you are staying at Bandung, you have to visit Mt Kawah Putih, known as the White Crater. It is a volcanic sulphur lake and you are able to walk down to the lake side. Be advised though, that the fumes being given off are poisonous and announcements tell you only to stay at…
Tangkuban_Perahu: i have been here for more than 50 times during 3 years,i had been handled a group from vietname,malaysian,dutch traveller..
Saung_Angklung: Liked the performances, the show leader (how she communicate with audiences), all the crews are nice and helpful!  Disliked the theater seats. Not comfy.
Ciater: Liked the performances, the show leader (how she communicate with audiences), all the crews are nice and helpful!  Disliked the theater seats. Not comfy.
Aryaduta: The reason i choose the most  to stay at Aryaduta Bandung is because of the strategic place. Room and the food is great. And the friendly staff too, it makes staying at the hotel feels warm and comfortable. It is memorable and worth to stay. Thankyou!
Trans: the hotel was just perfect. but, I expected stronger follow up due to my lost stuff. I guess the management could use their CCTV or inspection to find it. I'd also be happy to be involved in the process so i know the effort.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih: This is a beautiful place situated south of Bandung. Though only around 50 kms from Bandung, it would take around 3 hours of travel to reach the place as the roads are narrow and one has to travel through hill country. We had booked a travel agent for our trip to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: My wife and I hired a car/driver from Jakarta for a trip to this volcano crater.  It is a 3-4 hours drive, partly through flat but interesting country-side, and partly through mountainous and even more interesting country-side.  There is an entry fees of IDR 300,000 (about US $…
Saung_Angklung: it has performances of children and adult playing angling at certain hours of the day.  Good place to bring tourist, yet I find the facilities to be very poor.  The rest rooms could use some improvement, and the coffee shop could offer a bit more variety.  The souvenir shop was…
Ciater: it has performances of children and adult playing angling at certain hours of the day.  Good place to bring tourist, yet I find the facilities to be very poor.  The rest rooms could use some improvement, and the coffee shop could offer a bit more variety.  The souvenir shop was…
Aryaduta: need some of refurbished 'cos it's an old hotel. Bathtub, closet, carpet, and curtain need to be cleaned. refrigerator need to be clean too. Wifi unstable. But, they have very good service and helpful employee. Check in and check out went smoothly, the food was so yummy, can sleep well,overall satisfied.
Trans: The given service was luxury as per the hotel's name. It was one of our memorable moment with family. Breakfast was so great with various menu particularly on dim sum. Room was so clean. Strongly recommended hotel.

White_Charter: cooolll....the location is suite for pre wedding photo. the entry ticket cost you 10,000 (not included the transportation ticket)
Tangkuban_Perahu: It has amazing view of the crater, it also has small hot spring where you can wash your leg or boiling egg. it has a jungle track for adventurer to try.   Sometime the place is very foggy, you can't see the crater.  I talk to the guide, most people visit this place at June/July…
Saung_Angklung: The 2 hour show is snapshot of the arts and culture of Sudanese/Indonesian people-a rewarding experience of traditional songs, dances, and instruments with a modern touch. It definitely has outlived and outclassed many forms of modern music and dances. Kudos Pak Udjo in keeping…
Ciater: The 2 hour show is snapshot of the arts and culture of Sudanese/Indonesian people-a rewarding experience of traditional songs, dances, and instruments with a modern touch. It definitely has outlived and outclassed many forms of modern music and dances. Kudos Pak Udjo in keeping…
Aryaduta: Every thing right what is needed for comfortable and pleasant stay for business trip. Club Lounge is excellent place to meet business associates. I found all staff (every one) at Club Lounge are very friendly.  Equally good is check-in and checkout staff.  Keep it same way.
Trans: This is the 3rd time I stayed in trans, and everything was great as always except my breakfast experience.  There was very long queue of guests waiting for breakfast, and they cannot open the 18th floor because there was wedding preparation....so it was hectic and the hotel staff seems not ready.

White_Charter: It is a MUST to visit Kawah Putih. Worth it! Love the scenery. The place is cooling. Dun forget to bring a mask juz in case if you find tat sulphur smell was strong. Time spend bout 30minutes and enjoy the moment there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: 1) The entrance fee for local is 20,000 IDR while for Foreigner is 200,000 which is 10 times higher. 2) The local peddlers extremely annoying when they will keep follow you. If you want to buy, do bargain at least 75% from the offered price as the mark up price is up to 10 times…
Saung_Angklung: I had never played a musical instrument so the last thing I could ever have expected was to be playing in a bamboo ochestra ... absolutely amazing
Ciater: I had never played a musical instrument so the last thing I could ever have expected was to be playing in a bamboo ochestra ... absolutely amazing
Aryaduta: Booked two rooms 1 superior and 1 deluxe. Both are very spacious, big windows with amazing panoramic view. Rooms are very clean, well equiped and comfortable. Staff extremely kind and helpfull. Great pool and gym, also have tennis courts and kids club. Food is delicious, they serve great variety for breakfast. We really liked the traditional Jamu! Aryaduta is now our Bandung favorite, thank you, we will be back soon!
Trans: Stayed here for couple nights at the Celebrity Suite and it was amazing. Great service, great ambience, super comfy and hi-tech feature in the room, much better than any suite you would find in Bandung. Highly recommend it if you want to have some leasure time for yourself or your special one, and also got extra cash for it.   The only downside is the location, it's basically out of nowhere. There's a shopping mall/amusement park right next door, but that's all. You gotta take a ride in a horrible traffic to reach the city area or even further to Lembang. Makes it a much better option to just stay in hotel and take a step back from your busy life.

White_Charter: took 2.5 hours drive from Bandung and it has a gorgeous scenery with its cool air. don't forget to bring a mask because the smell of sulfur very strong.
Tangkuban_Perahu: One thing to say; make sure you come here in low season. You'll be enjoying the atmosphere here without more noisy things around you. Because Tangkuban Perahu is one of famous place in Bandung that people want to go to do picnic.
Saung_Angklung: We had a tour of this delightful angklung workshop where we watched an artisan carve and then tune an angklung.  We were even given the opportunity to complete the construction of an instrument and then participate in playing it.  Finally we were treated to a performance,  it…
Ciater: We had a tour of this delightful angklung workshop where we watched an artisan carve and then tune an angklung.  We were even given the opportunity to complete the construction of an instrument and then participate in playing it.  Finally we were treated to a performance,  it…
Aryaduta: This hotel is quite old, but is well maintained in my opinion, room is clean and comfortable. We stayed in 11th floor, with wonderful city view. The room amenities and furnitures are good. Nice swimming pool. The staffs were nice and very helpful. Check in and out processes were quick –room was available earlier than official check in time. The location is strategic – this is a point that made us select this hotel – closed to major commerce centre, restaurant (ranging from street food to fine dining) direct access to a mall (up to 10 PM), and at comfortable walking distance to various shops (including a well known district for local made apparels), parks, museum, Chatedral, and old city of Bandung (i.e Braga and Asia-Afrika streets). The hotel offers bicycle to rent to go around…
Trans: The service is excellent but taste of the food is not so good. Pool and kids area are excellent, also the staff very helpfull and nice. Recomend for family, for leisure or bussiness. The hotel next to mall area, restaurant and theme park

White_Charter: Its cold up here. Was up at about 4pm. Winding road up. Grab some strawberries and grilled corns while walking through the dream-like lake. Ethereal. Definitely worth my time.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was unexpectedly breathtaking, this is my first time to be this close to a crater and its amazing how the landscape tells you the story of a place.  It was only a quick walk, then you are already near the crater, didnt mind the sulphur smell because the view was simply…
Saung_Angklung: Very interactive show, where we got the chance to learn and play the angklung.  The performance was fantastic and exciting.  The show was two hours long but its really worth watching.
Ciater: Very interactive show, where we got the chance to learn and play the angklung.  The performance was fantastic and exciting.  The show was two hours long but its really worth watching.
Aryaduta: Me, husband and our two kids checked in at Aryaduta at Sunday, 29 jan 2017. A quarter to 12 pm our room was ready (we asked for early check-in via online booking website). The room was clean and spacious (we ordered executive club). The staff was informative, they told us what privileges we could get during our stay such as snack time and cocktail time at the executive lounge, kids club, breakfast, etc general stuff. We enjoyed our high floor room with mountain view. It's so amazing in the morning. The window's so big it's like you have the mountain in your room <U+0001F604>. And the bed was so comfortable. Although the carpet was old and so the bathtub. Everything else in the bathroom's from marble. We defenitely gonna stay at Aryaduta next time.
Trans: very convenient, next to a good shopping mall. good food, great service. beautiful & nice room. met a staff from my home town name Randa, very friendly, served me with a very delicious milk tea my favorite. recommend for everyone.

White_Charter: The place smells of sulfur which is very strong, hard for you to breathe. The water is blue and the scenery is awesome. Its is very chilly when on the way up to the crater. When going back down, there is a ciwidey strawberry farm.
Tangkuban_Perahu: good place for nature recreation for family. one hour walk to the crater hot spring. and realy good view. and you will enjoy peacefully
Saung_Angklung: We will find a good combination of culture mixed sweetly with education and entertainment. We can enjoy the comfort of Angklung music and in only 1 hours we can play it in harmony
Ciater: We will find a good combination of culture mixed sweetly with education and entertainment. We can enjoy the comfort of Angklung music and in only 1 hours we can play it in harmony
Aryaduta: The hotel might look abit of mileage but do not deceive by its look. The rooms are roomy and very clean. The staffs from every department deserve a great compliment! They are so friendly comparing to many Asian countries that I have been too. The locals there are as friendly too. Highly recommended to stay here! Things to improve-the bath towels only.
Trans: The hotel staff are friendly, and full of knowledge. We arrived at the hotel at 3 am, and the check-in process is very fast. The rooms were ready. The room is spacious, and clean. The kids love playing at the kids club. We will definitely coming back for another leisure trip.

White_Charter: The trip to the crater is pretty smooth as I paid extra (~SGD $15) to have my driver drive us up to the crater instead of using the public van. The public van is a good alternative as well, just that  there is a chance of the van breaking down in the middle of the mountain, as I…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is a scenic location crater Mount Tangkuban Perahu. Alight from the vehicle heading to the edge of the crater, looking down. Taken a picture. Photographs etc. Not too long then I was bored. Suppose there is provided a place of entertainment, dance or live music…
Saung_Angklung: prepared to be amused by how the team takes this traditional musical instrument to another level. Music arrangements can still be improved to include more genre, but overall shall be a great experience ....  A great venue to get to know the culture and tradition of people of…
Ciater: prepared to be amused by how the team takes this traditional musical instrument to another level. Music arrangements can still be improved to include more genre, but overall shall be a great experience ....  A great venue to get to know the culture and tradition of people of…
Aryaduta: Firstly, the facade of the hotel looks good on the outside even the lobby. The rooms unfortunately are not. The deluxe rooms are spacious but then the price is expensive considering that the amenities are old and falling apart. We even had to call room maintenance to fix a socket that was dangling- dangerous with children around.  The towels looked like they were around since the early1980s and the carpets looked a bit pitiful with stains on it. The taps and bathtub needs to be replaced. Merely changing the name from Hyatt Regency to Aryaduta will not suffice for the prices that are charged.  The service staff are simply excellent. You cannot fault them for anything. The front line staff are young and efficient. They were extremely helpful especially Ricki and the other guest…
Trans: Room is very luxurious and spacious. Very comfortable. Everything in the room screams luxury, even the slippers. Always love coming back here. Next to a shopping mall. Food is good too. Unfortunately the pool is not as luxurious as other parts of the hotel.

White_Charter: Pros : - cool air - Nice lake with a background of green mountains - beautiful scenery - A great place to take pictures - Officers were friendly - A good place to relieve fatigue - Full of beauty that will spoil your eyes - Away from the bustle of the city - Worth paying a visit…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This was my first trip to a volcano, though a dormant one, but the view is spectacular. The drive to the volcano area itself is wonderful; only downside was the entry fee which is too much for foreigners. Make sure you bargain for the guided trips. The area closes around 4 pm.
Saung_Angklung: I was traveling with my husband and 2 boys. I thought it was a bad decision to go there, because as Indonesia, I thought angklung is boring, we have heard them a lot. But I was wrong. They took angklung to another level. The way they make us participate was great, and the host…
Ciater: I was traveling with my husband and 2 boys. I thought it was a bad decision to go there, because as Indonesia, I thought angklung is boring, we have heard them a lot. But I was wrong. They took angklung to another level. The way they make us participate was great, and the host…
Aryaduta: Been to Bandung a lot for work, and it seems Aryaduta (it was Hyatt before) is becoming more and more homey - both for rest as well as for breakfast meetings.  This time around I tried the Club Executive service and the staffs were just excellent! And the nibbling was great too - a good variety of supper dishes, drinks and wines.  Unfortunately the breakfast menu at mezzanine was that great this time. Mot too many choices, nothing new from the last time I was there.  More improvements - better bathroom amenities, please! Parking signs could be better too, same goes with the welcoming staff for grabbing your bags after a long drive from Jakarta.  Will probably return here again as I deal around City Hall often.
Trans: Great place, big room, but... no privacy which we can hear voice from the other room not beside but two or three others room from our place. Event we choice in the corner and quite floor, it seem need more fabric to reduce the voice.  Please to choose your variety of food on breakfast time with the same level of yours 6 stars. and also the executive lounge, i will be happy if you upgrade your snack, food, because i found it is not 6 stars food and beverages.  thank you

White_Charter: Visit the above-mentioned attraction and we enjoy the visit. This place is known in Bundung as Kawah Putih. The weather is very nice and serene and we spend quite a long time there basking in the beauty of this attraction. Remember to bring along mask for those who having…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's a beautiful place. Great view and the sulphur smell was not overwhelming. Bring your own face mask just in case. We visited it during a public holiday and thus the huge crowd. Some areas required climbing down some steps which does not have a handrail. Beautiful scenery…
Saung_Angklung: I enjoy their performance,amaze with the children and also with their music performance and have fun trying to play angklung, enjoy the dance,
Ciater: I enjoy their performance,amaze with the children and also with their music performance and have fun trying to play angklung, enjoy the dance,
Aryaduta: I'm staying here since 8 months and I miss a loyalty program.  For me it is a real bottle neck. If not coming fast, I'm going to consider other hotels in Bandung.  75 nights per year !!  Further services hotel are good and I'm actually happy to stay here.
Trans: Hotel & the facilities really gives & adores us, my family with old man & kids, spent a family time along the end of last week in Bandung. Bravo for all staff, especially for your hospitality. Can't wait to spent a quality family time back to this hotel again. Thanks

White_Charter: As Bandung is a big city with not much else to do beside maybe visiting some outlet shopping malls or going on a short city walk we decided to visit kawah putih, the White crater lake. It is a 2 hour drive to get to the lake, which is difficult to do by yourself. Therefore we…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee 300,000rp per pax + 35,000 per vehicle is what you need to pay. Go early morning as the jam up can be quite bad. Many dragonfly. Bakso is nice. Beautiful scenery of clouds.
Saung_Angklung: We came without expectations and left with joy in our hearts.  The show was diverse, entertaining and interactive – you get to play the instrument by yourself together with the rest of the audience. It is not a concert, it is a way to learn about the power of music.
Ciater: We came without expectations and left with joy in our hearts.  The show was diverse, entertaining and interactive – you get to play the instrument by yourself together with the rest of the audience. It is not a concert, it is a way to learn about the power of music.
Aryaduta: Stayed here for a night with my wife & 2 kids. Booked online a non-smoking superior twin-bed room via hotel's website early in the morning and checked-in around 16:00. During checked-in, the receptionist asked us to choose, room with closed connecting door (ready) or room with no connecting door (waiting for 1 hr). We chose the room with the connecting door because my kids insisted to swim directly.  The room was big enough for 2 adults & 2 kids. It was neat, but need more cleaning. We still found some dust on the carpet, under the table, inside the closet & under the bed, when we tried to move the beds close to each other.  Bathroom was also big with shower over bathtub. But the hot water tap probably need to be check, since it will generate vibrating sounds if you let it open…
Trans: Great, modern, luxury hotel. I really enjoy stayed there because it's near to mall, mosque and trans studio...  We spend our subuh time to the mosque, have a really satisfied breakfast n have a nice swimming time with our children.

White_Charter: long journey to reach Kawah Putih (white crater) you need at least 2.5 hours to reach the place but you can't stay more than 15 min due to hazardous sulfur only go if you have the whole day to spend on the road
Tangkuban_Perahu: One of the places that you must visit if you arrive in Bandung. Enjoy views of the volcanic crater of the spectacular natural mountain of Tangkuban Perahu.   Do not be surprised by the rather expensive entrance fee for foreign tourists. Do not be fooled to buy souvenirs there…
Saung_Angklung: The real attraction of this performance is not necessarily the angklung instrument itself, but what can be done with the instrument. I had seen an angklung performance before, so I thought I knew what to expect - but I was pleasantly surprised!  Overall, the performance is…
Ciater: The real attraction of this performance is not necessarily the angklung instrument itself, but what can be done with the instrument. I had seen an angklung performance before, so I thought I knew what to expect - but I was pleasantly surprised!  Overall, the performance is…
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung was managed by Hyatt and changed the name last year after several years. The hotel is classic hotel but the maintenance is good. The food also well maintained. Stayed for two nights and attended the wedding at ballroom, I can saya still one of the great 5 stars in town.
Trans: excellent hotel with nice swimming pool, nice view, fresh air, and comfort hotel specially comfort room with modern furniture, nice bathroom with bathtub, good service. very recomended hotel for business, couple (honeymoon), family, friends and solo

White_Charter: We went there with the car wich was kind of an adventure but it was totally worth it. The view is really impressive so if you ´re visiting Bandung i´d suggest to visit the White Crater
Tangkuban_Perahu: I'm conflicted to either recommend or not anyone to visit Tangkuban Perahu. If you have not seen volcano crater before, it would seem magnificent. But from my own experience, the view were beautiful especially when the fog slowly came in and cover the crater. But it would be…
Saung_Angklung: One word.. A.M.A.Z.I.N.G!!!!  if you don't like culture, come here.. If you don't like music, come here.. If you can't play instruments, come here..  Here.. You're thought about it will change..   You're gonna love the culture, You're gonna love the music, and you will have one…
Ciater: One word.. A.M.A.Z.I.N.G!!!!  if you don't like culture, come here.. If you don't like music, come here.. If you can't play instruments, come here..  Here.. You're thought about it will change..   You're gonna love the culture, You're gonna love the music, and you will have one…
Aryaduta: Celebrated holidays season with friends in the hotel. Although the hotel needs to upgrade many of the rooms and facilities, it is a well maintained 5 star hotel. Helpful and friendly staff always ready to pamper you with all your needs. Enjoyed the gala dinner on Christmas day and the Arctic New Year Party. Thank you Aryaduta for the wonderful time.
Trans: Me n my husband always have a good time during our stay, the staff were very nice help, the room was very clean. And its very close to shopping mall, and they have a variety of food during breakfast.  Love this place very much and yet i still want to come again to this place.

White_Charter: Drive from Bandung city center took 3 hours plus. Did not trek around the crater thus took only 30 minutes for photos and walking the banks. Sulphur smell was bearable only when you are very close to the water edge the sulphur smell hits you in the face.
Tangkuban_Perahu: You may visit this place if you never been here before. The view is stunning, but not much to do here. Try to avoid visiting on weekend.
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo allows incoming travelers into Bandung to experience the Sundanese cultural instrument, Angklung, at hand. You will be able to experience the traditional Sundanese instrument being played along with Gamelan, which is the complete band-like combination of…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo allows incoming travelers into Bandung to experience the Sundanese cultural instrument, Angklung, at hand. You will be able to experience the traditional Sundanese instrument being played along with Gamelan, which is the complete band-like combination of…
Aryaduta: Centrally located, nice view in the morning. Older hotel but a very good maintained. The hotel is connected to a mall. We didn't hear a thing from other room and that's a plus! Inside the hotel is very nice decorated.
Trans: have a lovely holiday in this lovely hotel with a bunch of magnificent staff that’s always ready to serve with the smiles. comfy room and a grand bathroom also  all the foods that can make you smiles with the taste. <U+0001F929>

White_Charter: Just good. 46 km from Bandung, about 2,5 hours drive. From the gate of Kawah Putih to the crater is about 5 km. Better to take transportation which you can rent at parking area.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Reading many negative feedbacks before visiting the attraction made me feel a bit nervous on the way to go there. Luckily it turned into a great experience at the end. The sellers are not agressive as described, they don't follow or insist if they are denied.   Nowadays the…
Saung_Angklung: Definitely a must-visit place in Bandung. The kids are so cute and talented. in the middle of the show, they gave us an angklung, teach us how to play it and then played popular songs together. FYI, Saung Angklung Udjo was visited by The Amazing Race season 23, which is my…
Ciater: Definitely a must-visit place in Bandung. The kids are so cute and talented. in the middle of the show, they gave us an angklung, teach us how to play it and then played popular songs together. FYI, Saung Angklung Udjo was visited by The Amazing Race season 23, which is my…
Aryaduta: I was staying in this hotel during the year end holiday with family. We had booked 2 suite rooms and 2 deluxe room. Overall we were satisfied with this hotel. Location of the hotel is really perfect one since it is just beside a shopping mall. So you just need to walk to the mall. Breakfast was okay. Even though it was high season period but the restaurant team is really working hard to prepare the food and prepare the set up asap. However i have a few points which is i think need to be taken care of:  1. This hotel has 3 lifts to go up and down. The middle lift is quite dangerous one since it can just close suddenly. And when you press OPEN. Sometimes it is still keeping to close. Imagine what will happen if kids or old ones are walking to the lift. Last time i was in the same…
Trans: Hotel is really well maintained. Staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean and all amenities working. Buffet breakfast was amazing. Full spread of items from western to local Indonesian cuisine. Location of hotel is good too. Just beside is the Trans Mall and the Trans Studio Theme park.

White_Charter: The first part of the journey from Bandung will lead you through some of the most unattractive parts of the city and the traffic is always bad on this stretch if the road.  Once out of Bandung however, the scenery gets more attractive.  The crater is well worth a visit - not…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Not much to see. Spent about 20 minutes and decided to leave. Too many merchants trying to sell something which kind of nagging.
Saung_Angklung: Besides the volcanoes, eating and shopping in Bandung, it is definitely worth a visit to Saung Angklung to immerse yourself in some traditional Indonesian music, arts and culture.  Audiences get to participate in the orchestra using Angklungs too.    If you are local or with…
Ciater: Besides the volcanoes, eating and shopping in Bandung, it is definitely worth a visit to Saung Angklung to immerse yourself in some traditional Indonesian music, arts and culture.  Audiences get to participate in the orchestra using Angklungs too.    If you are local or with…
Aryaduta: Formerly known as Hyatt Regency, Aryaduta hotel is maintaining the 5 stars hotel quality. The breakfast comes with many varieties and tasty. The front desk officers are good and responded well in assisting us.  However, aryaduta management need to upgrade the room interior. The towel also looks old and need to be replaced. The toothpaste brand and quality are.not good.  Thr swimming pool still good enough for family.  The price is reasonable and  competitive. The location is connected to one of the busiest mall in bandung (open until 10.00 pm)   I will be back for another family holiday
Trans: Room is excellent. Friendly and helpful front-desk. Breakfast items is a disappointment for a 5-star hotel. Please improve the menu and food quality. Nice pool. Check-out experience is not as nice when check-in.

White_Charter: This place was great and stunning. Green lake was beautiful for our eyes. Smell of the sulfur sometimes too strong for some people. Ticket entrance was 15K Rupiahs per person and 18K Rupiah for Ontang Anting (public passenger car from parking lot to the lake). I suggest take…
Tangkuban_Perahu: There is different price for local and foreigners, and I got Rp 300,000 per person for weekend ticket and local just Rp 30,000. Not much to see, but we came early so not so crowded.   But there is man with a badge following us and force us to buy some merchandise that we not…
Saung_Angklung: Wow, that was my first when the students there started showing their talent playing with the angklung. I was really impressed that they have this kind of excellence centre for playing this very music equipment.  The place is a little bit far from bandung city but it was the…
Ciater: Wow, that was my first when the students there started showing their talent playing with the angklung. I was really impressed that they have this kind of excellence centre for playing this very music equipment.  The place is a little bit far from bandung city but it was the…
Aryaduta: Used to stay at this hotel when it was still owned by Hyatt. Was surprised when booked it under Aryaduta name. The facilities and people are basically the same, just the brand that changed.  This is an older hotel and back then was filled with state-of-the-art facilities which for today is slightly outdated, however most of their facility still works fine. Locationwise it is excellent, the hotel is attached to the Bandung Indah Plaza Mall, makes it very convenient if we want to meet people there or if we just want to browse local shops at the mall. Check-in was quick and since our rooms weren't ready yet, we were upgraded to 14th floor Aryaduta Club room (thank you David!) Rooms were large and spacious, beds are comfortable and have nice pillows and duvet, and flat-screen TV and…
Trans: Have stayed in this luxury hotel in two occasions. This is the most preferred luxury hotel in Bandung. From arrival, during stay until departure, all staff were very friendly and willing to assist you. Highly recommending the Trans Luxury Hotel whenever you are in business travel to Bandung.

White_Charter: The crater itself is just good. Nothing special for me, and because dry season, the crater lake somewhat receded. My point for this review is, they develop this place very well. Motorcycle have their own park area, and must pay some money for ride "Angkot" until they arrived at…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It was so crowded when we were there due to  holiday. There are many path where you can walk and enjoy the surrounding view but it was not enjoyable when as crowded as when we were there. The sellers are aggressive, so try not to have eye contacts if you didn't plan to shop.…
Saung_Angklung: This attraction is a must to watch and do when you are visiting Bandung. It's very proud as an Indonesian to have and enjoy this attraction. Feel the different atmosphere here by enjoy the angklung music performance and also join to play angklung together.
Ciater: This attraction is a must to watch and do when you are visiting Bandung. It's very proud as an Indonesian to have and enjoy this attraction. Feel the different atmosphere here by enjoy the angklung music performance and also join to play angklung together.
Aryaduta: the room is good, clean, but wifi is very slow. comfort room. swimming area need to be improve in towel, because towel is look old and not comfort. The towel in the room also old, need to be replace with a new one.
Trans: I stayed at 5-8 November 2017, i stayed for business and bring my family. A very great ambience seem all is great in design..room..and great swimming pool..i am so glad that the play ground for kids is so amazingly helpfull and nice for my daughters to play whole day there..and water playground at the swimming pool also very nice and give a best time for family stayed there..  I just found that breakfast need much much improvement..tasteless and not like other 5 star hotel..  Wishing i could be back again soon there..<U+0001F60A>

White_Charter: i can say this is the best crater in west java. the area is quite large. you can googling to see the pic. i recomend you to bring masker before enter to crater area because it has sulphur smells, of course its not good for your health esp for young children. the located is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: If you plan to visit , better in weekday. The entrance fee much cheaper, not too crowded. Just ignore the vendors politely, coz some of them keep following you offering their product. Riding horse will be a plus experience, especially for the kids the would love it. Always bring…
Saung_Angklung: Please come, see and hear "Bohemian Rhapsody" played with angklung orchestration. Located at the outskirt of Bandung, but definitely worth a visit.
Ciater: Please come, see and hear "Bohemian Rhapsody" played with angklung orchestration. Located at the outskirt of Bandung, but definitely worth a visit.
Aryaduta: This nice hotel  and we was holiday in December with our family. Located was strategic at central Bandung city and also integrated to Bandung Indah Plaza Hotel. We stay 4 days and the room is quite big but the hotel is comfort and old building.
Trans: The room is big and good view. When I get something problem and the serviceman quick to support and every day check to service take care. the location near the mall easy for shopping and dinner with my friend

White_Charter: 2nd time up to white crater.Magnificient place.Please do visit this place whenever you in Bandung!You'll never regret going there.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance ticket - Is too overpriced! (Visit during weekdays Rp200k) The View - so so so beautiful Weather - is not cold enough compare with Kawah Putih. The sulfur smells not too strong compare with Kawah Putih.  The seller and the sacmmers - They will follow me wherever I go…
Saung_Angklung: The performance was fantastic though at the beginning, it was a little boring.  Overall experience is good. Worth a visit. Very young kids may not enjoy the whole performance as the duration is about 1.5hrs long.
Ciater: The performance was fantastic though at the beginning, it was a little boring.  Overall experience is good. Worth a visit. Very young kids may not enjoy the whole performance as the duration is about 1.5hrs long.
Aryaduta: I and family really enjoyed staying here. We got 2 connecting rooms, and the rooms were wide and very clean, just like typical old hotel. Bed was super comfortable with complete amenities provided in the room. Bath room was large too, but I found it a bit uncomfortable with the water drainage for shower, which definitely will wet the sink area.  Breakfast was terrific, complete and delicious to make us try almost all corners. Location wise is unbeatable in Middle of hustle bustle Bandung City, please do not expect you can see mountain scenery. You will be paying for convenience for eating and shopping the most.
Trans: The hotel is nice, the room is huge, clean and comfortable.  I arrived early in the morning. The receptionist was very helpful and friendly.  The swimming pool was awesome, warm water, we enjoyed the hotel.   Unfirtunately, the breakfast menu was poor, cannot be compared with other 5 stars hotel. The price for breakfast buffet was expensive, limited choice of menu, and tasteless. I was expecting the breafast would be much much better.

White_Charter: It is beautiful place! Our guide (driver) brought us into the lake, and took nice photos! All I could say is that it is magical. It has a soft stench of the sulphur, but I'm ok with it. You don't need a mask. On low tide, you can walk over to the centre "piece" of rock. There…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu mountain is beautiful. Lots of posting here about the prices - my guide took good care of us and made sure we were not cheated so always good to have a good driver or guide.   If you are taking a bigger bus, you will need to stop somewhere to switch to small…
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo hit the right spot. it was entertaining, educational, interesting, engaging and interactive. They got old ladies off their seats to join in the dancing and singing. My kiddies learnt to play the Angklung and saw little children their own age up there…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo hit the right spot. it was entertaining, educational, interesting, engaging and interactive. They got old ladies off their seats to join in the dancing and singing. My kiddies learnt to play the Angklung and saw little children their own age up there…
Aryaduta: Hotel: Old style ex Grand Hyatt Regency but still well maintained. With traditional design and sandalwood aromatherapy when i visit.  Staff: Pleasant!They are all very nice and service was fast.  Wi-fi Great and quite fast connection  Room amenities: They even prepare shaver cream.  Spa: Under Grand Odiseus Spa  Pool: Nice pool  They have connecting room and baby crib are based on request (order additional bedcover for the baby crib base). There are tons of culinary place nearby and Bandung Indah Plaza (BIP) is just a step away and this hotel is connected.  Overall: Great and pleasant hotel!
Trans: I stayed at this hotel with mw wife and my daughters. The service of this hotel was very good. The facilities is very nice and complete. I will come again to this hotel & recommended to my colleague to stay at this hotel.

White_Charter: The access fee is outrageously expensive for foreigners who gotta pay 10 times the local fee. After the entrance the short drive heads you straight into the volcano in front of this beautiful turquoise water.  The site is magic, nice colors, amazing views. The smell is not too…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The scenery is breathtaking...the forest at the bottom till up to the crater on top...it would be nice if the tickets are not overpriced especially for foreigners....and please avoid going there during weekends or holiday seasons as you will be stuck in the massive slow crawling…
Saung_Angklung: I went there with my wife and kids.   We were really enjoyed the shows.  We can play angklung like a pro :-).  Thanks to Saung Angklung Udjo that have made our weekend successful!!
Ciater: I went there with my wife and kids.   We were really enjoyed the shows.  We can play angklung like a pro :-).  Thanks to Saung Angklung Udjo that have made our weekend successful!!
Aryaduta: Just had my first time experience at Aryaduta and it's beyooond ny expectation. Booked via Nusatrip, we had very good price for breakfast and superior room. Many choice of breakfast, they have jamu (indonesian traditional drink), but the taste a bit so so (never mind, coz they provide some sambals so i just add a little piece of sambal and problem solved). Easy access to Bandung Indah Plaza, good choice if you want to stay all dayyy long in your room, enjoy the facilities and don't want to go anywhere further. We didn't bring our own car, so we booked GrabCar and it took  less than Rp 20,000 to reach Jl Riau and Jl Progo (we had dinner there). This hotel is very kids friendly, they have a very decent kids club at 3rd fl, my daughter (1,5 y.o) is super happy playing all around…
Trans: It was a comfortable stay and appreciate the service and also restaurant is good and would prefer few more vegetarian options.  But in Room #1723 bathroom shower there was particular smell which please look into it and apart from this it was a very wonderful experience.

White_Charter: We quite enjoyed our visit to the  volcanic lake, as had never seen anyplace like it. We didn't find the gas as overwhelming as we were led to believe. The scenery was good, and the place was large enough that you didn't feel crowded in. Once we left the main traffic area of…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I wish to bring to the attention of the authority on tourist like me happened to encounter- a very Bad experience while visiting your famous tourist attraction, Tangkuban Perahu.   My group of 7 adults happily set off early in the morning on 15 Jan 2016 to  Tangkuban Perahu, a…
Saung_Angklung: In this place you will experience various sundanese traditions packed in one fun and interactive show! You will take part in the musical and dance activities! The hosts are very well trained to cater international tourists, as the presenter can speak english, french, dutch,…
Ciater: In this place you will experience various sundanese traditions packed in one fun and interactive show! You will take part in the musical and dance activities! The hosts are very well trained to cater international tourists, as the presenter can speak english, french, dutch,…
Aryaduta: if you looking hotel in Bandung near to everywhere around city. this is a good place. side by side with BIP mall. if you took a car. parking spot a bit small and you can park in mall and asked Front office to gave you a parking voucher. If I may add to this hotel front office service were quite below standard for me. for check in it takes 45 min to gave 1 key room and another 30 min for another key room. they said it need to be clean first. we came check in at 14.30 so its should be prepared by 5 star hotel standard. no welcome drink. 3 star review for such service from me. hope they will improved their future service
Trans: I love all of the hotels.. the view the room the facilities.... breakfast are very excellent.. bfast on the 18th floor was amazing.. with the view and the wind blow.. the kids very like the pool..  would be back for sure

White_Charter: Tips: 1.going up to the crater,ride the ontang anting for only 15k return.(cheaper) 2.bring mask(the atmosphere@gas from the crater will be unpleasant) 3.Enjoy and take lots and lots of pictures!The view is breathtaking!
Tangkuban_Perahu: My family and I hired a driver to have a look at tangkuban volcano and the floating markets. When we got to tangkuban we were asked to pay 300,000 IDR ($30 AUD) per person, which with four people equated to 1,200,000 IDR ($120 AUD) just to walk around a volcano. We…
Saung_Angklung: Angklung is somewhat oldies and outdated to some people but coming to this place you'd find that the device is very intriguing as Saung Angklung Ujo could present them in a modern approach. Even in one point, you would find yourself as one member of angklung orchestra playing…
Ciater: Angklung is somewhat oldies and outdated to some people but coming to this place you'd find that the device is very intriguing as Saung Angklung Ujo could present them in a modern approach. Even in one point, you would find yourself as one member of angklung orchestra playing…
Aryaduta: Stay for 3 night , for an old hotel it is well kept . I have a nice deluxe room at the 12floors only is I find that the lift is to slow but in good working condition . The aryaduta club lounge is very nice but the stock of drinks and variety foods is limited. Go for the deluxe is you want spacious room . Breakfast is ok but on Sunday morning try to go early.Overall good hotel. I be back Aryaduta.
Trans: My office held an off-site team building event for 1 night and I was a bit skeptical about a place at first since the hotel was affiliate with a reputable International chain but boasts as a 6 stars hotel hence I was somewhat intrigued.  I was pleasantly surprised of how responsible all the staff that took care of us and they seemed to be very well trained on how to treat visitors very well.  The room and facilities are also very well kept and looked almost new despite the fact that the hotel was built around 5 years ago.  One issue for me about this hotel is the distance from some of my favorite hangouts around Dago area. However overall stay at Trans Luxury Hotel was a very pleasant experience, highly recommend especially for parents with small kids as the hotel is located…

White_Charter: Vocanic lake ..sometimes boiling ..fumes..foggy with carosive smoke . Near by Bandung . Advised to carry a good facemask, scraf & sunglasses. People suffering from breathing problem should avoid.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I have been visiting Indonesia about every two years since 1994. I visited Tangkuban Perahu several time during those past trips and truly enjoyed the awesome display of nature's fury. I highly recommend a visit to the mountain to enjoy the breath taking views both of the…
Saung_Angklung: my visit was on 11/11...its worth, its entertaining, its enjoying n its the most memorable event... im trully touched by the way the kids having soooo much fun soo much passion in playing the instrument...and the experience of alllowing the audience to participate in making a…
Ciater: my visit was on 11/11...its worth, its entertaining, its enjoying n its the most memorable event... im trully touched by the way the kids having soooo much fun soo much passion in playing the instrument...and the experience of alllowing the audience to participate in making a…
Aryaduta: location : close to riau factory outlet, next to bandung indah plaza mall, not recommend staying here on public holiday if you looking for nature tourist destination such as lembang area.. but very recommended for shoppingholic  Room : kids friendly, spacious room, has bath tub and also spacious toilet, good bed, great aircon  Service : two thumbs up.. deserved for 5 star hotel service.. all line servicing with heart  hotel facilities : small pool but good pool, has kids club, has park to taking wefie, small parking lot   restaurant : variety menu, taste so so, it much better if they change their breakfast place in front of their park below swimming pool.. more fresh air and better place to see while enjoying breakfast
Trans: We (2 adults and 2 children) stayed only one night as a short family getaway after a long week full of works. This hotel has exceeded our high expectations and way beyond. We love everything about The Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung.  First we came at around 1 pm (check-in time is 3 pm) and very welcome. There was a little misunderstanding about my bed preference but the front desk staff, Ms. Farach, has handled the problem professionally. I  was sent to the lounge and given a welcome drink while waiting. In the end we got the room that we wanted. Thank you.  Pros: + they have bellboy service who can help with your luggage which was not required as I had only one piece with me. But it will be very helpful if you have more. + the room is huge, full of luxurious features and materials.…

White_Charter: Kawah Putih is located around 2 hours journey from Bandung. We departed early from the city center, and we were not caught in the jam. There's an entrance fee to Kawah Putih, and if you would like your private car to go all the way up, it will be an additional IDR 150,000 per…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Unfortunately we went here over the Christmas weekend, so was caught in a massive jam. Tried again the next day and set off from Bandung at 6am to beat the traffic. I would actually recommend this timing, as we didn't experience much of the harassment from the sellers during…
Saung_Angklung: This is a must, to see a show, of traditional Javan music. It lasted 2 hours, with great entertainment all the time. It's in a covered, but outside, amphitheatre. Also has very good shops, and a place where you can see them making the instruments. The show was first class, a lot…
Ciater: This is a must, to see a show, of traditional Javan music. It lasted 2 hours, with great entertainment all the time. It's in a covered, but outside, amphitheatre. Also has very good shops, and a place where you can see them making the instruments. The show was first class, a lot…
Aryaduta: Overall, it is a beautiful hotel with great facilities and a good location. It is about 20 mins drive from the airport. The hotel is also linked to a shopping mall which is great for those rainy days. When the weather is better, you could walk around the area to go to outlet stores, cafes or the familiar fast food outlets. It is also away from the heavy traffic.  We stayed on the executive floor. The room was decent, spacious and has everything needed to make the stay comfortable. The executive lounge also provides delightful afternoon tea from 6pm to 8pm, which is quite an odd timing for tea. (We're used to having executive lounges serving afternoon tea earlier). As for breakfast, we only go to the main dining hall as we read rave reviews of the breakfast spread. And yes, we…
Trans: The best location, food/meal & facility, spacious room with good amenities/toiletries friendly staff, close to mosque, next to shopping mall, easy to access, good meeting room, the best kids club & pool

White_Charter: Kawah putih is simply beautiful. It takes 3 hours from the city (traffic was bad!) to reach here. The journey was tiring but luckily, there is a transport to go up instead of hiking. Of course it is not free but it was a good experience.   Upon reaching, the smell of sulphur is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: One of the major attractions...but if you go on weekend, then be prepared to be stuck in traffic to go up to the spot...I think Kawah putih is much better ..but this is a live volcano..maybe good to just tick a box, its very crowded place...
Saung_Angklung: The Udjo Cultural center in Bandung was crowded with visiting school children.  But that made it fun, as they practiced English and I practiced Bahasa.  The center is all about angklung, a bamboo percussion instrument.  The center puts on a show which concluded with everyone…
Ciater: The Udjo Cultural center in Bandung was crowded with visiting school children.  But that made it fun, as they practiced English and I practiced Bahasa.  The center is all about angklung, a bamboo percussion instrument.  The center puts on a show which concluded with everyone…
Aryaduta: everything was great here, we really enjoyed our stay during the holiday. We stay for 2 nights 23 - 25 december 2016, the hotel also give us a pack of gingerbread cookies for christmas although we're not celebrating the christmas but the kids really like the cookies. for check in or out procedur are also fast, we dont have to spend more times in the reception, the security is also helping us with our suitcase. The room is spacious, clean and also soundproff. really recommended for business or family trip.
Trans: Super hotel. Great breakfast spread. The beach and pool super for kids. Helpful attentive staff. Lovely location. Wish we had more time there. Would definetely go again. Convenient as has a big mall nearby too.

White_Charter: The journey to this place frm the central part of Bandung was really far for me. I mean far includes the time we stuck on road due to road jam.  It was raining when we were there so the view was foggy but still it was nice. It was really cold during raining days. Really!   Not…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great mountain view. Expensive food. If you want to ride horse, must check the price first. Expensive local food: grilled corn, sausages, etc.
Saung_Angklung: When in Bandung, go to Udjo's. The 3.30 pm daily show is really worth it and you got a 2 hour treat of the Sundanese arts. The angklung show is really jaw-dropping!
Ciater: When in Bandung, go to Udjo's. The 3.30 pm daily show is really worth it and you got a 2 hour treat of the Sundanese arts. The angklung show is really jaw-dropping!
Aryaduta: Overall the hotel is nice to stay with a spacious clean room, various breakfast menu, big clean swimming pool. The problem is only at the lift that too small and rather old and can close immediately although we have press the button open
Trans: most comfortable five star hotel at the moment. Provided everything you need . Staff is friendly , helpful and polite. In fact everything is good and clean .Food is nice plenty of variety, staff is very helpful, pool is nice, the room and bed is clean and comfortable .The  best things is that they will ask you whether you have enough amenities in your room or not every night. I reckon this hotel should be rated six star

White_Charter: Kawah putih is truly stunning and mesmerizing  The white soil n light blue sulphuric lakes are truly a stunning view to behold   Please bring mask though cos the smell might choke you.   Sunglasses n mask are helpful too cos the water will reflect the sunlight
Tangkuban_Perahu: visited this place with families,the view was great,got fresh air and can saw the haze came to us from the center of crater.overall it was just a simple creater,nothing else you can see.foreigner ticket price was ten times compare to local
Saung_Angklung: It was so much fun to brought along our kids and introduced them to Sundanese cultural heritage. We enjoyed the Saturday show. As Indonesian citizens they charged lower price at Rp.70,000/person for Saturday show incl a free drink (choices range from a small bottle of water, a…
Ciater: It was so much fun to brought along our kids and introduced them to Sundanese cultural heritage. We enjoyed the Saturday show. As Indonesian citizens they charged lower price at Rp.70,000/person for Saturday show incl a free drink (choices range from a small bottle of water, a…
Aryaduta: stay one night at this hotel, the service is good, room was clean. view is good  location is near to BIP. only the food need improvement. specially for breakfast. fried rice in breakfast there is no taste
Trans: front desk is unprofesional & there is no coordination between officer, i had unpleasant experience with his services should the hotel as good as it should have a more profesional officer and smart !!!!

White_Charter: because fast closed,we  took motor cycle and for 30 minutes we reached the place.It was a wonderful place with different colour even tough it smelt strong of sulphur
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban perahu is the best place to visit in lembang. The hills is very high. Tangkuban perahu is the most famous hystory in West Java. Very cold and sulfur smell very strong. I need to walk for 1km to be on the top of hills to see very good view. Very recommended place to…
Saung_Angklung: When our friend living in Bandung recommended this, I thought it would be another all show-no substance touristy farce. Because of the horrible Bandung traffic, we did not arrive until the last half hour but we had a grand time !!  From the program distributed, I gather that we…
Ciater: When our friend living in Bandung recommended this, I thought it would be another all show-no substance touristy farce. Because of the horrible Bandung traffic, we did not arrive until the last half hour but we had a grand time !!  From the program distributed, I gather that we…
Aryaduta: We really enjoyed our stay at the Aryaduta in Bandung. The location was great to easily access nearby amenities. The hotel is located in a Lippo mall which we really appreciated having an infant and often needing baby supplies. The pool was nice, the buffet breakfast was very satisfying, especially where they change the variety slightly each day. Check in was quick and easy, the Front Desk are very competent. We found most employees at the hotel spoke fluent English - which was an added bonus for us.   Our one issue was the cleanliness of the room. We were likely extra vigilant having a newborn with us however, we found the rooms, which spacious and very comfortable to lack a similar standard in cleaning.   Overall, a beautiful hotel and a great stay.
Trans: However, the problem of traffic was common thing here and all Bandung area.  We may make well preparation to go out from hotel for outside programme, but for leasure, TSM is very good. We may enjoy hotel facilities: swimming pool, spa, jacuzzi and sport facilities.

White_Charter: Located in the highland, the weather itself gives a plus of pleasant to who is willing to spend 2 hours from Bandung city up to the site. The jeep journey is also another interesting on the way uphill. They also allow visitors to drive their own cars but I don't think that's a…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Super expensive and most of the places inside the complex have been closed due to safety concerns. Not recommended.
Saung_Angklung: Proud to be Indonesian ! Also proud to be a Sundanese ! :)  This is a great place to intoduce our next generation o their culture. Started from wayang golek, traditional players, and the special one...angklung show. In this session, we're not just watching, we're also teached…
Ciater: Proud to be Indonesian ! Also proud to be a Sundanese ! :)  This is a great place to intoduce our next generation o their culture. Started from wayang golek, traditional players, and the special one...angklung show. In this session, we're not just watching, we're also teached…
Aryaduta: The room is spacious! The location is great, close to a shopping mall with a good food court. There are also many shops near by, good place to stay. The hotel is very clean and modern, I waited a little to check in but the staff is friendly. Will recommend people to stay either for business or family trip.
Trans: I am an Independent Financial Planner. I travel a lot in a year. I visit so many hotels and stay there for my business trip.   So I have a chance to visit this Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung..as you can see the luxury is well said.  From the first time I check in the receptionist is very polite and kind offering quick check in..I came at 13.00 overall service are outstanding.  How about hotel's facilities ? They are very complete..the large room completed with kiblat direction, sofa, cozy bed mattress, clean carpet, automatic window curtain, phone, refrigurator, tea cup and tea collection, body scale, bath tub and pajamas.  Breakfast is very delicious and many recipee from wester. japanese and indonesians.  Trans Luxury very welcome for kiddos..kids corner, beach pools and sliding…

White_Charter: It took us 3 hours to get here! But it was worth it as its a beautiful place. I brought a mask along but realised that I don't need it as the sulphur smell is quite manageable for me. But my advise is to bring one anyway, just in case. I went on a weekday to avoid traffic and it…
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's a bit chilly in December but a sweater is sufficient. Beware of people pushing you to purchase souvenirs. They are marked at a very high price. Avoid buying them. Tried their bakso, tastes good. There's a prayer room available. Great place for phototaking.
Saung_Angklung: Just relax and rest your mind for two hours there, leave all your troubles behind, just savor the moments.  The performers are great and entertaining, especially the little ones. They look so enjoy and serious to their performance.  I believe everyone enjoys the playing together…
Ciater: Just relax and rest your mind for two hours there, leave all your troubles behind, just savor the moments.  The performers are great and entertaining, especially the little ones. They look so enjoy and serious to their performance.  I believe everyone enjoys the playing together…
Aryaduta: Bandung is a shopping haven & the hotel is beautiful to say the least. The currency there is definitely affordable. For someone who shops a lot, for 2 people $1500 is enough unless you buy those luxury branded stuff..
Trans: During my stay for celebrating my 1 wedding anniv is so much in love with this place. The hospitality, the staff, breakfast, pool, and sky lounge are very wonderfull.  Unfortunately, i just stayed 1 night. Will be back soon for sure!

White_Charter: Really strong sulphur smell once you reach there. Go down to the crater and remember to wear your masks if you can't stand the smell.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Finally I came here after maybe 15 years a go, there's  no different between my last visit, for me its just ordinary crater site seeing, we look the scenery in the side of crater, they build a wall so we just stand n see the scenes, there were some flea market they sell a grill…
Saung_Angklung: Although a visitor had to buy a ticket to attend the angklung performance conducted by the Saung Angklung Udjo Organisation, it was a small fee well spent.  Visitors were not only entertained, some said mesmerized, by the delightful musical performance, but in the end were…
Ciater: Although a visitor had to buy a ticket to attend the angklung performance conducted by the Saung Angklung Udjo Organisation, it was a small fee well spent.  Visitors were not only entertained, some said mesmerized, by the delightful musical performance, but in the end were…
Aryaduta: The stay at the Hotel Aryaduta, Bandung was pleasant and it invites me to return to it anytime!  The Lobby was warm and welcoming, although I have met more quick-to-serve, enthusiastic Check-in Receptionists in other similar type hotels.     The Deluxe Room assigned to us was spacious and well-equipped.  The bathroom was clean and bed was alluring!
