While there were not any outstanding wow! factors to the interior of the room, one of the two windows had a spacious and luxurious view of the mountains, pool area and leafy green of the cool Bandung climate.  This was our most favourite corner to hang out at, by the slightly stained sofa by the French window.  I appreciated the quiet in our room, where we could hardly hear the morning sound of noisy guests herding to the breakfast…
Trans: The Hospitality is great, the staff listen and respond very fast. The room is very spacey and enjoy the experience. If you want to try the 18th Club and Lounge also great. For vegetarian, we were served with delicious food for two days. But the third day, the fried rice was a disappointment. overall very nice hotel and hospitality, and definitely come back again.

White_Charter: Nice green crater lake. Had slight lingering sulphur dioxide smell. Optional to,wear masks, unless you have serious asthma o breathing problems.
Tangkuban_Perahu: The local people pushing to sell their items. They keep using the word to help them. I Agreed to buy but the minutes you bought then others will also pushing. Im travelling 2 small kids. Iwas so strees with their approach. until to the limit I Have to tell them to stop as I want…
Saung_Angklung: its was great art & culture place..at here you can enjoy few sundanese dance, musical instruments & some art performance..
Ciater: its was great art & culture place..at here you can enjoy few sundanese dance, musical instruments & some art performance..
Aryaduta: this is our first time stay aryaduta, we stayed in club deluxe room, room and facilitie is nice, but staff is passive, they not service us. they very nice to other's foreign people. very sad just looking staff only service them
Trans: During my stay while celebrating 7th Wedding Anniversary, I do really enjoy staying in Trans Luxury.   Excellence services, food, room & other facilities.  Thank you Trans for making my WA memorable. Hope to see you in other moments.

White_Charter: From bandung city to drive to kawah putih takes about 2hr if there are no jam pls asked ur driver what are the best preferred day to go there. The entrance fee is 50k but i paid 300k my driver bring us to the travel agency before we reach to kawah putih and they even provide…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Firstly, i went here on Christmas so it's understandable that the entry fee will be slightly more expensive but IDR 300,00 for each person and IDR 35,000 for the car is damn expensive plus the travelling to the top took so long.  When we reached the top, the view was amazing and…
Saung_Angklung: Just a must see traditional sundanese musical show, love it! Especially when the senior players play the classic music, for all the performance is extraordinary and lot of fun, the children are awesome too, keep the good show, guys! So proud of you
Ciater: Just a must see traditional sundanese musical show, love it! Especially when the senior players play the classic music, for all the performance is extraordinary and lot of fun, the children are awesome too, keep the good show, guys! So proud of you
Aryaduta: I booked Aryaduta for 4 nights after reading all the good reviews about the hotel. Check in was a bit slow, partly due to the fact that i wanted a connecting smoking room, but the staff were very accommodating in assisting me. Try to make a reservation for breakfast at the Chinese restaurant, unfortunately its was fully booked by a group, but the front desk did a great job in securing a table for me. And the best part of it was when i ask for the bill, i was informed that the breakfast was free, courtesy of the GM ! Wow..what a way to start the day ! Hotel location is good, its connected to the Indah Plaza mall and very easy access to all areas in the city. Security is top notch, and of course service from all staffs is outstanding! Would highly recommend this hotel for those…
Trans: Once you enter the hotel, you'll see great interior & warm welcome drink. Many good facilities available around, such as pool, spa, mall, amusement park etc. can be found easily in no time. The breakfast menu has many choice of cuisine such as Indonesian, Italian, few japanese & western food in good taste.

White_Charter: A greenish-blue coloured lake in the middle of the volcanic mountains. The view is breathtaking. No wonder all the tourists go shutter happy! However the journey to the lake on weekends is a pain. The roads are very narrow and the traffic hardly moves!
Tangkuban_Perahu: The Volcano is smoking and shows signs of life but if you have visited volcanoes and hot springs elsewhere, then this is a bit of a disappointment.   Today is a so called public holiday but everything seems to be working however our driver told us it was pretty much a normal day…
Saung_Angklung: Decided to visit Udjo when we had enough of shopping in Bandung and what a good distraction it was.  We arrived early and had time to wander a round the store. Nothing much to buy unless you are thinking of getting an Angklung.  The show started promptly and we were treated to…
Ciater: Decided to visit Udjo when we had enough of shopping in Bandung and what a good distraction it was.  We arrived early and had time to wander a round the store. Nothing much to buy unless you are thinking of getting an Angklung.  The show started promptly and we were treated to…
Aryaduta: The hotel staff pay attention to detail and go out of their way to make your stay at their hotel comfortable and pleasant. My family enjoyed the breakfast and their wise spread of selection. We will visit both bandung and Aryaduta hotel again. Waiting for the chance to win the namecard lucky draw end of the month. :)
Trans: This is a perfect hotel for a weekend getaway. Stayed here for two nights, I got a better deal when checked in Saturday and checked out on Monday. Location is quite far from downtown Bandung, since this hotel is situated in East side near Kiara Condong. Checking in here means, you eat, sleep and shop here. Basically everything is provided within the Trans complex. The beds, shower, and service are 'amazing'. Hotel employees are curteous and attentive. I give 4 stars instead of 5, bevause I am not impressed with the quality of breakfast. I might skip it next time and find local food in center of Bandung.

White_Charter: Highly recommended to visit this place. You won't frustrated.  Cannot compare with Tengkuban Perahu for panaromic view.  But definately less hassle and bustle.
Tangkuban_Perahu: To enter this area, each person must pay arond 30-35 rb rupiah..not much we can do in here, unless you are a nature lover and want to explore all the area then this is the place for you. For us, we just take picture around 'Kawah Ratu'. Then children can riding horse around the…
Saung_Angklung: When you are in Bandung and interested in Sundanese art and culture, then you must visit this place. Angklung is originally the Sundanese traditional music instrument. Here, we can see their performance, held everyday at 3.30 pm (lasting about 2,5 hours) in their indoor…
Ciater: When you are in Bandung and interested in Sundanese art and culture, then you must visit this place. Angklung is originally the Sundanese traditional music instrument. Here, we can see their performance, held everyday at 3.30 pm (lasting about 2,5 hours) in their indoor…
Aryaduta: One of the plus points for this hotel is basically its staff. Always smiling and helpful. Sincerely . The breakfast has a wonderful spread . The varieties are good for asian & non asian. Always spoilt for choice. Picky travellers .. especially those who have a certain mindset about 5 stars hotel might beg to differ. The design and look of the rooms are not very current. The facilities ( pool , gym , steam room n jacuzzi ) made a traveller like me happy. I have no complains in general except for the fact that my sensitive nose gets irritated whenever im in the cafe .. sometimes room as well . I think it is the carpet. Location of hotel is also very good. Super convenient and not very far to shops and malls. All i can say is that ... i enjoyed my stay. Will be back .
Trans: I have stayed at this property already several times. This was probably the seventh stay at this hotel but this time for family occasion. I did not really count. We booked 2 connecting rooms as we were 2 families with several kids. I could not say anything else but it was another great great short holiday that we had. Everything was delivered to us perfectly from check in process (quick and efficient), room service, room quality, entertainment until we did check out. The bed room were spacious, luxurious and have everything working very well. we liked the hotel amenities quite much. They did serious efforts on this. The bathrooms were also nice with bathtub and the showers were powerful. Kids playground and swimming pools were great. Kids enjoyed very much to play here all day.…

White_Charter: Its a long ride to reach Kawah Putih...but worth seeing the shimmering green crater lake. There are some fumes, however, if you don't plan to staying there for more than 20-30min (more than enough to walk around and take photos), you don't need a mask. Its quite safe. You will…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The landscape is beautiful, it potential to be more tourist friendly if equiped with better facilities.  I am Indonesian, but i feel sorry to see they charge international tourist 10 times more expensive than local. IDR 20,000 weekday and 30,000 for local. IDR 200,000 weekday…
Saung_Angklung: i was here on 2011, and it was amazing.., i love the kids dance n played Angklung also Cepot's puppet show, i can say ,u won't regret to visit Saung Udjo, excellent!
Ciater: i was here on 2011, and it was amazing.., i love the kids dance n played Angklung also Cepot's puppet show, i can say ,u won't regret to visit Saung Udjo, excellent!
Aryaduta: It is easily accessible to the shopping mall attached next to the building and it is also within reasonable walking distance to Jl Riau (quite many factory outlets). There are many local food stalls opposite the hotel with cheap price.
Trans: Best of the best luxury hotel in town. Love the huge bed and the cozy pillow. Love it! And of course.. my kidz was verrrrrrryyy interested with the sand pool. They just keep swimming all day. The breakfast also taste delicious. Will comeback soon for sure.

White_Charter: Recommended site to take beautiful photos of you, couple and family. The journey from Bandung, or as I was from Jakarta, after exiting the kopo toll from padaleunyi, took another 1.5 - 2 hours to arrive to site, the roady is kinda bumpy, hope there's improvement for future, for…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Rented a car (good for up to 5 Pax) for Rp 900000 (approximately S$90) for 12 hours use. Journey from city to Lembang took about 1 hour.  Visited the Ratu Crater first, nice aerial view of the crater, but couldn't get close. Pretty windy up at the peak so would really recommend…
Saung_Angklung: Always get entertained whenever I visit Saung Angklung Mang Udjo. They give professional and beautiful performance every time. Great to see such wonderful music and songs played by kids from all ages. I like the way they involve visitors to play angklung with them. Highly…
Ciater: Always get entertained whenever I visit Saung Angklung Mang Udjo. They give professional and beautiful performance every time. Great to see such wonderful music and songs played by kids from all ages. I like the way they involve visitors to play angklung with them. Highly…
Aryaduta: The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Check in was quick and the room spacious with a comfortable bed.The concierge provide us with a map to explore Bandung and advise us where to go for the best Outlet Shopping. 2 nights in Bandung was surely not enough to see and do everything.  The hotel breakfast was great - we loved the traditional asian breakfast dishes. The breakfast staff were amazing and super helpful. Great start to the day.  The hotel is linked to the Indah Plaza which was useful at night when we wanted to grab a bite to eat.
Trans: Great hotel in Indonesia, you can play at swimming pool which have beach sand. My son very happy when play at there. The breakfast so great with the Indonesia and overseas menus. I will stay at there once come to Bandung.

White_Charter: We headed for Kawah Putih from Jakarta Airport at 7:30 am on a saturday and reached at 1 pm with a tiny break. Google Maps does not tell you the traffic from Jakarta is outrageous and roughly 90minutes was spent negotiating the first tollgate out to the highway!  My guess is it…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Must go early morning open 7am-5pm, During month of Dec rain in the late morning around 11am. Remember to bring umbrella or poncho. Go weekday less visitors, and cheaper by 100k Rp, 200k compare to 300k Rp (weekend). Pay entrance fee at the guardhouse before entering the…
Saung_Angklung: + I went with my husband and son on Friday, June 14th, the show starts at 3.30PM. We go from the hotel around 2PM. + The traffic to go to the place was jammed, so careful with your time. We arrived at the place on 3.10PM.  + You can book the place if you
Ciater: + I went with my husband and son on Friday, June 14th, the show starts at 3.30PM. We go from the hotel around 2PM. + The traffic to go to the place was jammed, so careful with your time. We arrived at the place on 3.10PM.  + You can book the place if you
Aryaduta: One of the best hotels in the city of Bandung, for sleeping at nite or for having a conference. It is well-known for its adjacency to the shopping mall BIP (Bandung Indah Plaza) which has Theater 21 (XXI) on its upper floor. And, not many people may know that actually Hotel Aryaduta also has tennis courts and a helipad.  In addition to the nice rooms, ranging from Superior Room to Presidential Suite, there is also a Function Room suitable for different meetings like seminars, workshops, training, and also inauguration events.
Trans: clean and spacious room with full set amenities with very good quality. however we found bad traffic jam while arriving in the afternoon and long waiting almost 45mins for concierge during check out. the staff were friendly.

White_Charter: It was so beautiful, and a welcome change of weather in Indonesia. Remember to pack warm clothes you WILL need them. The camera guys are very funny, make sure you buy a souvenir picture off them it's worth it. It's a really nice place to hang out, do not touch the water please!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Regardless what other have to say about this place, tangkuban perahu display a spectacular panaromic view of what was left on a volcano that had been erupted years back and I think it is still active! It has a distinctive shape almost like an oversized "big bowl"  and the place…
Saung_Angklung: Entertaining and different.  Worth enduring the traffic jams to get there.  Involving the audience was a plus.  Couldnt believe that people of different cultures can play a few songs together after a short lesson by the conductor
Ciater: Entertaining and different.  Worth enduring the traffic jams to get there.  Involving the audience was a plus.  Couldnt believe that people of different cultures can play a few songs together after a short lesson by the conductor
Aryaduta: The hotel is bit old but well-maintained. Clean & spacious! All staffs are very friendly & helpful (we asked them to call the blue bird taxi few times). But the fridge function is not cool enough & bit dirty inside. Breakfast is fair enough but too many people on Sunday morning time and staffs service were really slow. We needed put used-plate to other empty table. Overall it was ok but I would think to stay for next time.
Trans: This is the 4th times i stayed here. In my personal opinion this hotel is still the best hotel in bandung. Everythings are more premium compare to others 5 star hotel. From the lobby, amenities, pool, and breakfast menu.

White_Charter: Cool place. Stunning panorama. Different taste. Sulphuric aroma.  Have an amazing holiday to visit this place, don't forget to wear your mask because of the aroma of sulphur could sting the mood directly :))  Not too expensive for LOCALS, but kinda not too cheapie for…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Didn’t check out this attraction on tripadvisor prior to going, so we were there based on our driver’s recommendation on our day trip up North. It was a crowded place with touts and a dried up crater. The air was clean and crisp, sulphur smell weren’t too bad but sadly the area…
Saung_Angklung: I visited this place for a show called Beatles Night. A tribute to the Beatles, played with Angklung! Of course the team played Angklung very very good. But for me, the very good thing is in that show, there's a session that every visitor got an Angklung, aaaaaand they teach a…
Ciater: I visited this place for a show called Beatles Night. A tribute to the Beatles, played with Angklung! Of course the team played Angklung very very good. But for me, the very good thing is in that show, there's a session that every visitor got an Angklung, aaaaaand they teach a…
Aryaduta: This was our fist time staying here. We were with kids and elderly. What we like the most were: location (connected to a mall make it easier for us to find entertainment for the kids), spacious rooms (and like most classic hotels they have bath tubs), the quite wide swimming pool and last but not least, the service. We checked in very early at around 10 am, yet they made one room available for all of us. Seldom find this kind of service!
Trans: I was staying with my family, i rent 3 premier rooms. The room so spacious had a luxury bathroom amenities, had white sandy beach pool great for kids, the 18th lounge had the best view. My family fall in love with this hotel

White_Charter: first is pretty n cooling weather here. how to go here u need to rent a car with driver, full day tour without ticket the cheapest can get is RP 400,000 . or u can deal with some taxi driver when u arrive at bandung, the price is around RP 500,000 . hotel and tour price will be…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I have been to many creaters before and this is very disappointing.  After the high price entrance fee. 300.000 rupees with was on a Wednesday but they still charged me for weekend rate. For this price and after paying a lot to get there by private car and driver, I would say…
Saung_Angklung: decided to drop for a while.  extensive choice of souvenirs from tshirt and others made from bamboo, wood and so on.  the price is not too expensive.
Ciater: decided to drop for a while.  extensive choice of souvenirs from tshirt and others made from bamboo, wood and so on.  the price is not too expensive.
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung, used to be a Hyatt Regency, was one of the finest in Bandung, West Java. They changed the name and its ownership and unfortunately its service quality.   As a frequent traveler, I put an important priority to three aspects, first is the service of the whole staff, followed by the room's quality and then pricing. Aryaduta, regretfully is not qualified for the first aspect.   I checked out Nov 12, 2016 morning after staying a night on a biz trip and asked the reception staff if I can keep my room if my engagements in Bandung requires me spend another night with the same price. She said yes as long as I notify them before 2 pm. I called them them at 1:30 pm informing that I need my room and again she confirmed its OK.  I returned to the hotel at 10 pm after series…
Trans: The hotel has a very bad coordination such as: I forgot my Iphone charger, the hotel took more than 4 days to send it to another location within Indonesia. After further investigation, i found that the Iphine charger is still with the hotel business group. This is totally unacceptable for such Luxury hotel. It mean there is a problem with the business group and need to be punished. Also, instead paying around Rp 200,000.00 as the charger will be shipped to Jakarta, now i have to pay around  Rp. 1,800,000.00 as the charger will be shipped internationally.

White_Charter: This is my second visit to the crater. The first time, we can't enter the crater because of the bloody traffic jam - around 6-7 hours and we arrived at around 6 pm which the crater already closed. Also, the locals ask us around 600k rupiahs (around US$50) each car and another…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visited this site few months ago. A winding and uphill road to the site. This is a popular tourist site. Great view of the volcanic crater below and still active. Many small shops selling variety of souvenirs. Highly recommended.
Saung_Angklung: It was both entertaining and culturally fulfilling 2 hours spent.  The beauty of this outing was introduction to the amazing music by this traditional bamboo instruments and the involvement of the audience and how together we could make actually played a nice piece of music.
Ciater: It was both entertaining and culturally fulfilling 2 hours spent.  The beauty of this outing was introduction to the amazing music by this traditional bamboo instruments and the involvement of the audience and how together we could make actually played a nice piece of music.
Aryaduta: Nice atmosphere, friendly and helpful staff, decent breakfast and great value for money. The hotel is nicely located and attached to a shopping mall which also has lots of food variety to choose from. This becomes an extra plus point for those who just wanna be around the hotel area for a relaxing holiday.
Trans: The hotel room is big enough for family, has wide selection of pillows, bathtub, shower and amenities. The restaurants serving various meals but unfortunately you have to pick yourself for beverages (no waiter/waitress offers you drink). The facilities is good, connecting mall and even Mosque, a great Mosque

White_Charter: We got our driver to drive up the kawah putih mountain. It was really cool so make sure to bring your sweaters along. after visiting kawah putih we got free dinks that comes together with the ticket we purchased. awesome experience and would love to visit again.
Tangkuban_Perahu: First experience to see the volcano this is awesome . i enjoy the scenery even few minutes because heavy rain but it's okay i enjoy every second at volcano.
Saung_Angklung: The show was held at the Valley Restaurant, They were reserved for Our Guests from China. The performance was fun, the MC guy was very good, He managed to make the Audience follow and play along, We really did enjoy the whole show. It was a great experience !
Ciater: The show was held at the Valley Restaurant, They were reserved for Our Guests from China. The performance was fun, the MC guy was very good, He managed to make the Audience follow and play along, We really did enjoy the whole show. It was a great experience !
Aryaduta: I stayed at the Aryaduta on business.  It was a good value, had all of the amenities and cleanliness a Western traveler appreciates, and was very conveniently located. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  They epitomize the genuinely warm, casually classy Indonesian hospitality I love most about this country!
Trans: Me and my family ate at "The Restaurant" for buffet dinner. The food was nice, the atmosphere was great, but the one to catch our attention is the warm and friendly staffs that never let go their smile even once. Especially Andri whos show warm hospitality which proof to be memorable for us.

White_Charter: Took more than 2 hours drive from Bandung city. Took another half an hour to reach the hill. It is fairly cold there. When we drop off the car we started to feel the sulfur smell. Along the way to Kawah Putih, the view is really amazing but the strong smell is a barrier to us to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I went there in 2009 and I was soo amazed by the view. It was like in the wallpaper but it's live! Seriously it is a must-visit when you get around Bandung. and it's cold so you better get yourself jacket to keep you warm.
Saung_Angklung: You too can Make Music  Don’t miss this wonderful fun filled show, the children are very talented and full of fun, you’ll be introduced to the Angklung an Indonesian musical instrument made from bamboo and you too will learn to play it. The audience got fully into the show…
Ciater: You too can Make Music  Don’t miss this wonderful fun filled show, the children are very talented and full of fun, you’ll be introduced to the Angklung an Indonesian musical instrument made from bamboo and you too will learn to play it. The audience got fully into the show…
Aryaduta: Based on other reviews, I hoped this would be a place of old charm, and I don't need much luxury so I picked it. This Hotel may have been a highlight once but it hasn't kept any of the charm and lacks many of the basic features a 5 star hotel needs. it's located on a round about, of sorts, and it's hard to access. The upper rooms have a nice view but the beds and carpets are decades old, the mattresses are overused; which is strange considering there's hardly anyone staying here anymore. I shared the breakfast hall with 2 or 3 other people or ate alone, the pool is abandoned and full of leaves. The reviews complaining about the breakfast are partly right. The Indonesian food is great, the continental pretty bad, the juices are based on some artificial powder. The Chinese…
Trans: The emplyoyees are so great, kind. The room was so great except for the tv channels. The foods were to plain. N the price is jut too expensive. Please make more Mushollas. But other than those, it was a great experience.

White_Charter: Better to start early in the morning if you wanna go from Jakarta. Best way to get here are took Padalang Highway and take exit at Baron/Cimahi, just follow the road, you're on track once pass the Soreang and ended in Ciwidey. It took 2-3hrs from Jakarta. Entrance gate is 150k…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The trip is worth it for the spectacular view. Great photo taking spots. As you arrive, be prepared to get swarmed by locals selling their goods. Others would gladly follow you around and tell you some history. At the end they will pester you to buy their goods, reminding you…
Saung_Angklung: it located 2 hours ride outside Jakarta ! Angklung is a traditional musical instrument made out of bamboo. in Saung Angklung Udjo, you can see the process of making the Angklung and you can see the Angklung music performance
Ciater: it located 2 hours ride outside Jakarta ! Angklung is a traditional musical instrument made out of bamboo. in Saung Angklung Udjo, you can see the process of making the Angklung and you can see the Angklung music performance
Aryaduta: A flawless hotel in Bandung that everyone can see n feel by themselves, so i dont need to write a long paragraph to describe this incredible magnificent creation. And the service,facilities, and food are also well
Trans: This hotel provides with a glamorous experience and its velue for money. Its close to one of the famous mall in the city. However when u drive ur own can, quite consfuse in the parking lot coz there are no clear sign to go.

White_Charter: the journey to kawah putih little far from town and the jam on weekend was killing part.   Once we reach kawah putih, we need to pay entrance fees. You have option to choose travel up by car or the angkot.   From the entrance to the top around 5km distance. And walk further you…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view on top of Takuban Perahu is breathtaking. Wonderful scenery and great for picture taking. But personally felt that it was not worth the time and effort, not to mention the IDR 200k-300k per pax (weekday-weekend) for foreign tourists. We were warned of the high entry fee…
Saung_Angklung: You can see (and do) performance and get general information about Angklung here. Definitely traditional, genuine, and fun.
Ciater: You can see (and do) performance and get general information about Angklung here. Definitely traditional, genuine, and fun.
Aryaduta: Love the way they treat costumer, very kind and friendly, the room was nice and clean, good service. Love the environment and other stuff. I absolutely recommend this hotel if you go with your family. Nice job
Trans: Always love to stay in this hotel and it has never let me down! Great service, the staffs are warm and helpful, great room (they keep it well maintained, the room always feels the same as when we first stay here, when they first opened)

White_Charter: The place was cool. It is a great place of taking photos. The view is breath taking. The journey from down hill to up hill was so adventurous, but so much fun.
Tangkuban_Perahu: I came here with my friends, with motorcycle. You must wear a jacket and gloves , if you drive a motorcycle to get to tangkuban boat . Because the road to tangkuban perahu is very cold , and uphill. The view on the top of the mountain is cool. You can see the carter sulfur. But…
Saung_Angklung: Fantastic attraction in Bandung, not to be missed.  We had played Angklung previously but still found the performance (1 and 3:30pm) to be engaging in Indonesian or English.  A good sampler not only to Angklung but music from around the archipelago.  Guides on site are very…
Ciater: Fantastic attraction in Bandung, not to be missed.  We had played Angklung previously but still found the performance (1 and 3:30pm) to be engaging in Indonesian or English.  A good sampler not only to Angklung but music from around the archipelago.  Guides on site are very…
Aryaduta: Excellent place with great service, one more good hotel in Bandung. I finally found a place to rest my head comfortably, in this beautiful city. There's no regret for every money i spent! "Satisfaction" maybe the word to describe all of my experience at Hotel Aryaduta Bandung.
Trans: This has been my 4th time to visit Bandung but it was my 1st experience for me staying in Trans Luxury Hotel, it was overwhelming experience for me, i like all things this hotel provide, the staff was very friendly the room was great and very clean too, I want to add the restaurant as well,the staff was so nice and friendly, they always greet me with a big smile especially Hilal and Reno who always gave their best performance to my family, please send this two guy a regards from my wife and my son. I thank you so much for Trans Luxury Hotel and the staff to make my holiday feel so great.

White_Charter: even it takes a long journey to Kawah Putih, but it was so worth to wait. The view is so beautiful. bring your own masker, because its hard to breath when we go down, there are a lot of ppl sell masker but its a lil bit expensive. and there are Instant photographer who will take…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Thd scenery is not bad but it was too expensive for foreign tourists, it was about 300k Rp. It was much cheaper for Indnesian and KITAS holder. It was a typical local tourist spot, big crowds and souvenir vendors attacks. They sold accessories made by stones of this volcano. The…
Saung_Angklung: i visited SAU for twice. First visit was totally great. The audience was great, the show was amazing and the MC's spoke in many languages. My first visit was at 3.30 pm show in Sunday, while my 2nd was the 1 pm show and it was totally different from the 1st show. the show wasn't…
Ciater: i visited SAU for twice. First visit was totally great. The audience was great, the show was amazing and the MC's spoke in many languages. My first visit was at 3.30 pm show in Sunday, while my 2nd was the 1 pm show and it was totally different from the 1st show. the show wasn't…
Aryaduta: Greatest hotel of this class, hotel was very clean as well as the room. The breakfast was great, and all staff is very friendly and welcoming. There was a festival traditional food on saturday night, the food was awesome, i enjoyed very much. Special thanks to Mr. Duco de vries for his excellent hispitality.
Trans: i think this hotel is one of the most luxury ever i stayed. artistic and beautiful.. love this hotel so much.. wanna come ..agaiinn..a gaiinn. Maybe pudding must be there on the breakfast and give more facilities like outbound and others

White_Charter: It was a long journey to there , the journey was amazing. Rows and rows of strawberry, cabbage and all sorts of plantation along the way. The green scenery and everything. the air is so fresh  Once we arrive, made sure to purchase the face mask. because we can smell the gas...It…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view was breathtaking. We could see the unique features of the valcano. The weather was rather hot. I think the only downside of this visit was, there were too many people selling souvenirs there, who kept approaching us. We felt being disturbed as they would walk with you…
Saung_Angklung: A very polished stage show but lacking in authenticity. All in all, not a bad way to spend an afternoon.
Ciater: A very polished stage show but lacking in authenticity. All in all, not a bad way to spend an afternoon.
Aryaduta: Aryaduta Bandung is one of my favorite hotel in Bandung. They have great facilities, good service, attentive and friendly staff and great food at Cha Yuen their Chinese Restaurant. They also have so many events there. Like "pasar traditional" whichis there's so many traditional of Indonesian foods. And the tastes was delicious! Highly recommended! Thank you Aryaduta for your good service, I'll be back soon! <U+0001F60A>
Trans: Despite the name "luxury" of this hotel, basically this is just a standard 5-star hotel, nothing special. Location-wise it's near a big mall with an indoor amusement park, as well as adjacent to a convention ballroom, so if you have things to do at those places it is indeed convenience. Pool is pretty small. One side of pool have slides and white sands but that's basically all.

White_Charter: Started at 8 am from Bandung and with heavy traffic along the route, took 2.5 hours to reach this very unique green lake. Along the way there are strawberry farms and Luwak coffee to try. At the entrance cars need to pay entrance fees and the driver that took us there advised us…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The entrance fee is rp200000 per pax in weekday. Rp300000 per pax in weekend. The people who selling souvenirs will follow u all the times. It's makes me feel uncomfortable.
Saung_Angklung: Everything was good. The musicians and the performers were fantastic. All of the viewers and performers participated and learner how to use the angklung.
Ciater: Everything was good. The musicians and the performers were fantastic. All of the viewers and performers participated and learner how to use the angklung.
Aryaduta: A fabulous lobby which reaches up to the sky greets your arrival. As soon as you set foot in the place there are people ready and happy to help with luggage, check-in etc. I was using the Club lounge and I checked in there, though there was no queue at the main desk and plenty of staff to check you in. I was offered a drink  and nibbles while I waited for my room to be ready - I arrived before lunch so I expected to wait.  My room was ideal for me They knew I liked to swim in the morning and I had a room on the 3rd floor the same as the pool and the spa.  Using the Club Lounge was great except on Saturday when it was very busy especially in the evening. Otherwise, it was often just me and a couple of others. The staff there were particularly welcoming and showed a genuine…
Trans: Pelayanannya oke, kamarnya bagus, sarapannya enaaaakkkkk banget Kolam renangnya bagus dan air hangar jadi baby friendly So nice spending time with my whole family at Trans Luxury Hotel.. next we’ll come again

White_Charter: Went there about 3 yrs ago. This place is stunning, it's magical. It's like a place where mythical creatures lived.We had to ride like some kind of a minibus to reach the hill. The weather was cold n beautiful. At the white crater there were dry branches,logs n rocks which made…
Tangkuban_Perahu: three day trip in bandung. stayed at hyatt regency, nice hotel big rooms. probably one of the best you can find in bandung.
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is a complex which has a musical theater and a restaurant, but it is more well-known for its musical performance.  It was created by a local artist that had a passion in preserving traditional music and musical instrument. He built a musical school. So what…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo is a complex which has a musical theater and a restaurant, but it is more well-known for its musical performance.  It was created by a local artist that had a passion in preserving traditional music and musical instrument. He built a musical school. So what…
Aryaduta: It was great stay there! The suite room was clean and everything there are working properly. Friendly and smart staff, good breakfast and very nice swimming pool. Really recommended and I'll be back!! :)
Trans: Our heartiest compliments to two of your managers Dimas and Hilal who have been very accomodating during our stay.   They were always smiling and with their professional attitude makes our meals at the restaurant very enjoyable.  I would also like to compliment the Sous Chefs and the Chef de Cuisine for their effort for taking care of us. I wish them all the best in their career endevour.  Definately will return soon to the property.  Thank you,  Saiful Effendy

White_Charter: It was a long journey but after leaving the busy city, the journey was amazing. Rows and rows of strawberry, cabbage and all sorts of plantation along the way. The green scenery and everything.  Once we arrive, made sure to purchase the face mask. It is necessary! Walked a few…
Tangkuban_Perahu: it's a nice place, easy to reach by car.  You can see the Ratu and Upas crater.  But at the entrance (more expensive at the weekends, but come early before the crowds) they dont tell you that a visit to the Domas crater is not free and that you need to take a guide for 200.000…
Saung_Angklung: My family and I enjoyed the performance very much. My two boys had a great time playing the Angklung together with the others. It was a good way to involve the audience. Overall, the performance did a good job to educate and entertain in a fun way without appearing too…
Ciater: My family and I enjoyed the performance very much. My two boys had a great time playing the Angklung together with the others. It was a good way to involve the audience. Overall, the performance did a good job to educate and entertain in a fun way without appearing too…
Aryaduta: We are just visited Bandung and stayed at Aryaduta for 2 nights in a deluxe room. We took 2 rooms with interlining doors and fun family package. Price was so so.....still reasonable.  Located at the center at Bandung, easy to go everywhere, easy for foodstreet. Noted that this is an old hotel before named Hyatt. Its been years but still looks good and well maintain. Rooms are Ok, clean, simple and function. At the 1st night there was a trouble for the TV channels but it works later. The view from my window wasn't good.....It was an unfinished construction building. Other are the parking lot.....it is not really easy to find the parking even at the suggested oarking area and need to walk a long way. Noted that the hotel provide a free valet but somehow, not all like the valet…
Trans: I went with my family. We enjoyed the warm sandy beach pool. The room is very beautiful. Breakfast has many options, beautiful presentation and delicious taste. A chef made me a very delicious spaghetti carbonara. Shopping mall connected to hotel.

White_Charter: New attraction to visit, come and see the beauty of white crater, the sulfur smell emitted from the water is quite strong, the entry fees cheaper than "Tangkuban Perahu"
Tangkuban_Perahu: 8 of us travelled in a van from our budget hotel, Hotel Meize. Reached there after about an hour, passing through small and crowded roads with plenty of interesting sights. We had to pay a 'cut-throat' Rp 200 00 per head, 10 times more than the locals ! Rp 300 000 if it was in a…
Saung_Angklung: My favorite part was near the end of the show when the MCs instructed visitors to play the angklung together. Each member of the audience received an angklung with a number on it and together, under the MCs cue, we rattled the instruments. It amazed me how a group of strangers…
Ciater: My favorite part was near the end of the show when the MCs instructed visitors to play the angklung together. Each member of the audience received an angklung with a number on it and together, under the MCs cue, we rattled the instruments. It amazed me how a group of strangers…
Aryaduta: We stayed from 7 till 13 October. We were checked in by Kiki, a very pleasant and patient guy. He took the time to show us the places near the hotel on the map  The room was very spacious, overlooking the garden, pool and the masjeed. On clear days we could see the mountains   Buffet breakfast was fantastic. Very wide selection including various fruits. The staff were very helpful and full of initiatives.  Greis made us very comfortable during our dining. The other staff were Robbie, Endie, Nita and the very professional manager Ridwan.  He was on his toes all the time, helping the staff with the work. He even manned the egg station for a while.Such an exemplary manager   The only minor irritation we had was with the safe deposit box. It was locked. The tap in the bathroom made…
Trans: Overall great stay. Hotel located next to the mall so easy access for eating/shopping. For a pregnant lady, the hotel even had a pillow menu so we had the chance to request a maternity pillow. Will come back next time for sure.

White_Charter: We left Bandung City at about 6am and the journey took us a bit over the 1.5 hour mark. We had a few stops (breakfast and to take photos of the scenery along the way) and were completely mindblown upon reaching Kawah Putih. Be prepared to pay at least 15x what the locals pay…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Aside from the main crater (Ratu Crater), I managed to visit the other crater, Upas Crater, which was amazing because we were alone (guided by the staff nearby) and literally went down near the crater. The view was breathtaking and the track was good and clean enough to go on.…
Saung_Angklung: Play Angklung together with other 300 of people, the harmony of sundanese traditional music!what a great place to visits to know a miniatur of litle sundanese village. Bring your kids here, enjoy the show!learn how to play angklung!Love it!
Ciater: Play Angklung together with other 300 of people, the harmony of sundanese traditional music!what a great place to visits to know a miniatur of litle sundanese village. Bring your kids here, enjoy the show!learn how to play angklung!Love it!
Aryaduta: #NAME?
Trans: Great service and interior, great room color and lighting. The breakfast is very good, a lot of variety. The pool is great for young children. The gym is professional level for the machine. Next to the mall. The staff device is excellence. Recommended for business or pleasure.

White_Charter: The never ending and bumpy journey took about 2 hours from the city of Bandung bypassing a breathtaking and mesmerizing village. Really enjoy the cold and fresh breeze while going up the hill. The fee is still 65 rupiah (as of April 2015). If you don't really fancy sniffing the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The place was too crowded when my friends and I visited it but what spoiled our mood the most was the sellers who kept following us, forcing us to but their goods.
Saung_Angklung: Saung Angklung Udjo is a wonderful evening - the young performers are very talented and put on an excellent show. The costumes are beautiful. The best part was where everyone plays the angklung - it was quite remarkable  that they were able to take a large group of adults and…
Ciater: Saung Angklung Udjo is a wonderful evening - the young performers are very talented and put on an excellent show. The costumes are beautiful. The best part was where everyone plays the angklung - it was quite remarkable  that they were able to take a large group of adults and…
Aryaduta: We stayed here for 3 nights and we really enjoyed our stay. The room was big and spacious, the bed was comfortable and clean. The breakfast was good, they offer quite a selection of food to choose and during our breakfast the Restaurant Manager came to our table and said hi to us. He offered a "real coffee" instead of the ordinary coffee served at the restaurant and we were pleased about it. The pool was big and the kids enjoyed spending time there. The calamari by the pool was great. The only down factor was the attendant of the kids club was not that attentive. We left our kids there and went for gym, and we met him at the gym texting at his phone. We told him that our kids are in the club if he could watch them for us and he said yes I will go there later. When we picked them…
Trans: Best place to have private moment. No disturbance, just stay in Hotel. You wont feel the presence of hotel staffs, though they are available at any time. Clean an cozy everywhere. Very highly recomend for non business travellers.

White_Charter: Come and see the beauty of white crater, you'll be amazed...you better use local transportation because it is cheaper than using your own transportation, there are many local restaurants..with reasonable price, don't forget to take picture around white crater and in front of…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I visited this place years ago and is interesting environment but when we go there last week and we decided not to enter the place due to high entrance fee, per person. Not value for money. Weekend 300,000 and weekday 200,000
Saung_Angklung: we loved the unique concert and found it amazing  that such a primitive musical instrument could produce such lovely sounds. the anchors were great and the hands on experience was superb touch bravo! UDJO
Ciater: we loved the unique concert and found it amazing  that such a primitive musical instrument could produce such lovely sounds. the anchors were great and the hands on experience was superb touch bravo! UDJO
Aryaduta: I have to say that I really had a mixed feeling about this hotel.  I spent 2 nights at this hotel together with my wife.   Overall, my stay was very pleasant.  I like the location of the hotel which I think it's quite strategic.  Quite easy to get around.  The people are very nice especially the team at the Club Lounge.  However, I can't help of noticing that this hotel may need a touch of improvement.   A few little things that bothers me slightly.  I reserved a club room which should be located in the club floor.  But the rooms were somehow all occupied.  I was given the same room type but on regular floor. As a result of this, we had to change the room key a few times as the elevator didn't let us go to the 13th floor where the lounge is located.  Plus for some reasons the…
Trans: Big room, comfort, clean. Breakfast is very good but too crowded, maybe next time will try the breakfast at 18th. Swimming pool also too crowded. Location just next to mall, so it's easy to buy things that we need.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih about 2 hrs from Bandung. You need a private transport to reach this place. Itsnot easy to use public transport.   Dont miss to visit this place when you have a time for it. You will have an amazing experience, nice view and natural with a huge crater.  I went with…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The access to this place is from a road between Lembang and Subang. We can drive the car up to the top of the volcano. It is wonderful to see the crater of the volcano from the top. It is recommended to walk around and take photos.
Saung_Angklung: it's a great place to visit, you can learn how to play angklung(traditional bamboo instrument) here. every afternoon there are a show that you can watch and they will lend you an angklung and let you play along. this is the founder of saung angklung udjo ---->…
Ciater: it's a great place to visit, you can learn how to play angklung(traditional bamboo instrument) here. every afternoon there are a show that you can watch and they will lend you an angklung and let you play along. this is the founder of saung angklung udjo ---->…
Aryaduta: I stayed only one night through resv online travel agent which offered 50% discount. I love all the classic design the hotel. The room is really spacious, comfort and clean with white color dominated. Still felt the ambience of Hyatt signature (now convert to Lippo corporate).   Really enjoyed the room from 12th floor. You can see the plane clearly on your window, landing to near airport.   The pool is large enough to have real exercise. And enjoyed the sauna, steam bath, hot jacuzzi where all of hotel facilities for free.   Sorry your Buffet dinner and breakfast is to simple for 5 stars hotel. It's beyond my expectations. Your Indonesian Buffet is so tasteless, simply elaborate menu. But still love the pastry, it's ok. And Buffet display is old fashioned. Try to elegant more.  …
Trans: Guest room is big and nice. Bath room clean and good. Swimming pool warm, safe and very cool for kids. View at 18th floor is beautiful. Bell boy and front desk are helpfull for our family and very kind.

White_Charter: It was a 2.5 hours drive from Bandung. The journey was far but scenic. We passed by terraced villages and farms. The crater was turquoise blue and felt ethereal with the fog and mountain green. Fortunately the sulphur smell was weak because of the rain the day before.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It's a truly awesome experience to see the volcano crater from the top. Take a walk around and enjoy the scenery. Sample fried tauhoo with chili padi, ginger tea with brown sugar. Buy some handcrafted souvenirs. Good value for these beautiful gifts.
Saung_Angklung: I went here with my family. The atmosphere there was awesome, the souvenir shop was full of creativity, I assure that you will buy something there before you leave. Other than that, the performances are interesting and they gave us the chance to play the 'angklung' ourselves.…
Ciater: I went here with my family. The atmosphere there was awesome, the souvenir shop was full of creativity, I assure that you will buy something there before you leave. Other than that, the performances are interesting and they gave us the chance to play the 'angklung' ourselves.…
Aryaduta: My friends and i stayed in Aryaduta Bandung on the weekend (14th-17th oct 2016). During our stayed, we have been pleasant by the kindness of the helpfull and friendly staff. Outdor swimming pool with a beatiful mount view. We also had a great massages and sauna.   Great location, direct access to Bandung Indah Plaza and few minutes walk to Factory outlets in Jalan Riau. Shopping heaven! And big thank you for Aryaduta General Manager Mr. Duco de Vries for the attention and services, we had a wonderfull weekend stay in Aryaduta hotel Bandung.  Hopefully we will be back soon.
Trans: The hotel was very convenience especially when we stayed with our children. We love the swimming pool, the room was very comfort and clean. We just stay one night and we though we need to stay longer in the future.

White_Charter: The journey from the city of Bandung took around 3 hours. Along the ascending road, you are greeted with traditional, with a decent attempt of beautification of houses with colorful paints and greenish gardens. There is not pot of land wasted for the locals will plant paddy or…
Tangkuban_Perahu: While planning for this trip, I came across viewpoints from both sides of the continuum. I have read positive & negative reviews of this place. After our visit, I now can appreciate why.  There are 2 craters that most visitors to Bandung would try to get to. One is Tangkuban…
Saung_Angklung: We were made to experience the instrument and the participation of the audience were great. The bands were good with each of their instruments. There's just one thing that looked out of place, the drums. There was one child performer who looked bored but gave an amazing dance.…
Ciater: We were made to experience the instrument and the participation of the audience were great. The bands were good with each of their instruments. There's just one thing that looked out of place, the drums. There was one child performer who looked bored but gave an amazing dance.…
Aryaduta: My family and I stayed in Aryaduta Bandung on the weekend.. We really enjoyed staying there.. The receptionists are nice.. We liked swimming there bcoz it has a beautiful mount view.. The sun's warm and we love sunbathing there.. and the room is cozy.. :)
Trans: The Hotel is really good. Very comfortable. The breakfast is fantastic with a lot of options. The employess are very well prepared. The 18th restaurante is absolutely amazing. But I stayed in a room where was possible to hear every single noise from the room beside my room, and it was terrible because I could not sleep well. That room has a door to conect to the other room and through this door is posssible to hear clearly the conversation and TV (It was a very bad experience).

White_Charter: It's a stunning view but for those who's having breathing problem better wear a mask & do not stay too long. The entry also much cheaper than Tangkuban Perahu.
Tangkuban_Perahu: They say, you're never in Bandung if you've never been to the Tangkuban Perahu,  So, my mates and I made our way straight from the airport the moment we landed in BDO.  Thank goodness we spent our days in Bandung on weekdays, if not traffic would be frustrating and 50% more time…
Saung_Angklung: angklung can sing many song beside indonesian song also fromanother country, for example we are can sing with angklung the Beatles song etc
Ciater: angklung can sing many song beside indonesian song also fromanother country, for example we are can sing with angklung the Beatles song etc
Aryaduta: A business trip brought me to Bandung for 5 nights and i had been recommended to stay in the Aryaduta Hotel. The hotel was spacious, clean and in a very central position. During my stay, I have been pleasantly suprised by the kindness of the helpfull and friendly staff. For those who love shopping in their spare hours: The hotel is just around the corner of THE street filled with factory outlets - Shopping heaven ;-) I will be back soon!
Trans: Everything was good, the staff were very friendly and helpful, white sandy beach pool with warm water, my kiddos really enjoyed...the Hotel is adjacent to a shopping center so it makes it easy to search for food and shopping, staying there for Two Nights,Our room was clean and smelled fresh..i love and very enjoy this hotel..

White_Charter: Will be a new and main attraction to visit .  The ticket just 50idr . The place more organised with a proper shops to purchase sourvenier .  My family love this new perspektif view ...  Kawah Putih means white crater .
Tangkuban_Perahu: Olala this place is magnificient. Just gorgeous and cooling. No words to describe these beautiful views...  The only thing i dislike about those guys selling souvenirs, they  pestered us and followed us until we left the place. My suggestion that they should have a table…
Saung_Angklung: I have not experienced this type of music and spectacle before and if you are in Bandung then you really should visit. Be prepared for delightful, not cheesy, audience participation. You will come out smiling.
Ciater: I have not experienced this type of music and spectacle before and if you are in Bandung then you really should visit. Be prepared for delightful, not cheesy, audience participation. You will come out smiling.
Aryaduta: I came with my family last week, we enjoyed stayed in Aryaduta, nice hotel with lovely view, good experience and friendly staff, they have good hospitality, easy access to shopping mall,  very good recommend <U+0001F60A><U+0001F60A><U+0001F60A> keep it up
Trans: Best service and best quality of room and food..  Recommend Hotel for vacation with family. Full facilities and close with Mall & theme park.  Speed of table cleaner need to be faster since occupancy of Hotel full book.

White_Charter: Go try ontang-anting as a vehicle they use from parking lot to location and you got adrenalin rush :)
Tangkuban_Perahu: Is definitely not worth paying Rp200,000 for a foreigner to visit the Tengkuban Perahu.  The volcano is completely dried up as explosive rock, thus there is nothing much to see.  There are a lot of touts trying to get you to buy souvenirs.  We were not really disturbed by them…
Saung_Angklung: this place is a must visit when you go to Bandung. it is a great experience going there, finding out about indonesian tradition. Even at the end of the show you will get to have a chance to play the anklung instrument which was used in the show. Not only in the show they play…
Ciater: this place is a must visit when you go to Bandung. it is a great experience going there, finding out about indonesian tradition. Even at the end of the show you will get to have a chance to play the anklung instrument which was used in the show. Not only in the show they play…
Aryaduta: I'm an event organizer, I arranged many events and accommodations for my clients and they like it. Beautiful hotel, very clean and fast arrangements to my suggestion.The staff are really helpful. Thank you Aryaduta it's a pleasure to do a business with you.
Trans: Good hotel, a little bit far from city center but near the shopping mall dan trans studio amisement park. Good quality and room service but lack of variety fo breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Overall I recommend this hotel for family or business trip

White_Charter: Just to inform another visitor from malaysia...fees per entry+ontang anting for visitors kawah putih is always change...depends on your luck..i pay rp400 000 for 2 adults..1 kids 7y n 1 kids 2y...too expensive..
Tangkuban_Perahu: Manage by lots of scum there! Expensive entry ticket and expensive guide fees! stay away from there! Boycott this place! Go any other volcanoes in Indonesia but not here!
Saung_Angklung: Love the angklung musical, will go again if i were in bandung again. Talented musicians which i believe it can only be master by the indonesians! :) salute to Udjo! :)
Ciater: Love the angklung musical, will go again if i were in bandung again. Talented musicians which i believe it can only be master by the indonesians! :) salute to Udjo! :)
Aryaduta: Since the hand over from Hyatt Regency to Aryaduta this hotel still has it charm. Warm welcoming hotel staff, very attentive club lounge staff and top service for the banquet team. Nice, clean and comfortable room.  In conclusion, I have no trouble at all during my visit. All of the hotel staff made my stay very easy and smooth for my work.
Trans: amazing you should spend a night there, and you can have your own review.. this place is really amazing..   is it worth it? even the price is a little higher, but it worth that much.. have a try, and you can review yourself..  everything is amazing since check in until check out..  the pool with sands thats nice for childrens.. the buffet dining restaurant is awesome..   thank you

White_Charter: Very small in comparision with T.Perahu. Can get really crowded. Only for photography. Driver told us the gas here compared to T.perahu wasnt poisonous but the smell of sulphur here is stronger as u are at the crater. Bring ur own mask rather than purchasing from the vendors.…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The view of this place is good with the cold weather conditions but beware of those people who admit as a certified tour guides, ( one of them shows a card that is hanging on his neck saying he's a certified tour guide to take tourists around this place while giving information…
Saung_Angklung: You haven't been to Bandung if you missed Saung Angklung Udjo. Ok, the merchandise shop in the entrance area was a little strange but it was still quite interesting. The whole place is about a traditional bamboo instrument. The show itself gives an impression about the…
Ciater: You haven't been to Bandung if you missed Saung Angklung Udjo. Ok, the merchandise shop in the entrance area was a little strange but it was still quite interesting. The whole place is about a traditional bamboo instrument. The show itself gives an impression about the…
Aryaduta: Choosing Club Deluxe room type was our best decision. The room was really spacious,  our daughters could running around in the room.  For a Hotels running for two decade we also amazed with the interior design that stay up to date and well maintained.  Not to mention the benefit of Club Lounge access,  they served A'la Carte menu at breakfast.  The prime location next to Bandung's historical Mall and beautiful parks nearby is another great advantage. Last but not least,  the Level of service from Reception,  club lounge, room service and Housekeeping staff was really nice. Surely will comeback for another stay, Thank you and keep up the great job!!
Trans: Our family number one choice for family hotel in bandung, very good atmosphare and cozy place. Our kid love the beach like pool, water slide and kids zone area.  Food is very good, delicious. Service is very good, Room very clean.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih charges an entrance fee of idr 65,000 rupiah for non residents and idr 33,000 rupiah for residents or kitas holder. This includes the ontang anting ride up the mountain.   You can purchase a mask for idr 5,000 rupiah or bring your own. The meaning of kawah Putih is…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I went there during the sunset time. All I can say it was just stunning!.. 1 word to describe, WOW!.
Saung_Angklung: Angklung known as the traditional  musical instrument from West Java. This place gonna take you to know about angklung more. They will put you all in the little stage and teach you how to play angklung and you will be asked to get interact with all the performer from Udjo's.…

Aryaduta: I come with my husband and my mother in law and her friend from Holland, my mother in law and her friend were amazed by the hotel and services. Very big room and balcony, super clean and comford. The staff are very helpful and warm. Thank you for Aryaduta General Manager Mr. De Vries for the attention and services, we had wonderful stayed in Bandung. We would like to come back soon.
Trans: I traveled to Bandung with my wife and my 3 years old son, i choose to stay at your hotel because i know you have a great swimming pool area for kids, and yes thank you! he amazed and have a great time play there, then we came back to Jakarta and already have plan to stay there again in a couple weeks from now

White_Charter: About two hours, 50 km, drive from Bandung, , Kawah Putih (White Crater) at an altitude of just over 7000' is a lake in a volcano crater, ranging in color from milky white to greenish white depending on the ambient light. Nestled amidst heavily forested hills with a sandy beach…
Tangkuban_Perahu: This inactive volcano near Bandung is rich with scenic background, cooler atmosphere and a large number of shops selling handicrafts and souvenirs. Will take 2-3 hours by rad from Bandung
Saung_Angklung: Outstanding performance of music, dances, a little bit comedy and art as a whole. They involved the audience in the orchestra, it was awesome! The experience was so unique that I really want to repeat it. I will certainly go back to Udjo once I visit Bandung again.
Ciater: Outstanding performance of music, dances, a little bit comedy and art as a whole. They involved the audience in the orchestra, it was awesome! The experience was so unique that I really want to repeat it. I will certainly go back to Udjo once I visit Bandung again.
Aryaduta: Stay for 3 nights (8-11 Oct 2016) with my family, overall it is a good stay, room is well kept, breakfast is good, room service is fast, Swimming pool is spacious enough, worth your money, only one thing they need to improve more is the  parking area which is too crowded, especially on the 2nd night of our stay, when they have an event, Cars were overcrowded on the lobby, and at one point we are forbid to enter the hotel and the security ask us to turn for the back gate, but when we in the back gate they told us to turn to front gate, that made my husband angry and insist to get in as we need to rest after a long day and we end up speaking to the manager and ask them to coordinate better with their security Team on parking issues in the future..it leave quite a bad taste on our…
Trans: This hotel is one of the best i ever stay in any hotel in the world. The service, cleaness, and everything was great andi am very satisfied to stay here. And the food was also great. Will come back agian for the next Trip to Bandung.

White_Charter: There's nothing much here to see so expect to spend only 10-15 minutes here taking pictures. The scenery here is nice.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Went to this place from Jakarta, it took around 3 hours by car. My 11 years old son likes the panoramic scene, and we also like the food sold at the stall, and the 'Jagung Bakar' ( grilled sweet corn). At the area there are outbound activity, tracking,  and horse riding. We…
Saung_Angklung: It was an unforgetable experience to see and hear students from 5-6 years to 15-16 years old perform traditional Javan music and dance.  Kudos to these kids for keeping their tradition alaive and well. The real treat was a public performance with angklungs when, under skillful…

Aryaduta: This one is old hotel but managed it interior still clean and comfortable. I try one class up than deluxe room, so its represent more than average of its services and hospitality. Our family love to play with its pool and kids small play ground. The location also side by side to Bandung BIP mall and the location is very strategic in Bandung.
Trans: Hotel Service was excellent. Facility was very good if u bring Your Kids stay here. My kids very enjoy play the sand at pool. View from the cafe very very nice.Staff very friendly and helpfull. A lot of choice menu for breakfast. I will stay here again for next visit. Very recommended

White_Charter: Journey here from bandung city took us more than 2hrs one way. Bad traffic jam. Park the car at the base so you can avoid paying expensive car entrance fee. There is a mini van which they call it Angkot. Quite am experience with it. View there is not bad but I have been to Ijen…
Tangkuban_Perahu: I never been to any crater before and I do not know what to expect. I went there on Friday morning. Luckily not many people. A lot of people will come to you promoting all kind of things. Food, services. Just don't start dealing with them, else everyone else will come to you…
Saung_Angklung: came here last november 2012. arrived on site, bought ticket. was given a little angklung as the entrance ticket. was given some welcome drinks as well...   anyway, they have 2 MC for the whole experience. both always speaks bahasa indonesia, then translates it to english. you…

Aryaduta: My sister and I booked 2 deluxe rooms with connecting door and sofa bed, however when we checked in they said the room is not available. Tried to speak with the hotel manager (Chyntia) but she came after an hour waiting. We dont like the way she talks and she have made us waiting for so long. Not professional!  First, She tried to place us in 6th floor room which according to housekeepkng staff it cannot be occupied / broken. Why she doesnt even know that the room is broken? Isn't she the manager?   Second, She suggested different floor which not make any sense. We are here for family holiday and we want to stay together not in different floor.  At the end, after the long argument they up grade our room to presidential suite with connecting door to a superior room. Yes the suite…
Trans: Very finely furnished and nicely decorated hotel, including bedrooms. Good quality amenities in the room, second to none in Bandung. Extremely courteous and efficient hotel staff.  A little setback here is the noise from the mall, where loud music was played until late at night.

White_Charter: if you have seen this crater lake on google.in real its more more beautiful and amazing.. the place is magic, you can feel like its like in other planet.. eveything is blue, green, white, turqouise colour..if you love to take pictures of nature this is best place. lots of people…
Tangkuban_Perahu: As we seen as tv...this volcano is still active when we go there we can not explore the whole area bcoz its still dangerous. So we just seen the above area. We wilk find may guide here without so much difficult they will explain and guide you to the interesting place around
Saung_Angklung: Attractions that are worth your while in West Java are few and far between, but this is one that I wouldn't miss if I was happening to travel to Bandung, if you are into music and dance of course. The orchestra is great and so are the presenters of the show and the performers,…
Ciater: Attractions that are worth your while in West Java are few and far between, but this is one that I wouldn't miss if I was happening to travel to Bandung, if you are into music and dance of course. The orchestra is great and so are the presenters of the show and the performers,…
Aryaduta: One of the fastest hotel check in  I've ever experience. The staff are very attentive and friendly, room is very clean and facilities are well maintained.   Another plus for this hotel is Internet and wifi connection are fast and stable which means a lot for me. It is also very well located, just beside a shopping mall and lots of restaurants and cafes nearby really helps when it comes to dinner.   Definitely will stay in here again on my next trip to Bandung.
Trans: Stayed here for 1 night with family. The hotel is in good condition, all good, just one thing that they need to improve the service. But overall our stay was OK. The swimming pool was very good, has sandy beach, very good for family, recreation in the middle of the city.  The location is very near to the Trans studio, just walking distance, and also next to the mall,m so it is very easy to go to the shop or to the restaurant. Stayed in 7th floor, very noisy because of the music concert in the trans park.

White_Charter: Located south of Bandung, Kawah Putih is well known for its White Crater, a scenic and spectacular mother nature formation. Our journey took about 1hr 15mins to reach here from our hotel and along the way, we passed through the mountains, windy hilly roads (with houses,…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tengkuban Perahu is a dormant volcano that was worth going to many years ago. Nowadays however, it has become a tourist trap with lots of touts. It is also extremely expensive to visit as they charge you once (exorbitant foreigner pricing) when you enter the site and once more…
Saung_Angklung: This spectacular performance ...just like you see the orchestra but this music made of bamboo. There is one occassion everybody can play angklung / music instrument made of bamboo together. Seriously, it will make you happy, as if you can play orchestra.
Ciater: This spectacular performance ...just like you see the orchestra but this music made of bamboo. There is one occassion everybody can play angklung / music instrument made of bamboo together. Seriously, it will make you happy, as if you can play orchestra.
Aryaduta: I have booked for a night and actually the hotel was awesome, nice view and as well as good location they connected with Bandung Indah Plaza. The swiming pool and the breakfast was also great. Aryaduta is on my favorite list in Bandung, recommended for everyone. Farewell
Trans: We had a short but memorable stay at this hotel. It is my first visit to Bandung and actually not sure where to stay. After a brief study of ratings from Booking.Com, we decided to stay at Tans Luxury. After 3 nights stay we concluded that it was a perfect selection!!  All the staff are very friendly and polite. They are very helpful and supportive. The foods at the Restaurant at level 3rd and 18th are excellent. Facilities are well maintained. The room are clean and well maintained as well. We did enjoy our stay at his hotel and highly recommend to others. In fact we already planned to bring the whole family on the next trip to Bandung!!

White_Charter: The view is amazing, the place is so beautiful, breezy and a perfect place to fill up your photo album.  Eventhough we have to pass through traffic jams, it's worth a visit. No regrets, make a point to visit Kawah Putih while in Bandung.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Had been here many times and never bored to visit again. Domas Crater is very exotic one and also the green forest make the feeling stay calm. Ratu Crater is huge and fully recommended one.
Saung_Angklung: This is an ought if you visit Bandung, especially when you want to know traditional culture of Bandung, the traditional local instrument= Angklung, here you could watch the small orchestra or you could join them by playing the Angklung.
Ciater: This is an ought if you visit Bandung, especially when you want to know traditional culture of Bandung, the traditional local instrument= Angklung, here you could watch the small orchestra or you could join them by playing the Angklung.
Aryaduta: Great location! <10min walk to Secret outlet boutique and the others on Jalan Riau. Direct mall access to Bandung Indah Plaza with hypermarket for water/groceries. Can buy layered cakes (kek lapis) and pisang bolen home for family and friends from popular Holland bakery, also just next to hotel (cut through Indah Plaza). Excellent service from hotel staff. Especially touched that they went beyond and offered the very nice and spacious board meeting room for me to nurse my baby when we arrived too early and no rooms were available for check-in yet. Stay was also very comfortable. Spacious and clean.
Trans: the staff must more helpful to offer their assistance to the guest and the parking area must bigger than already is since its quite difficult to find parking lot.  and the receptionist should be more helpful

White_Charter: A beautiful place to visit which is so natural and beautiful, You will surely love it if you are fond of nature.
Tangkuban_Perahu: USD 100 for a group of five to endure aggressive hustlers and to see a view obstructed by ever expanding junk shops with all the associated litter. The price has shot up recently and over the last 5 years has become infested with rip off artists and African type shanty shops.…
Saung_Angklung: the coordinates given by tripadvisor (after clicking on the address) was off by quite a bit, i had to navigate narrow alleys and asking locals to find it (which was good experience as well) ..  but, once we were in the Udjo complex, we were taken by the beautiful traditional…

Aryaduta: I stayed for 3 nights and what made me like this hotel is the white touch in the bathroom. The facilities I got was worthy compared to the price. Need to be maintained soon but the room is quite good and cozy.
Trans: Good hotel location, in the bigest mall in Bandung an near Buah Batu exit tool road, Trans Studio is in the same area and many food experiance in the malls and many branded store, the 18th restaurant of the hotel have good view on rooftop area.

White_Charter: Bit far away from Jakarta around 4 to 5 hrs drive...but the place was amazing !! Beautiful scenery, green colored lake, cool breeze and perfect place for photography :)
Tangkuban_Perahu: We went there by car, and because we are students in Bandung and somemore we can speak Bahasa Indonesia so we get a cheaper price for entrance fee (300 k per person for foreigner) The view at there was very nice. And I like the weather there it was so cold. Haha it is better to…
Saung_Angklung: Come here to witness the whole package of how angklung is made and perform.  I was so impressed with this place, maybe because I was a music lover. But don't worry, eventhough you are music illiterate, still you can make the angklung sound.  Try to visit this place and…
