Aryaduta: This hotel used to be Hyatt Regency.  After staying there for three nights, I realise why they have lost the licence to use the Hyatt Regency name.  The hotel reception, restaurants etc are fine.  However, the hotel is let down by poor maintenance of the rooms.  The bathroom had damp smell and the towels were terribly smelly and looked like they have been used since the 17th century,  Not as good as some of the other reviewers claim this place to be. The hotel location is very good though.
Trans: I Was travelling with my family,this Was My 3rd stay"i think"in this hotel,and i just cant set My heart to another one.the room spacious,so clean,with Most everything u need with ur toiletries.bed so comfort,variety of breakfast, and the kids pool that my son favorites,coz after he's Done with the pool,he straight to the kids lounge...<U+0001F618><U+0001F618>

White_Charter: It's a must to visit Kawah Putih when you are in Bandung! The view is simply amazing. Same thing, this place needs a driver to help you get the local price as the entrace fee. Otherwise, you will need to pay the foreigner price. The smell of the sulphur so it's bearable even…
Tangkuban_Perahu: 300k per person for foreigners as entrance fee was definitely not worth it. Way too expensive! Weather was cooling but gets hot when you are near the smoking crater.   PLEASE DO NOT BELIEVE WHEN THE LOCAL GUYS SHOW YOU BADGES SAYING THEY ARE FROM BANDUNG GOVERNMENT THERE TO HELP…
Saung_Angklung: this place is making an angklung. angklung is one of indonesian traditional musical instrument made from bamboo. u could see how they make it, and u could see the performance, and u could learn how to use angklung. just a little bit complain bout the road to get there... the…
Ciater: this place is making an angklung. angklung is one of indonesian traditional musical instrument made from bamboo. u could see how they make it, and u could see the performance, and u could learn how to use angklung. just a little bit complain bout the road to get there... the…
Aryaduta: I booked from traveloka and got large room with large sofa for quite cheap price. Really worth. It is like a junior suite room paid for deluxe. Good breakfas. Include fresh fruit juice. Iron board available. Bath tub. Bed a bit small. Love the stay and for sure will come back if with great discount.
Trans: We stay for business trip  and stayed for 3 nights  Overall very pleasant to stay. The Bedroom very art decor and  Clean room The bathroom is very artsy and clean. Plenty of choice for Breakfast Please to improve the WiFi facility

White_Charter: surrounded by the mist....as like we were in mysterious place! forgot to bring our mask, we didn't not buy from the salesman, but to me the sulfur smell was bearable.   don't forget to buy the strawberry. was advised by our driver, Rp40,000 for 1kg is max and choose those on…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Fascinating story about Tangkuban Perahu (go google it). Located 30km north of Bandung, taking 1hr30min to get there on a weekday (probably longer on a weekend). Four volcanic craters in the vicinity with three being accessible, one of which erupted in December 2014. Entry is a…
Saung_Angklung: My family and I had a good time watching the performances. From Wayang Golek ( Traditional Puppet Show ), Gamelan Performances, Sundanese and Javanese dance and the Angklung Performances by local children. Very entertaining.  My kids were happy to learnt and played the Angklung…
Ciater: My family and I had a good time watching the performances. From Wayang Golek ( Traditional Puppet Show ), Gamelan Performances, Sundanese and Javanese dance and the Angklung Performances by local children. Very entertaining.  My kids were happy to learnt and played the Angklung…
Aryaduta: Another great stay at this hotel. This is an old , but very well maintained hotel. The staffs and services were superb. Keep up the good work, and look forward to staying at this hotel in the near future!
Trans: Bandung is not among frequent visits by foreigners but this place proved to be paradise and major contributor was this hotel. With high class amenities and extraordinary arrangements for kids, this hotel proves to be best not only in hotel but services and feel also. 24 hour smiling staff is ready to assist in any manner they can. Vast buffet for non veg lovers but chef agung took special care of us by making veg pasta and veg pizza fresh for us. Best with kids with 4 pools. It will be difficult for you to check out from this hotel because you will not be able to enjoy the feel and facilities of this hotel easily anywhere in the world.

White_Charter: A good place to take picture. :) Please buy the mask first before going down nearer to the lake.  However, until now, I still want to know why they closed the cave and why we cannot stand in front of cave for too long...
Tangkuban_Perahu: Great Place and scenery, u can find a lot of place to take a beautifull shot. U can also find some handcrafted things with cheap price, and u can rent a horse too!!
Saung_Angklung: learning culture by music, by living with them closely. have interest with angklung for long time. it creates beautiful symphony though it's made only from bamboos.
Ciater: learning culture by music, by living with them closely. have interest with angklung for long time. it creates beautiful symphony though it's made only from bamboos.
Aryaduta: very lovely hotel with lovely lobby. Staff was fast in checking in and helpfull.  I was able to have a great rest here. Room was spacious and clean, efficient not having too much furniture and  everything neatly placed. Wifi was working well in my room.  I was let to have breakfast in the club in 13th fl, less variety compared to the breakfast in mezzanine but had a breath taking view to the Northern part of Bandung. We got a great deal and I think every penny was worth it.
Trans: I have nice experience during stay, the room is good, the staff overall is good and polite. The reception and check out process is also good and efficient. THe food served at breakfast are variety from chinese, western, indonesia and traditional.

White_Charter: The view is worth seeing. This is another tourist attraction worth to be visited while in Bandung.  May need a mask as the smell of the sulphur can be quite strong at times.
Tangkuban_Perahu: We visited the crater in september 2015. There were no extortionist. The price for the guide is fixed ( written in the ticket counter ). At the crater there were some women who offer to do massages with mud but very pricey around Rp. 100.000, just say no.
Saung_Angklung: In Saung Angklung Udjo, you can learn how to play angklung(Indonesian traditional music instrument), watching wayang and Indonesian tranditional dance. You can also buy souvenirs.
Ciater: In Saung Angklung Udjo, you can learn how to play angklung(Indonesian traditional music instrument), watching wayang and Indonesian tranditional dance. You can also buy souvenirs.
Aryaduta: Another enjoyable stay at my favourite hotel in Bandung.....always a pleasure  Breakfast buffet extensive with capable friendly staff  Often get a massage here after travelling from Australia via Jakarta or Denpasar
Trans: The hotel gives all facilities, helpfulness, and very helpful staff. The quality of services is very good. The facilities such as internet with very good connection, bathroom and room interior are very excellent. However, the location of hotel is very crowded, may need the sign board how to enter the hotel.

White_Charter: Been here a couple of time. Great to see a turquoise coloured volcanic lake with yellow sulfur around the edges. Nice for taking photos and remember to bring an umbrella as it often rains here.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Tangkuban Perahu is one of the precious place in Indonesia, the view is wonderful with sulfur smell. If you bring children, riding the horse is an option. Evan the place has nothing else to offer, for view lovers it still great.
Saung_Angklung: This place is superb !! young kids, teens n adults were kept enthralled with their superb performances..Be it the Wayang Kulit (Pupet show), Peacock dance , Angklung performances.. the colorful costumes, the energetic performances of the little children , be it dancing or…
Ciater: This place is superb !! young kids, teens n adults were kept enthralled with their superb performances..Be it the Wayang Kulit (Pupet show), Peacock dance , Angklung performances.. the colorful costumes, the energetic performances of the little children , be it dancing or…
Aryaduta: This hotel is transform from Hyatt Hotel in bandung. The Aryaduta take offer this business name.   I got upgrade to the corner room. And it was huuuuuuuuge Room. With my 2 kiddos, they are looking so happy to run and run inside the room.   The pool was big and big. They provide kid pool. And it was so busy in the weekend.   This hotel also have helipad for you in you need to land here by chopper... <U+0001F607>   Thw food was great during brekafast and five star hotel services.   Overall it was great experiences here.  Will comeback sometime.
Trans: Very comfortable bed with various pillow as needed and comfortable room. Nice place to stay, with good food, extra night room service, very complete bath amenities, fresh fruit in every room (everyday), and hospitality.

White_Charter: One best palce to visit. Everythings there looks beauty. 1 motorcycle 2 persons only Rp71.000. I suggest to you to bring your own masker. There are many masker seller too. Better to visit at  10am til 12pm.
Tangkuban_Perahu: There was a great story behind the crater. It is very peaceful place. Nice weather and a good place to spend your wekend. Take your family with you.
Saung_Angklung: Eventhough I am not born In Indonesia.. I feel home in Bandung and the Saung Angklung Udjo makes it complete.
Ciater: Eventhough I am not born In Indonesia.. I feel home in Bandung and the Saung Angklung Udjo makes it complete.
Aryaduta: An old hotel, but equipped with full five-star facilities from gym, sauna, swimming pool to spa. The room is spacious and clean, but the lift is slightly too small and always busy. Breakfast is good, we decided to return for a-la-carte lunch, waiters and waitresses are polite and serve with smile.   A short walk to Bandung Indah Plaza next door makes it convenient for a cuppa or if you wish, some grocery shopping at Hypermart. For shopaholic, there are fashion outlets opposite the hotel - I can't rate the shopping, though, due to my time constraints :P
Trans: I really love to stay at this hotel, especially my wife was given a birthday surprise with the room decorated with roses. Thank you for the hotel's luxury trans team. If the price can be made cheaper, it will be more impressive again.

White_Charter: This volcano crater not so big, for photography scenery it's ok, but there's no private bus allowed. The smell of the sulphur it's ok too. For me, no need wear mask. At the entrance, some stalls sell souvenirs, masks, fresh strawberry, fresh blueberry, candied strawberry and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Amazing view but beware of scammers who tries to sell you sweet strawberries. The box of fruit looks deep in depth, but its all cardboard fillings below. Strawberries are only at the top layer. Do keep a lookout for their fresh avacados on your drive down, by the roadside…
Saung_Angklung: A good place to visit whether you're kid, adult or old people. You will see various performance ie wayang, dance and music. And you will also learn how to play Angklung. Very recommended.
Ciater: A good place to visit whether you're kid, adult or old people. You will see various performance ie wayang, dance and music. And you will also learn how to play Angklung. Very recommended.
Aryaduta: Didn't know the hotel at first, as it was formerly named and owned by the other hotel brand. Once I read it has access to the mall (Bandung Indah Plaza), I knew exactly the location. The mall access is one of the plus points of the hotel, my family and I ended spend our afternoon at the mall while waiting for dinner time with the other visiting relatives. The room is spacious as I got the corner room. My son can even run around the room freely. Location is the best, you can get to major city spots and restaurants easily. Close to Factory Outlets in Jalan Riau, and Gedung Sate. Going back to Jakarta is also easy as the access to the highway is close by. Will def staying here again when I'm visiting Bandung.
Trans: the hotel was excellent...highly recommended for business and family. the pool was great for children to play. the food was great and lost of choices. the meeting room was nice for discussion and presentation.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih was a good place to visit. nice scenic view. but the service provided was still far from superficial. it was too hard to even buy a ticket, they mistook information. 2 of us, and we had to pay for 3, after further explanation, they apologized.   the journey to the…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Must seen, but beware. It is an expensive price for outside tourists with very agressive tourguides who want to force you to take a guide while it is not necessary. You can do it on your own if you have a good condition. The atmosphere is smelly and heavy downwards so take your…
Saung_Angklung: I have been here twice. It was amazing! I really enjoyed the show. Just come and bought ticket on the spot. When you come with a group, you need to make a reservation first. Talk about the show, we not only see and listening to the music. They also asked us playing Angklung…
Ciater: I have been here twice. It was amazing! I really enjoyed the show. Just come and bought ticket on the spot. When you come with a group, you need to make a reservation first. Talk about the show, we not only see and listening to the music. They also asked us playing Angklung…
Aryaduta: One of 5 stars hotel in Bandung, it was by Hyatt and now changed to local. But doesn't mean they are lowering their standard. The hotel is still maintain very well and i am delight to share my great stay with Aryaduta Bandung. Located in the downtown and easy to access to hot spot in Bandung, and event closed to BIP Mal (Bandung Indah Plaza) and easy to find local food near by. Again, what my expect during stay in hotel is fulfills - Good location, Good room and good bath up, clean and tidy, good breakfast, friendly staff and good internet connection, so nothing i left from this hotel.  Staffs very polite and friendly and helpful, and what additionally i can convey here is other great facilities such as Gym/Fitness center is very complete with many equipment (so no queuing with…
Trans: I enjoy staying here...very nice n very comfortable place to relax or business or spend holiday with families.. We satisfied for all service and the room,, and the breakfast buffee also good taste,,,,

White_Charter: Kawah putih was a nice place to visit to see it on ur own a turquoise lake. But please be aware of the smell of sulphur and you may buy a face mask for IDR 5,000 at the entrance or bring a wet towel on ur own. Not advisable to stay long if u have breathing problem
Tangkuban_Perahu: It located in 1 hour (drive) away from Bandung City. Whether is bit cold in the morning compared to Bandung City. It would be better if you could go weekdays. - coz you will find less crowd and less ticket fee..
Saung_Angklung: Well worth visiting and the band and instruments are unique. There were varius categories fo musicians from juniors just starting out to fully experienced complete orchestra. I also enjoyed the opportunity to play an Angklung (makes one note so need 7 other persons to play the…
Ciater: Well worth visiting and the band and instruments are unique. There were varius categories fo musicians from juniors just starting out to fully experienced complete orchestra. I also enjoyed the opportunity to play an Angklung (makes one note so need 7 other persons to play the…
Aryaduta: When I got there it was still under Hyatt.. I was amazed how this  old hotel was so flawless with age. I was on business trip and checked in late. So i had no time checking the other facilities. I notice that the room is spotlessly clean and the staff was womderfull during breakfast. They greet us and have our luggage handled. The breakfast has lots of variety and tasty. No lines seen even it was a pretty busy morning.
Trans: Staff was friendly and helpful. room is very clean. The best in Bandung, steps away to family theme park. Very modern and well maintained hotel. Facilities are OK to my standard. Had a very good stay with my family

White_Charter: A beautiful aquamarine lake set in a large flooded volcano crater. Its a bit of a nightmare drive to get to it but the scenery improves as you climb up the mountain through the starwberry field and market garden - which are beauitful. Its a bit expensive if you enter the park by…
Tangkuban_Perahu: the entrance fee to tangkuban perahu for indonesian is really cheap but for foreigner they cost Rp 200k. I went there with my Malaysian friends. and they got the indonesian price as well. Since i am the one that sit beside the driver :))do you get what i mean?<U+0001F604><U+0001F604><U+0001F604> since…
Saung_Angklung: I was impressed with the Angklung played by young people in saung mang ujo..Traditional Music with modern creative touch. Saung Mang Ujo is one cultural heritage that we must preserve. I support this art can go international.
Ciater: I was impressed with the Angklung played by young people in saung mang ujo..Traditional Music with modern creative touch. Saung Mang Ujo is one cultural heritage that we must preserve. I support this art can go international.
Aryaduta: Location : Good close to shopping  Rooms : Large and offers a good view. Amenities in the rooms are good including toiletries   Service : Courteous and attentive. Kiki who took our check-in is very good.  Food ; Breakfast spread is good.
Trans: Bathroom towels unclean, not sterilized and unpleasant smell. Being a five star hotel this was a great disppointment. However overall service and amenities are good. Restaurant staff needs strengthen english communication

White_Charter: I really love this place. Good scenery for photography. Too bad it's too crowded and they charged alot for foreigners, but not as much as Tangkuban Perahu. Best time to come: EARLY MORNING. If there's something I could change, I wish the visitors are not so many.
Tangkuban_Perahu: To get the mountain is rather tough for us since we do not own any vehicle. we got there on gojek. the ticket was expensive (Rp 30.000). then there are gangs that pursue us to use their bike for another expensive rate. first was 100.000 for two, then decreased to 60.000, when we…
Saung_Angklung: It's a good place to learn about one of the oldest Indonesian bamboo music heritage. And the show are very interactive, good for kids & also adult.
Ciater: It's a good place to learn about one of the oldest Indonesian bamboo music heritage. And the show are very interactive, good for kids & also adult.
Aryaduta: I stayed in for two nights. Apart from some faults regarding the key card, the whole experience was splendid. Located right besides Bandung Indah Plaza, the place was spacious and neat. The staffs were very helpful and super nice.
Trans: Amazing, nice, classy, children happy with facilities, definitely will come back again if i have a chance to visit bandung again with my family. 3 days 2 nights not enough to enjoy this hotel. My input is just for breakfast menu, have to increase the taste and variety

White_Charter: Have heard very nice reviews, so I thought let's check it out. When there from bandung by changing 3 angkot and bus.  Nothing much to see. Just the blue green water. As the place is at very high altitude so the weather is cold. Do take a jacket and an umbrella also. Happy make 2…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Two Volcanos could be seen, a smaller one and the bigger one. Entrance if you are a foreigner 200,000 IDR car 25,000. But Really worth it. I love these sites. Its still alive, can smell the Sulphur, see the smoke. But no issues. Evening view is good. Closer to the hot spring…
Saung_Angklung: We arrived at 15.30 when the show just begun. The tickets cost us IDR60K (adults) and IDR 40K (child) and it include a souvenir (mini angklung necklace/pin) and a bottle of water/ice cream bar. Many songs played with angklung creatively by the kids and teenagers.  Everyone was…
Ciater: We arrived at 15.30 when the show just begun. The tickets cost us IDR60K (adults) and IDR 40K (child) and it include a souvenir (mini angklung necklace/pin) and a bottle of water/ice cream bar. Many songs played with angklung creatively by the kids and teenagers.  Everyone was…
Aryaduta: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights and we absolutely loved it. Service was excellent and there are absolutely no complaints! The facilities are great as well. Did not get a chance to check out the spa though. Breakfast spread was amazing too. They had both western and local food. They even had Jamu which is medicinal/health supplements mainly consumed by ladies. Would definitely stay here again the next time we visit!
Trans: Staff is really helpful and room is smell nicely. Breakfast is tasty; hot beverages i.e. chocolate, coffee and tea are served great! Swimming pool is warm:) suitable for morning swimming. It's best place for family trip as they offer sand-swimming pool and great activities for the kids

White_Charter: I went here on a very raining and busy day. The travel up took some time because the traffic was very bad with narrow roads and even longer going back in these older style buses/vans. It was also pouring with rain and quite windy. But I must say I enjoyed this trip and our time…
Tangkuban_Perahu: You drive drive and drive and finally you arrive there and the amount of money you pay for it is just not ok. Way too high for this sight compared to others and the difference of tourist between locals is just not ok for me. There are nicer crates in Indonesia like the white…
Saung_Angklung: We went to the Angklung show which lasted over one and a half hour. Filled with Angklung music, dances and at the end all the spectators joined the Angklung orchestra by playing 5 songs using signs shown by the host. Very interesting and fun for the whole family. Also went to…
Ciater: We went to the Angklung show which lasted over one and a half hour. Filled with Angklung music, dances and at the end all the spectators joined the Angklung orchestra by playing 5 songs using signs shown by the host. Very interesting and fun for the whole family. Also went to…
Aryaduta: We stayed here like, twice or more, several years ago when it was a Hyatt Regency. During the stay the TV was still a CRT TV! But that is the past.  We aren't aware about the operator change in February (from a Hyatt Regency into a locally-operated hotel, operated by a famous developer called the Lippo Group) until last month! We stayed in a different hotel last month, and this month we got the chance to experience the hotel after the operations transfer.  The lobby was still the same, as shown in the picture.  Our room is a DX (deluxe) premium suite, and things had slightly changed. The TV has been converted into a flat TV, now there's Wi-Fi, and the Hyatt logo in the swimming pool's mens' bath's exterior wall, has been removed. The rest are the same, as same as when the hotel…
Trans: This hotel is awesome, its location and facilities are nice, the services are very good, especially the breakfast. Just in walking distance you can find anykinds of food in its mall called TSM, Trans Studio Mall. Just walked around the hotel you can access the society around including their facilities such as Bank, Supermarket, street food, mass transportation etc.

White_Charter: If you travel during rainy season, better be prepared with rain coat or umbrella. I actually prefer raincoat because by then, your hands are free from holding umbrella, and you can take pictures Just make sure you protect your camera. Wear something warm, trust me, it's chilly…
Tangkuban_Perahu: The traffic was terrible in Bandung city.  The guide from Jack tour could only drive at ~ 20 to 30 km/hr.  Although it was less than 50 Km from town, but it took us almost close to 2 hrs to reach Tangkuban Perahu from our hotel in downtown Bandung.   I visited this place more…
Saung_Angklung: I went there last week with my wife, two little daughters, my sisters and my brother in law. We went for a visit in the morning and saw the workshop and talked with a man who was making the angklung, Mr Rahmat. We took photos, walked around and bought some cute gifts. In the…
Ciater: I went there last week with my wife, two little daughters, my sisters and my brother in law. We went for a visit in the morning and saw the workshop and talked with a man who was making the angklung, Mr Rahmat. We took photos, walked around and bought some cute gifts. In the…
Aryaduta: Nice view over city of Bandung and mountains, very good pool. Staff is very friendly (one even speaks Dutch...) and helpful. Next to big shopping mall with Dubai style luxury (at least European level ;-)). Room facilities are perfect. Don't order the nassi in the restaurant - outside much better. Breakfast is impressive!
Trans: I and family was staying here for couple days.. the ambience of the Hotel so good, they have kids corner where the kids can play free with friendly staff there. Many activities for kids like feed the fishes, watch cinema in the weekend only i guess, the pool have beautiful white sand feel like in the real beach.. and The Restaurant has many variety of international food and local food with superrrr delicious taste! And i like the skywalk in the 18th floor there, cool :D

White_Charter: Rented a van that could fit easily fit 10 pax from Sensa Hotel at 900k for 12 hours.  It took us about 2 hours from the hotel to drive up the mountains to arrive at this attraction. The journey took us through small town roads leading up the mountains. The drive is scenic and…
Tangkuban_Perahu: We drove from Jakarta to experience the beautiful nature of Kawah Putih which is a volcano crater. The place is cooling as it is at highlands. As soon as we came out of our car, we were followed by local merchants selling souvenirs. They tagged along throughout our visit, trying…
Saung_Angklung: A daily show starting 1530 to 17.30. The complex seeks to preserve the local culture & the playing of the Angklung (wooden musical instrument made of bamboo. The children to young adults go to school in the morning & in the afternoon practice & then perform the show. The…
Ciater: A daily show starting 1530 to 17.30. The complex seeks to preserve the local culture & the playing of the Angklung (wooden musical instrument made of bamboo. The children to young adults go to school in the morning & in the afternoon practice & then perform the show. The…
Aryaduta: We are really love and enjoy to stay at this hotel. Location and the room is very good. Nice breakfast and also Hotel staff service is outstanding. Perfect to get relax.  For sure, I will come back to this Hotel.
Trans: This hotel have outstanding staff, they really kind and helpful. Great building with great room interior.  Swimming pool is very nice, hotel location is far from city centre. But near Mall and Theme park, really good for family

White_Charter: Not a big place but place looks exactly like pics. Amazed by the light greenish milky look of the waters. Do prepare your own masks else can buy before you enter. Smell can be quite strong. Recommend to go
Tangkuban_Perahu: Very interesting place,  in fact is just a hole with a little smoke coming out. But if you think that is a real vulcano it's ok to see only that instead of lava. Kids love to walk aroud the top of the vulcano. Later we went down to Kawah Domas. To go down we had to pay again and…
Saung_Angklung: Nice place to buy local gifts such local traditional music, show perfomance, but a little bit too far away
Ciater: Nice place to buy local gifts such local traditional music, show perfomance, but a little bit too far away
Aryaduta: We fist time stay at this Htl for meeting,  bqt is very nice,  big lobby,  room is big with the strong shower and hot water,  nice amenities good for bring family and B'fast is very nice menu and many choices and the staff many friendly and always smile and quick action for clear up and set table,  all the staff nice service. And good location near for shopping and center of Bandung city.Good Job I will be back.
Trans: Very Good Hotel, worthed price, strategic location.  overall this hotel verry good, for business or family leasure.  cant wait for repeat bookin in club premiere room, seeing view of Bandung city at night. and just walk a minutes from indoor theme park and shoping mall

White_Charter: The bluish white water and misty air creates a mysterious and magical background to any photo shoot. Other than the rather mild sulphuric air, it is a beautiful place to reflect and be inspired. Bring along a jacket/pullover as it can get pretty cold. A good pair of walking…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Although it is possible to book official tours to Mt Patuha it is not necessary, as it is easy to hire a taxi from Bandung which is inexpensive. The volcanic crater is quite spectacular and you are able to walk along its ridge. There is also another crater that you can walk to…
Saung_Angklung: I had a smile on my face the entire time. The performances are mostly by children aged 3 - young 20s, but the older ones are quite talented musicians and the variety of dance and music is utterly charming. The entire audience is directed in playing songs and it sounds great and…
Ciater: I had a smile on my face the entire time. The performances are mostly by children aged 3 - young 20s, but the older ones are quite talented musicians and the variety of dance and music is utterly charming. The entire audience is directed in playing songs and it sounds great and…
Aryaduta: We love the room!! It's big and it provides sofa so it can accommodate 2 adults and 2 kids. The room also provide bath tub (which now most hotels only provide shower). The location is also in the city centre and near a shopping mall.  Perfect to get relax!
Trans: room is clean, big room, comfortable for family, very good bathroom, shower good, pool is very extraordinary like water park, water temperature 30 degree so comfortable for kids, there is sand pool so kids very happy, great service, lobby was so nice

White_Charter: When you visit bandung, it's a must to visit this place..Beautiful white crater. Make sure you bring mask along when you go down to the crater location because of the strong wind and sulfur haze..if you forgot to bring one there's some guys selling disposable mask at the parking…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Beautiful view of the crater but too bad it's now dormant. I came here when i was young and there used to be alot of activity. The sulphur smell was very strong and the steam was constant. I guess it's been a while and even volcanoes die.  Like the other reviewers mentioned, too…
Saung_Angklung: It was my first time when I went here. I was going there in my field trip journey with 40 other friends. We were playing a traditional music instrument called angklung and other bamboo instruments. it was fun and fun!
Ciater: It was my first time when I went here. I was going there in my field trip journey with 40 other friends. We were playing a traditional music instrument called angklung and other bamboo instruments. it was fun and fun!
Aryaduta: We stayed at hotel aryaduta 2 nights. Location is good. You're at the heart of old town Bandung. With Braga street, asia-africa and Bank Indonesia just around the corner.  This used to be Grand Hyatt hotel, so that's promising. But you can tell it's not Hyatt anymore. As more hotels in Asia maintenance and renovation are not normal. The hotel is still impressive as a building, large rooms. But lost it's grandeur. It's dusty, not dressed up and getting old.  As always in Indonesia staff is kind and helpful. And price-quality is good. Beds are comfortable and breakfast is complete.  We liked the space in our room and the location. If you are looking for good price for large rooms and want something from where you can walk (so you're not stuck in traffic all day) stay here.
Trans: Kids club was disspapointing and quite dangerous. Dinner at the restaurant on the 3rd floor was a let down. Breakfast on the 18th floor was a horrible and uneasy experience.  Room was great, altho would love to hv more space on the table. They even provide us with bottle sterilizer (Avent brand).  Staff were friendly and hospitable (except the ones on the 18th floor that morning). They were always on guard to catch my super active energiser bunny toddler, so that she didnt run too far from the parents.

White_Charter: Kawah Putih is a highly acid lake which changes colour from bluish to whitish green with sulfur smell around.  You will never regret by visiting this crater lake! We had heaps of fun & photos taken at this wonderful place.  Tips: Do not visit during the rainy days as you would…
Tangkuban_Perahu: During our recent holiday to Bandung, Indonesia we had a chance to see the Tangkuban Perahu Volcano here. The volcano is located around 30 kms north of Bandung city. The summit or rim of the volcano is situated at a height of 2,084 meters. This volcano is considered an active…
Saung_Angklung: I m not a fan of traditional music but this one is different ... they managed to give an international touch to this traditional bamboo instrument ... the songs they play is not only our traditional 'slow-monotone- rhythm but very interesting composition that will not bore you…
Ciater: I m not a fan of traditional music but this one is different ... they managed to give an international touch to this traditional bamboo instrument ... the songs they play is not only our traditional 'slow-monotone- rhythm but very interesting composition that will not bore you…
Aryaduta: Hotel building is old but still well maintain. Room is clean, big with sofa inside. 1st came into the room there were old furnitures smell. After open the door awhile and turn on aircon, everything was fine. Available in room a big flat tv with many channels Staffs are nice with smile. Breakfast was good and many choices. They even served tradional drink call jamu. But unfortunately they served it cold instead of hot.  Pool is clean and big enough. Next to the pool there is kid's corner with some toys available. There is also gym with many modern equipments. Also available sauna room, steam room also whirpool.
Trans: The lobby was grand. The Premier room was equally grand. A whole set of toiletries include a gillete disposable shaver and Oral B toothbrush. They provide a bathbomb for that nice soak in the bathtub.  The breakfast buffet includes western and Indonesian dishes. They change the dishes daily so we looked forward to the new Indonesian dish from different parts of the country.  The kids pool was good fun for our young one and the staff are attentive. There is a kids activity room and they will have activities conducted at the pool side at some times of the day.

White_Charter: Admission which was priced at $30 000 RP gave us entrance into a still blue lake surrounded by mist. When we went, it was drizzling, making it rather cold. Bring a jacket along. Despite the bad weather that day, people surrounded the lake everywhere, taking pictures. It was hard…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Pretty nice to see the ciater formed by volcano eruption hundred years ago. Nice scenery and place to take picture of. But the entrance fee is pretty expensive and there are a lot of sellers of keychains, volcano stones, etc around.
Saung_Angklung: The show is entertaining, and audience has a chance to try playing angklung with a short course at d end of d show.
Ciater: The show is entertaining, and audience has a chance to try playing angklung with a short course at d end of d show.
Aryaduta: Everybody was so nice, like the security officer, and the receptionist. My room was on the 10th floor and we can see sunrise in the morning. I stayed in a superior room, and it was very spacious and bigger than the same room type at other hotels in Bandung. We didn't have to go far to look for something to eat, because the hotel is next to a shopping mall.
Trans: We stayed in Trans hotel for 2 nights, my husband and 1 brought our young children to stay here over the wkend. The room was way smaller than I thought. And honestly it wasn't as luxurious as I thought it would be. The staff was very friendly and welcoming though. We had our bf in the pool floor, it was very crowded but I didn't have to wait in line for a table. Food was alright, just alright. The second morning we had our bf on the 18th floor, if I remember correctly, it was way quieter and the food is the same as what they serve downstairs. So if you prefer a quieter place for bf, do consider the top floor. My kids love the pool area, they also have a kids club. But my kids find the kids club somewhat boring. Don't know why :(We didn't visit the theme pack because my kids are…

White_Charter: It took me 3 hours to get there from Bandung city (traffic jam incl.) but when we got there, its all paid off (at least 40%). The crater itself need 5 km drive from the ticketing box, you can drive by yourself or take the shuttle (different charge applied), but when you get to…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Just to see the volcano (even if not active). The view also nice...but the kaki lima seller is sooo irritating. They will follow you everywhere you go and pressure you to buy from begging to nearly threatening. But still they are so nice and willing to take picture for you.…
Saung_Angklung: It the good place for cultural of bandung. It have angklung music for play . It made by bamboo , so great.
Ciater: It the good place for cultural of bandung. It have angklung music for play . It made by bamboo , so great.
Aryaduta: The Aryaduta hotel was great and nice for family to stay. The room is clean and big. Best services, nice swimming pool,  good breakfast it has many choices. The location is next to bandung indah plaza.
Trans: Great hotel and accommodation to stay for business and leisure time with family. Located in Bandung West Java, Trans Luxury hotel provide holidays atmosphere for entire family. Great food and facility. Recommended for all type of user.

White_Charter: Not so many crater lakes in the world we can come up to.  It is a special experience if you have a chance to enjoy specific atmosphere of a crater lake named Kawah Putih and its surrounding in Ciwidey, about 47 kilometers southern of Bandung, Indonesia. You can come very close…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Visitors to bandung if u don't have much time u can give this place a miss as there are other better places to visit. Nothing special to see other than a crater view (kawah ratu) n another crater tht u can get closer to the crater (I can't recall the name) but u need a paid…
Saung_Angklung: I've been there several times yet I never felt bored. It was always a pleasant experience for me. My last came with my fiance and I m sure he enjoyed it very much.
Ciater: I've been there several times yet I never felt bored. It was always a pleasant experience for me. My last came with my fiance and I m sure he enjoyed it very much.
Aryaduta: I stayed here during a peak season (9-10 July 2016). The hotel is near the city center so it was easy to find even though you are new to Bandung. There are two kind of great hotel, the one without any flaw and problem and the one with flaws but manage to solved it. Aryaduta Bandung is the latter.   I arrived with a private car, after dropping my parent in the lobby I tried to find a parking spot, turns out the hotel have limited parking spot and I need to find it in mall's parking area, after 30 minutes I give up. I didn't know that the hotel have complimentary car valet, so in the end I used it. Nice one.  Because my parent did the check in, I didn't know what kind of room they give us, turns out it was in the 13th floor which is the smoking floor and the room is one king bed.…
Trans: nice and clean hotel..nice pool..staff is polite and friendly.. the room is clean and tidy..can't wait for next visit.. please make sure the carpet well maintain so it keep clean and good smell. and also the bathroom keep it well maintain.

White_Charter: I been to Kawah Putih 2 weeks ago and it a very beautiful crater of volcano. Moreless same like kawah ijen but kawah putih no need spent time for trekking. The trafict rules was good.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Amazing view with beautiful weather. You can have a walk around the crater to enjoy the view. I would say its really worth your effort but the entrance fee of IDR300,000/person for foreigners is a bit too much.  Tips: 1) First & foremost, you must be strong to ignore all the…
Saung_Angklung: a bit clumsy in the beginning but fun for whole activities. the moderator is quite good in english but the rundown a bit too long for me. the price is also quite reasonable for me.
Ciater: a bit clumsy in the beginning but fun for whole activities. the moderator is quite good in english but the rundown a bit too long for me. the price is also quite reasonable for me.
Aryaduta: Changed to Aryaduta from previously Hyatt in Feb 2016, this luxurious old hotel still shines its charm. Located in a very strategic location in Bandung and adjacent to a very well known mall in the city.  In general, this hotel is very well maintained. Huge room (i stayed in deluxe room), with huge king size comfortable bed, and also 2 additional adult size day bed. Bathroom with huge bath tub to soak yourself in. I also enjoy the huge tv with many channels.   The swimming pool is quite big as well (maybe about 1/4 size of an olympic size swimming pool), divided into adult and kids section. Next to the pool is a quite big kids club.  The wellness centre is also quite big, with well equipped fitness centre and spa facilities.  Breakfast menu options are not that vast but more…
Trans: Lemme tell you my honest review. I was staying at this beautiful hotel for couple of days and everything was satisfying ! Friendly staff, great food , cozy room and great service. There's no disappointed things happened during my stay here.  I also held my engagement party here and it was such a beautiful venue . Great food, friendly and helpful staffs , great reviews from my guests make it all so perfect !   Overall Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung is highly recommended for family and couple holidays :))

White_Charter: Even it took such a long time to get there from Bandung but the scenery paid it off. I thought that  the place had lower temperatures but even I wore shorts I barely felt cold. I advise, if you want to take picture, do it around in one hour regarding to the fact that the place…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Like mentioned, it is too expensive given the view we see at the crater. Since we visit in the afternoon, it is fairly empty of people and sellers. Since we politely turned down any offers of selling us things, we are left alone, so that is a good thing. One tip is to just not…
Saung_Angklung: Good performance and enjoy the time when we get to play the Angklung it self.. Kids loved it so much
Ciater: Good performance and enjoy the time when we get to play the Angklung it self.. Kids loved it so much
Aryaduta: The hotel was great and nice for family to stay and spend holiday. The room is clean and big, can add extra bed for two. Swimming pool is nice and has a kid pool. The facility are complete for five star hotel. The location is next to bandung indah plaza, so you can easy search for food. Me and family was very happy with the services and the whole ambient of the hotel. And will staying here for the next holiday.
Trans: First impression it was a high class hotel, the price was suitable with the facilities. But when we try to take a rest, we can still hear people in the next room talking with standard voices. It was not so comfort.

White_Charter: Its an interesting place to visit. The place surrounded with white rocks and kind of foggy, it is really cold but the water feels warm.
Tangkuban_Perahu: Very Expensive enterance fee for tourist. Dont go there, I recommed other place which is more beautiful thn tangkuban perahu, you can go to ciwidey onl one hour and half from bandung.
Saung_Angklung: We are family with young children enjoy this place soooo much, we get free neclace with mini angklung locket as a ticket and the best part we can enjoy either drink or home made ice cream at the entrance. Like everyone said... its worth it!
Ciater: We are family with young children enjoy this place soooo much, we get free neclace with mini angklung locket as a ticket and the best part we can enjoy either drink or home made ice cream at the entrance. Like everyone said... its worth it!
Aryaduta: This hotel has seamlessly changed from the Hyatt Hotel to the Hotel Aryaduta.  Its lovely old world charm, combined with modern comfortable upgrades makes this hotel one of the best hotels in Bandung. Easy adjoining access to shops, with plenty of kaki lima around the outside each evening.
Trans: Best location, great breakfast, friendly staff, pleasant room and many more.... Wish to visit and stay at Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung again... We hope there will be more special discount with Mega Card...

White_Charter: Travelled about 2 hours plus just to visit this place. It is only worth it if you explore the other places of interest within the area.  Kawah Putih itself is pretty cool. Great place to take an apocalyptic style photo.
Tangkuban_Perahu: It cost about USD30 for foreigners vs USD3 for local.  For the view and to do activities, I would not  highly recommend for that price to visit.  Interesting myth to the crater, nice view but just a bit overpriced.
Saung_Angklung: Apart from being a little further away from the city, Saung Angklung Udjo is worth a visit if you're into culture. Learn how Angklungs are made and there is a daily cultural performance (Wayang Golek and Peacock dance, etc) catered to tourists.
Ciater: Apart from being a little further away from the city, Saung Angklung Udjo is worth a visit if you're into culture. Learn how Angklungs are made and there is a daily cultural performance (Wayang Golek and Peacock dance, etc) catered to tourists.
Aryaduta: We visited this hotel few days ago. This hotel is very well maintains. Old, but clean.  Walking distance to a lot of amenities.   Some regularly use equipments (eg. Hair dryer) might need updating, but it still in a working order.   Staffs was very helpfull and professional.   Love the swimming pool and the traditional musical instruments in kids club.  And to my supprise... I was very happy to be able to enjoy "jamu" for couple of morning at the breakfast buffet.
Trans: Love staying in this hotel... So clean, staff are great.. Facility good.. Pool is great for kids to play. 1 area with mall. No need to go far to just do window shopping. Definitely want to go back there again!!!

White_Charter: The journey itself took about 2.5 - 3 hours from Bandung city (which may take longer with the traffic jams) unless your driver knows how to take the small roads to avoid the jams.  When you reach the entrance (near the ticket counter), there will be lots of people selling…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Generally its a nature tourist destination with a good view, with fresh an cold air. They have 2 crater : Ratu Crater and Domas Crater.   Pros about this destination: - For foreign tourist price its  not worth it. For foreingn tourist ticket fee IDR 200.000 for weekdays and IDR…
Saung_Angklung: I was not expecting that the performance is that good, yet it turns out to be an extraordinary experience and performance. having heard some feedback from friends and reading several comments in tripadvisor, we planned to spend our afternoon in this place, first we had lunch in…
Ciater: I was not expecting that the performance is that good, yet it turns out to be an extraordinary experience and performance. having heard some feedback from friends and reading several comments in tripadvisor, we planned to spend our afternoon in this place, first we had lunch in…
Aryaduta: Choose Aryaduta was a perfect decision, location is perfect near with shopping center, room is huge and the staff is really nice and friendly  I invite my family to do Iftar ( breakfasting ) in the restaurant. And it has many many choices, its no kidding when they say they have 100 menu for the break fasting  The staff is very helpful, i saw the GM came to the restaurant and make sure if everything is ready for the breakfasting  For sure i will recommend this hotel to my friends
Trans: need explanation all room sevices especially in room spa, all aplication in room such as televison, food sevices, in room services, need more varian for welcome drink, diskon rate for weekdays, avalibility swim toll

White_Charter: This crater lake is certainly worth a visit if you visit Bandung. The cooler climate and the misty appearance make it a unique sight compared to other places in West Java.
Tangkuban_Perahu: This is a very beautiful place with a great view and nice weather. It is really crowded at weekend especially on holiday. If you want to go there on a weekend or on holiday, it would be better if you stay around Tangkuban Perahu. If you stay far away from Tangkuban Perahu, you…
Saung_Angklung: I second what previous reviewers have said. The best part is the "community art" part where each guest gets to play an angklung, and in no time the whole audience is performing a song amazingly well.  Afterwards we bought an angklung to take home.  Even one angklung at home has…
Ciater: I second what previous reviewers have said. The best part is the "community art" part where each guest gets to play an angklung, and in no time the whole audience is performing a song amazingly well.  Afterwards we bought an angklung to take home.  Even one angklung at home has…
Aryaduta: The hotel is located next to Bandung Indah Plaza (BIP) and there's direct access from hotel lobby, it's very convenient if you want to find food or shopping.  Even though the hotel is bit old but Room is nice & clean. The room size is big enough, carpeted & you get a bathtub too! Breakfast selection are plenty enough, taste good.  Ordered spaghetti bolognese for room service, and came fast & in big portion.  Overall it's nice to stay here :)
Trans: We stayed in this  hotel  for  four  night in 2 connected  rooms  the rooms  are  very  big  and in excellent condition. The pool  is nice but it was closed  for maintenance  for 3 days during  our stay  The breakfast  is excellent  with to many  choices the staff very friendly  The hotel is connected  to the mall and the indoor  theme park .

White_Charter: The journey to this place takes about 2.5 hour by car from the Bandung city, but it's definitely worth it. The lake is in the colour of turquoise and the view is stunning! The smell of sulphur was bearable for me and my friends, so none of us bought the masks sold there. The…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Beautiful Volcano. We went to Tangkuban Perahu in July 2015. I was surprised for the new tickets for foreigners, 200 K Rupiah pp (14 Eur). The ticket is just 17 000 Rupiah less expensive than Bromo Volcano.  I believe the ticket from 2 years ago for foreigner was about 50 K…
Saung_Angklung: You can learn more about Angklung with interesting way. But it's hard time to reach this place especially if you come in week end because the traffic jam is terrible. Our scheduale to visit this place on Saturday, and we already reserved that. But we can't reach that due to the…
Ciater: You can learn more about Angklung with interesting way. But it's hard time to reach this place especially if you come in week end because the traffic jam is terrible. Our scheduale to visit this place on Saturday, and we already reserved that. But we can't reach that due to the…
Aryaduta: This is one of the old hotel in bandung but the location nearby Bandung Indah Plaza (BIP) and you can your car there if the hotel car parking is full.  The room is cleannes.  I think they have good maintenance building. The location nearby Factory outlet at Riau Street.  We love this hotel.
Trans: if you want to stay in this hotel on weekend better booked for your stay long before the day to guarantee you got the room. The staff is super helpful and they treat us the same even we are using a voucher

White_Charter: I am glad we chose this visit besides the tangkuban perahu which had a fare hike for tourist. this place takes you about 3 hours away from the city of bandung. due the poor road system it was a boring and tiring journey but all worth it. upon reaching the shuttle bus station…
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entrance fee to the park is Rp. 300k per person which is expensive. Local rate is only Rp. 30k.  If you have money to waste go with a guided trekking tour to see Domas crater and get a foot massage in the hot spring. The tour will take more than 2 hours but when you pay at the…
Saung_Angklung: Repertoire quite well-designed. Amusing to watch the children who were pretty natural, seemed to be guileless and also enjoying themselves. Audience got to try their hand in mass playing the angklong - which turned out to be really quite fun.
Ciater: Repertoire quite well-designed. Amusing to watch the children who were pretty natural, seemed to be guileless and also enjoying themselves. Audience got to try their hand in mass playing the angklong - which turned out to be really quite fun.
Aryaduta: Stayed in this hotel from 22 June to 25 June 2016 with family and friends. The hotel is next Bandung Indah Plaza. The hotel has direct access. This hotel may be old but is clean and has big rooms. Food is good at the Club Level esp its breakfast and they serve wine & beer with a good selection of finger foods from 5.30pm to 8pm.   We stayed at the Club Level and Ms Devita is always greets us with a cherry smile and  is ready to assist with any enquiries. In fact, the staff at the Club Level are well trained in hospitality -a new 5 stars service. My elderly parents likes her attitude.   This hotel is well located in the middle of those suggested sites - jeans street and nearby Ciwalk, Paris Van Java, Rumah Mode and  Pasar Baru ( a seven story market selling from clothes,…
Trans: Trans Luxury is very near mall and entertainment place Trans Studio. So you just walk to the beside lobby you can find the mall. One of the big mall in Bandung and quite a lot merchant. The hotel design is good, the service also good. From the beginning and the pool side restaurant, especially in the pool side there is a waiters very humble and tell us about Bandung, give us some recommemded drink and food the the pool side restaurant. There are several pool which the favorite for kids is pool with sand. And also pool with the replicate water fall. There is a rooftop restaurant, if you have a dinner there you can see the Bandung city view All the faciliies is awesome, but there is a little bit more improvement in the breakfast area. Maybe we stayed in a full occupied, when we…

White_Charter: A breathtaking view of a sleeping volcano with a greenish lake. The cool air with those fog on the lake surface will make you capturing thousands of photo. LOL! But remember to check the weather report before depart, where else you might face heavy rain when you reach there.  …
Tangkuban_Perahu: Entry fee for tourist is IDR300,000 (for weekend) or IDR200,000 (for weekday), while for local are IDR30,000 or less. There is nothing much to see other than a big rock, which is not that magnificent. You have to pay another IDR400,000 (at least) to go down to the crater or…
Saung_Angklung: The location is in Bandung suburban area and easy to reach. The show started by a traditional dance, wayang (puppet) show and continue with amazing colaboration shoe of traditional and modern music instrument. Then some children performs great musical show and asked us to sing…
Ciater: The location is in Bandung suburban area and easy to reach. The show started by a traditional dance, wayang (puppet) show and continue with amazing colaboration shoe of traditional and modern music instrument. Then some children performs great musical show and asked us to sing…
Aryaduta: The room was good, quite big and the hotel itself had amenitites like swimming pool,tennis court and my kids enjoyed swimming pool. The breakfast was good and had lot of options vegeterians. The hotel staff were good and very kind. The transportation is available from the hotel for the city tour but was slightly expensive.  Overall had an awesome stay in hotel.
Trans: Very much on the fence for the quality of this hotel. No doubt the service is top notch , good service provided from arrival to departure . Very good training on the staff. Room furnitures are great too . Nice looking room with comfortable bed. Lovely pool at this hotel as well  The problem we had was that there were insects in the room (mosquito ? not sure) which ended up with insect bites on our daughter face and hand on last day before check out - during the night sleep. Two days later at our home - swelling is bigger - whole hand swell , one side face swollen too - all because of insect toxic bite.  Hotel staff did service recovery on this (thanks to nice gesture) but then - as parent I don't really care much of service recovery when looking at the damage from the insect…

White_Charter: Hate the smell but like the unique environment. Not something you see everyday. Might not be a good idea to bring children... If you do just make sure you bring mask for your children and yourself.
Tangkuban_Perahu: it is a beautiful sight. the place has less foul smell compared to kawah. do not go with the tour guides, touting for tour guides and items. it was annoying. but other than that, if you have a personal driver that you brought along, just ask him to tag along with you all the way.
Saung_Angklung: We visited Saung Angklung and were impressed by the rendition of little kids. The best part was the orchestra by the audience.
Ciater: We visited Saung Angklung and were impressed by the rendition of little kids. The best part was the orchestra by the audience.
Aryaduta: Despite its old age, this hotel is well maintained. I still feel its luxuriousness from the Hyatt era. The rooms are spacious and clean. I especially love its pool and the whirlpool and sauna facilities.   I booked 2 rooms and send an email with my requests a few days before check-in to the hotel. I'd like to thank Ms. Priscilla who fulfill all my requests.   My only complaint was the experience i had during check-out. The guy (don't know his name) who checked me out did not say a word. He didn't say "hello or good afternoon or thanks". It was a big let down for leaving a 5 star hotel like that. I believe the last impression should be as good as, if not better than the first impression.
Trans: Kids very enjoy the room and swimming pool.. Many kind of food on breakfast.. The hotel very good ambience.. Valet and service they are good.. The room very comfortable and make me feel relax.. Thank you!

White_Charter: We were there in the morning and had 1 hour to stand at the lake's edge to admire its beauty before we had to run for sheltor.  The clouds came in and the rain fell in such continous torrents that the place we took sheltor in flooded!
Tangkuban_Perahu: Been there on August 2015. Entry fee is 300K rupiah per person. The ride up to the summit you can smell the sulphur (i think). Smells like rotten egg or farts. Temperature was cool, I recommend a jacket if you can't stand the cold. Very scenic. Greatest turn off here is that…
Saung_Angklung: I like this place as it has nice thins related to Indonesian culture. The shows are fun to watch too. I recommend this place if you want to know about the local culture. But the road to get there is pretty rough though. Better use a rental car.
Ciater: I like this place as it has nice thins related to Indonesian culture. The shows are fun to watch too. I recommend this place if you want to know about the local culture. But the road to get there is pretty rough though. Better use a rental car.
Aryaduta: This Hotel is in a very good location in Bandung, very big, good breakfast, great pool, you can actually swim, good gym, I could stay there for a week, no complaints :) if you play tennis bring your gear, you will be able to use it.
Trans: We love Trans Lux!  There are so many great features: clean, well-appointed rooms; fun pool; great breakfast buffet; excellent location.  But the best part is the people - staff make sure to solve anything that may come up during the trip with sensibility and a sincere desire to improve your experience.  We love Trans Lux!
